po nyon cig /mchod pa'i las dag byed 'dod na/ /gnyis dgon gtsug lag chu mig 'gram/ /mtshe'u lteng ka khron pa'i steng / /dbyar zla gsum la gnas par bya/ /dbyibs legs ran mdzes byi dor bya/ /ba yi rnam lnga spos dang dri/ /thig le lnga dang ldan par

bya/ /dbus su hU~M bri gsal bar bya/ /oM phA pho phai pha~M 'di dag bzhi las rdzogs par bskyed/ klu yi rgyal po rgya mtsho ni/ /lus dkar rin chen sbrul mgo gsum/ /lag na rin chen sdong bu'o/ /klu yi rgyal po kun nas gdugs/ /sbrul mgo gnyis pa kha

dog ser/ /rin chen 'bar ba lag na'o/ /chu lha mgo lnga kha dog dmar/ /lag na pad ma 'bar ba'o/ /klu rgyal shing la pu ra ka/ /lag na sprin phung kha dog ljang / /rgyal dang rje dang bram ze dmangs/ /so so'i rigs kyi rgyal po ste/ /spra tshil zha nye bag zan la/ /

gzugs su yang ni mdzes par bya/ /sems can 'khor gyis bskor bar bya/ /klu sman sna tshogs dkar dang mngar/ /tshogs par byas la mchod sbyin bya/ /kham phor sbu gu mchu lnga par/ /blugs la kha bcad gnas su sba/ /gso bar bya ba'i las ni rab/ /spyan

drangs gdan dang phyag skyabs bstod/ /smon lam la sogs rgya cher bya/ /bden pa bdar zhing bsdigs par bya/ /dug rnams dbyung ba'i las dag ni/ /ra~M ya~M kha~M las byung ba yi/ /'khor lo rnam gsum me rlung chu/ /bsreg gtor bkru bya stong nyid kyis/ /

'khor lo chen po gnas par bya/ /hU~M las gyur par ldan par bya/ /bzang skyob pa dang dogs nyes dang / /mnyam dang ldan pas mchod pa bya/ /de nang de bzhengs mtshan nas brjod/ /nya stong dus mchod sri zhus bskor/ /des ni don rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /

dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las dug dbyung zhing mchod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ dus ngan tha mar gyur pa'i tshe/ /sdig la mi 'dzem mi dge spyod/

mtshams med byed cing chos dkor 'jig /mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa dang / /skams dang zha grum gzhogs phyed na/ /de'i tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung / /nyon cig dbang po 'khor gyi mchog /log sred gdul dka' gdol ba can/ /zhi bas mi 'dul gang zag gi/ /

gshed du 'khor lo 'di bskos so/ /kro d+ha rA dza'i gzungs bcas la/ /rdo rje rgya gram mtha' bskor rdo rje'i rwa/ /brtson 'grus bzhi ldan dbus dang lnga ru de'o/ /de las rgyas pa dag tu bskor 'dod na/ /de la khyad par khyams dang yi ge ni/ /bcu gcig ldan byas

mtshon re'i ming rus gcar/ /khyams gcig hU~M dang ming rus mang na sbrag /dbus khyams sngags bri mang na de dang sbrag /gcig la rdo rje hU~M bar mang na gcar/ /rkang pa mos ma shigs na pho yi las/ /de ma byung na pho mo sbrag pa'i las/ /bsod

nams can gyi skal ma thul na/ /srid pa'i stong bzlog 'khor lo dkrugs te bskor/ /ro ras la bri bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro/ /smyu gu byas la gdan nag yig sngon bri/ /dri rgod shing bsregs bong khrag bong dug sbyar/ /dbus dang brtson khang bzhi por hU~M bar gcad/ /

dgod pa kun byed las rnams thams cad kyi//sngags 'di pho dang mor bri bar du gsad/ /oM badzra tsaN Da ma ha ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ pho dang mor bskor rabs chad pho mor gzhug /dbus kyi hU~M btags srad bu tshangs bug dbyung / /yak+Sha kha phaT phyogs bzhir gzhag

par bya/ /rdo rje rab tu hU~M bar de bar bzhag /dug sna khrag snas ga'u nag por byug /gu gul rgya tshil tshil chen ra lug rmang kha ni/ /khu ba nag pos bya bar rab tu shis/ /bong gri nag po'i rngog ma dri rgod shi skra dang / /yugs sa mo yi skra shad skud pas dkri/ /

yugs sa mo yi dor rtas dril la sba/ /pho mo'i thod pa steng 'og rgya gram bri/ /ri rab mnan byas mtha' gnyis dang po bzhi/ /bang rim sngags bris steng du rgya gram dgab/ /rgya gram 'og khung steng du khru do'i tshad/ /bang rim bzhi la sngags 'di sku gsung thugs/ /

nga yi ri rabadag tu mtshon phyir bri/ /oM la~M hU~M la~M sta~M b+ha nA~M/ oM badzra tsaN Da nA~M zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las drag po 'khor lo'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //de'i tshe de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mthus 'jig rten gyi

khams kyang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos so/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la la la ni/ g.yas su 'khor ba'i tshul gyis 'khrugs so/ /la la ni g.yon du 'khor ba'i tshul gyis 'khrugs so/ /la la ni bla 'og dgye dgu'i tshul gyis 'khrugs so/ /la la ni mtho

dman dang grum pa'i tshul gyis 'khrugs te de dag na gnas pa'i gdug pa can thams cad rab tu myos nas/ kha nas khrag ngan skyugs pa dag kyang bskus te/ thams cad kyang ga na ba der thad du 'dus nas phyag 'tshal ste mgrin gcig tu skad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

kye ma snga ma ma mthong khro bdag 'jigs pa'i sku/ /rab tu drag pa ya mtshan e ma ho/ /thugs rjes dgongs shig bdag cag 'bangs su mchi/ /de las 'gal na dmyal bar ltung bar shog /ces gsol zhing 'khod do/ /de nas bdud kyi rgyal po skos kyi bdag

po bdud bye ba 'bum phrag dang bcas pas mgrin gcig gis srog gi snying po phul ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig pa 'di bzhes su gsol/ oM nag po tri Ta tri Ta tri ling tra ta ha ke Na/ bdag cag gi rig pa 'di gang na gnas pa der bdud kyis

'gal bar mi bgyid do/ /gang yid la dgos pa de grub par bgyid do/ /phas byad sngags dang sbyor ba btang ba yang phyir ldog go/ /de nas gza' rgod chen po rA hu la 'khor gza' 'bum phrag dang bcas pas mgrin gcig gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul

ba/ /shu shu rak+Sha tshal pa/ kro d+ha kro le shwar/ rA hu la/ tsa ti tsa ti/ bdag cag gi rig pa 'di gang na gnas pa der gza' rnams kyis 'gal bar mi bgyid do/ /phas gtang ba yang slar de nyid la mchi'o/ /'di 'dzin pa la ci 'tshal ba yang stsol bar bgyid

do/ /de nas dkar po dung gi thor tshugs can la sogs pa'i rgyal po 'khor 'bum phrag dang bcas pa lhags nas mgrin gcig gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ bra h+ma pu Did Sha/ a bar ta rA dzad+ha na rak+Sha tsi ta phyung rA dza tsi ta ra dza phyung rA dza tsi ta gtubs/

bdag cag gi rig pa 'di gang na mchis pa der yul 'khor dang dpag tshad du 'gal bar mi bgyid do/ /phas btang ba yang de nyid la slar mchi'o/ /de nas btsan dmar po srog len btsan 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pas mgrin gcig gis rang rtags srog gi

snying po phul ba/ A bi shu rA dza tri liM bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'di las 'da' bar mi bgyid do/ /phas btang bar gyur kyang slar de nyid la slar mchi'o/ /de nas gshin rje'i rgyal po smigs pa zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas pas mgrin

gcig tu rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ ya ma rA dza ya ma tsit+ta bdag gi rig pa spyod pa der bdag gi gnod pa mi spobs lags te/ gnod pa'i rgyun spangs nas phas gtang ba yang slar de nyid la mchi'o/ /de nas ma mo'i rgyal mo mkha' dbyings kyi yum lnga dang / /

bdud kyi gshin rje'i sring mo srid pa'i phung byed re ma ti la sogs pa/ ma mo'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dag gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul pa/ rag mo mA mA ru lu snying kha rak+Sha dza pA la ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ /bdag cag gi gsang ba'i sngags 'di spyod pa der srung ba dang

bskyab pa bgyid do/ /'khor dang bcas te bka' bzhin bgyid do/ /phas gtang ba yang slar de nyid la mchi'o/ /de nas klu 'khor dang bcas pas mgrin gcig tu rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ nA gA rA dza nA ga ni/ /gang na rig sngags kyi rgyal po spyod pa der bdag gi

klu'i gnod pa'i rgyun spong ngo / phas gtang pa yang slar de nyid la mchi'o zhes so so nas rang rtags srog gi snying po phul te dam bcas so/ /de nas dbang po chen pos/ khro bo'i bdag po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /srid pa dbang can 'di rnams kun/ /'khor los

zlog na ji ltar bzlog /bzlog thabs khyad par bka' stsol cig /bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha'i dbang po mA ra ya'i tsakra dag las so so'i sngags 'khor bri/ byad sngags phyir zlog dam tshig bzlog btags so/ /mchu gsum snying lpags med pa'i thod pa dang / /

ro nya sbal shugs phag thod rnal gri mo/ /dri rgod skyud ga thod chen nang dag tu/ /rab tu drag tu bskor ba'i 'khor lo gzhug /'ong 'gro 'drul srang rgya gram lam dag tu/ /e dong bru byas rgya sol mi khyi ra/ /rta khrag rme khrag nag pos sbyangs la bsku/ /dbus bcug

mtha' bskor mnan pa'i las dag bya/ /yang na thun du spags la khros pas 'phang / /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las dregs pas srog gi snying po phul ba dang / mngon spyod drag po'i las kyis bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu drug

pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol ba/ kye bstan pa 'jig pa'i dus dag na/ /thun gyis tshar gcad bstan du gsol/ /bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig /rdzas dang sngags bcas ting 'dzin gsum/ /khros pas zhe sdang bskyed

par bya/ /zhe sdang dran pas gdug rdzas bsag /yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe til/ /gze ma skyer pa se ba'i tsher/ /thun sngags 'di bzlas brnags la brab/ /a mu kam ni gtor ma 'am/ /mtshan ngan ka pA la ru gzhug /oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ mA ra

ya thun phob/ dbang po la yaM/ srog la yaM/ tsit+ta la yaM/ go ro tsa na la yaM/ gzas pa'i mtshan mos rdo rje'i thog tu dbab/ /gang dmigs gzas pa'i mthu dang rdzu 'phrul rnams/ /bdag la bsdu byas rtog pa'i bag chags bkru/ /sngags 'dis rol

cig brjod cing b+ha ling dgril/ oM ba li~M ta/ ba li~M pU dza ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha hoH/ badzra kro d+ha tsaN Da/ ba li~M khA hi khA hi/ badzra kro d+ha tsaN Da ha ha ha/ he he he/ b+ha TA swA hA/ sbrul dang sbal pa nya dang chu srin snying / /sha chen khrag chen longs spyod rnam pa kun/ /shes

rab mchog gi phyag rgya cher bsam la/ yaM gtor raM bsreg khaM bkrus bdud rtsir bsgyur/ /a mr-i ta dag sngags 'dis sbyang bar bya/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ badzra a mr-i ta hU~M hrIHthA/ oM ma hA raka ta dz+wa la raM khaM/ khA hi khA hi/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hA hA hA/ phyi nang

gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya mtsho'i tshogs/ /dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pa kun/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams gang bar rab dmigs la/ /skye med dang bas nyin mtshan brtson par bya/ /mi dmigs mnyam gzhag ye shes rab ldan pa/ /sku gsung dus gsum

sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /sems dpa' sems ma khro bo khro mo'i tshogs/ /mchod pa chen po de mnyes sbyin bya'i sems can tshim/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las thun drag mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste bcu bdun

pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang bo la sogs te/ ri rab dang bar snang la sogs pa la gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / lha'i na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / rgyan sna tshogs pa dang / bdug

spos dang / sil snyan dang / byug pa dang / sgra sna tshogs pa dang / spos sna tshogs pa thogs nas lhags so/ /'jig rten pa de dag kyang rang rang gi mchod pa sna tshogs pa thogs nas lhags te/ zhe sa dang gus pa byas te thams cad kyang mgrin gcig gi nga ros

gsol pa/ khro rgyal sku la dri ma mi mnga' yang / /dkar chab dang ra chab spos kyi chab/ /sman chab bdud rtsi'i chab la sogs/ /khyod kyi sku la khrus chab gsol/ /A ha ra hU~M/ ga bur bzang drug sman gyi dri/ /a ga ru dang du ru ska/ /gla rtsi spos kyi dri la

sogs/ /'gag pa med pa shangs la 'bul/ /d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha hU~M/ /rin chen lnga yi me tog dang / /chu las skyes dang thang las skyes/ /yid kyis sprul pa'i me tog rnams/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbu la 'bul/ /puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha hU~M/ /'bru yi mar me rtsi yi mar/ /

'dam bu snang gsal rin chen sgron/ /spobs pa bcud len sgron ma rnams/ /khro bo gtum po'i spyan la 'bul/ /A lo ke pU dza me g+ha hU~M/ rnam lnga'i spos dang sman lngar sbyar/ /ra sa ya dang a mr-i ta/ /rdo rje 'dzin la dri mchog 'bul/ /gan d+he pU dza me g+ha hU~M/ /

ro mchog brgya ldan bdud rtsi'i mchog /bde bar bzhes te dgyes par dgongs/ /a mr-i tA b+ha ra hU~M/ kun tu grags pa'i sgra rnams ma lus dang / /dam chos sgra sgrogs sil snyan 'bul/ /sgA ra Na khaM zhes mgrin gcig gis gsol nas de nyid du spro ba'i tshul gyis

gnas par gyur to/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las dregs pa'i 'khor dag gis sri zhu dang gus pas mchod pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas rdo rje khro bo des dregs pa'i 'khor de dag la dam tshig ched du spyad pa 'di bka' stsal

to/ /mi gnas mtha' las 'das pa sems nyid mchog /sna tshogs cho 'phrul 'byung bas kun gyi gzhi/ /ma bcos rang bzhin rkyen gyis byas pa med/ /de la gnas na rang dam bsrungs pa yin/ /de bzhin gyur kyang 'od 'gyed ched du blang / /nor bu 'bar

ba ma mthong ston pa dang / /thugs rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gdung ba'i nad sel ba/ /bdud rtsi lta bu'i tshig gis tshim byed pa/ /kun gzhi'i yul du nus pa'i dbang 'bogs shing / /thugs rjes skyob par mdzad pa'i mgon po de/ /dus gsum sangs

rgyas kun pas gnyen pa ste/ /snying bzhin skye med rmi lam nang du bkur/ /ngag gi rdo rje chu bo'i rgyun bzhin drang / /skyo med nyin mtshan dus su brtson par bya/ /rdo rje'i phrag par mi gseng bsdams la drang / /med tshig gis dam pa de la bstod/ /bshad pa'i

dbang rnams rab tu ma bstan na/ /rdo rje'i lce la bdud rtsi 'dzag gyur kyang / /gzhan la zer thigs 'ga' yang spro mi bya/ /gsang 'os gnyer gtad sngags dang mtshan rnams gsang / /dus gsum 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku mchod de/ /na dang 'chi sogs las

kyi rnam smin gang / /sdug bsngal mi bzad nyam thag ci byung yang / /lhag par dran pa bskyed de rjes su gzung / /'gro nyal 'dug za spyod lam rnam pa bzhir/ /mi brjed shes rab dag gis rjes su bzung / /slob dpon mtshang dang gsang tshig yi dam lha/ /

srog gi phyir yang de dag mi spong ngo / /bzhi pa de bzhin de la de mi sems/ /dran pas rjes su de la bzung bar bya/ /smig rgyu chu rgyun brtul zhugs bya ba bskyed/ /de las 'gal ba'i brtul zhugs rab tu spyad/ /rdol zhing zag 'gyur dug can smad pa'i snod/ /de ru

mu tig bdud rtsi mi blugs ltar/ /thabs kyi spyod pas rnam dbye shes par bya/ /dpag tshad kun tu nyams pa rnam par spong / /de dag 'gal na rdo rje dmyal ba yi/ /sdug bsngal chu bo reg cing bzod dka' bar/ /dus gsum rnams dang nga yis

brjod mi nus/ /gzhan nas gzhan 'phang thar pa'i dus kyang med/ /ma nyams brgal dkar 'gro bar gdon mi za/ /nga dang dus gsum kun kyang de la dgongs/ /gang la dmigs pa'i 'bras bu chud mi za/ /phyogs skyong rnams kyis dam skyong de la bsrung / /zhes

gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las sa ma ya bkod pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas 'khor de dag la ched du rjod pa 'di brjod do/ /nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kun/ /don dam dbyer med phyogs cha kun dang

bral/ /mi len mi gnas mi spong mi 'gog cing / /rang bzhin gnas pa de la bcos su med/ /rtog pa'i gnas min phra ba'i spyod yul min/ /dngos por mi gnas mtshan ma kun dang bral/ /sgro dang skur pas de la dpag mi dpogs/ /stong pa ma yin tha snyad de las

'das/ /mi gnas mi rtog rkyen gyis bskyed pa med/ /dngos bral kun gyi mtha' 'das brjod du med/ /'di zhes nges pa de la mtshon du med/ /dus gsum bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yab yum shul dang kun gyi dngos po yin/ /sems can 'jig rten

khams kyi rang bzhin dang / /bud d+ha 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin kun/ /gcig ste rnam grangs yongs kyis de las med/ /gang yang ma 'gags gcig tu nges pa med/ /tha snyad brjod bral sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /de ltar grol ba rnal 'byor mchog gi lam/ /

phra ba'i sgo mo rnams kyis rjes dpag dka'/ /de la spro dang bsdu ba'i dbang po med/ /gzugs dang kha dog rnam pa gang du yang / /de nyid ma grub de la gnyen po med/ /'byung ba chen po nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/ /khu rlangs 'ja' tshon na bun sprin la sogs/ /than

drag lhags rlung la sogs gang byung yang / /nam mkha' chen po de la g.yo ba med/ /dang po byung yang de yi ngang las byung / /tha mar zhi yang de yi ngang du zhi/ /de dag de yi nang du 'ub kyis 'chus/ /yangs so che'o nam mkha'i khog par gnas/ /khams gsum

sems can dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams/ /don dam nga yi rang bzhin nga nyid yin/ /kun kyang dge dang sdig sogs gang byas kyang / /rang byung 'phrul ldan de la 'phel 'grib med/ /rang byung ye shes rgyu rkyen dngos po med/ /sems can sangs rgyas gnyis

shes rtog gi bu/ /de la dbye dang ming dang yig tshogs med/ /ces gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las gzhi byang chub snying po'i rgyu'i le'u ste nyi shu ba'o// //de nas dregs pa'i 'khor de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas

mgrin gcig gis 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis mngon par bstod pa/ e ma ho rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa che/ /rdo rje sku ste che ba bo/ /mi shes dri ma kun 'joms pa/ /sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas/ /

'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje lus te lus kyi mchog /lus rnams tha dad rnams sprul cing / /lus dman pa dag 'jigs par mdzad/ /lus kyi nges don gting dpag dka'/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /'bar ba'i 'od kyis sdang ba

'joms/ /rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba/ /rdo rje'i mtshon chen phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyag na rdo rje ye shes che/ /zhal gyi rdo rje sdang ba 'bigs/ /rdo rje mche ba rno ba che/ /che ba rgya mtsho gsung chen bstod/ /rdo rje pad ma byang chub che/ /thugs nyid sangs rgyas rang

byung ba/ /rdo rje rgya che thugs kyi mchog /rdo rje rnal 'byor thugs chen bstod/ /'jigs byed drag po nag po che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sdang byed pa/ /bsgrub dka' bsgrub legs yon tan che/ /yon tan rdo rje mchog legs bstod/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po che/ /ha

la ha la nag po che/ /rtog pa'i dus ngan rnam par spyod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ces mngon par bstod do/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las 'khor gyis mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //

de nas lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kyai rdo rje khro bo khyod/ /dus ngan bstan pa mi gnas tshe/ /'jig rten khams su chu 'khyags dbab pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ /bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig dbang po chen po/ 'jig rten phung bar byan nA ga'i chu

'khyags dbab/ /gsang ba'i las rab 'di ni rab tu gnag /na mo bud d+hA ya/ badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ oM badzra tsaN Da/ ki li ki li/ tsaN Da mo ra tsi Na/ tsaN Da tsaN De/ nA ga b+han d+hA ya phaT swA hA/ sor brgyad seng ldeng phur bu gu gul dang / /tshil chen

sme khrag byug cing bdug /rtsa gzir sngags sham gdags pa bca'/ /thog ma'i gong nas grangs med bzlas pa'i mchog /klu gnas btab na khyung gis mi thar 'ching / /phyogs btab ldog 'gyur zhing btab 'bu srin za/ /ldum ra rta bres gnag ra ra lug gnas/ /

btab nas mi skye ri snyil chu yang ldog /phal pa'i grong dang rgyal po'i sgor btab na/ /phal pa'i grong 'jig rgyal po'i 'khor gyi mi/ /'byer zhing nad kyis thebs 'gyur phyung na thar/ /nA ga'i gnas btab thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur/ /nag po gnas su song la

las 'di bya/ /byang bltas chu mig rngom dang dmas skyibs gnag /mgo na rdo nag dreg pa chags pa yod/ /gnas der e nag 'dom bzhi rtse mo lho/ /dkar nag rdo ba glang dmar rwa skyed bya/ /skam po dum bzhir phyi rol khrag dug gnag /ra khyi mi'i khrag bskol

bya ting 'dzin bsam/ /ga ru'i sprul pa mang po shin tu gces/ /dkar nag dud pas dran bskyed dbang du bsdu/ /de nas khyung bskul ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /hrIHdpag bsam shing las bzhengs pa'i ga ru Da/ /ye shes gshog pa 'bar ba gser gyi mig /

rdo rje'i mchu sder thogs med lcags kyu can/ /ri rab rtse nas rgya mtsho'i gting du sleb/ /klu rgyal gdan du 'dings shing klu phrug zas su za/ /klu rnams bka' las ma 'da' chu 'khyags phob/ /brjid gnon man tra mu dras zil gyis gnon/ /nA ga rA dza phut+ta

phut+ta/ stong bzlas gshams sbrel ban+d+ha chu mig brdab/ /klu gzugs sbrul mgo bdun sngon skyed khar gzhag /mgo la khrag byung 'di nyid rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /nA ga nA ga la khrag nang mgo la phob/ /nA ga mgo la khrag thun rbad/ /rtsa brgyad brjod cing thab bya khrag

lhag dang / /thal 'jim ban d+ha chu mig nang du brdab/ /thog dang ser ba ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'ong / /nA ga'i gzugs ni nag po gel chags che/ /mig nas glog 'gyu kha nas khrag ser 'bab/ /de ltar bsams na klu 'khrugs ser ba 'bebs/ /dpal

ldan rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang pa'i rgyud las 'jig rten thog ser gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang lha'i dbang pos zhus pa/ mthar thug drag po'i las kyis ji ltar dbab/ /rdzas dang sngags bcas drag po'i sbyar thabs gang / /

sba gnas dus tshod mdzes pa gang la bgyi/ /bsrung ba'i bcas ba ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa las/ bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig skal ldan lha yi dbang po nyon/ /rdzas dang sngags bcas drag po'i sbyor ba 'di'o/ /mdze sha mdze tshil thod pa tshil chen

dud/ /gzhob rnams blugs te spra ba'i me dang sprad/ /yugs sa'i zhabs dril khar nag bcing byas la/ /chu mig 'gram sar seng ldeng phur pa gdab/ /ston zla ra 'bring gza' rgod rgyu dus gtad/ /skya reng shar dang nyi phyed nya la gtad/ /rdzas mchog ma

phyung chu 'khyags nyin re 'bab/ /de nas klu rnams kun gyi gnyen po rak+ta tsa muN+Di zhes bya ba 'dis skul bka' stsal to/ /hU~M sku ni gnam lcags 'bar ba la/ /dmar ser me yi ral pa can/ /khams gsum srid gsum kha na khyer/ /srid pa gsum ni lto na 'phyo/ /

ya 'gal gnam la ma 'gal sa/ /nyi ma'i sman dang spyan nas 'char/ /zla ba'i skyin dang zhal nas 'char/ /ri rab rtse dgu phyag na bsnams/ /mi bzad 'bar ma gtum chen mo/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' nyan ma/ /'dul ba'i gnyen po klu 'dul ma/ /

thugs dam klu yi ban d+ha 'dren/ /zas su klu yi sha la za/ /klu yi gnas ris dbang du sdud/ /sngags bka' stsal pa/ oM nA ga zhung thun/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ phaT phaT swA hA/ las kyi go cha drug ni rab tu gces/ /log gnon gyi sngags

bka' stsal pa/ nA ga li dum+pa ya sa dom d+he ba ku ru hU~M hU~M/ dzaHdzaHb+h+yo b+h+yo/ 'khor lo tshul du lus la'o zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las mthar thug drag po'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de

nas 'khor de dag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan nyid kyi mtshams bcad ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang / bka' stsal pa/ 'dul ba'i tshogs nyon cig /nga'i rang bzhin ni dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs par rtogs par byos shig /nga'i rang bzhin ni

skye ba med par rtogs par byos shig /nga'i rang bzhin ni 'gag pa med par rtogs par byos shig /nga'i rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid du rtogs par byos shig /nga gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'i bdag po'o/ /nga gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpar rtogs par byos shig /nga gang

yin pa de ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar rtogs par byos shig /nga gang yin pa de ni gtum po chen po nyid du rtogs par byos shig /nga gang yin pa de ni chos so/ chos kyi phung po'o zhes bka' stsal pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes shing dga'o/ /dpal rdo rje gtum

po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi ba'o// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a ba yug ta'i zhal snga nas zhus nas/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shri badzra tsaN+Da tsit+ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra ut+ta ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das

nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i bstan pa dam pa'i dbang ji lta ba'i gsang ba dam pa mdzad du gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang las ma hA tsaN+Da kro d+hi hUM zhes gsungs pas/ g.yon du khro mo gtum chen mo/ /mthing

nag chen mo 'jigs tshul can/ /dbu skra kham pa gyen brdzes ma/ /spyan dmar sdang mig bgrad pa'i tshul/ /mche gtsigs khro gnyer spyan gsum ma/ /phyag g.yas dril 'dzin gtso la 'khyud/ /g.yon pa thod khrag gtso la stob/ /zhabs gnyis gtso

la dgyes tshul 'khril/ /hi hi dgyes dang ha la'i sgras/ /thams cad g.yo zhing rlag par byed/ /dur khrod rgyan ldan me dpung nang / /sku la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po/ /dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas pas/ /nyid

kyi mkha' la hU~M oM ldan/ /nor bu dang ni rdo rjer ldan/ /rdo rje'i rtse mo'i sbub mar phaT/ /yum gyi gsang bar pa tra ldan/ /pad ma dang ni ze 'brur ldan/ /ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las yum rnam par

'phrul pa dang / mkha' gsang rab tu ldan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bde rdzogs gang lags bshad du gsol zhes zhus pas bcom ldan 'das bde rdzogs chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas 'khor lo bde rdzogs zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po mchog /bde skyong 'khor lo sum cu gnyis/ /dung dang kun+da lta bur gnas/ /mi shigs hU~M ni kha 'og bltas/ /mgrin chen longs spyod 'dab bcu drug /dbus na gser

zhun lta bu ma~M/ /ya ba ra la kha dog bzhi/ /phyogs bzhi 'dab ma bzhi na gnas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab brgyad de/ /hU~M mu~M dbus te phyogs mtshams na/ /oM kro d+hi ha mA~M lA~M pA~M tA~M/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo drug cu bzhi/ /dbus na oM

dkar de bzhin du'o/ /me yi 'khor lo gru gsum ra~M/ /rlung ni gzhu 'dra ba dan can/ /dza nya phaT dang ra~M ldan pa'o/ /dbab dang bskyil ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /shin tu snod ldan dam pa la/ /srin mtheb lces blang dbugs kyis drang / /byin rlabs byas pa'i shes

rab ma/ /rang lus thabs ldan gtad pa dang / /bde ba dang ni bde ba che/ /shin tu bde chen bde mchog yin/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las 'khor lo bde rdzogs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can don du byin brlabs mthu/ /sngags kyi mthu rnams bka' stsol cig /ces gsol pas/ nyon cig lha'i dbang po sngon chad nga la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin par dbang bskur te/

da ltar ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /'di ni klu thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o/ /nyi ma sa sla la na~M/ nA ga ku na zhi/ tsit+ta mu ling na~M/ zlog byer/ nA ga shig /nA ga bzlog /nA ga byer/ nA ga da ha da ha mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga ha na ha na/ mA ra ya phaT/

gsang ba gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa'i/ /sngags des klu rnams rlag par byed/ /rdzas su bstan pa 'di lta ste/ /rtsa ba dang ni skyobs su bcas/ /lce pog nag po rgya tshil dang / /mgo gnyis I dra ma g+ha d+ha/ /sa yi dri dang rnam lnga'o/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jil bar

byed/ /shu dag tshil chen rwa gzhob dang / /dri chen dri chu rma bya'i mdongs/ /byug dang bdug par bya ba'o/ /mu zi gla rtsi dri chen dang / /zhun chen dri chu sbyar ba rnams/ /ltor btang gdon rnams rang zhir 'gyur/ /'dis ni rang nyid srung bar byed/ /nA ga sha ti dun

dzibs/ /nA ga tsi ta na~M/ nA ga ni ra rbud/ shA na ting sha du rtsubs/ nA ga a ra lig shams/ nA ga dun dun/ gyen gyen/ nA ga sha~M ti/ ya ya/ tshubs tshubs du sha rbud/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las klu thams cad rlag

par byed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'ching bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'jig rten 'ching byed kyi sngags gsungs pa/ oM e ka ya ma/ he ka ya ma/ hri ma ya ma/

sartsa tsit+ta gzer thums big+h+na~M/ zhes gsungs ma thag tu srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa la thug pa yan chad sems rnam par myogs te/ lus ri mo bzhin g.yo ba med par bcings par gyur to/ /de nas dpung rnam par zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ dpung zlog byed kyi sngags gsungs pa oM e ka ya ma he dun rak+Sha he du na/ hU~M dzaHhA~M/ ya ma tsit+ta sha ma/ sha tU~M sta~M b+ha ya na~M d+h+r-ika rbad/ ces gsungs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'khrugs shing / dregs pa can thams

cad rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin du gyur te/ myos par gyur to/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las 'jig rten bcing zlog gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das khyung rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs nas khyung las la gzud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags gsungs pa/ grang ti tig tig /gra ta brag shi ta ta le he du hU~M phaT/ de nas yang dgra 'ba' zhig pa gsad pa thun mong ma yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje drag po

thog 'bab ces bya ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM mA ra na sod sod/ mA ra na bying bying / mA ra na rmugs rmugs/ mA ra na hal hal/ mA ra na dun dun/ myogs myogs/ bying bying / thum ri li li rbad dza dza/ nA ga la sogs sha trU~M sbyar zhes gsungs

so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las gsang pa sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas yang lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kyai bcom ldan 'das gdug pa can tshar bcad pa'i las khyad par can bka' stsal du

gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das khyung sgrol byed gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rab tu gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/ oM tad+ya thA/ oM Ta ki tsa ti/ gur+ya la/ g+h+yu li mi li sha sha g+h+yu g+h+yu/ shad ti bi ri ti/ hU~M ya

hU~M ya/ hU~M tu ti swA hA/ 'bras dang so ba nas nag dang / /a ru ra rnams zhib btags te/ dgu dang bcu gcig bsgrub par bya/ /mkha' lding sgo nga sngags kyis bskor/ /'gram du bzhag la bsgrub par bya/ /mA ra na sod/ mA ra na bying bying / mA ra na

mugs mugs/ mA ra na ha na ha na/ mA ra na dun dun/ ha la ha la/ myos myos/ bying bying / thum ri li li dza dza/ de nas gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /ba liM ta khA hi khA hi/ gr-ih+Na hr-ih+Na/ ma hA rag si pa to/ sa mA ya swA hA/ gsol ba gdab cing

phrin las bcol/ /gla rtsi shing kun sha chen dang / /lce po gnag po sha rI ra/ /byi sku stag gi sder mo rnams/ /ras su gtums la lus la bcang / /oM nyi mas sla nAM/ g+hu ni zhi rtsi ta g+hu bi nAM/ tsi tra mu tra zlog byer/ /tsi ta g+hu li nAM/ ya khra nA ga

zlog /nA ga shig /nA ga mgo la nAM/ ha pa sa khre/ rtag tu stom changs gtor mas mchod/ /zhi bas dug dbyung byad kyang dgrol/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi ru/ /nA ga'i gzugs bris dug can gzhag /tshon skud sbrul bsgoms bcings pa

de/ /spu gri 'bar bas gtubs shing dbye/ /ri rab chen po'i phyogs bzhi na/ /dug bzhi las skyes rigs bzhi'i klu/ /sa chu me rlung dug bzhi'i bdag /bcings pa dgrol cing dug dbyung phyir/ /dug thub sgro la khyung bsam phyir/ /dug byab rang rang gnas

su btang / /bden pa bdar zhing ting 'dzin gsal/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las rab tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bdud

rtsi mchog bka' stsal pa/ rin chen bum pa tshad ldan la/ /dri yi rgyal po la sogs lngas/ /byugs la bog nag dud pas bdug /rtsi ldan 'o ma 'bras dang nas/ /til dkar dang ni a ru ra/ /ba ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /mngar gsum klu sman sna tshogs

dang / /tsan dan la sogs dri sbyar ba'i/ /chus bkang lcug ma 'o ma can/ /kha rgyan byas te mgul pa yang / /dar ras sngon pos bcings byas la/ /maN+Dal gtsang ma'i steng du bzhag /lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis/ /gri lcags sbu gur mchu btsugs te/ /

dbugs ma shor bar rab tu bsnags/ /seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad dang / /sngags kyi mda' mchog la yang bsnag /bum pa la sngags 'bum tshar re/ /bton nas snying rje'i yul la bkru/ /khong du btang na grol bar 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs

gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las bdud rtsi bum khrus kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas yang bdud rtsi bum pa khrol bu la bsgrub pa gsungs pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po gtso/ /ting 'dzin gsang bar sgrub pa ni/ /dzA ti pha la nas sngon mo/ /'bras dang

so ba ma gi ta/ /ting 'dzin gzhu btul byas te bsgrub/ /de la rtags byung phye mar bsgrub/ /byugs nas dri chus skyo mar sbyar/ /zhun chen sbyar te khong du gtang / /bum pa'i chu la lcags sbugs sngags/ /mchod dang ting 'dzin brtson par bya/ /bum chus khrus

bya 'de gus byug /skyo ma zhun chen khong du gtang / /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las bum pa khrol bu phye ma dang / 'de gu dang / khong du gtang pa'i le'u ste brgyad po'o// //de nas yang lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ nyon

cig lha yi dbang po dag /gdug pa'i dug la rnam mang yang / /bsdus na rnam pa gnyis yod de/ /mngon sum dug dang rku dug ste/ /rkun thabs dug ni bzlog par dka'/ /gdug can nyon mongs gsum ldan te/ /gti mug che bas byol

song rigs/ /'dod chags che bas dbral bar dka'/ /shin tu zhe sdang che bas kyang / /dug ni rkun thabs dag tu gtong / /de phyir slar yang ldog par byed/ /phrag dog che bas rang rten la/ /gzhan gyis gtses na gzhan la gnod/ /rkun thabs dug gi

mtshan nyid kyang / /thabs shing gdug pa'i dug klod kyang / /bar bar skabs su ldang bar byed/ /de bzlog thabs ni shin tu'ang dka'/ /de yi bzlog thabs dam pa 'di/ /ngas bstan pa la the tshom du/ /gang zhig byed par gyur pa de/ /nam yang grub

par mi 'gyur te/ /grub kyang g.yel bar gyur pa yin/ /de nas lha yi dbang po dag /the tsom med par nges par byos/ /tsan dan dmar pos gtsor byas te/ /nA ga ge sar ma gi ta/ /rgya tshil rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang / /phag rgod dag gi sha dag ste/ /

yang na rgya tshil ma gi ta/ /phag rgod sha dang sbyar byas te/ /lcags snod nang du lcags kyis phur/ /'bum phrag gsum du bsnyen byas nas/ /sgrub pas dkar gsum gzhan mi bsten/ /'o ma sol chus lus bkrus te/ /nya la gnas drug thig le bya/ /

mkhur tshos gnyis dang dpral ba dang / /snying ga lkog ma lag mthil gnyis/ /thig le mtshon gang pa re bya/ /lte ba pus mo gsang gnas su/ /ma gi ta nyid 'ba' zhig byug /thig le re la nyi shu gcig /de ltar lo gcig bar du bya/ /gangs

ri la ni nyi ma bzhin/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las rkun thabs kyi dug bzlog pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kyai ma khro bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ /gdug pa'i dug gi mtshan nyid gang / /

zlog dang mi zlog ji lta bu/ /khro bdag chen pos bshad du gsol/ /zhes gsol pas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dga' bas nyon cig lha yi dbang po khyod/ /bsnyen dang sgrub pa rtags dang gnod pa rtogs/ /lcags zangs mi dang gcer

bu bum pa thogs/ /ba lang nya lcibs zas su za ba dang / /me chen 'bar dang zam pa 'dzugs pa dang / /skye shing 'dzugs dang nyi ma shar ba dang / /bzang ba yi ni rtags su shes par bya/ /nyi ma nub dang nam sros thur du babs/ /btson du bzung nas mi theg khur

bskur dang / /sgrub po gzhan yul 'gro ba ngan pa'i rtags/ /lung pa dang ni skam nas chu byung dang / /nya sbrul sa rlung gsod dang 'chod pa dang / /rid dang skems pa de dag khri la 'dug /gcer bu spyi bcings tshogs kyis sems can gsol ba mthong / /'jigs

pa'i chu mig skams dang rtag tu nor bu rgyud/ /sbal sbrul zas su za dang khyi spyang gsod la sogs/ /bzang ba yi ni ltas su shes par bya/ /chu nang chung dang sbal sbrul lus la 'jug /de dag phyi bzhin du ni 'brang byed cing / /sbrang bu mchu ring la sogs lus la za/ /ba

lang ma he'i tshogs kyis brdungs nas 'ded pa dang / /khyi spyang tshogs kyis zugs dang 'dam du tshud/ /'bag seng bu chung la sogs ston pa ngan/ /gnod pa'i rtags su gting ring grog po ru/ /mi shong bzhin du phyin dang slar mi thar/ /ri brag dog mo lung pa

phug rdugs dang / /lha khang gnas khang hrul por mi shong bzhin/ /sgo la 'dzul nas slar yang mi thon dang / /chu ngan mtsho dang lu ma nya sbrul sogs/ /phag pa ba glang ma he la sogs te/ /shin tu yid du mi 'ong gzugs mang ston/ /ri gzar mi thar ce spyang

tshogs kyis 'ded/ /de dag gnod rtags lus kyi nyams myong yang / /nul ba dang ni ku dang chang la dga'/ /nad dang nyams lci yan lag na/ /sha ni 'gul 'phrig shu g.yan sha bkra dang / /ngo lheg sha ro skabs su zug gzer che/ /de dag gnod pa'i rtags su

shes par bya/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las bsnyen sgrub kyi ltas dang / gnod rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol ba/ kyai bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi lus

la gdug pa'i dug lus la sleb pa'i mtshan nyid bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sha mthangs bar du sleb pa'i dug /rtag tu snying yang mi dga' zhing / /sha rtsa za zhing 'gul dang 'phrig /rtag tu

'phrug snying 'dod pa dang / /sha yang 'o ma'i bris ma bzhin/ /sha mdog me lce 'dra ba'o/ /skabs su sha mthangs bar dag na/ /chu grang blug pa snyam byed dang / /shu ba bal bldags sha bkra 'ong / /gdug pa dug gis sha la sleb pa ni/ /'phrig

'gul za sbrid ber ba ltar/ /sha ni gnag cing dmar la bem/ /du ba mig tu song ba bzhin/ /mig gi tha ma chu yis gang / /mig kyang zlum la smin ma grugs/ /smin ma byi zhing mig kyang 'gul/ /sor mo rnams ni byi mjug 'dra/ /rtsa dang chu la zhugs

pa ni/ /lus la dri ma nga ba 'byung / /chu bur dang ni chu rgangs dang / /de ni rtsa yi me tog yin/ /chu ser mdog ni dud khu 'dra/ /chu ser ko rul mnam pa dang / /ko ba rul pa'i dri mnam pa'i/ /chu ser dag ni 'byung ba yin/ /ro stod mi bde blo yang 'degs/ /

spyi yi mtshan nyid 'di dag dang / /'byung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod/ /me 'od tsha ba 'dra ba 'ong / /tsher ma zug pa 'dra ba 'ong / /lus po tsha la 'brum pa 'ong / /kor tshe shu ba 'byung ba dang / /rma dang ser ka mi 'tsho ba/ /kor tshe tshor ba med par 'byung / /na

tsha med pa'i shu ba 'byung / /tsha la 'khums pa 'byung ba yod/ /lus kyi nyams stobs chung bar 'byung / /glang shu ba dang sha bkra 'byung / /sha ro sbal mig 'dra ba 'byung / /sha sul thams cad 'gul 'phrig 'byung / /dug gis rus par sleb gyur na/ /

phyi yi sha rnams kun skams te/ /mdog ni sngo skya sha mdangs 'chor/ /gos kyi mdangs kyang 'chor ba ste/ /de ni thar bar mi 'gyur kyang / /sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /tshe ring skad gsang lus kyang bde/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje

gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las gdug pa'i dug rus pa la sleb pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus kyi 'gro ba la phan gdags pa'i phyir rdzas kyi khyad

par bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po gtso/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi sems can rnams/ /gdug pa'i dug gis nyen pa na/ /phan pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta bu/ /kun kyang sngags kyis bsgrub

par bya/ /me 'od 'dra na spyang dug btang / /tsher ma zug pa lta bu la/ /ra dug dang ni re lcag go/ /tsha la 'brum pa byung ba na/ /btsod dang spang spos btang bar bya/ /sha ni kor tshe shu ba la/ /ra thug sre dang long rtol btad/ /rma dang ser ka mi 'tsho na/ /khong

du bsgrub pa'i ma gi ta/ /de nyid drag po'i sngags kyis gdul/ /kor tshe tshor ba med pa la/ /stag sha gser gyi me tog dang / /rgya tsha sbyar te btang bar bya/ /sha bu thal ba bdud rtsis gso/ /mu zi ba bla ldong ros dang / /dri chu sbyar te bsku bar bya/ /

na tsha med pa'i shu ba la/ /bong ril ti tsha mar dkar bsku/ /tsha 'khums lce bog rwa ru gzhob/ /tsha dang zhun chen sbyar bar bya/ /lus kyi nyams stobs chung ba na/ /bum pa'i chu dang ma gi ta/ /sbyar te bkru zhing btung bar bya/ /dri chu zhun chen btang bar bya/ /sha

bkra gur gum phag tshil lo/ /glang shu 'dra ba byung ba na/ /gser gyi me tog mu zi dang / /sngags kyi bya ba 'bad par bya/ /sha ro sbal mig 'byung ba dang / /sha yi sul rnams 'gul ba la/ /gla ba mu zi lce pog gnag /sha mthangs bar gyi dug

rnams la/ /sa yi dri dang ma gi ta/ /shu dag lce bog ru rta dang / /gu gul nag po dri ma dang / /ro yi ro dang btsan dug dang / /byi ku cig skyes mi phag bcud/ /yang na btsan dug lce pog dang / /ldong ros dang ni sa yi dri/ /zhun

chen dri chus bsdus te bsku/ /gu gul shu dag shing kun dang / /gla rtsi btsan dug ro yi ro/ /rus chen btags te zhun gyis bsdu/ /ril bu byas te bsregs nas kyang / /yang dang yang du sna bug bdug /dug chen klu dang de las gram pa'i gdon/ /skye

dgu 'tshe byed gdon rnams gang yin yang / /gdug pa chen po'i dri 'di tshor ba yis/ /gdug pa can rnams klad pa rab tu 'gas/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis mun pa ji bzhin no/ /sha la zhugs pa'i gdug pa'i dug rnams la/ /byug pa'i rdzas rnams phyi nas

byug /bdug pa can gyis rtag tu bdug /ma gi ta dang dri chu grang mor sbyar/ /bkra zhing khong du gtan du btang bar bya/ /nad rnams 'byang zhing spu sogs byi ba skye/ /rtsa dang chu ba dag la gnas pa'i dug /byug pa bdug pa chu bo'i gzhung bzhin du/ /khong

du btang ba'i rdzas ni 'di lta ste/ /ma gi ta ni dri yi chus sbyangs te/ /a ru ra dang sbyar ba rgyun mi bcad/ /rtsa yi gnas su nad rnams dngas snyigs 'byed/ /dngas snyigs phyed pa'i nad ni phyi ru 'byung / /gangs kyi ri la nyi ma lta bu'o/ /dug rnams rus pa dag

la rgyas/ /khong du btang ba'i rdzas ni rgyun du btang zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las gdug pa'i dug rdzas kyis gdul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kyai bcom

ldan 'das gdug pa can shin tu yang tshar gcod pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig dbang po chen po'i lha/ /gdug pa shin tu tshar gcad na/ /bsreg pa'i las la shin tu brtson par bya/ /

thab khung gru gsum sor brgyad pa/ /khrag dang dur khrod sol bas byug /dkyil du rdo rje rtse gsum bri/ /zur du mchod rten gsum gzhag ste/ /de steng drag po'i snod bzhag la/ /nang du gru gsum rtse mo lho/ /gdug pa'i shing yang zur gsum brtsig /dkyil 'khor

chen po'i shar lhor bya/ /shing shun dag la shutrU yang / /brgya rtsa brgyad bya dug sna dang / /tsha ba gsum dang bong bu'i chu/ /rnga mo bya rog brun yang bsag /lha yi ting 'dzin mchod sngags kyis/ /ting 'dzin gsal ste lha la 'bul/ /sreg pa'i sngags ni 'dis

bya'o/ /sarba big+h+nAn mA ra ya dz+wa wa ra~M/ /stong rtsa brgyad dang brgya rtsa brgyad/ /lan grangs mang du byas pa yi/ /thal ba chu chen gzhung la bor/ /thab khung 'og ma'i thal ba yang / /khyi yi dri chen tsha ba gsum/ /bsres te sha trA~M gzugs byas la/ /nA ga sta~M

b+ha na na zhes rgya gram dkyil du mnan zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las dregs pa can shin tu tshar gcad pa bsreg pa drag po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas yang lha'i dbang pos gsol ba/ kyai bcom ldan

'das/ gnon pa'i las ni bgyi ba yi/ /shin tu tshar gcad ji ltar bgyi zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lha yi dbang po chen po nyon/ /ru sbal khog pa kha sbyar du/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba khre rgod dang / /nA ga ge sar cu gang

dang / /dkar gsum sha chen sha rI ra/ /ma gi ta yis gtso byas te/ /ru rta dang sbyar ro nye'i shubs/ /re bas gtums te sngon dmar dkri/ /sngags kyis mda' la sum stong bsngags/ /nA ga stam b+ha nan/ brgyad gsum dbus ma'i zla zer la/ /nub kyi rgya gram

sum mdo 'am/ /yang na gnod pa'i sa phyogs su/ /shug pa'i phur pas khru gang brko/ /der bcug g.yam pa rgya gram can/ /de steng gnon pa'i ri rab gzhag /de dag byed tshe dman zas spang / /kha zas dkar gsum mngar gyis bya/ /sha rul khrag

rul rgya tshil dang / /sngags mda' sngags dang ldan pa yis/ /rang gnas brten pa'i bar du gcad/ /thog drag lta bur sngags las bya/ /rtsa gcig bar du gnod mi 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las phyir mi

ldog pa'i gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang bos yang gsol pa/ kyai bcom ldan 'das gdug pa can de dag de nyid kho nar 'gro ba la rnam par 'tshe 'am/ de dag gzhan dang gzhan dag gi mthu yang gnon par 'gyur/ gal

te gzhan dag gi mthus kyang 'gro ba ma rungs bar byed na/ de ji ltar yongs su bsal bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon cig dbang po chen po lha/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi sems can la/ /gdug pa'i

dug gcig zhugs gyur na/ /pho nya 'di dag ma rungs byed/ /btsan dang rgyal po 'gong po dang / /dngos grub 'tshe ba byed kun tu/ /de dag de nyid shes gyur na/ /de dag rang gshed rang gis byed/ /rA dza tsit+ta rbad nan/ tsa hur thums dzaHma rA ya rbad nan/

oM tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ hab shaM tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ ru tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ rA dza trig nan/ tsa hur thuM dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ sde brgyad spyir gdul ba ni/ oM AHhU~M badzra sarba duSh+TAM trig nan/ e hur thuM dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ gal te rgyal po gdug pa

dag /shin tu che bar gyur pa na/ /ku sha rtsa la brgya byin gzugs/ /mdze mo'i sog pa g.yas pa la/ /khrag chen gyis bri snying gar stsal/ /tri badzra aM ku sha dzaH lce pog gis bdug sngon dmar bcing / /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /gru gsum

nag por bcug byas la/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas la dgug /tri badzra tri badzra/ yak+Sha duSh+TAn badzra a~M ku sha dzaH kro d+hing kro la sha /rA dza tha ma na~M/ rA dza sha trU~M mA ra na phaT/ rA dza a mu kaM /b+hak+Sha ni gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na mA ra ya phaT/ phur ba gdab cing

lcag gis brab/ /de nas bskor ba'i 'khor lo bca'/ /rtsa ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la/ /ku sha'i gzugs gzhag phyi rtsibs la/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi ldan pa la/ /rtsibs la gzugs bris bong khrag sbyar/ /re'u mig cha la bskor sngags dgod/ /

du tri pa tri dkor ba kha~M rbad/ /ya tri dkor ba kha~M rbad/ /yungs kar khrag sna dug snas brab/ /yang na chu bo'i gzhung la bskur/ /yang na phugs rdugs grog por gnon/ /de tshe zhing lcags drag tu bsnun/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma

las dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi slob dpon a ba yug ti dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba bla ban chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra tsaN+Da tsit+ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra ut+ta rot+ta ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'khor de na gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje gtum

po zhes bya ba 'khod pa stan las langs te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas mig 'dzums dang bcas pas rang gi spyod pa las shin tu spa gong bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kyai bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus na/

gdug pa can gyi sems can la rnam par 'tshe zhing rnam pa gsum gyis sems can ma rungs par bgyid de/ reg pa'i dug gis kyang rab tu yang gzir bar bgyid do/ /kha rlangs kyi dug gis ni rab tu myos shing shin tu yang lci bar bgyid do/ /mthong ba'i dug

gis ni za zhing 'phrug cing tsha bar byed do/ /'phro ba kha rlangs kyi dug can dang / reg pa lus kyi dug rnams kyi gdung ba bsal ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon cig gnod

sbyin gsang ba'i bdag /dug gsum dug gi rtsa ba yang / /dug gsum las ni byung ba yin/ /rtsa ba'i dug la rang bzhin med/ /de ni dug gso sman gyi mchog /sman nyid rang 'byung gzhan las min/ /de nyid rang dang gzhan las grol/ /

rtsa ba'i dug la rang grol na/ /dug gsum la sogs gzhan du med/ /dug lnga las 'phros 'byung lnga'i dug /kun rdzob tsam du 'byung ba 'joms/ /de dag rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir/ /rang gzhan rang grol bdud rtsi yi/ /rtsa ba'i dug sogs 'joms

par byed/ /lha yi sku dang sngags kyi mthu/ /ye shes 'byung ba chen po yis/ /las kyi 'byung ba 'joms par byed/ /rdzas kyis kyang ni de bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las dug dang dug

'joms byed kyi le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas gnod sbyin gtum pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kyai bcom ldan 'das dug chen po de dag smin pa la/ gdon pa'i las dag gang gis bgyi/ /nan tan gyis ni bka' stsol cig /ces gsol

bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ badzre sarba Sh+TaM tsit+ta rbad nan/ ma hA kA la tsit+ta rbad nan/ sarba sha trU~M mA ra ya rbad nan/ zhag grangs nyi shu gcig tu bya/ /nam langs nyi ma shar ga ru/ /stong tshar re ste de bzhin du/ /srod dang tho rangs

nam gung la/ /ma khrag gsum dang dug sna dang / /drag po'i rdzas rnams dag gis brab/ /nA ga'i gzugs byas rdza yi nang / /gzugs nang phuHla sngags phreng bskor/ /rdza nang thal chen 'brub khung du'o/ /sngags par rtsa ba'i 'khor lo yis/ /kha chod

sme gos nag po dgab/ /de nas drag po'i sbyin bsreg bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las gdug pa srog gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang gsungs pa/ nA ga'i gzugs

la reg bya ni/ /sngags kyi 'bru bzhin sngags bkod do/ /klu rgyal bzhi gzugs mthar bzhag nas/ /gdug pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /dang po'i zhi ba tha mar drag /dang por drag la tha mar zhi/ /thog mtha' gnyis ka zhi dang drag /oM nA ga rA dza sa ma

ya/ /a pa lA ya tsit+ta dz+wa la ya/ sa ma ya swA hA/ nyi shu gcig gis mthar dbyung ngo zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las dam tshig srog gi 'khor lo 'jam pa dang rtsub pa'i sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //

de nas yang gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus na bstan pa la gnod pa dang gdug pa can 'dul ba thun mong gi las bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thun mong phyi ru

gsad 'dod na/ /phrin las mi 'gyur 'khor lo bskor/ /'khor lor gzhug dang gzugs la gdab/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo lto sbyar du/ /gang dmigs gzugs de khrag tu bri/ /snying gar ming bri lte ba la/ /shwa rI ra te mgo bo la/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha zhes

pa dgod/ /yan lag bzhi pa ha na ste/ /mA ra ya brla gnyis dang ni mtshan ma la'o/ /dmigs pa'i sa nas zag pa'i rdzas/ /blangs te bong bu'i chus sbrus la/ /sha trU~M gzugs bya yig 'bru rnams/ /gnas su bkod de sngon dmar bcing / /dug

rdzas gtum pa'i rdzas kyis gtum/ /btson khang bskur te thun rnams dbab/ /zla ba gcig tu gnag par bya/ /bdun bdun bskor bya bar bar du/ /mchod pa'i las bya mtshan thun dbab/ /bsreg dang gnon pas mtha' brtul bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las phrin las mi 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa/ kyai bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus na/ gdul dka' ba'i gdol pa

can rnams kyi lo tog 'joms pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lo tog 'joms pa'i las byas na/ /nA ga gzir te gzhom par bya zhes stobs kyi yi ge 'bru bzhi dang / mi

'gyur ba'i yi ge 'bru gsum gsungs pa/ oM hU~M badzra ma hA ba la zhes gtum po stobs chen po'i sngags gsungs so/ /nA ga tsit+ta rbad nan/ zhes klu'i snying gzir drug pa gsungs so/ /sarba duSh+TA na/ zhes thams cad dbang du sdud pa gsungs so/ /phob

shar shar phob/ ces chu 'khyags kyi snying po gsungs so/ /gcig tu dril zhing brdeg par bya/ /nA ga'i gzugs bcas sngags bkod nas/ /yungs kar brdeg cing phur bus gdab/ /mdze thod nang du klu gzugs gzhug /khrag chen btsan dug gla ba'i khrag /yungs

kar yungs nag sngags shing brdeg /klu gzugs nim pa'i chu nas dbyung / /dang po cho 'phrul che bar 'dod/ /nyam thag pa na dbab las bya/ /gsad cing ro ru 'dug pa na/ /dus las yol te phebs mi 'gyur/ /rtags dang ldan par gyur pa na/ /bdag nyid ting

'dzin ldan pa yis/ /drag po'i sngags kyis klu gzugs btum/ /rdzas dang thod pa chu mig mnan/ /drag po rgyu ba'i dus dang sbyar/ /'jig rten ldog par the tsom med/ /ces gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las chu 'khyags

lo tog 'joms byed kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas dregs pa can thams cad shin tu yang yi rang bar gyur/ ljon shing la dus kyi rlung drag pos bskyod pa bzhin 'dar bzhin du 'khod de/ bka' bzhin du bgyid do zhes 'dzer cing spyan snga na 'khod pa las gnod sbyin

gtum pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus kyi bstan pa la gnas pa'i slad du las gnad la dbab tu gsol zhes gsol pas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdud rnams las la gzhug pa ni/ /kha rag nag po khra mA ya nr-i mA ra dzA mr-i khug dzaH

btsan rnams las la gzhug pa ni/ /A pi shu rak+Sha tshal pa tshal pa a nr-i tr-i dzaHdzaH/ klu btsan las la gzhug pa ni/ /nA ga rA dza shul a/ tr-i dzaHdzaHmA ra ya nr-i lo sod/ rgyal po las la gzhug pa ni/ /tro ta ni tro ta ni/ pa tra pa tra/ shU la shU la/ d+ha sha grI ba mA ra ya

nr-i dzaHdzaHrbad/ klu rnams las la gzhug pa ni/ /nA ga gur ling / snying khrag bam rul/ nA ga ra ra he sa tad rbad/ pu du ma shi kha la rak+Sha rbad/ gnyan las la gzhug pa ni u ta kha kha da ra sing ga rak+sha kha la ni dun mA ra Na dun rbad dzaH/ de dag gi phyag brnyan las

la gzung ba ni dza la dzi nri ha na nr-i ma du ma/ snying kha la nr-i dzaHdzaH/ dza nr-i rbad pu khal rak+Sha rbad/ ling ga byad gzhug re bas dril/ /rta nag thod par bcug nas kyang / /nub kyi phyogs kyi brag nag rtsar/ /mthun pa'i rdzas dang ming byang sbrag /rta nag lug nag snying dag

dang / /lug nag mthing nag dar gyis brgyan/ /rta nag thod bcug brag rtsar gtad/ /mthun pa'i ming bris dug gis brab/ /mthing nag dar dril mdzo thod gzhug /ba dmar rta dmar snying dung gzugs/ /thod par bshos cha dmar por gzhug /chu mig brag

gi rtsa ba na/ /rtse na brag dmar yod par gtad/ /ming rus bris la za 'og dril/ /'jon mo spre'u yi mgo co ru/ /rta dang bya dang lug dkar snying / /spyan gzigs dkor 'bru za 'og dril/ /thod par bcug ste lha khang gi/ /them pa'i 'og tu mnan par bya/ /

sha trU~M sbal nag lto bar bri/ /glang dmar rwa rur bcug la dril/ /rtsi sman 'bru dang rin po che/ /ba dmar glang rur blug nas kyang / /nA ga gdug pa'i lag tu gtad/ /mdzo dre'i thod par ming byang gzhug /chu rta'i gzugs dang rta sngon snying / /thod par bcug ste rgya

mtshor skyur/ /tsa ra dmar po'i thod pa ru/ /sha trU~M ming gzugs dar dmar dril/ /sngon dmar dog pas dam du bcing / /bya dmar ra dmar snying dang gzugs/ /thod par bshos cha dmar po gzhug /byang phyogs brag dmar rtsa ru mnan/ /brnag pa'i

ming byang bris nas kyang / /tsa ra sngon mo'i thod par gzhug /mjo ltol ba lang dre'u'i yang / /thod par bcug ste chu 'gram dang / /shing gcig rtsa ru mnan par bya/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang rdzas rnams kyis/ /rang gi bya ba nan tan byos/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las bstan pa la gnod pa chom la dbab pa'i le'u sngags kyi phong bstan pa ste drug pa'o// //de nas gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa/ /kyai bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i

dus na gdug pa can phyag brnyan bcas pa'i sbyor ba'i mthu zlog pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nas sbyor ba'i mthu bzlog na/ /rang lus sbas te de dag gi/ /mig gi 'bras bu

gcar bar bya/ /rang lus sba bar bya ba ni/ /skye 'gro mig gi 'bras bu gcar/ /nag po kha ta'i 'bras bu dang / /tsa ra rog po'i 'bras bu gnyis/ /mig la bskus te nor bu btsal/ /rnyed nas lus bcad ri khrod 'grim/ /de dag rnyed par ma gyur na/ /gser

dang dngul rdo zha nye'i rdo/ /spra tshil dang ni a ru ra/ /ba ru ra dang pi pi ling / /pho ba ris rnams cha mnyam ste/ /bzhu ste rdzi dang rlangs la gzab/ /de dag gzhan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gam gzhan las 'tshe gyur na/ /dregs pa kun gyi 'bras bu gcar/ /lto

'phye'i sha dang sbal 'dra'i sha/ /sa chu dag na gnas pa'i mi/ /glang ma'i sgron shing 'bras bu dang / /me ma btang ba'i du ba dang / /nyag gcig po yi dri chen dang / /sems ma chags pa'i sha rnams kun/ /legs par nan tan byas bcas nas/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams

kyi/ /rnam par dag pas mthong mi 'gyur/ /gdug pa'i klu rnams 'gras pa'i gdon/ /de dag 'bras bur gcar ba ni/ /phag pho rog po'i don snying lnga/ /lce bog nag po'i gser lum dang / /thar nu'i thangs nyams rnyed gdung ste/ /lus la bcangs par gyur pa na/ /

sha mig rnam par dag pa yi/ /klu chen brgyad kyis bltas gyur kyang / /mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las lus rnam par sba ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas lha yi dbang po dang /

gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje gtum po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje stobs po che dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang / de dag la sogs pa

'dus pa'i tshogs chen po rnams rab tu yi rangs te/ lan brgya stong du mar mchod cing bskor nas mngon par bstod do/ /de nas lag na rdo rje bzhi la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje bzhi po dang / rgyud 'di dag gang na gnas par khyed kyang rjes su 'brangs la rgyud 'di 'chad pa

dus gsum du mchod cing bkur bar gyis shig /de'i dgos pa gang ci'ang rung pa ma lus par sgrubs shig /phyi ma'i dus na o tre yul du rgyas par 'gyur gyis der srung bar byos shig ces gsungs nas chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la bzhugs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum

po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi slob dpon a pa yug ti la dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bla ban chos kyi brtson 'grus
kyis zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //@#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ gnod sbyin gyi sde chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ oM mu tsi

ni swA hA/ mu khe se swA hA/ mo hA ni swA hA/ dan ti swA hA/ cho ga 'di chu khyor ba gang bzlas pa byas te/ 'thungs nas sems bzhin du nyal na lag na rdo rjes rmi lam ston par 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni yak+Sha ma hA ru dra badzrA na la dzi hwa tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje me lce'i rgyud ces bya ba/ 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad

bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'byung ba'i yum btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin drag po bye ba phrag bcu dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na drag cing gtum pa'i rigs ji snyed pa thams

cad dang thabs cig go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das drag po'i skyil mo krung bcas nas g.yas pa nam mkha' la bsgreng / g.yon pa sa la bgrad nas spyan bzlog pas phyogs bcur gzigs te/ zhal nas hU~M ha zhes pa'i sgra cher byung ngo / /de nas 'khor thams

cad gtso bo mi snang bas yun ring du brgyal bar gyur to/ /de'i skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bo'i gtsug nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba/ sngags rnam pa gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa phyag brnyan lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba kha dog sngon po cher

grags pa/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje rtse dgu pa thogs pa/ g.yon pa na nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po drag po thogs pa zhig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/ /de nas nam mkha' lding gi gshog pa bskyod pas rgya mtshor zhugs te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /

'jog pos rang gi bdag po'i spyi bor 'dud do/ /nye dga' bo dang dung skyong gis rna cha byas so/ /rigs ldan gyis mgul rgyan du byas so/ /pad+ma dang pad+ma chen pos lag gdub tu byas so/ /sprin gyi shugs can gyis se ral khar bcings so/ /hu lu hu

lus ska rags su byas so/ /'brug sgra dang bdud 'joms kyis rkang gtub tu byas te/ slar bdag po'i lag pa g.yon par song ngo / /de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag bcu dang / /drag po'i rigs rnams brgyal ba las sangs te/ phyogs kun tu bltas

pa las phyag brnyan lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa mthong nas/ rings par kye ma a la la bdag cag gi gtso bo nyid bzhugs so/ /zhes brjod nas song ba las phyin te/ bltas pas cher drag pa skra kham pa gyen du 'phags pa/ mig me mdag gi phung bo

ltar 'bar ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/ gsus pa rdzing bu ltar 'khyil ba/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ klu'i rgyan cha bdun dang ldan pa/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje rtse dgu pa thogs pa/

g.yon na nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po drag po thogs pa/ sku byin po la dpag tshad nyis 'bum drug khri yod pa bzhugs so/ /de nas gnod sbyin rnams kyis gsol pa/ gtso bo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i don drag po rgyas par gson cig

dang / /bdag cag rnams kyis zhu bar ma spobs kyis zhes gsol nas/ lag na rdo rje la gos sngon po dang la baiDUr+ya zhun ma'i nang du btsos pa zhig bla gos su gsol to/ /stag gi pags pa drug stong gis sham thabs su bcings so/ /de nas lag

na rdo rje rings par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/ mdun du snying po dang ldan pa'i skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' dang sa gzhi la gzigs nas/ bar snang du yang spyan gyis 'khor bar

gzigs so/ /de nas kha~M thu~M sa~M/ zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do/ /de nas lag na rdo rje stan las langs nas/ rdo rje thal mo rang gi snying gar sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba drag po'i don bdag dang sems

can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhu na/ /ci bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar gnang ngam zhes gsol pa dang / ci yang mi gsung bar bcom ldan 'das gdug pa'i tshogs nges par 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs ma

thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i gdug pa can thams cad snying 'dar bar gyur to/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ lag na rdo rje la gzigs te byed pa g.yon pa'i chu shing snying po nas drangs te bkug pa'o/ /

byed pa skyes pa'i chu shing sgra dang bcas pas brkyang ba byas te gnas so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje phyag rgya de nyid yang dag par rig ste/ tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ khyed la sogs pa'i 'khor dag sa phyogs 'dir ma gnas par phyogs gzhan du dengs shig /gal

te mi 'gro na khyed la sogs pa'i snying 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes brjod pas sgra gnas kyi khung bur sgrib byed kyi tshogs song ste/ snga ma bzhin du 'khod do/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //

de nas phyag na rdo rje yis/ /thub pa'i sku la 'di skad gsol/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje drag po'i don/ /rgyas par bdag la bshad du gsol/ /gsang ba'i bdag po legs par yang / /nyon la yid la zung shig khyod/ /nga yi gsang ba gang yin dang / /rdo rje drag po

gang yin pa/ /nga la mtshan nyid gzhan med de/ /khyod nyid kyi ni rgyud dang yang / /khyod kyi bya ba'i las bshad bya/ /skye ba bzhi bsdus sems can rnams/ /gdug pa can gyis gtses gyur pa/ /thabs su ldan pa'i bzlog pa yi/ /mtshan ma nges par bshad par

bya/ /ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de/ /dza ni mi bskyod thub pa'i sku/ /ra ni rin chen 'byung ldan sku/ /me lce'i yig 'bru gsum po la/ /dang por gtso bo bshad bya ba/ /pA ni rdo rje 'joms byed ma/ /Na ni pad+ma 'joms byed ma/ /i ni kun 'gro 'joms byed ma/ /

'og btags gsum po ming mthar sbyar/ /e ni kun tu go byed de/ /ra ni smin par byed pa ste/ /pa ni kun nas sdud pa yin/ /sa ni yongs su rten pa'i las/ /ya ni yang dag bskyod par bshad/ /go 'byed gnyis pa'i steng gnas pa'i/ /sna ldan dag tu shes

par bya/ /de las nges par byung bas na/ /kun snang gang yin dngos dang sbyar/ /bsam pa'i dngos la 'jug rnams kyi/ /yan lag thabs rnams thams cad du/ /gong du smos nas brjod pa yin/ /don du gsal bar zlos pa yi/ /tshig ni rgyas par

brjod mi dgos/ /las las grub pa'i gzugs rnams la/ /drag po yongs su ston pa dang / /gnod sbyin be con thogs rnams la/ /gtso bo'i don du bshad pas na/ /tshig tu nges par yang dag brjod/ /khyod kyi lung 'chang rab dga' bas/ /de nyid rigs

su byung ba ste/ /kun kyang drag po'i las la dga'/ /snang ba dag par mi mthong bzhin/ /de nyid la ni nges par brjod/ /gong du bstan pa gang yin pa/ /so so dag la gdon mi za/ /sbyor ba sna tshogs des bsgrubs na/ /snang bar 'byor ba sna tshogs pa/ /mngon

du rgyas shing nges par gsal/ /snang ba chen po bdag med par/ /rgyud pas yongs su grub pa yin/ /kun rdzob gong ma'i tshig lta bu/ /dngos po bsten pa lta bur mthong / /don dam 'og ma'i sgra lta bur/ /nyon mongs kun bsregs rang bzhin gyis/ /'od

gsal ba ru gnas pa yin/ /snying po don dam la 'jug pa/ /phyi rim kun rdzob la brten bya/ /dang por sangs rgyas mi gnas shing / /snga mi'i bya ba sbyor bar brtson/ /dbang thob pa la rlom sems med/ /bla ma'i man ngag nges pa las/ /bla ma nyid la ci

nus kyis/ /yang dag par ni mchod par bya/ /rdo rje ngo bo kun 'byung dang / /gdug pa thams cad sreg phyir gang / /dngos po la 'jug gong ma'i sgra/ /gong ma'i tshig tu brjod pa yin/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las/ nges tshig

gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //gos sngon lag na rdo rje yis/ /sangs rgyas mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba yi/ /thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gsung du gsol/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ /yang dag don dam

dngos gyur na/ /dkyil 'khor lha gzugs med pa ste/ /'gro ba rtog pa la gnas pas/ /de yi kun rtog bsal ba'i phyir/ /lha yi sbyor ba bshad par bya/ /gang zhig mos pas byed pa yis/ /khru gsum dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi pa/ /

nags sam dur khrod khang stong ngam/ /gtsug lag khang ngam mchod rten nam/ /de dag gnas su nges par brtsam/ /dang por bsnyen pa rab gnas pas/ /bu mo bcu drug ston mo byas/ /bdag gis zhag gsum khrus bya zhing / /spyi bo lkog ma snying ga ru/ /

gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge brtag /rams su bcos pa'i gos nyid la/ /gur gum thig le nges btab ste/ /de nyid la ni bskon par bya/ /zas su dkar gsum sbyin byas shing / /skyes pa dang ni phrad mi bya/ /snying po 'di nyid 'bum tshad du/ /rang

gis bzlas pas rig pa 'byin/ /de nas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa las/ /bu mo nyid la tshig brjod de/ /ba yi rnam lnga nyid dang yang / /rams dang mthing shun kun 'dus su/ /rin thang mi brtsi nyor bcug ste/ /de nyid rigs mthun nang gtums la/ /gnas

gang yin par bdag la gtad/ /de yis zhag gsum sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya nges pa nyid dang yang / /snying po gong gi sbyor ba yis/ /dri chu btab la grangs tshad du/ /phyin par yang dag bzlas par bya/ /de nas skud pa sngon po ni/ /bu mos legs par bkal

ba la/ /sngags kyis dag byas rab mdzes pas/ /srad bu dgu ru nges par sgril/ /me tog sngon po'i nang gtums la/ /seng ldeng phur pa lnga rnams kyis/ /sred bu yongs su bri bar bya/ /rab tu tshad du nges pa yis/ /phyag rgya ma la ngag brjod pas/ /de

nyid mnyam par gzhag pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor legs par byas pa yin/ /'phang du khru gang tshad byas te/ /dang po byang shar mtshams nyid nas/ /kun rten kha dog rigs mthun blang / /yongs su bsdus byas nges par bya/ /gnyis pa gnyis pa nyid du nges/ /

gsum pa gcig gi tshad dang ldan/ /de ltar tshad du ldan pa las/ /shin tu mnyam par 'thas par bya/ /de nyid rjes su 'jug pa yis/ /dang po'i srad bu gang yin pas/ /kha dog ser po'i thig gdab bya/ /dkyil 'khor dgu ru nges pa las/ /'bru dang sa dang rin

chen dang / /phye ma nyid du btags pa yis/ /dkyil du pad+ma bcu drug pa/ /'dab mar ldan par bri bar bya/ /shar dang lho dang nub byang dang / /mtshams rnams su yang de bzhin bri/ /le tshe'i pad+ma gang yin pa/ /sna tshogs par ni yang dag bshad/ /mtshams

rnams su ni mchod pa yi/ /lha mo yongs su dgod par bya/ /sgo bzhi dag tu khro mo bzhi/ /sbyor bas yang dag dgod par bya/ /rin chen pha gu 'dod yon dang / /dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan/ /twa ra Na ni bzhis brgyan cing / /sna tshogs rdo rje gzhir gnas yin/ /

gdugs dang gang yin pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par sgeg /sngags pa byang chub blo ldan pas/ /keng rus phreng ba nyid dang yang / /sbrul mgo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje sna tshogs rab 'bar ba'i/ /phreng bas phyi rol legs par bskor/ /

zur bzhi dag tu bum pa bzhi/ /rgyan gyis rdzogs par yang dag bri/ /de dkyil phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /snga ma'i tshul gyis yongs su gnas/ /shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal nyid/ /yang dag par ni bri bya ste/ /kha dog dmar po nyid la yang / /dbu gsum phyag ni

drug pa'i dbyibs/ /zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /pho ni rdo rje nges pa las/ /mo ni dgra sta yang dag ldan/ /bar ma gnyis kyis 'ching byed pa/ /gung mo mthe bo nges mdud nas/ /gzhan rnams yongs su brkyang pa yin/ /de nyid snying po gang yin

pa/ /snying gar yang dag bzung byas nas/ /de 'og pho yis zhags pa 'dzin/ /mo yis ral gri bzung byas pa/ /dang po nyid la dgod par bya/ /lho ru nag po chen po nyid/ /kha dog dud sprin lta bu la/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa'i dbyibs/ /pho nyid tsan dan

bde chen bsnams/ /mo ni zhags pa yongs su 'dzin/ /khro zhal gzigs pa mi bzad pas/ /phyogs bcu rnams su rab tu gzigs/ /de nyid mgon po gang yin pa/ /phyogs gnyis par ni rab tu dgod/ /nub phyogs gsum par dgod

bya ba/ /lus ngan sras po stobs po che/ /kha dog ljang gu nyid la yang / /spyan ni rgyas pa nyid/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa la/ /spyi bor rdo rje rmog gis brgyan/ /g.yas pa nyid la rdo rje can/ /g.yon pa ne'u le'i rkyal pa 'dzin/ /zhabs

gnyis drang por rab gnas te/ /shar phyogs bltas pas yongs su gnas/ /byang phyogs bzhi par dgod bya ba/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yongs su gnas/ /kha dog sngon po de nyid la/ /tsham rngam khro gnyer brjid pa'i zhal/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang stang

stabs tshul/ /phyag gnyis brang du rab bsnol te/ /g.yon du nges par cung zad gzigs/ /lhor bltas yang dag dgod par bya/ /byang shar rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ /kha dog dmar nag 'jigs pa la/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum rab bzhugs nas/ /

phyag g.yas gri gug rnon po 'phyar/ /g.yon pa cang te'u drag po rdung / /gtso bo la bltas dgod par bya/ /shar lho rdo rje ro langs nyid/ /kha dog sngo skya rab 'bar la/ /mi bzad 'bar ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /cung zad g.yas su nges par gzigs/

g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul gnas te/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog rab bzung nas/ /gung srin la sogs gsum po rnams/ /dam por bkug pas yongs su bsdams/ /mtheb mdzub bzhi rnams rab brkyang ste/ /spyi bor nges par bsnol bar bsnams/ /lho

nub rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/ /kha dog dmar skya nyid la yang / /shin tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhabs gnyis mthil sbyar btsugs pa la/ /nam mkha' gru bzhi pa ru 'dod/ /lag gnyis spyi bo thal sbyar nas/ /me lce 'bar ba yongs su 'dzin/ /

thod pa lnga yis mgo brgyan pa/ /gtso bo la bstan dgod par bya/ /nub byang bzhi pa'i mtshams su yang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed zhes bya ba/ /kha dog sngo nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa la/ /zhabs gnyis dag tu rnam par

bshad/ /g.yas g.yon dang po glang chen gyi/ /pags pa yongs su brkyang ba 'dzin/ /de 'og g.yas pa dgra sta la/ /g.yon pa rdo rje yang dag 'dzin/ /gsum pa'i g.yas na lcags kyu ste/ /g.yon na mi mgo rlon pa bsnams/ /brkyang bskum

tshul du gnas nas kyang / /gtso bo nyid la kha bltas bzhugs/ /mtshams kyi gru chad gang yin par/ /'od skyed ma dang yid 'phrog ma/ /kun bzang ma dang glu sgra can/ /rang gi phyogs kyi kha dog la/ /shin tu zhi bas ldem bag can/ /phyag g.yas

su ni me tog dang / /dri dang zhal zas sgra brnyan rnams/ /gar gyis rol bar yang dag ldan/ /nu ma cung zad 'bur ba la/ /dar dag dkar pos smad g.yogs pas/ /gtso bo la bltas mdzes pa'i gzugs/ /phyi yi grwa ru dgod par bya/ /sgo rnams

su ni sgo skyong ni/ /srog gcod ma dang dbugs rngub ma/ /khrag 'thung ma dang sha za ma/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa la/ /stag dang seng ge sbrul dang yang / /dom du yang dag gnas pa ste/ /phyag g.yas tho ba rkyal pa dang / /hom gzar gri gug rnon

po bsnams/ /g.yon pa rnams ni zhags pa nyid/ /kun kyang 'jigs par yongs su 'dzin/ /rang gi phyogs kyi kha dog ste/ /kun kyang nag po shin tu bsreg /g.yon brkyang g.yas ni bskum pa nyid/ /mche ba gtsigs shing rngam pa'i sku/ /shin tu

khro gnyer brjid pa'i zhal/ /gar stabs kyis rol bde chen gnas/ /cung zad g.yon du gzigs pa yis/ /ha la ha la'i sgra yang sgrogs/ /gzhan yang lha rnams de dag kun/ /thod pa lnga yis brgyan byas nas/ /rgyan cha lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /kun

kyang stag gi pags pa yis/ /smad ni yongs su dkris pa yin/ /de stengs gdan ni rab gnas pa/ /gtso bo nyid la nyi zla yis/ /phrag pa nyid la 'khor bar rgyu/ /tshangs pa dbang po lha chen gnyis/ /zhabs kyis yongs su mnan pa

yin/ /shar gyi lha chen rnam rgyal nyid/ /keng rus steng na bzhugs pa bzhin/ /gzhan yang de ltar gnas pa yin/ /sa bon gnas pa gang yin pa/ /sgra dang bcas pa shes par bya/ /dang po gtso bo skyed byed gang / /hU~M las nges par rdzogs

bya zhing / /gzhan rnams 'di las 'byung bar bsam/ /hU~M ma~M ba~M a~M/ ya~M ba~M Da~M b+ha~M/ pra~M ma~M sa~M sha~M/ pra~M sha~M ra~M ma~M/ de dag las byung sngags pa yis/ /'od dang bcas par bde gshegs kyi/ /zhal nas 'byung bar yang dag ldan/ /de las rags

pa gang zhig gi/ /'bar 'phro nges par bskyed par bya/ /dang po kun kyang gcig pa yis/ /ba~M las gyur pa sna tshogs pa/ /yang dag par ni skyed par byed/ /de 'og ka~M las rab bskyed pas/ /skam por yongs su brtag pa yin/ /de dag rab rdzogs

sngags pa yis/ /sku ru yongs su rdzogs byas la/ /bdag gis rnal 'byor yang dag 'grub/ /de nas sngags pa blo ldan pas/ /rigs su nges pa gang yin pa/ /thabs 'di la ni 'jug par bya/ /kun la 'jug par gyur pa yi/ /khyab pa'i bdag po chen

po ni/ /rigs kyi gtso bos spyi la khyab/ /mdun ni rdo rje'i rigs yin te/ /lha min la sogs nges par 'jig /g.yas pa nyid na gang gnas pa/ /rin chen rigs su nges pa ste/ /sha za la sogs nges par 'jig /rgyab na gnas pa gang yin pa/ /pad+ma'i

rigs su yang dag ldan/ /nor la sogs pa gang dgod pa/ /re ba bzhin du skong bar byed/ /g.yon na nges par gnas pa gang / /las kyi rigs su nges pa las/ /klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa/ /ma rungs pa rnams yongs su 'jig /gzhan yang lhag

ma thams cad kun/ /pho nya'i tshul du nges par gnas/ /dang po nyi ma shar ba na/ /las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs pa/ /so so dag la snying po nyid/ /gong du bu~M las rab rdzogs pa'i/ /brgya rtsa brgyad dag nges par bzlas/ /hU~M gi sgra dang rab ldan pas/ /bdag nyid kha

ni me 'bar gsal/ /phyag rgya snang bar bcas byas te/ /de nyid stang stabs bskyod pa yis/ /gdug pa thams cad sreg byed dang / /bde gshegs mngon par dgyes par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu gzung byas nas/ /khro bo'i cha lugs gang yin pas/ /phyogs rnams

rmongs par byed pa yin/ /lha mo'i gzugs 'chang gang yin pas/ /gzhan gyi sems kyang 'phrog par byed/ /re mig rnams kyi bar gang yin/ /me lce 'bar ba yongs su bri/ /'khor lo'i 'og tu gnas bya ba/ /chos 'byung phyag rgya nges par bri/ /thabs

dang shes rab ldan pa la/ /kun 'byung yum du nges par gsal/ /rten 'brel yang dag 'byung ba yis/ /kun rdzob la ni don dam brten/ /don dam nyid la kun rdzob kyang / /brten pa nyid du yang dag gnas/ /de bas snang ba mi gsal bar/ /chos 'byung

phyag rgya nges par yang / /rgyas pa la sogs ma yin gyi/ /drag po'i dkyil 'khor yin pa dang / /de bzhin dbyibs su rang gsal ba/ /dran dang bcas pas bri bar bya/ /mthu dang ldan pa'i gang zag la/ /stobs ni shin tu nges par skye/ /dkyil 'khor lha

gnyis mngon bsgrubs pas/ /lus la gzi brjid 'jug pa'o/ /rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor dang lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //lag na rdo rje gos sngon gyis/ /'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams dgyes bya

ba/ /thabs de gang lags gsung du gsol/ /nang gi bdag nyid can dang yang / /phyi yi khrus sogs rab byas la/ /rab gsal la sogs rgyun bcad nas/ /gang yang rung ba'i lo nyid la/ /ston zla ra ba nas brtsams nas/ /lha min bla dang me tog gi/ /

drag po dang po de nyid la/ /bdag gis sbyor ba nges par brtsam/ /de nas dang po bdag lus la/ /rgyan cha lnga yis rab brgyan te/ /lus la gos dag sngon po nyid/ /bla gos smad g.yogs yang dag bcings/ /spyi bo la sogs gnas

lnga ru/ /sbrul gyis yongs su bcing bar bya/ /rang nyid dkyil 'khor shar sgo ru/ /'dug pas sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /de nas dang po bla re gang / /steng du nges par phub byas la/ /zur bzhi dag tu ba dan bzhi/ /sngon pos yongs su dpyang bar bya/ /bla re dag

gi dkyil dag nas/ /skud pa la brgyus me tog gi/ /phreng ba yongs su dpyang bar bya/ /de nas snga ma'i tshul gnas la/ /gong du bstan pa'i gnas rnams su/ /bdag gi las 'di nges par brtsam/ /gtor ma'i las rnams kun rdzogs dang / /mchod pa rnam

pa lnga rnams dang / /seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la/ /sngags 'di yis ni yang dag bsngags/ /oM badzra kI la ya sarba big+h+nA na ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badzra pany+tsa dz+nya na sho d+ha ya sarba tsak+Shu kA ra ya hU~M/ sngags de dag gis phur bu dang / /skud pa lnga la lan grangs

ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas byas la/ /tsan dan la sogs dri lnga yis/ /gos par yang dag bcang bar bya/ /de nas sngags pa blo ldan pas/ /bdag nyid bsrung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam/ /rang gi phyi rol mtshams su ni/ /mi 'gyur las ni bsil

ldan bsgom/ /de steng sdud pa'i dngos po gang / /kha dog nag po yang dag bsam/ /de las khyab byed rigs lnga pa/ /yang dag par ni bsam par bya/ /de nas yongs su rdzogs pa las/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil par bdag bsam ste/ /rdo rje sdigs

mdzub phyag rgya yis/ /sngags bzlas pas ni bgegs bskrad la/ /rigs gtso'i rtse mo de nyid la/ /ka~M las lus skyob bsam bya ste/ /spyi bor gnas pas khyab par bsam/ /de nas gtor ma de nyid la/ /bdug pa la sogs gang yin dang / /skye ba bzhes

bsdus sems can la/ /las kyi bar chad mi 'gyur phyir/ /bsam par rdzogs par rin thang bya/ /de nas bdag nyid dad pa yis/ /mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams ni/ /bsam pa sngags kyis dbul bar bya/ /gong ma'i stang stabs las bya ba/ /g.yas pa nges par

bskums pa las/ /g.yon pa legs par brkyang byas te/ /g.yas pa'i lag pas rdo rje nyid/ /phyar nas g.yon gyi be con dang / /rtse sprad spyi bor gnas byas la/ /g.yon pa'i be con g.yas spos la/ /g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa yi/ /lag pas bzung nas

snying gar mnan/ /be con nges par bskor ba yis/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams su nges par gdag /kha nas hU~M gi sgra 'bar zhing / /sna tshogs rdo rje gar thabs kyis/ /lan gsum rab tu bskor bar bya/ /de nas gdug pa gang yin pa/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu song

ba las/ /sa phyogs nges par gtsang bar 'gyur/ /de nas thig sogs gdab pa yis/ /sta gon legs par gnas pa dang / /rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur la/ /rmi ltas nges par gdab par bya/ /bzang ngan ltas dag dbab pa dang / /bzlog dang mi bzlog

bya ba gang / /shes rab can gyis gsal bar brtag /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bzhengs bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis drag po dang po la/ /phye ma lnga la sngags dag dang / /phyag rgya bcas pas byin gyis brlab/ /de nas snod dag thod pa la/ /byas pa'i rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab/ /

nges par las kyi sbyor ba brtsam/ /phyogs su nges par bskor ba yin/ /dbugs rgyu ba yi dngos po gang / /yi ge mngon par gsal ba yis/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bri bar bya/ /skabs kyi skad cig shes pa yis/ /rab tu khro gnyer bstan par bya/ /dang po nag po bri bya zhing / /

gnyis pa dkar por nges par dgye/ /gsum pa nyid ni ser po ste/ /bzhi pa dmar po yang dag ldan/ /lnga pa ljang gu bri bya zhing / /drug pa kha dog sna tshogs rgyas/ /dkyil 'khor las rnams rdzogs pa dang / /rdzas su yongs su ldan byas te/ /gru bzhi dag tu byang shar

gyi/ /mtshams nas sa gang bu mo yis/ /blangs pa las byas mchod rten ni/ /sngon po bzhi dag gzhag par bya/ /de yi bskor ba'i rtse mo la/ /gong gi srad bu btags byas te/ /me tog sngon po'i phreng ba yis/ /'khor bar yongs su brgyan

par bya/ /bum pa sngon po bcu bdun nyid/ /mtha' ma'i phyogs su nges par gzhag /sman dang spos dang snying po dang / /lan tshwa rtsi thog la sogs pas/ /legs par bkang bas gnas pa yin/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan nas/ /lus la mngon par

phyogs par bzhag /de nas sngags pa blo ldan pa/ /grangs dang nges par rab sbyar la/ /zhal zas zur med legs pa dang / /dri dang snang ba gang yin dang / /byug pa'i dri dang tshangs skud dang / /phreng ba ral gri be con rnams/ /yang dag pa ru dgod par bya/ /

gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /phyogs su nges par yang dag gnas/ /de nas bdag po gang zhig gis/ /na bza' dar yug sngon po la/ /gur gum thig les legs bris la/ /de nyid la ni dbul bar bya/ /yol ba sngon pos phyogs bskor la/ /phyi

ma rnams kyis snang mi bya/ /gal te snang bar gyur pa na/ /rang gi lus las ma gtogs pa'i/ /gzhan rnams brlag par 'gyur ba yin/ /de bas legs par bsgrims pa yis/ /phyi rol gzhan la bstan mi bya/ /gang zag gcig pur gnas pa yis/ /

las kyi sbyor ba 'di brtsam bya/ /phyag dag sngon du song ba yis/ /mchod pa'i las la mngon par gzhag /bdag nyid las kyi phyag rgyar gnas/ /bsam pa mngon du gyur pa yis/ /kun gyi 'bras bu gang yin pa/ /bdag gis gsal bar rab tu brtag /

sngags dang phyag rgya rab ldan pa'i/ /mchod pa 'di dag nges pa las/ /bgegs bsal ye shes rab dbab pa'i/ /rnal 'byor rdzogs par yang dag gnas/ /rang rang rigs kyi phyag rgya yis/ /sngags bzlas pa yis dbul bar bya/ /oM na mo nI lA~M

bar d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nA~M/ push+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM na mo nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nA~M/ d+hU pa ni ra yA ta yA mi hU~M/ oM na mo nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nA~M/ A lo ke ni ra yA ta yA mi hU~M/ oM na mo nI lA~M bar b+ha

ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nA~M/ gan+d+ha ni ra yA ta yA mi hU~M/ oM na mo nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nA~M/ nai wi d+ya nir yA ta yA mi hU~M/ oM na mo nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nA~M/ shab+nga ni ra yA ta yA mi hU~M/ oM na mo nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da

la de ba tA nA~M/ tsa ni yA ni ra yA ta yA mi hU~M/ oM na mo nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nA~M/ ta ri nir yA ta yA mi hU~M/ oM na mo nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nA~M/ bA sa na nir yA ta yA mi hU~M/ oM na mo nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nA~M/

gan+d+har ri ni ra yA ta yA mi hU~M/ oM na mo nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nA~M/ s+phar+sha nir yA ta yA mi hU~M/ oM na mo nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nA~M/ rat+na sarba bstu ni ra yA ta yA mi hU~M/ de yis sngags kyi mchod pa las/ /sdig pa bshags pa'i

sngags kyis su/ /phyag rgya nges par rab bcas pa/ /sdig pa bshags pa'i smre sngags kyis/ /lus ngag yid gsum btud pa yis/ /yang dag par ni bshags par bya/ /bsod nams rjes su yi rang dang / /yongs su bsngo dang skyabs 'gro dang / /sems

bskyed pa dang gnas bzhi dang / /gong du bstan pa'i phyag rgya nyid/ /skabs 'di dag tu shes par bya/ /dang po rgyu las skyes pa las/ /phyi nas dngos por mi gnas shing / /rang bzhin 'od ni gsal bar sgom/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las

mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas lag na rdo rje yis/ /gsang ba'i mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /bsam pa rab tu rdzogs pa yi/ /nang gi rnal 'byor gsung du gsol/ /bde gshegs gsang bas bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba la/ /

thabs kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po shes rab can dag gis/ /bdag gis dngos por snang ba las/ /de nyid ngang la mchog nyid kyis/ /'od zer bsil ldan yang dag bsam/ /de la gang du gyur pa ni/ /dbugs rgyu 'gugs par nges

par bsam/ /de las gsal ldan rigs lnga ba/ /stong pa'i dpe las mngon song ba'i/ /gzugs ma sogs rigs ma yis/ /mi 'chi lnga ldan dus 'gyur las/ /'dzin pa can la sbyin par bsgom/ /de nas sngags 'dis rab bsngags te/ /bdag nyid

rigs su ldan pa yis/ /bdag pos phyag rgya nges par gsal/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mA~M badzra pA Ni hU~M a ho A ha ra~M ta thA s+thi to ya~M a ho ma ma pri yang stu ti hU~M/ bdag nyid dngos po la brten nas/ /mtshan mar mi gnas ma skyes pa'i/ /gdod nas grub pa bsam bya ste/ /

sangs rgyas dngos la rab sbyor bas/ /dang por dngos dag bsam byas nas/ /bdag nyid gang gi gzugs gnas la/ /steng du mig 'dra'i dngos po bsgom/ /de las gong du gyur pa las/ /'jigs byed rigs dgu nges par bsam/ /mig 'dra'i sbu gu rab sbyar bas/ /
