khros kyi rgyud las gsang ba'i snying po dang mtshan ltas bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rten ni rdo rje'i 'od du 'bar/ /brten pa 'phro tshad hU~M du 'bar/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro/ /'jig rten ma lus sbyangs nas

kyang / /slar la thig le nyid la 'dus/ /sgra dang bcas te rang gsal 'bar/ /brtan par gyur na spro bsdu bya/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las me'i bsam gtan gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /mthing gi shog gu sngon po la/ /

gser gyi 'khor lo bris pa'i steng / /bsrung ba'i snying po legs bkod de/ /gang ming rak+Sha sbyar bar gyis/ /de yang tri yis yongs bgos te/ /sangs rgyas sems can nyid la bstim/ /de nyid bum par legs bzhu gsal/ /mchod cing bzlas brjod

gsol ba gdab/ /de nas tshes pa'i dus bzang la/ /rang ngam gzhan la btags gyur na/ /bar chad thams cad nyer zhi nas/ /tshe dpal bsod nams rgyas par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las bsrung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas mngon

par bshad bya ba/ /'gro ba dug gis gdungs pa la/ /gdug pa'i dbang chen la sogs pa/ /'tshe ba 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi dga' sems 'phyo 'gro snying 'dod/ /nyam chung 'thibs dang ltas kyang ngan/ /yang yang na zhing gtam bsnol 'ong / /de ni klu yi

gnod pa ste/ /tshor nas legs par bcos na bzlog /sa srin mi la 'di ltar gnod/ /lus sbrid sha 'phrig sha ro 'byung / /sha bkra thor bu ngo yang 'gyur/ /de yang tshor nas bcos na bzlog /sa bdag gnod na 'di ltar 'gyur/ /gdon yang shin

tu ldog 'gyur che/ /na tsha'i zug rngu drag por 'gyur/ /res 'ga' bde ba ltar yang byed/ /skabs su thig le kho nar na/ /de yang bcos dka' shes pas bzlog /gnyen gyi gnod pa 'di yin te/ /shin tu na tsha'i tshabs kyang che/ /rkang lag na 'khums

dri ma ldog /sha khrag lud nas mig kyang sle/ /kha yo sna yo chu ser za/ /kha yang mi thub gnod pa za/ /chu bur byur na 'tshang yang che/ /tshor bar mi chog bsgrim pa gces/ /gdon tshogs gzhan yang yun mi rtag /phra mo tsam la sogs pa bzlog /kun la

bsgrims te bcos na 'tsho/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las gzhan gyi gnod pa brtag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /dbang chen la sogs thams cad la/ /mchod dang gtor mas mgu bar bya/ /ci 'dod pa yi rdzas rnams

sbyin/ /rten yod gnas su legs par sba/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis bsgo byas la/ /bum par nor bu rin chen gzhug /mdzes pa'i dar sna 'bru yi mdzod/ /gang gi rten la sbas gyur na/ /gnod pa rags pa zhi bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las

zhi byed mchod thabs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /btsan dug gu gul gla rtsi dang / /shu dag shing kun mu zi drug /gsang sngags btab ste lus la byug /gu gul nya mkhris gla rtsi dang / /sgog pa shu dag

dri chen rnams/ /bdug pa byas te yang na bkru/ /gser g.yu byi ru mig ma phug /btsan dug rma bya'i mkhris par bcas/ /bcangs na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las rten 'brel rdzas kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //

rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las dum bu dang po bstan pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/ /drag sngags 'di dag brjod par bya'o/ /oM mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na rmugs rmugs/ mA ra Na

ha la ha la/ mA ra Na dun dun/ mA ra Na myos myos/ ma ra Na myos bying thum ril dzaH/ mi tshig spangs te drag sngags 'di/ /dbugs ma shor bar sbub mas drangs/ /bum par bstims nas rtags thob nas/ /'thungs sam bkrus na dngos grub

'thob/ /sngags la gang ming sbyar byas nas/ /yungs kar gdug pa'i phur pa la/ /brjod de las la sbyar gyur na/ /gang la bzlas pa brlag par 'gyur/ /ma bsgrubs lan cig brjod pas kyang / /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /

ma byung mi 'byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las drag sngags khros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bskyed drag sngags bzlas/ /dgos pa tshang ba'i bum pa ste/ /mi dmigs ba~M

las rin po che'i/ /bum pa tshul dang 'thun par bsam/ /de nas ba~M dang la~M las ni/ /chu dang sa yi dkyil 'khor bsam/ /lha bsgoms khyad par bum pa 'dzin/ /mchu ni rdo rje'i sbu gu ste/ /de nas sngags kyi 'od zer 'phros/ /

phyir 'phros gdug pa ma lus bsreg /'od zer lcags kyisbub mar drangs/ /bum par khro chu khol mar gyur/ /de 'thungs bkrus pas gang gnod pa/ /rdul du brlag ste dag par bsam/ /brtsams pa'i las la the tshom med/ /rdo rje

khros pa'i rgyud las bum pa khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom 'khor lo bskor/ /ro ras byi dug bya rog sgros/ /khru gang tsam gyi mtshan nyid la/ /'chi bar byed pa'i snag

tsha la/ /'ug pa'i sgro rtsa g.yas pa yis/ /drag sngags mnyam pa'i re'u mig bri/ /de nas mtshan mar gang dmigs gzugs/ /kha dog rigs bzhi nyid du bya/ /de snying drag sngags re re dgod/ /maN+Dal gtsang ma dris byug ste/ /dkar

dang dmar dang ser dang ljang / /rma bya'i sgro yis brgyan byas te/ /lha bsgom khyad par 'khor lo 'dzin/ /'khor lo bskor ba'i rim pa ni/ /drag sngags mnyam pa'i 'khor lo bskor/ /sngags ni/ nA ga tsakra ma ra Na hU~M phaT/ gang

bsams 'di la the tshom med/ /rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las 'khor lo khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom phur pa gdab/ /lcags sam seng ldeng dug shing la/ /sngags

grangs mnyam pa'i phur pa bsham/ /'khor lo'i mtha' ma bskor te dgod/ /lha bsgom khyad par phur bu 'dzin/ /drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/ /nA ga badzra kI lA ya mA ra Na hU~M phaT/ sngags grangs mnyam pa'i phur pa bsham/ /brtsam

pa'i las la the tshom med/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las phur pa khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom sbyin sreg bya/ /gdug pa'i shing bu khru gang tshad/ /sngags kyi grangs kyang mnyam

par bya/ /sngon dmar skud pas rim gsum dkri/ /bar der 'khor lo'i srog rtsa gcad/ /lag tu gri thogs drag sngags brjod/ /nA ga tik+Sh+Na che ge mo mA ra ya hu~M phaT/ /rim par bgrangs te g.yang gzhi'i khud/ /byang shar mtshams su rnam par

gzhag /de nas maN+Dal dbus nyid du/ /hom khung brus te dug khrag byug /nang du hom du gzugs par bya/ /'khor lo gris gtubs thogs nas ni/ /grangs dang mnyam par bsreg par bya/ /me de yugs sa'i khyim nas bslang / /lha bsgom

khyad par me dpung 'dzin/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa 'di/ /nA ga tsit+ta dz+wa la raM/ mA ra ya phaT/ /bsregs nas las brtsams 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bed khros kyi rgyud las me dpung khros pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //

de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom mnan sngags bzlas/ /chu srinasram mam byi ba'i mgor/ /bsregs pa'i thal ba bsdus byas la/ /gang yin nyid kyi sbyor ba bcas/ /lha bsgom khyad par ri rab 'dzin/ /

drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/ /nA ga stam+b+ha ya nAn/ mnan byas chu srin kha ru bsgom/ /'di byas gang la bzlas pa brlag /'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las ri rab khros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //rdo rje

bde khros kyi rgyud las dum bu gnyis pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /glang po'i pags par 'brug bris nas/ /gang ming bcug ste drag sngags bzlas/ /gnam lcags 'bab pa bzlog par 'gyur/ /'bru yi pad+ma 'dab

brgyad la/ /klu yi gzugs rnams bris pa la/ /bstims nas drag sngags rgyab gyur na/ /gnam chu dus su phebs par 'gyur/ /thod par e bris sngags kyis bskor/ /gang yin bcug la bstims pa la/ /drag sngags gang yin

bzlas byas na/ /myur du 'grub par gdon mi za/ /srog chags 'jigs par gyur pa la/ /'chi ba'i chu yis drag sngags bri/ /'jigs byed bkug ste de la mchod/ /de nyid yungs kar thum por 'debs/ /gang la btags pa bsrung ba'i

mchog /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las las phra mo'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas de dag la 'khor rnams mngon par dga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bstod nas rjes su yi rang ba phul te mi snang bar gyur to/ /mnyam pa chen po la bzhag

pa'o/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las dum bu gsum pa rdzogs so// //mchog tu gsang ba'o/ /dz+nyA na ka ras bsgyur ro// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ mA yA dzA la ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza na ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang

ma'i steng na khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po bkod pa/ rdo rje'i ka bas brgyan pa shin tu mdzes pa'i rin po che bkod pas rnam par bkra ba/ rdo rje dril bu 'khrol ba/ yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par chen pos brgyan pa/ rdo rje'i 'khor

los spras pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i cha byad sna tshogs 'chang ba rnams kyis don gyi bya ba byas pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po las yang dag par 'byung ba'i spyod pa bskyod nas zhal bzhi'i sgo'i go skabs nas byung ba sna tshogs dang / rdo rje dang / rin

po che chen po dang / 'od dpag med dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs dang / rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams kyis brgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / phyag brnyan dang / phyag

brnyan mo du ma'i 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi bde ba de'i bdag nyid dang / dmigs pa dang ma bral ba thugs rje chen pos mnyes gshin pa/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba la brtson par mdzad pa/ lha dang / klu dang /

gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa mang pos brgyan pa na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so/ /

de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'dug pa la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bla gos

phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas 'gying bag can du bltas nas rdo rje gsor te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dgongs pa ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/

bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gang gi slad du gzigs pa dang 'dzum pa mdzad/ des na bdag dang 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur pa lags na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge chen po'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de skad du gsol ba btab ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa/ rgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i thabs bde ba rdo rje'i ye shes bsgrub pa rol pas mnyes par bya ba'i thabs de kho na

nyid thams cad kyi 'byung gnas stangs stabs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs dang shes rab bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes sgrol ba/ rol pas bzhad cing bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor

dang ri mo'i gzugs dang / bsgom pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / stangs stabs dang / sbyor ba dgod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbab pa dang / bskrad pa dang / dbrog pa dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / nyam thag par bya ba dang /

bcad pa dang / bsreg pa dang / bkang ba dang / bskrun pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / sbyin pa dang / slob dpon dang / slob ma gzung ba dang / gsang sngags mang po'i 'jo tshul rnams ngas bshad par bya'o/ /de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin mchog la snyoms par zhugs la

nyon cig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gzhan yang gang dag 'khor du 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis chos kyi 'brel ba'i gtam mnyan par brtsams so/ /de la re zhig dang po dngos grub ni slob dpon

chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pas/ slob dpon med par gyur na ni/ /dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur bas/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig /brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu

med/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor shes pas/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bya'o/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing / /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /theg pa che la rtag dga' ba/ /de ni slob dpon yin par gsungs/ /phyi rol bstan bcos yongs shes

shing / /nyan thos rnams kyis lam 'gro dang / /gsang ba de nyid bsdu ba dang / /theg pa chen po mi shes pa/ /snying rje yod pa ma yin dang / /dad med brtson 'grus mi ldan la/ /rtag tu ngan pa'i tshul spyod dang / /bstan bcos rnams la smod pa min/ /gong du

bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /ldan na slob dpon yin par gzung / /de yis dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / /de nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams bstan/ /de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags dag /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dge dang sdom la dga' ba dang / /rtag tu bla

ma la gus dang / /rgyun du lha rnams mchod byed pa'i/ /yon tan ldan na slob ma yin/ /slob dpon ci 'dra blta zhe na/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog /de ni ye shes rgya mtsho che/ /yid

bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin/ /slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung / /skyon rnams nam yang ma yin no/ /yon tan bzung bas dngos grub cing / /skyon rnams kyis ni dngos grub nyams/ /de yi grib ma'ang mi 'gom ste/ /mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs/ /

rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang ba yi/ /dam pa gang yin spangs par 'gyur/ /slob dpon smod par byed pa dag /rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya/ /slob dpon smod pa gang yin te/ /bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis gzung / /ngan pa gtum po las byed pa/ /mkhas pas

rtag tu spang bar bya/ /mnar med shin tu skyi g.ya' ba'i/ /dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin pa/ /der ni slob dpon smod byed pa/ /gnas par 'gyur zhes rab tu gsungs/ /de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te/ /bsam yas 'bras bu smin byed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas

'bras bu 'dod byed pa'i/ /sems can dad pa ldan pas mchod/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ 'di ni 'jug pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas

thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po ye shes bsgyings pa gsang ba'i byin brlabs kyi mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang la bka' stsal pa/

phyag na rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma ye shes chen po'i snying po 'bar ba rdo rje bsnyen bkur byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang

bskur bar 'gyur bas phyag na rdo rje sems can gang la las tshon rtsi mthong ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur ba la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas

nyid kyi grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyon cig /dang po kho nas yongs su gzung ba byas te/ slob dpon gyis lha nyid kyi stang stabs su 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa bsgrims te rdo rje gsor zhing / lag pa g.yon pas dril bu gsil nas rdo rje 'gros kyis yongs su bskor bar

bya'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis hU~M zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi brjid pa gang gis bskor nas kyang khro bo'i skur bsgoms nas sdang ba'i lha dang / lha ma yin dang gsang ba pa rnams la tshig 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o/ /slob dpon

ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po ming 'di zhes bya ba bri yis/ lha dang lha

ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnon po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / rig sngags grub pa dang / rgan po'am/ rgan mo g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams

dengs shig /'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni phyag na rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can gyis ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu 'bar bas mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes lan gsum brjod nas/

stang stabs la gnas bzhin du sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba dang / g.yon brkyang ba dang / sa ga'i 'dug stangs dang / zlum po'i 'dug stangs dang / mthun pa'i rkang stabs dang / rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang / rdo rje gdegs

pa dang / rdo rje 'jo tshul dang / rkang pa ya gcig gi stangs dang / seng ge'i stabs dang / seng ge glal ba dang / bung ba'i 'phur ba'i stang stabs dang / rdo rje sgrog dang / rdo rje gsor ba dang / rdo rje'i stang stabs dang / rdo rje dgug pa dang / rdo rje gar dang / rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje ro

langs ma dang / rdo rje tho ba dang / rdo rje'i byin rlabs dang / rdo rje'i gdu bu dang / bud med kyi sgyu 'phrul stang stabs dang / rdo rje'i dra ba dang / stobs po che'i 'degs pa dang / rdo rje mche ba dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / rdo rje sgra dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / rdo rje'i thabs dang / 'khor

lo'i tshul dang / gtun shing gi tshul dang / ba dan gyi tshul dang / zhags pa'i tshul dang / pad ma'i tshul dang / be con gyi tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa'i tshul dang / lcags kyu'i tshul dang / 'bras bu'i tshul dang / mdung thung gi tshul dang / gzhu'i tshul dang / mda' bzung

ba'i tshul dang / mda' 'phang ba'i tshul dang / thag mdung bskor ba'i tshul dang / mchog sbyin pa'i tshul dang / mdung gi tshul dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa'i tshul dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang / rdo rje'i 'dug stangs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dug stangs dang / rdo rje skyil

mo krung dang / pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang / dpa' bo'i 'dug stangs dang / bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang / tsog pu'i 'dug stangs dang / rtse ba'i 'dug stangs dang / mdun du dgu ba dang / phyir dgye ba dang / mtha' yas dang / rnam

par rgyal ba dang / sprin sgra dang / gsus po che dang / rgyal ba'i phur bus gnas pa'i bcing ba dang / phur bu brdung ba dang / dra ba dang / ra bas mtshams gcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba de lta bus/ sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs par bsgoms te

gtan la dbab par bya'o/ /rang gi ming nas smos te/ hU~M zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi sgra brjod na 'khor lo thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sa'i lha mo sta gon du gnas par bya ba ni/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad

par dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad thob bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis dkyil 'khor 'dri bar bya/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sta gon du gnas par bya

ste/ thugs brtser gnas pa'i dgongs pa can/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sras dang lhan cig gshegs nas kyang / /sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar mdzod/ /de nas 'khor lo'i dbus su chos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la/ mtha' kun tu yang mtshan

nas smos te thig ler bya'o/ /de ltar spyan drangs te mchod pas mnyes par byas nas phyir byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no/ /de nas sems can sta gon du gnas par bya ste/ spos chus spyi bor bsang gtor byas nas/ lag pa snying gar bkram nas su/ /rtse mo

lnga pa rgya gram bya/ /g.yas pas srung skud bcings nas su/ /lag mthil so shing ku sha sbyin/ /de nas 'dug ste gsum la skyabs su btang ba dang / sdig pa kun tu bshags pa dang / bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang / bdag nyid dbul ba dang /

byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la 'di ni skyabs su 'gro ba yin te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /'gro ba'i dge la yi rang ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung / /zhes lan gsum

brjod do/ /de nas ci nus kyis ci 'dod pa'i chos bshad par bya'o/ /de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du mnyes par 'gyur bas mchod pa'i cho ga bzang po bya ste/ slar yang gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas nang du zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhir glo

g.yas pas nyal te/ rmi lam bzang ngan bltas nas phyi de nyin dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /tshon dang thig las sangs rgyas lnga'i/ /ngo bo dag kyang sprul par bya/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can rnams ni rnam grol mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa kun gyi gnas/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgyal bdag ste/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/ /tshon rtsi dgye ba brtsam par bya/ /dang po slob dpon nyid kyis bgyi/ /de nas kun tu slob mas bya/ /dang po sa gzhi yongs gzung ba/ /gnyis pa sta gon

gnas pa ste/ /nub gsum pa ni 'jug pa yin/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu yis/ /khru stong pa'am lnga brgya bar/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab po/ /yang na khru lnga khru do pa 'am/ /khru gang ba yi bar du bya'o/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis

ni brgyan pa yi/ /dbus su 'khor lo legs par bri/ /dkyil du rnam par snang mdzad gzhag /shar phyogs su ni mi 'khrugs pa/ /lho phyogs su ni rin chen 'byung / /nub phyogs su ni 'od dpag med/ /byang phyogs su ni don grub rnams/ /'khor lo grwar ni

lha mo bzhi/ /dngos grub sbyin par mdzad par bri/ /dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni spyan no/ /me'i phyogs su ni mA ma kI'o/ /bden bral phyogs su ni gos dkar can no/ /rlung gi phyogs su ni lha mo sgrol ma'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis phyir phyung nas rim pa gnyis pa la

shar phyogs su ni rdo rje sems ma/ lhor rdo rje rin chen ma/ nub tu rdo rje chos ma/ byang du rdo rje las ma rnams bri'o/ /grwa rnams su skul byed ma dang / rin chen sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud rnams so/ /de nas yang 'gying bag tu langs te/ rdo rje

shugs kyis phyir phyung nas rim pa gsum pa la/ shar phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / spos kyi glang po dang / ye shes tog rnams bri'o/ /lho phyogs su bzang skyong dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa

brtsegs pa rnams bri'o/ /nub phyogs su ni mthu chen thob dang / ngan song thams cad spong ba dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / dra ba can gyi 'od rnams bri'o/ /byang phyogs su zla 'od dang / 'od dpag med dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang /

sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams bri'o/ /shar sgor ni gshin rje mthar byed do/ /lho sgor ni shes rab mthar byed do/ /nub sgor ni pad+ma mthar byed do/ /byang sgor ni bgegs mthar byed do/ /grwa rnams su ni mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / be con sngon po

dang / stobs po che'o/ /zur rnams su ni rdo rje bri'o/ /sgo'i nang logs su yang rdo rje bri'o/ /'khor lo ni tshon rtsi dkar pos bri'o/ /gnyis pa ni tshon rtsi dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po gsum gyis bri'o/ /gsum pa ni sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor chen po yin no/ /de nas dbang bskur

ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang ldan pa rim pa gnyis par bya'o/ /dbus su ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa snying po dang bcas pa bri'o/ /snam bu gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni rdo rje'o/ /lho phyogs su ni rin po che/ nub phyogs su ni pad+ma/ byang phyogs su ni

ral gri ste/ /de lta bur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis lus legs par bkrus te/ spos kyis bskus nas legs par brgyus pa'i me tog gi phreng ba mgo la bcings nas/ mgul pa dar gyis bcings pa la/ /ldum bu yis ni

kha bkab pa/ /rin chen sman 'byung sna lnga dang / /spos chu yis ni bkang ba dang / /bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya/ /rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi/ /lha rnams kun gyi bum pa bzhi/ /sgo yi phyogs kyi bum pa ni/ /

las kun byed pas bzlas brjod do/ /sems can kun gyis bsang gtor bya/ /yang na ku sha'i chun pos bya/ /de nas bum pa mngon par bsngags te lha bshos dang gtor ma phul nas me tog dang bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bkru ba la

sogs pa dbul lo/ /de rnams phul nas bum pa rnams grwar gzhag par bya'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni dbus su spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs nas gsal bar bya ste/ gzhug pa dang / bsdam

dang / dbang du bya ste/ phur bu dang / ra ba dang / dra bas phyogs bcing ba dang / mtshams gcad pa byas la/ mchod yon dang / zhal bsil dang / gdan dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa yang bsngos te phul nas phyag rgya'i tshogs rang rang la bstan par bya'o/ /

bstod pa dang / rdo rje'i glu dang / dril bu gsil ba'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / gling bu dang / rgyud kyi sgra'i khyad par yang dbul lo/ /rol mo'i khyad par gzhan rnams kyis kyang bstod par bya'o/ /bstod nas bzod par gsol te dngos grub thams cad kyi phyir gsol

ba gdab po/ /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid zhugs te/ de'i 'og tu slob ma gzhug go/ /de nas sems can thams cad snying po 'di dang phyag rgyas gnas lngar bsrung zhing gnas lngar cho ga bya'o/ /hU~M o~M dzi na dzika /AHA ro l-ika /hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika/ swA rat+na d+h+r-ika /hA pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika /

de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gzhug par bya ste/ rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /pho brang dkyil 'khor snying po 'dir/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje sems mas me tog gtor bar bgyi ste/ pra tIts+tsha badzra hoH/

tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol lo/ /de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni/ /dkyil 'khor deng 'dir blta bar gyis/ /sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su 'khrungs/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /dngos grub thams cad phun sum

tshogs/ /dam tshig mchog tu grub par byed/ /rdo rje pad+ma rol pa'i mchog /sngags kyi bdag nyid shes par bya/ /de yi snying po 'di yin te/ /pa sh+ya badzra/ gang la me tog bab pa de de'i lha yin no/ /de nas dbang bskur sbyin bya ste/ /dri dang me tog phreng bas

brgyan/ /gos dang rgyan gyis legs par brgyan/ /steng du bla re bre bar bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /lha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / /gdu bu dag dang ska rags dang / /bkra shis yo byad rnams kyis bklubs/ /slob ma sdig dang bral ba

la/ /slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro/ /dang por rnam rgyal bum pa yis/ /de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang / /lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po yis/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad glu sgra dang / /rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis/ /skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du/ /til

gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i/ /rgyal bas bum pa bzung nas ni/ /de nyid la ni dbang bskur bya/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bsam/ /de lta bur ni bsams nas kyang / /chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya/ /thur ma me long 'khor lo dang / /dung dang rdo rje

glegs bam dang / /gser dag dang ni dngul rnams kyis/ /mi shes rab rib la sogs pa/ /ci nus par ni bsal bar bya/ /thur ma la sogs med na yang / /phyag rgyas gzugs rnams bstan par bya/ /de nas dam tshig bstan par bya/ /de ring phyin

chad bu khyod kyis/ /srog dang lus la bab gyur kyang / /dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya/ /rdo rje spun rnams bkur sti zhing / /sdang la byams shing chags bral ba/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin no/ /de ltar byas

na sangs rgyas kyis/ /khyod ni dmyal ba'i nang du 'dor/ /de nas bla mas yon blangs te/ /sa dang yid 'ong chung ma dang / /rin chen gser dang nor bu 'bar/ /mu tig byi ru la sogs dang / /lus kyang dbul du gzhug par bya/ /bla ma la ni gus pa yi/ /

slob mas de bzhin kho nar bya/ /bla ma de ni mgu bar bya/ /bla ma mgu ba dngos grub ste/ /gzhan du min zhes thub pa gsung / /de nas slob ma bslang ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar mchod pa bya ste/ sbyin sreg gi las bya'o/ /de nas cho ga mthong

bas las byas nas/ /sbyin sreg bzlas brjod mchod pa dang / /de bzhin bsgom pa'i rim pa'i tshul/ /zhi dang rgyas pa'i rim pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad tshim par bya/ /de nas dus gsum gshegs pa yi/ /rgyal ba thams cad gshegs su

gsol/ /bsgrims te tshon rtsi rnams bsdus nas/ /chu klung chen por bskur nas kyang / /ba yi lci bas byug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun/ /slob dpon nyid kyis bsdu bar bya/ /slob mas cung zad mi spyad do/ /de ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur/ /slob

dpon gyis kyang ci rigs par/ /bdag nyid 'dod pa spyad par bya/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas yang gsang

sngags kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs nas phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gsang sngags kyi snying po'i yi ge rnams nyon cig /phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sems can thams cad

la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ o~M las rnam par snang mdzad do/ /o~M hU~M mi 'khrugs pa'o/ /o~M trA~M rin chen 'byung gnas so/ /o~M hrIH'od dpag med do/ /o~M kha~M don yod grub pa'o/ /o~M ga

ga na lo tsa ni hU~M spyan gyi'o/ /o~M ki ri ki ri mA ma kI hU~M mA ma kI'i'o/ /oM ka Te bi ka Te ka Ta~M ka Te ka ro Ti pIr+ya swA hA/ gos dkar mo'i 'o/ /o~M tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ sgrol ma'i'o/ o~M sa twa badzrI hU~M/ rdo rje sems ma'i'o/ /o~M rat+na badzrI hU~M/ rdo rje rin chen ma'i'o/ /o~M d+harma badzrI

hU~M/ rdo rje chos ma'i'o/ /o~M karma badzrI hU~M/ rdo rje las ma'i'o/ /o~M tsa le tsu le tsun+de swA hA/ skul byed ma'i'o/ /oM rat+na lo ki rat+nA dz+wA li ni swA hA/ rin chen sgron ma'i'o/ /o~M b+h+r-i kuT+Ti b+h+r-i/ khro gnyer ma'i'o/ /oM badzra shr-iM kha le hU~M phaT swA hA/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i'o/ /o~M ma

byams pa'i'o/ /o~M mu~M/ 'jam dpal gyi'o/ /o~M sa man+ta b+ha dra hU~M/ kun tu bzang po'i'o/ /o~M gan+d+ha ha ti ni hU~M/ spos kyi glang po'i'o/ /o~M dz+nyAn ke tu ba ti hU~M/ ye shes tog go/ /o~M b+ha dra b+ha ti b+ha dra pA le hU~M/ bzang skyong ngo / /o~M sA ga re ma hA sA ga re hU~M/ blo gros

rgya mtsho'o/ /o~M ak+ShA ye hU~M hU~M ak+Sha yak+Sha a karma A pa ra Na pa ri sho d+ha ni swA hA/ blo gros mi zad pa'o/ /o~M pra tib+hA ni pra ti b+ha ne kU Te hU~M/ sbobs pa brtsegs pa'o/ /o~M s+thA me ma hA s+thA ma ba ti swA hA/ mthu chen thob pa'o/ /o~M sarba a pA ya dza te sarbA pA pa~M sho d+ha hU~M/ ngan song

thams cad spong ba'o/ /o~M sarba sho ka ta mo ni rngA ma ti hU~M/ mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros so/ /o~M dzA li ni ma hA dzA li ni hU~M/ dra ba can gyi 'od do/ /o~M su d+ha na shri ye hU~M/ nor / /o~M tsan+d+re tsan+d+re byA ba lo ki te swA hA/ /zla 'od do/ /o~M

a mi te pra b+he a mi te hU~M/ 'od dpag med do/ /o~M ga ga ga ne ga ga na ba ra lo tsa na hU~M/ nam mkha' mdzod do/ /o~M sar+b+ba ni pA ra Na biSh+ka b+hi ne hU~M/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o/ /o~M ya mAn+ta krita/ gshin rje gshed do/ /o~M pra dz+nyAn ta kri ta/ gzhan gyis mi thub

pa'o/ /o~M pad+mA na ta krita/ rta mgrin no/ /o~M a mr-i ta kuN+Da li big+hAn ta krita/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro/ /o~M a tsa la hU~M ha~M/ mi g.yo ba'o/ /o~M Tak+ki hU~M/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /o~M nI la daN+Da ma hA daN+Da hU~M/ be con sngon po'o/ /o~M kro d+ha hU~M dzaH/ stobs po che'o/ /

dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge de dag go/ /'di dag la bsten nas ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las nges par 'byung ba'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag du ma gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad ni lcags kyus spyan drang ngo / /byang

chub sems dpa' rnams ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so/ /rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni rigs kyi yum rnams kyis so/ /khro bo rnams kyi ni zhal gyi phyag rgyas so/ /bran rnams ni zhags pa'i phyag rgyas so/ /pho nya rnams ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so/ /de dag la sogs pa

ni spyan drang ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul

pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag na rdo rje ras sam rtsig pa la sogs pa la gzugs brnyan bsgrub pa la dmigs pa gang gis gsang sngags 'chang rnams kyis ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur zhing ye

shes rdzogs pas sangs rgyas nyid bde blag tu thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshogs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gsang chen bla na med pa bshad par bya yis nyon cig /o~M gyi ye shes kyis bsgrubs pa/ /rgyal chen

rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /shes rab ye shes rab rgyas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mchog gis mchod/ /zhi ba thor tshugs cod pan 'chang / /zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /gser gyi mdog can phyag drug pa/ /dang po bsam gtan phyag rgya can/ /

bgrang phreng ldan zhing mda' yis brgyan/ /g.yon gyis lha mo'i nu ma 'dzin/ /'khor lo dang ni gzhu thogs shing / /lha rnams bred cing khams rnams 'dzag /'bar ba'i 'od dkyil brgyan pa la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sprin 'phro ba/ /rab tu 'byung zhing legs 'khyud

pa/ /de nyid spyod yul can bsgoms te/ /gsang sngags nang gi bzlas brjod bya/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /o~M zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'od chen bsam/ /thor

tshugs cod pan 'chang ba'i lha/ /dbu rgyan thams cad mkhyen pas brgyan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /gtso bo zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra/ /zhal gsum spyan gsum 'bar ba la/ /phyag drug 'dug stangs bzhi pa can/ /phyag gnyis pad+ma'i 'jo tshul

can/ /g.yas na bgrang phreng rdo rje 'chang / /g.yon pas nu ma 'dzin pa la/ /ril ba spyi blugs gsum pa na/ /gzugs rnams thams cad 'phro mdzad cing / /kun nas 'od zer phreng ba can/ /lag nas mtshon shor 'jigs 'khrugs pa'i/ /bgegs 'gyel

ba la lta byed pa'i/ /de 'dra'i tshig gis lam bsgoms na/ /ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas 'thob/ /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog yangs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /zla ba'i gzugs la hU~M zhes pa/ /sems

kyi rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /mthing shing bzang po lta bu'i mdog /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab bklubs pa/ /cod pan la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs/ /rin chen rnams kyis yongs su brgyan/ /zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa/ /cung zad bzhad cing 'jo sgeg

can/ /phyag brgyad kyis ni brgyan pa la/ /rdo rje dang por gsor ba dang / /gnyis pa na ni ral gri gdengs/ /lcags kyu bzang po gsum pa na/ /bzhi pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams/ /de bzhin gnyis pas nu ma 'khyud/ /

gsum pa na ni zhags pa ste/ /bzhi pa lha rdzas gzhu yang 'dzin/ /rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sprin gyis 'bar/ /'di 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom pa/ /de yi rdo rje sems brtan zhing / /ring por mi thogs byang

chub 'thob/ /rga shi rnams kyi pha rol 'gro/ /sems can gyi stobs mtha' yas pa rdzogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po rdo rje shugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /trA~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i bdag nyid de/ /zhal ras

gsum ldan spyan gsum pa/ /thor tshugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan/ /bde ba chen po kha dog dmar/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya rnam par bzhugs/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas pa ste/ /phyag g.yas na ni rdo rje dang / /g.yon pa rin chen yongs su

'dzin/ /'od zer ser po 'phro ba las/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i sprin chen nam/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyis/ /rin chen char gyis rgyas par byas/ /rin chen mngon par thob pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ /kha~M gi ye shes las

bsgrubs pa/ /don yod rdo rje bsam par bya/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya legs bzhugs pa/ /margad ta yi 'od ltar 'bar/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri dang / /g.yon pa yis ni lcags kyu nyid/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro zhing / /legs par bsgrub phyir slar

yang sdud/ /'od zer chen pos rab gsal zhing / /ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /'di 'dra rtag tu sems byed pa/ /nam mkha'i snying po thub pa che/ /'du byed thams cad spangs pa yi/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa der 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' snang bar byed pa'i ye

shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /la yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang brgyan/ /lha mo spyan gsum phyag brgyad pa/ /zhal gsum gser gyi mdog dang mtshungs/ /sgeg pa'i cha lugs legs 'chang ba/ /cung zad bzhad pas 'dod

chags ma/ /dang po'i phyag ni mchog sbyin mdzad/ /de bzhin gnyis pa mi 'jigs sbyin/ /phyag gsum pa na rdo rje ste/ /bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /rin chen snye ma gnyis pa na/ /gsum pa na ni bgrang phreng ste/ /bzhi

pa gzhu yis legs par brgyan/ /'od dmar 'od zer phreng ba can/ /lha rnams 'jigs pas sems myos te/ /lag pa thal mo sbyor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro bar/ /ye shes rdo rje spyan ma bsam/ /byang chub yan lag 'bras brgyan pa'i/ /lha

mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya/ /ye shes spyan gyis snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje 'jo tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /rdo rje rigs can mA ma kI/ /lha mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma/ /dgod cing zhal ras khro dang bcas/ /ut+pal sngon po'i

mdog 'dra ba/ /'od dmar shin tu 'bar ba can/ /dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag /gnyis pa legs par rdo rje bsdams/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsod/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste/ /gnyis pa zhags pa legs par bsnams/ /

gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin/ /rdo rje can ma sku gsum 'chang / /dngos med ngo bo mtshan nyid can/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro ba/ /'di 'dra sgom pas bsgom par bya'o/ /sgyu 'phrul 'byung ba'i stobs kyis ye shes zab mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pa

yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /zla ba'i mdog dang ldan pa'i yum/ /ming ni gos dkar can zhes bya/ /spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /zhal ras gsum pa dga' mdzad ma/ /phyag drug mi 'jigs spyan mdzad ma/ /gnyis pa na ni rdo rje ste/ /gsum pa

mda' yis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yon pa pad+ma bsnams par bya/ /gnyis pa na ni bgrang nor phreng / /gsum pa na ni gzhu bsnams shing / /rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'phro bar mdzad/ /pad+ma'i sprin gyis rgyas par

bsgom/ /gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/ /rin chen skur ni bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma'i gzugs kyi 'jo tshul sangs rgyas kyi rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /tA yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul

can/ /'jo sgeg cha lugs la gnas pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /bzhad pa margad 'od dang ldan/ /dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag /gnyis pa na ni rdo rje bsnams/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /

g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste/ /gnyis pa na ni ut+pal nyid/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu yang 'dzin/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar ba can/ /sangs rgyas 'phro bas rgyas mdzad pa/ /dga' mdzad sems can kun gyi ma/ /rtag par rgyun du bsgom par bya/ /

sems can thams cad dbang du 'gro zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /skyes mchog rgyal bas gsungs pa yi/ /sems ma bzhi ni brjod pa'i ming / /sems ma dang ni rin chen ma/ /chos ma rdo rje las ma ste/ /rol pas rjes su

mnyes mdzad ma/ /de dag ji ltar rigs par bsgom/ /de dag kyang ni bsgoms pa yis/ /ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob/ /sems can rab tu dga' byed pa'i/ /'phags ma bzhi yi ting nge 'dzin to/ /tsu~M gi yi ge las bsgrubs pa/ /ming ni skul byed

ces ma'i gzugs/ /sku gsum rgyal ba bye ba phrag /bdun gyis gsang sngags glu yis bstod/ /yi ge dgu pa thabs dgu can/ /lha dgu rnams kyi gnas kyang yin/ /zhal gsum ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /

na chung skal ldan dar la bab/ /rig sngags thams cad sgrol mdzad ma/ /dang po'i zhal ni cung zad tsam/ /bzhad cing spyan gsum ldan pa ste/ /g.yas kyi zhal ni rnam gdangs pa/ /ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i 'od/ /mche ba zla ba tshes pa bzhin/ /lce

ni glog bzhin ljib par mdzad/ /g.yon pa kha dog dmar po ste/ /tshems kyis sgros ni rnam par gnon/ /rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs/ /gdu bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /brgyan pa'i phyag ni nyi shu rtsa drug de la phyag gnyis rtsa ba'i phyag rgyas snying ga'i

gnas rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /g.yas pa gnyis ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o/ /gsum pa na ral gri'o/ /bzhi pa na rin po che sbyin pa'o/ /lnga pa na shing tog bI dza pU ra'o/ /drug pa na mda' gsor ba'o/ /bdun pa na dgra sta'o/ /brgyad pa na dbyug to'o/ /dgu

pa na tho ba'o/ /bcu pa na lcags kyu'o/ /bcu gcig pa na rdo rje'o/ /bcu gnyis pa na se gol gtogs pa'o/ /bcu gsum pa na bgrang phreng ngo / /g.yon pa gnyis pa na yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no/ /gsum pa na pad+ma'o/ /bzhi pa na ril ba spyi blugs

so/ /lnga pa na zhags pa'o/ /drug pa na gzhu'o/ /bdun pa na mdung thung ngo / /brgyad pa na 'khor lo'o/ /dgu pa na dung ngo / /bcu pa na bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo'o/ /bcu gcig pa na bum pa bzang po'o/ /bcu gnyis pa na thag mdung ngo / /bcu gsum pa na

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /pad+ma la bzhugs bsgom par bya/ /la yi zhing cung bgos pa yi/ /steng du bla gos gyon pa ste/ /sna tshogs tshig gu na bzar gsol/ /cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /sangs rgyas

rnams kyis sku gzugs 'phro/ /sum cu'i lha rnams ltung ba dang / /bgegs rnams shin tu 'jig skrag nas/ /thal mo sbyor bar byed pa ste/ /'di 'dra gang zhig rtag bsgoms shing / /bsgrims nas gsang sngags brjod pa des/ /sangs rgyas myur du thob gyur na/ /

dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /ting 'dzin ngo bo thob 'gyur zhing / /sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /rgyal ba mtha' yas pa'i ye shes skul bar byed pa'i stobs kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /rin chen sgron

ma zhes bya ba'i gzugs/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ /na chung dar la bab pa'i tshad/ /zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa ste/ /phyag ni rin chen gdu bus gtams/ /phyag gnyis rin chen thal mo ste/ /'od kyis

dkyil 'khor phreng ba 'khrugs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag ni mi 'jigs sbyin/ /gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor/ /g.yon mdzub ma rung rnams la bsdigs/ /gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin/ /'od zer dmar po legs par 'bar/ /rol stabs thabs kyi

zhabs kyis gnon/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phro zhing sdud/ /chos 'dzin yid du 'ong ba yi/ /lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas rin chen sprin gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /b+h+ri yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /'jigs

las sgrol ba khro gnyer can/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /phyag drug pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ /rol pa'i stangs la brtson pa ste/ /zhal ni khro dang bcas par bzhad/ /legs par 'bar ba'i rtser lta can/ /g.yas

pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa be con 'dzin par bshad/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo can/ /gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs bsnams/ /gsum pa na ni mtshon cha gzhu/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro

zhing / /de bzhin gzhan dag legs sdud pa'i/ /nyal dang 'greng dang 'dug pa na/ /lha mo 'di 'dra rtag tu bsgom/ /'jigs pa thams cad dmigs pa med par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /ming ni

rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /thams cad 'ching ba bskyed pa ste/ /sems can ma rungs phung bar byed/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug sngo bsangs gzugs bzang ma/ /zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa mdzad/ /lag pa g.yas na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis

pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang bsnams/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste/ /gnyis pa na ni zhags par gsungs/ /gsum pa gzhu yang thogs par brtson/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni sprin 'phro ba/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud bsgoms na/ /

byang chub skad cig gis 'thob na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /rdo rje sgrog gi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mai yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /thub pa'i skyes mchog byams pa ni/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /

de yi 'og na pad+ma ste/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /phyag bzhi dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag gnyis chos 'chad phyag rgyas brgyan/ /g.yas pa yi ni phyag gnyis pa/ /sems can skyob pa mchog 'dzin mdzad/ /g.yon pa

lha rdzas klu shing gi/ /me tog ze'u 'bru'i mgo lcogs bsnams/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /sprin chen de bzhin 'phro bar mdzad/ /byams pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par brgyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mu~M gyi ye shes las

bsgrubs pa/ /gzhon nu 'jam pa tshig gi lam/ /shes rab ye shes mchog thob pa/ /zab mo tshul ni ston pa po/ /zhal gsum spyan gsum zur phud gsum/ /gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /cod pan bzang po mi 'khrugs can/ /

me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis bklubs/ /'og ma pad+ma chen po la/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /'jo sgeg thabs kyis rol pa ste/ /zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa la/ /dpa' bo chen po phyag drug pa/ /dang po mi 'jigs sbyin par

bya/ /gnyis pa na ni ral gri nyid/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /de bzhin g.yon pa shes rab 'chang / /gnyis pa na ni ut+pal thogs/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do/ /shes rab ye shes mchog gis bklubs/ /sangs rgyas rang

bzhin sprin gyi bsnams/ /'phro bar sangs rgyas 'dod pas bsgom/ /'jam dpal mchog gi shes rab dang ye shes kyi rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /spos kyi glang po ye shes tog /de bzhin du ni bzang skyong dang / /blo gros rgya mtsho blo gros

ni/ /mi zad pa dang spobs brtsegs nyid/ /ngan song kun spong mthu chen thob/ /mya ngan kun mun 'joms pa'i blo/ /nor dang ni dra ba'i 'od/ /de bzhin zla 'od 'od dpag med/ /nam mkha'i mdzod dang sgrib kun sel/ /de ltar de sogs grangs med

pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa kun/ /sa bon yig 'bru rnams las 'khrungs/ /yi ge phyag rgya'i sbyor ba can/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis rol bar mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di yi rgyu/ /gsang

sngags bzlos par bsgom par bya/ /mdog ldan 'du zhing 'phro mdzad pa/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsam/ /hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /gzi brjid ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi/ /gshin rje'i dgra zhes rnam grags pa/ /bskal ba'i me

ltar 'bar ba ste/ /char sprin gyi ni 'od dang 'dra/ /zhal drug pa la phyag drug pa/ /de bzhin zhabs drug mi'u thung 'dra/ /gsus khyim shin tu che ba ste/ /de ni drag po chen po yin/ /ljags 'dril rdo rje mche ba can/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa

ste/ /stag lpags kyis ni sham thabs bgos/ /rol pa'i stabs can ma he bcibs/ /de yi 'og tu pad+ma byas/ /mi thod phreng can skra 'khyil pa/ /ag tsom ser la sgra chen 'byin/ /mgo yi steng nas mi 'khrugs pa/ /sku gsum la ni rnam par

bzhugs/ /'jam pa'i dpal gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste/ /g.yon pa'i tshems kyis sgros mnan khro/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri ste/ /gnyis pa na ni rdo rje nyid/ /gsum

pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa gzhu ni bdungs pa yis/ /shin tu legs par rnam par brgyan/ /lha mo yis ni g.yas nas 'khyud/ /gnyis pa na ni ut+pal

thogs/ /g.yon pa zla ba ltar snang ba/ /pad+ma dkar po thogs par bya/ /'og tu lha dang bgegs kyi rnams/ /sdar ma bred nas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar dang bcas/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'phro zhing sdud/ /rnal 'byor dag gis bsgoms

nas su/ /bsgrims nas gsang sngags bzlas pa de/ /'dug dang nyal dang 'chag pa na/ /legs par bsams te kun zos shing / /'dod pa lnga la longs spyad kyang / /nam mkha' lta bur gos mi 'gyur/ /gshed byed thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i ye shes

rdo rje gshin rje gsod pa'i 'dul ba 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug gis ni rnam par brgyan/ /mdog ser mi thung gzugs can la/ /

'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /pad+ma la bzhugs rol ba'i stabs/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa la/ /dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par bsgyur/ /g.yon pa'i tshems kyis sgros kyang mnan/ /sna tshogs tshul

gyis 'bar ba ste/ /lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje thogs/ /gnyis pa na ni dbyug pa ste/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang thogs/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa gzhu can yin par gsungs/ /spyi bo'i steng na mi 'khrugs

pa/ /rim bzhin 'phro zhing sdud pa ste/ /'di 'dra goms par bsgom par bya/ /bzlos pas sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ha yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /khro bo pad+ma mthar byed pa/ /zhal

ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /kha dog dmar po phyag brgyad can/ /sku ni sbrul gyis dkris pa ste/ /pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs/ /khro bo lta bas gzigs mdzad pa/ /dang po zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril

ba ste/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan pa/ /stag lpags gsol zhing khro ba la/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa na ni dbyug tho gsungs/ /gsum pa na ni lcags kyu ste/ /bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i

mdzub mo ste/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni pad+ma ste/ /bzhi pa na ni gzhu nyid do/ /de yi cod pan mi 'khrugs pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni mang po dag /'phro zhing 'du bar bsgoms byas na/ /'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du

min/ /rta mchog gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /ming ni khro bo bgegs kyi gshed/ /me yi dkyil bzhugs sgrub pa sbyin/ /lag na rdo rje'i rjes 'brangs pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /

bgegs rnams 'joms mdzad phyag drug can/ /dang po'i zhal ni bzhad pa ste/ /de bzhin g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pa/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra'i mdog /zhabs kyis bgegs ni mnan pa ste/ /gnyis pa pad+ma'i

steng na bzhugs/ /g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri ste/ /gnyis pa na ni dgra star gsungs/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /de bzhin gnyis pa nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu yang gsungs/ /sangs

rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bar/ /ye shes mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'dral ba'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /mi g.yo byis pa'i gzugs dang ldan/ /

zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa la/ /dang po'i zhal ni bzhad pa ste/ /de yi g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pas/ /khrag gis brlan pa'i ljags kyang 'dril/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro/ /hU~M gis snying ga'i phyogs

kyang bkang / /mthing shun gyi ni mdog can te/ /rin chen ri stengs pad+ma la/ /rol pa'i zhabs kyis stabs su bzhugs/ /thub pa bgegs kyi chu 'dzin 'joms/ /phyag drug 'bar ba 'phro ba yi/ /'od bzang dmar po'i dkyil 'khor na/ /g.yas pa'i

phyag na ral gri ste/ /gnyis pa na ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor/ /g.yon pas sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa gzhu ni bdungs pa la/ /tshangs pas gzung ste lta ba dang / /sna tshogs

me tog gis bcings pa'i/ /cod pan dang ni dbu rgyan thogs/ /zur phud g.yon pa bung ba'i mdog /mi 'khrugs pa yis rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin dag gis/ /cho 'phrul chen po du ma 'phro/ /de ltar rtag tu rnal 'byor gang / /

sgom pas sgom par byed pa de/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi/ /them skas la ni 'dzeg par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa mi g.yo ba'i ye shes rdo rje bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hU~M gi ye shes las

bsgrubs pa/ /ming ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug pa zhes bya bar bsgrags/ /dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i/ /thor tshugs cod pan bzang po can/ /dang po'i zhal ni bzhad pa la/ /g.yas pa yis ni

rnam par bsgyur/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro/ /dpral ba khro gnyer rim pa can/ /'bar ba char sprin lta bu'i mdog /dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba can/ /phyag gnyis 'dod pa'i phyag rgyar ldan/ /g.yas pa na ni rdo rje gsungs/ /gsum pa mda'

yis rnam par rol/ /g.yon pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa'i phyag na gzhu yang bsnams/ /pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs/ /'og tu bgegs kyang rnam par mnan/ /sangs rgyas lang long 'phro mdzad pa/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgoms byas na/ /

bla na med pa'i ye shes 'thob/ /snying thams cad 'gugs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /khro bo be con sngon po can/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug gis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dang

po'i zhal ni 'jo sgeg bzhad/ /de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros kyang mnan/ /sku ni kha chu 'dra ba ste/ /lus ni sbrul gyis rnam par brgyan/ /skra tshogs lcang lor 'khyil pa ste/ /dbu rgyan la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /pad+ma

la bzhugs rol stabs can/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa na ni be con nyid/ /gsum pa mtshon cha mda' dang ldan/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa ste/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid bsnams/ /dkyil

'khor dmar po 'bar ba can/ /sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis bskrun pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni rtag tu 'phro/ /bgegs kyis rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ hU~M zhes gsungs pa'i khro bo ni/ /ye shes dam pa stobs po che/ /

zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sprin gyi kha dog 'dra ba ste/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /mig dmar skra 'bar gyen du brdzes/ /mgo bo la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs/ /dang po'i zhal ni rnam par

bzhad/ /de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan pa/ /pad+ma la bzhugs 'gying bag can/ /drag po'i cham rngam stang stabs can/ /phyogs bcu'i lha rnams phung bar mdzad/ /'bar ba rnams kyis yongs bskor

ba'i/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nang na bzhugs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa be con thogs par mtshon/ /gsum pa yis ni ral gri gdengs/ /bzhi pa mda' yis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa

yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni tho ba nyid/ /phyag bzhi pa ni gzhu can la/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro ba/ /sgom pa mchog gis bsgom par bya/ /bsnol ba med pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

b+h+ru~M gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ste/ /sku gsum ldan pa zhal ras gsum/ /gser gyi mdog can 'od bzang ba/ /'dom gang 'od kyis rnam par brgyan/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgyar rnam par gnas/ /rin chen ri stengs pad+ma

la/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /rigs kyi yum ni bzhi bo rnams/ /gzugs dang yan lag kun mdangs can/ /zhal ras 'jo sgeg tshul gyis brgyan/ /gos dang rgyan gyis bklubs pa ste/ /chags phyir spro ba'i rtsol ba can/ /phyag rgya rin chen snye

ma dang / /rdo rje pad+ma ut+pal ldan/ /lha mo so so'i phyogs na bzhugs/ /gtsug tor 'od zer lnga pa can/ /kun tu 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / /'khor lo'i bar na rdo rje gnas/ /'od zer phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bas/ /

nam mkha' thams cad 'gengs par mdzad/ /byang chub snying po don gnyer bas/ /'di 'dra'i 'khor lo can sgom zhing / /bsgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis/ /ring por mi thogs 'dod pa 'thob/ /byang chub snying po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi ye shes rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dza~M gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /gnod sbyin gnod gnas sku gsum can/ /zhal ras gsum pa phyag gnyis na/ /bI dza bU ri ne'u le can/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'am/ /yang na bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas/ /ngos

na rgyan rnams thams cad kyis/ /brgyan pa'i gnod sbyin mo bzhi dag /rin chen char pa 'bebs par byed/ /mgo bo'i steng na sangs rgyas lnga/ /de yi cod pan bzang po yi/ /g.yon phyogs rtse phran rgyan yang chags/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin

'phro zhing / /rin chen char pa 'bebs par mdzad/ /gang zhig nor rdzas 'dod pa yis/ /gnod gnas 'di 'dra bsgoms byas na/ /de yis sa chen nor rdzas kyis/ /ring por mi thogs gang bar 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rjes bdud rtsi yi/ /chu yang rtag tu dbul

bar bya/ /rin po che sprin sbyin pa'i char pa 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i/ /nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer can/ /rta bdun ldan pa'i shing rtar bzhugs/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor snang mdzad pa/ /

zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum ldan/ /phyag drug kha dog ser por snang / /phyogs bcu bsrung bar brtson pa ste/ /'jo sgeg tshul du zhal yang bzhad/ /na chung rgyan ni g.yo ba can/ /cod pan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga/ /thor tshugs me tog rnams kyis

brgyan/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa la ni khab skud bsnams/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa a shwa'i yal ga ste/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do/ /gzugs brnyan mang

po 'phro ba yis/ /sdang ba'i sems can bcing ba dang / /mig dang kha ni 'drub par byed/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod 'bad pa dag /gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/ /lha mo hU~M mdzad bsgom par bya/ /'di ni sgom par byed pa yis/ /dbang du sems

can rab tu 'gro/ /sdang ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i rdo rje mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i/ /rig pa'i ri khrod shing lo can/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /zhal ras bzhad cing khro dang bcas/ /

rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /na chung gzhon nu phyag drug ma/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid/ /gsum pa mda' yang rnam par gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa shing lo'i bam po ste/ /phyag

gsum pa na gzhu nyid do/ /thor tshugs me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /de steng kha dog lnga po dag /rab tu 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /mdog ser pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor dmar po cher 'bar bas/ /khro bo'i sprin 'phro sdud mdzad

cing / /gdon gang skye dgu'i nang gnas pa/ /de dag khro bo'i mes kyang bsreg /phyir yang bsregs nas sangs rgyas kyi/ /kha dog bdud rtsi char 'bebs mdzad/ /de 'dra rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na/ /mi ngas thams cad zhi bar mdzad/ /nad thams

cad zhi bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dza yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /rig sngags mtshan ni dug sel ma/ /sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can/ /nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa ste/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum

pa/ /gzhon nu mtshan ni 'bar ba can/ /bzhad cing khro dang bcas pa ste/ /sbrul gyi ska rags dag gis brgyan/ /phyag drug rol ba'i stang stabs can/ /mgo yi steng na mi 'khrugs bzhugs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa ral gri thogs

par brtson/ /phyag gsum pa ni gar thabs kyis/ /stang stabs tshul gyis mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa dug gi me tog can/ /phyag gsum pa na gzhu nyid do/ /dbu rgyan me tog rnams kyis brgyan/ /

gser mdog pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'od ni dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /dza rnams 'phro bas bskor ba ste/ /kun nas 'bar ba rnams kyis khebs/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'phro ba can/ /phyag bzang bum pa zla 'dra ba'i/ /kha ni

dza yis rnam brgyan pas/ /dug gis phog pa rnams la ldugs/ /rtag tu sku gsum dug sel ma/ /dug gis phog pa rnams la bsgom/ /de ltar bsgom par byas pa yis/ /ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob/ /nyon mongs rnams kyi dug

sel ba/ /gdengs ka'i dbang po rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /tri yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /sku chen ha la ha la ste/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /thor tshugs cod pan rnams kyis rgyan/ /zla ba tshes pa bsnams

pa'i lha/ /dbu rgyan thod pa dag gis brgyan/ /thor tshugs rgyal po'i sku gzugs bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /pad+ma dkar po lta bur snang / /sems stobs ldan pa'i 'jo tshul can/ /phyag brgyad zhal yang bzhad pa ste/ /smad g.yogs

stag gi pags pa mnabs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa bgrang nor phreng ba can/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa pad+mas rnam par brgyan/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do/ /g.yas

pa mdung rtse gsum pa la/ /sbrul gyis yongs su dkris pa ste/ /g.yon na thod pa dri zhim pa'i/ /me tog sna tshogs kyis bkang ba/ /pad+ma dmar po la bzhugs pa/ /rol pa'i stang stabs tshul du gnas/ /rin chen ri phug nang bzhugs par/ /

rnal 'byor sems dpas bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin gzugs dang ni/ /cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs 'byung / /rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis/ /kha zas thams cad za byed cing / /nang gi sngags pas sngags brjod cing / /rim bzhin

rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na/ /byang chub myur du thob 'gyur zhing / /bla na med pa'i bde ba 'dren/ /'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrub pa/ /ha la ha la yongs su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sa yi ye shes las bsgrubs

pa/ /stong chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /lha mo nad kun 'phrog ma ste/ /sdang ba'i sems can 'joms mdzad ma/ /phyag stong ldan zhing dbu stong la/ /spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /brtson chen phyag brgyad khro ba dang / /steg pa'i stabs

kyis dgongs pa can/ /phyag g.yas mchod sbyin lha rdzas kyi/ /ral gri lcags kyu mda' dang ldan/ /phyag g.yon pad+mo rdo rje nor/ /zhags pa gzhu dang sta re can/ /mdog dmar zhal ras bzhi pa ste/ /bgegs stong 'joms par mdzad pa yin/ /rang gi

rnal 'byor la brtson pas/ /nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs 'jug cing spro/ /glang po rta dang skyes pa dag /za bar mdzad ma phreng ba can/ /de yi las kyis bskul ba yi/ /gsang sngags dpa' bos gdon par bya/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug las 'dod

pas/ /'di byas pas ni srung bar 'gyur/ /dpung chen po la rnam par lta ba thams cad srung ba stobs kyi mchog stong chen po rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /d+h+waM zhes bya bas bskyed pa yi/ /bsdigs

pa'i mdzub mo'i phyag rgya can/ /drag mo chen mo zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum phyag brgyad kyis rnam brgyan/ /ral gri gtun shing 'khor lo mda'/ /mdung rtse gsum pa rdo rje gzhu/ /chom rkun mdzub mos bsdigs pa ste/ /rdo rje ro langs 'byung ba dag /

mthong bas dpung rnams bcom gtor bas/ /lha mo rtag tu bsgoms na ni/ /ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob/ /'jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms pa la mkhas pa mchog gi rtse mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /

stobs chen pha rol gnon mdzad ma/ /spyan gsum phyag brgyad g.yas pa na/ /ral gri 'khor lo mdung rtse gsum/ /mda' yis rnam brgyan phyag g.yon na/ /rdo rje zhags pa dgra sta gzhu/ /bsnams pas sdang ba'i bgegs ltung mdzad/ /bu mi

'tsho dang mo sham dag /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu gnas su/ /lha rnams kun gyi bum pa 'dzin/ /slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur zhing / /de yi mngal du byis pa ni/ /'jam pa'i gzugs can 'jug par bsam/ /zhags pa'i phyag

rgyas mtshan ngan nas/ /skyes pa gzugs can 'byung ba dang / /dran pa yis ni bral nas kyang / /mngal ni bsod nams dag gis spel/ /mngal thams cad rnam par lta ba so so 'brang ma'i ye shes rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ba yi ye

shes rol pas bskrun/ /lha mo nor gyi blo gros ma/ /gzi chen gser gyi mdog can la/ /phyag drug lang tsho dar la bab/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /'jo sgeg thabs bcas 'bar ba ste/ /de yi phyag g.yas mchog sbyin mdzad/ /gnyis pas 'bru

yi snye ma dang / /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /phyag g.yon yid bzhin nor bu dang / /rin chen char 'bebs gzhu yang 'dzin/ /grogs mo'i skye bos yongs bskor cing / /mngag gzhug gnod sbyin mo yi gzugs/ /rin chen char pa 'bebs pa dang / /

nor kun gyi ni char pa yang / /'bebs par byed pa bsam par bya/ /nor gyi blo gros chen mo 'di/ /de ltar sngags pas bsgoms na des/ /dpag tshad bdun ni rgyas par yang / /nor gyi char gyis khyab par mdzad/ /byang chub sbyin mchog dam pa ma/ /

de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid bsgom/ /nor gyi rgyun gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ bi yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /srin mo 'bar ba'i glog phreng can/ /ming ni dngul dkar las skyes mo/ /stobs mo che la pha rol

gnon/ /gsus 'phyang mo la mche gtsigs ma/ /skra ser kham pa gyen du brdzes/ /thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /spyi bo la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs/ /bcu gnyis dbu dang brgyad phyag /spyan ni gsum gsum thod phreng ldan/ /drag mo lag

na rak+ta yis/ /bkang ba'i thod pa thogs pa ste/ /smad g.yogs seng ge'i pags pas g.yogs/ /sbrul gyis mchod phyir thogs pa can/ /ral gri lcags kyu 'khor lo dang / /gtun shing rtse gsum dril bu dang / /ba dan ltag dbyug mdung mchog

sbyin/ /gzhu mda' mdung thung be con dang / /zhags pa dgra sta tho ba thogs/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni lus la brgyan/ /mdog nag rol pa'i stabs kyis ni/ /pad+ma'i gdan bzhugs sdang ba dag /'dul ba zhes brjod 'di lta bu/ /rtag tu hU~M gis hU~M

mdzad pa/ /bzlas brjod yang dag ldan par bsgom/ /sems can kun don tshogs pa yi/ /byang chub ring bor mi thogs 'thob/ /sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i mchog rang byang chub kyi snying por rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /k+ShiM

zhes bya bas bsgom pa'i gzugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /na chung gzhon nu 'jo tshul can/ /mgo bo skra tshugs phyed du gzung / /de bzhin du ni stod g.yogs kyang / /la dkar seng ba bgos pa ste/ /de la kha dog lnga pa yi/ /me tog 'phrul

pa rnams kyis brgyan/ /gser gyi mdog can bzhin 'dzum pa/ /phyed zur bas ni rnam par rol/ /dpag bsam shing gis brgyan pa yi/ /rin chen ri la legs par bzhugs/ /'jam pa'i khro bo rdo rje yis/ /de yi mgo bo mnan nas bzhugs/ /tha ma thog

thag gnod sbyin mos/ /nam mkha' gang bar bsgom par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sngags la o~M AHhU~M/ yi ge gsum pa mig gsum gzugs/ /khyab 'jug lha chen mes po ste/ /gdong gsum rang gi

mtshon thogs la/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyis bskul cing / /rdo rje ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas/ /mod la dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten thams cad grub pa mig gsum rnam par rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gzhan yang gsang sngags yi ge yi/ /

sa bon gang gis sbyar byas te/ /rdo rje yig 'bru rnams bsgoms na/ /de dag ma bsgrims bzhin du 'grub/ /'phrog ma 'phrog byed las skyes pa'i/ /bu ni lnga brgya po rnams dang / /lnga rtsen dang ni dpal can ma/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyud

kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la zhi bar lta ba rdul dang bral ba'i mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum las sna tshogs kyi ye shes bskyed par mdzad pa 'di dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o~M b+ha ga ba tI ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas las thams cad rab tu

rdzogs par byed pa 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams dgyes/ /bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dar 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes dran byed/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ /rdo rje dam tshig gis

bskul na/ /shi ba rnams la srog sbyin mdzad/ /ma grub pa rnams grub par stsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsum rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'chang

mchog thams cad skyed pa'i yum rdo rje dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa 'di phyung ngo / /o~M shaM ka re/ shAn+ti ka ri/ g+hun+Ta g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ti ni b+hA Ta ya g+huT+Ti swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje gsum las skyes gyur pa/ /

thams cad kyis ni mig phye nas/ /rdo rje shugs ni rjes dran gyur/ /sgrub pa thams cad srung mdzad ma/ /de bzhin las rnams sgrub pa yin/ /sdig pa thams cad 'joms ma ste/ /zhi dang rgyas dang 'phel mdzad ma'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang

mdzad kyis 'dod chags chen pos zhen pa pad+ma gar gyi stang stabs thugs kyi rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par 'thor ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos thams cad 'dzin pa mchog gi yum 'di rdo rje gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /oM ka

Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka Ta~M ka Te swA hA/ de nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan mchog /dam pa 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis mig phye nas/ /rdo rje pad+ma rjes dran byed/ /rgyas pa chen po yum yin te/ /chos mdzod rnam par 'phel mdzad ma/ /bsgoms shing

bsten te bzlas brjod na/ /rgya cher srung bar mdzad pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dbang du bya ba khong du chud pas/ rdo rje gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ye shes la 'jug

par byed pa sna tshogs thams cad 'chang ba'i yum gyi sgrol ma 'di gsungs so/ /o~M tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang sras kyi rnams/ /spyan phyed rnam par gdangs nas su/ /ye shes rdo rje ldan par dran/ /lha

mo bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis/ /skye dgu rnams ni mngag gzhug 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi ye shes la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di rdo rje gsum las phyung ngo / /

na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ o~M kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta satwa da ma ka a si mu sa la pa r+shu pA sha hasta/ tsa tu ra mu kha/ tsa tur b+hu dza/ khaT+tsar Na/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta prANA a pa hA ri Ne/ ma hA bi g+h+nA g+hA ta ka /bi kr-ita A na na/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta b+ha ya~M ka ra/

aT+TAT+Ta hA sa nA di na/ byA g+hA tsar ma ni bA sa na/ ku ru ku ru/ sar+b+ba karmA Ni/ tshin+d+ha/ tshin+d+ha/ sar+b+ba mAn+t+rA nan/ b+hin+d+ha/ b+hin+d+ha/ pa ra mu drA na/ A kar+Sha ya/ A kar+Sha ya/ sarba b+hU tA na/ ma tha ma tha/ ni rma tha ni rma tha/ sarba duSh+TAM pra bi sha ya/ pra bi sha ya/ maN+Dal ma d+h+ya bai ba shwa ta/ dzI

bi tAn ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kAr+yaM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi la mA/ mA bi la mA/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba nA sha ya ri pA na/ ka ra ka ra/ bigrAM sarba A shA pa ri pU ra ka /he he b+ha ga bA na/ kiny+tsi

rA ya si/ ma ma sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya swA hA/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems mkhas kun/ /'dar zhing 'jigs pa skyes gyur nas/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad/ /rdo rje ra ba dra ba yin/ /ye shes sna tshogs can la lta/ /srubs

gcig pa'am srubs gnyis pa'i/ /thod pa bzang po rnying pa dang / /rkang rjes sa yi cho ga la/ /lha mo bzhi pa'i sbyor ba dang / /sangs rgyas lnga yis byin rlabs te/ /sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms nas su/ /myur bar khugs kyi bar du ni/ /rkang pas

mnan te bzlas brjod bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes kyi rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i mchog sprin chen po nam mkha'i rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje gsum rnams las snying

po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA da~MSh+T+rot+ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ pa ra shu bA sha hastA ya/ o~M a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ bi s+pho

Ta ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+nA bi nA ya kA na/ ma hA ga Na pa ta/ dzI bi tAn+t+ra ka rA ya swA hA/ khro bo chen po gsungs pa yis/ /grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /yid phyung nas ni skrag par 'gyur/ /log 'dren rnams dang bgegs rnams 'dar/ /sku gsum ye shes mchog

mnga' ba'i/ /rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran/ /de yi rkang rjes sa dang ni/ /rlung gis gtsubs pa'i shing lo la/ /khro bo'i 'khor lor gzir nas su/ /tshogs bdag rkang pa'i drung du bzhug/ /hU~M dang phaT kyis bskul nas su/ /bskrad pa'i sbyor ba byas na ni/ /

sangs rgyas rdo rje can yang skrod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'phro ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/

o~M hU~M dzi na ri tiT+Ta hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ /de nas khro bo 'di brjod pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /'jigs par gyur cing skrag gyur nas/ /gtso bo rnam snang mdzad pa dran/ /srin po 'byung po dang mkha' 'gro/ /skem byed gdon rnams gzir ba

la/ /rdo rje gzir ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /hU~M tsam gyis kyang las byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mtha' yas kyis yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa kun nas sdud pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje pad+ma'i khro bo

chen po 'di sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA NAM/ oM hU~M hU~M hU~M ta ru la/ bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka/ dz+wa li ta/ bi s+phu liM ga /aT+TA T+Ta hA sa/ nA de ni/ ke Sha ri sa TA To pa Ta~M kA ra/ badzra khu ra/ nir g+hA ta na/ tsa le ta ba su d+ha ta la ni shwA sa mA ru to tik+Sha p+ta

d+hA ra NI d+ha ra/ b+hI Sha Na aT+TA T+Ta hA sa/ a pA ri mi tA/ ba la pa rA kra ma/ Ar+ya ga Na b+hI ta b+hUta ga Na/ t+h+yu Shi ta/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ ha ya grI ba/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man+t+rA nA/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ sid+d+him+me/ a d+hiSh+Tha te A bi Sha ya A be Sha ya/ badzra sar+b+ba dz+wa ra pi shA tsA ni/

sar+b+ba gra he Shu/ a pra ti ha to b+ha bA/ badzra da~M Sh+T+rA kiny+tsi rA ya si/ i daM duSh+Ta grahA na/ duSh+Ta sar+b+ba m+bA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ marda marda/ pA Ta ya pA Ta ya/ maT maT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM b+hA/ a nu dz+nyA taM kar+m+ma ku ru shIg+h+raM ha ya shrI ha ya grI pA ya phaT/ badzra ya phaT/ badzrA gA trA

ya phaT/ badzra nai trA ya phaT/ badzra daM Sh+T+rA ya phaT/ badzra khu rA ya phaT/ badzra khu ra nir g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ pa ra man+t+ra bi nA sha nA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba trai lokya b+ha yaM ka rA ya phaT/ sarba kar+m+ma su pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ badzra ku la san+t+rA sa nA ya phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas

khro chen byung ba yis/ /rdo rje pad mchog las byung rnams/ /yid ni 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur/ /'khor bcas 'jigs pas rnam 'khrugs nas/ /byang chub tshogs ni dran byed cing / /ye shes rdo rje dran 'gyur ba/ /lag pa la ni pad+ma dang / /

ha zhes bya ba mchog 'bar bsam/ /khro rgyal ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /rdo rje gsum yig 'dzin pa yis/ /khams gsum dag kyang khyab byed pa'o/ /mi bzad dug ni drang bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis

don yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po be con sngon po can 'di rdo rje gsum las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA NAM/ e hi e hi/ b+ha ga bA na/ nI la badzra daN+Da/ tu ru

tu ru/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ gu lu gu lu/ gu lA pa ya gu lA pa ya/ kram kram/ b+ha ga bAn/ bA yu be ge na/ b+hU tA nA shI g+h+ra~M/ da ha da ha/ da ra da ra/ ba ha ba ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo TA pa ya mo TA pa ya/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni/

tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ b+hAk+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ as+thi mi daM a se/ ru d+hi ra ma dz+dza mi daM/ bi shwa madz+dza/ ru d+ti ra/ bri ya e h+ye ha b+hi ga bA na/ sar+b+ba big+h+dan/ sar+b+ba bi d+yA ni/ sar+b+ba man+t+rA Ni/ sar+b+ba mU la kar+m+ma Ni/ kr-i tri ma Ni/ bi Sha dI ni/ sarba gra hA na/ ha na ha na/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza

marda marda/ e daM me/ kAr+yaM sA d+ha ya/ hU~M nI lA ya nI lA ya/ nI la badzra daN+DA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ big+h+dAn bi nA ya kA na/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hu ru hu ru/ dIb+ta tsaN+DA ya/ sarba sha tUM nr-iM hr-i da yA ni pI Ta ya/ tshin+da tshin+da/ par bid+yA nA ma/ ts+tshe dka hUM bid+yA nA mash+shiSh+Ta ka /

sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ badzra d+ha ra ba tsa naM tsa/ mar mA Ni ni kr-in+ta/ hU~M ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/ phaT phaT hU~M hU~M kri tAn+t+ra ya/ de ba r-i Sh-i bi drA ba kA ya/ ha na badzra daN+De na swA hA/ khro bo chen po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag

tu bdud kyi ris thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rab tu g.yos te sku gsum gyi mchog gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad dran par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs bskul na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la

khro bo chen pos gsod par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas bkod pa kun tu rnam par 'phro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stobs po che rdo rje 'di sku gsum las phyung ngo / /na maH

sa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ o~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ u gra shU la pA Ni hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ o~M dz+ya ti ni ranA da hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ o~M ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ de nas khro bo gsungs tsam gyis/ /gdengs ka yis ni bskor ba kun/ /yid ni shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/ /

rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dran/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas pa yis/ /las kun rab tu grub par byed/ /char pa che na gcod 'gyur la/ /char pa chung na rab tu 'bebs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo chen po 'dod pa'i khro bo 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nA/ Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ de nas khro bo gsungs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'dar/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang skrag /

bdud kyi dpung rnams ltung bar 'gyur/ /rkang g.yas sna tshogs rdo rje yi/ /sbyor bas mtshan ni mnan nas su/ /sku gsum ye shes stobs ldan pas/ /khro gnyer rim par gnyer byas te/ /gsang sngags kun gyis bkug nas su/ /sems can

thams cad dbang du byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje rab tu 'bar zhing khro ba'i ye shes rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje khro bo mi g.yo ba gtum po 'di rdo rje sku gsum

rnams las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsa la kA Na tsaN+Da/ na Ta na Ta/ maT+Ta maT+Ta/ moT+Ta moT+Ta/ saT+Ta saT+Ta/ taT+Ta taT+Ta/ ta na ta na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ mo ha ka ra/ ha sa ha sa/ badzra hA sa ku ru/ hA sa hA sa/ ma ra ma ra Ta/ ma ra ma ra

Ta/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ ha na ha na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi sha A bi sha /ma hA man+tApA la kA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ big+h+na na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ duSh+TA na/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarbAn ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi Sha ma badzra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/

hU~M hU~M hU~M/ tri bi lA ta rang+ga narta ka/ a~M a~M a~M/ hA~M hA~M hA~M/ a tsa la tsa Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hU~M hU~M a sa man+ta kATA Ta ma hA ba la sha tA ya/ ba ra man+dI na/ a~M a~M/ hA~M hA~M ma~M shud+d+h+ya~M tu lo ka/ tuSh+ya~M tu badzrAM/ na mo tu kru a pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yaHdz+wa lA ya/ trA Ta a sa ha na maHswA hA/ /

de nas khro bo mi g.yo ba/ /khro bo stobs chen 'di gsungs pa/ /lha dang klu kun mngag gzhug byed/ /gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin/ /'jigs pa thob nas brgyal bar 'gyur/ /bdud kyi sde rnams lhung nas su/ /tshig cing rab tu zhum bzhin du/ /gtso

bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran/ /khro bo'i rgyal po du ma yis/ /bcug pas 'jigs pas nyen bzhin du/ /gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad nyid/ /sna tshogs las rnams myur du mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs

pas sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis 'jigs pa chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gnod mdzes 'di gsungs so/ /na maHo~M suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/ gr-ih+Na pA ya gr-ih+Na pA ya hU~M/ o~M A na ya

ho b+ha ga bA na bid+yA dza hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas/ /lha yi bu mo thams cad ni/ /skra tshugs zhig cing gcer bur gyur/ /mig rtsa rig rig byed pa dag /sku gsum rdo rje mchog mnga' ba'i/ /zhabs kyis nu ma gnyis mnan pas/ /gtso bo rdo rje

rnam snang mdzad/ /ye shes kyis 'joms dran par 'gyur/ /lcags kyu yis ni rnam dral te/ /rdo rje zhags pas bcings nas su/ /bu mo thams cad dgug bya ba/ /bu mo dgug pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes chen po rnam par

bsgyings pas dga' ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsum gyi mchog rdo rje 'chang bskyed par mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di rjes su dran par mdzad do/ /'khor lo che la rnam gnas nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin dag dang / /de

bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba'i sprin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags thogs 'byin/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las byung gtso/ /gsang sngags skyes bur bdag bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gugs byed na/ /rdo rje 'chang sogs ci zhig smos/ /bud med lha chen bu

mo dag /rlung la rkang pa bzhag nas su/ /lcags kyus snying la drangs nas ni/ /sems can kun yang 'gugs 'gyur te/ /'di la dpyad pa cung zad med/ /rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /sku chen zla ba'i kha dog yin/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /

rdo rje bdud rtsi 'babs bsams te/ /lan grangs bcu ni brjod pa yis/ /de nas gdon mi za bar khugs/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /rdo rje lcags kyu chen po yi/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yis/ /gzhon nu ma dag nges par 'gugs/ /rdo rje gsum

'khrugs khro bo ni/ /rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa ste/ /lha ma yin kun des sreg cing / /lha min bu mo rjes chags pas/ /gsal shing gis ni bsgyel nas su/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis/ /drangs nas lha min bu mo 'gugs/ /btsag dang thod lo kor

dang ni/ /ba bla 'byor par gyur na ni/ /gzas zin tshe na khar bcug ste/ /rdzas rgyal rdo rje lcags kyus 'grub/ /drag po rlung dang khyab 'jug dang / /lha mo gnod sbyin gnod sbyin ma/ /mngag gzhug bcas par 'jigs skrag ste/ /ming bris kun nas rtag

tu 'gugs/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lor legs bzhugs te/ /'jam dpal rdo rjer rnam par bsgom/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed/ /lag na rdo rje lcags kyu thogs/ /khros shing 'bar ba 'phro ba yis/ /gnod sbyin bu mo bkug nas

spyod/ /phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba dang / /bsam gtan 'khor lo sbyor ba yis/ /dgug par bya ba'i tshig gsungs pa/ /gzhan du byas na 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i zhabs drung kun gnas pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /
