kun gyis sems rab rdzogs byed pas/ /yang dang yang du skul bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje

rgyal mo chen mo rnam par bsgyur ba'i rdo rje 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /oM shU li ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /klu mo dbang chen grags pa dag /gos dang bral zhing tshig bzhin du/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran/ /gsang sngags

rig sngags 'di yis ni/ /klu rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /bsam gtan rdo rje mthu dang ni/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pa yis/ /sor gdub rgyan ni gsol ba yis/ /klu mo mig yangs bkug nas ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chags

pa'i/ /klu mo nye bar spyod par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho 'phro ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas skul byed ma chen mo'i gzungs kyi rig sngags chen mo 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa

man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ samyak+si bud+d+hA ko TI nAM/ tad+ya thA/ o~M tsa le tsu le tsun+da swA hA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus/ /ting nge 'dzin las g.yos par gyur/ /bdud rnams brgyal

zhing tshig nas su/ /thams cad cho nges 'debs par byed/ /sa yi 'og gi bu mo dang / /lha min bu mo klu mo dang / /gsang dbang bu mo rnams 'khrugs nas/ /gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran/ /rig sngags 'di ni bzlas pa dang / /sgom pa yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /

bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur zhing / /bkug nas rab tu longs spyod byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos bdud rtsi'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i khro gnyer 'di

rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /o~M b+ha ya nA sha ni trA sa ni trA se/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ bai ra Ti b+h+r-i ku Ti ti Te/ bai Ta Ti bai Ta Ti/ shwe te shwe te/ dza Ti ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rig sngags 'chang dang lha rnams ni/ /g.yos shing

'jigs pa thob par 'gyur/ /bdud rnams 'jigs pas rnams 'khrugs te/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad/ /yid gcig tu ni dran par byed/ /nor bu'i gdub rnams g.yo ba yis/ /rig sngags 'chang ma klu mor bcas/ /lha min bu mo gsang ba

yi/ /bu mo bkug la spyod par byed/ /'dis ni las kun byed pa dang / /mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'jigs pa yin/ /yang na gsang sngags thams cad ni/ /skye bo med pa'i nags tshal du/ /sngags pas bye ba bzlas nas su/ /las rnams thams cad

bya ba gsungs/ /gang gzhan slob dpon smod pa dang / /theg pa chen po sun 'byin dang / /mi gang gsang sngags rgyud dag gis/ /sbyor ba la ni 'phya byed pa/ /de yis dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /de ni rtag tu gdon gyis zin/ /bsgrims nas gsang

bar bya ba 'am/ /yang na lus ni gzhig par bya/ /sngags pas 'di ltar byas na ni/ /byang chub dngos grub legs par 'thob/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad ni/ /sku gsum ye shes las byung ba'i/ /khyad par du ni bsgom par bya/ /dgra la

'di ni the tshom med/ /khrag 'thung chu yis brlan pa'am/ /dur khrod thal ba'am bshang gci yis/ /brlan pa'i gos ni bgos nas kyang / /rkang pas mtshan ma mnan nas su/ /khro bo'i rgyal por sbyor byas te/ /gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /sangs rgyas

kyang ni nges par 'jig /chus brlan pa yi gos bgos te/ /khro bo'i mdun du bcings nas su/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan na ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig /bshang gci yis ni sbags pa'i gos/ /rul ba'i dri can smad pa dag /bgos nas gsang sngags

bzlas brjod na/ /mod la 'chi ba'am skams par 'gyur/ /dur khrod thal bas bsdus pa'i gos/ /bgos nas khro bo 'khrugs nas ni/ /lan grangs stong du brjod na ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'ang rnam par 'jig /skra ni lhug par bshig nas ni/ /kha bzhin rnam par bsgyur byas te/ /

rkang pas mtshan ma mnan na ni/ /nam mkha'i khams kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam/ /khang stong 'am ni bzhi mdo 'am/ /mtshan ma gcig pa'am shing gcig tu/ /drag shul spyod pa brtsam par bya/ /de yi rkang rjes sa la ni/ /mi rus las byas phur

bu dag /sor brgyad tsam gyi tshad tsam la/ /lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pa'i/ /phur bu yis ni btab nas su/ /dgra yi khyim sgor brkos te gzhug /sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/ /shes dang mi shes spangs pa yang / /zla phyed nya yi nang rol du/ /'ching ba'am

yang na 'jig par 'gyur/ /mkhas pas thod pa yongs tshang ba/ /khyad par can ni rnyed pa dang / /de la gsang sngags tshig bris te/ /rdo rje tshig gis bzlas brjod nas/ /dgra yi sgo 'am yang na ni/ /grong du sbas na nges par skrod/ /ta la'i 'dab ma'am gzhan la'ang rung / /

khro bo'i gsang sngags legs bris te/ /dgra yi khyim mam sgo kar ni/ /sbas na 'chi 'am skams par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsum rdo rje'i

phur bu'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khams gsum thams cad ye shes kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo / /o~M g+ha g+h+ra/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TaM phaT

phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA pa~M phaT phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra kI la badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pha ya ti/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra/ kI la ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje dbang chen grags pa kun/ /brgyal nas 'jigs pa skyes gyur te/ /rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa

dran/ /mi yi rus pa'i phur bu'am/ /yang na seng ldeng las byung ba'am/ /lcags las byas pa'i phur bus ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par 'jig /rdo rje sems dpar mnyam gzhag ste/ /'od bzang me stag 'khrug pa can/ /sku gsum rdo rje mtha' gtugs pas/ /

gzugs brnyan la ni bsams nas sbyor/ /rnam snang phyag rgya chen po'am/ /yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can/ /phyag rgya chen po gshin rje gshed/ /'dod pa'i khro bo nyid du ni/ /rdo rje phur bu bsam par bya/ /bdag nyid chen po stobs po che/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor rdo rje dang / /

rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gyis/ /sdang dang gtum po gcad par bya/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang / /thugs nas zhabs la thug par du/ /rdo rje phur bus rnam par bsgoms/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par gnon/ /'di ni phur bu'i mthu

rlabs te/ /steng 'og lha yi dam tshig yin/ /rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad gnon pa yi/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /myur du 'chi 'am skams par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen

pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i sku gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo / /oM tshin+da tshin+da da ha da ha/ dIp+ta

badzra tsakra hU~M phaT/ phan tshun bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /mthe bo'i ngos kyi drung du bsdu/ /snang mdzad zhabs kyis mnan nas su/ /rdo rje phur bus btab par bya/ /btab pa tsam gyis sems dpa' che/ /sku gsum ye shes las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs

par mdzod/ /gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i thugs kyi ye shes chen po rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i stang stabs kyis phur bu zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje sku dang

gsung dang thugs rnams las phyung ngo / /o~M badzra rA dza hU~M/ rtse mo lnga pa bcings nas su/ /me stag 'phro ba bsgoms byas te/ /rdo rje thugs kyis zhabs kyis mnan/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya/ /btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che/ /sku gsum ye shes las byung ba/ /dam tshig

mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod/ /gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig mchog rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung gi dam tshig gi stang stabs kyi phur bu'i gsang

sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo / /o~M tri oM b+hur+b+hu baH/ rdo rje sor mo bcum pa yis/ /pad+ma kha bye 'bar ba yis/ /'dod chags rdo rje zhabs kyis mnan/ /rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab/ /btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che/ /sku gsum ye

shes las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod/ /gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyis chags pa yin/ /cho ga bzang po tsam gyis ni/ /rdo rje mkha' dbyings mtha' gtugs pa/ /mnan 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ces

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje phur bu'i tshig rnams bka' stsal to/ /de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog /sems can khams la phan bzhed rnams/ /dgyes shing mgu ba brnyes nas su/ /rdo rje dbyings kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /kye ma'o gsang ba'i tshig

gi mchog /kye ma'o gsang ba kun 'dus pa/ /kye ma'o zhi ba chos kyi tshig /ye shes rdo rje phur bu rmad/ /gsang sngags kun gyi phur bus 'di/ /bde gshegs bka' yi rjes su byed/ /'di dag sangs rgyas kun gyi ste/ /phur bu de nyid rnams las byung / /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis chom rkun thams cad mdongs par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'od zer can 'di gsungs so/ /o~M mA rI ts+yai de ba tA yai swA hA/ rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni/ /dbang chen grags

pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /thugs ni dgyes shing mgu bar 'gyur/ /sras rnams kyi ni spyan yang phye/ /'di ni las rnams thams cad ma/ /chom rkun sdang ba 'ching mdzad ma/ /'di yi sbyor ba la gnas na/ /'gro ba'i tshe na mthong mi 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stong chen po rab tu 'joms

pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs so/ /o~M ma hA sa ha sra pra marda nA ba ra sid+d+hiM da mI ge ma Ni badzra Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / /bdud kyi ris rnams g.yos

par 'gyur/ /gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad pa/ /thams cad tshig bzhin btud nas su/ /bcom ldan rig sngags mthu stobs kyis/ /gnod bgyid thams cad gzer lags so/ /gang na rig sngags stobs mo che/ /pha rol gnon pa 'di zlos pa/ /der ni bdag cag mi mchi zhing / /

der ni srung ba dag kyang bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ brgya byin mngon par mtho ba'i stobs lha ma yin rnam par 'joms pas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rgyal mtshan

gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi gzungs chen mo 'di gsungs so/ /oM g+ha ga ba tI d+hA dzA gra ke yU re pa ra sai n+ya/ bi d+h+wan+sa na kA swA sai n+ya pa ril ni/ u yu kA mu khi kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ pa ra sai n+ya ma anan+ta b+hu dze/ a nan+ta mu khe/ pra ha ra pra ha ra hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas rig

sngags che gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams g.yos par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab g.yos shing / /bdud kyi sde rnams tshig par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin srin po gos bral nas/ /'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa yis/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran/ /

bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis tshig lags te/ /bdag cag dam tshig la gnas par 'tshal lags na mgon mdzad cing lus thams cad rab tu bsgrub tu gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs

pas mngal thams cad yang dag par skyes pas khyab pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo so so 'brang ba 'di gsungs so/ /o~M ma Ni d+ha ri badzra Ni ma hA pra ti sa ri swA hA/ rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa dang / /rig sngags

rgyal mo'i mthu yis ni/ /mi yi skye dgu 'tshe byed pa/ /mthu chen mngal ni 'phrog pa dang / /log 'dren kun dang sdang ba'i rnams/ /mi bzad me lces tshig gyur nas/ /'jigs pa dang ni skrag pa yis/ /rdo rje snang mdzad drung lhags te/ /zhabs la gtugs te tshig

smras pa/ /bdag cag dam tshig gnas par 'tshal/ /rig sngags dam tshig rtag gnas pa/ /gang gis mngal yang mi 'phrog cing / /rtag tu mngal ni spel bar mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas nor gyi

rgyun gyis yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo nor rgyun 'di gsungs so/ /oM ba sud+hA ri ma hA bsu d+hA ra br-iSh+Ta ni pA ta ni pa su swA hA/ nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba yi/ /rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni/ /

bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dag /yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas/ /rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ /drung du nye bar 'ongs nas su/ /dam bcas pa yi tshig smras pa/ /bcom ldan nor rgyun zhes bya ba'i/ /mtshan ni mi mchog sgrogs bgyid na/ /de la nor

gyi char 'bab cing / /nor chen dang ni ldan par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod par byed pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas srin mo glog 'bar ma bsgyur ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /a re du tre Ni bra kup+ta tsaN+Di ma hA

be ga d+ha ri bid sA d+hu dzi tre/ ma ho da ni rau tri ka pA la mA la d+ha ri Ne dzA Ta mu ku Ta/ maN+Di te/ nA nA pra ha ra Na/ d+ha ri hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ ku ru ku ru hU~M hU~M pra ma d+ha ma sarba sha trU~M NA~M/ sho Ni ta bi pa pra tsaN+De/ be ga d+ha ri pa tsa ta pa tsa ta/ be ki ra ta sa ta ya hU~M/ da ha

da ha/ sarba sha trUM/ sarba duSh+Ta na/ ni gr-in+ta/ pra sA d+ha ya hU~M/ ma hA b+ha ga ba te/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ hU~M phaT/ che ge mo zhig me ba sha mA nA ya swA hA/ de nas srin mo 'bar ba'i glog /rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa yis/ /bdud kyi gnas rnams tshig par 'gyur/ /dgra rnams

kyi ni snying yang skams/ /dur khrod kyi ras la srin mo btsag gis bris nas legs par sbas te gu gul gyi bdug pas bsreg cing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ /me tog dmar po dang / dri dmar po dang / gtor ma dang / lha bshos dmar por byas pa byin nas dur khrod du brko

bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du ming nas smos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis gtor to/ /brkos pa'i mod la phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /mnan pa dang rmongs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma'i

dga' ston gnod sbyin mo'i tshogs dga' bar byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'chang chen po 'phrog ma'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /o~M hA ri t+ye ma hA yak+Shi NI ye ha ra ha ra/ sarba yak+Shi NI pra be sha ni swA hA/ de nas 'phrog dga'

'phrog ma ni/ /gnod sbyin chen mo gsungs pa dang / /gnod sbyin ma kun g.yos nas su/ /dngos grub phyir ni mngon phyogs gyur/ /khro mo'i 'khor lo gnod sbyin ma/ /brgyad dbus 'phrog mas brgyan byas te/ /lcags kyu 'bras bu ne'u le can/ /gnod

sbyin brgyad kyis bklubs nas su/ /gnod sbyin ma kun bsgrub par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad chen po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mi ngas chen po zhi bar mdzad pa'i rig sngags ri khrod kyi shing lo can

ma 'di gsungs so/ /oM pi shA tsi par+Na sha ba ri/ sarba mA ri pra sha ma ni hU~M phaT/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /gnod byed nad 'gro srin po dang / /sdang ba rnams kyi snying yang zags/ /yam shing 'o ma can dang til/ /'o

mas du ba zhi bar 'gyur/ /nam mkhar kun nas rig sngags kyi/ /rgyal mos legs par bkang nas su/ /bdud rtsi char 'bebs bsams na ni/ /mod la gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags kyi ye shes rnam

par bsgyings pa'i rim par phye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sku gsum ye shes kyi rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba lag pa'i phyag rgya tha dad pa

rnams mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis nyon cig /gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing / /'di na lus ni byin rlabs te/ /rang gi gzugs su rnam bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta

smos ci dgos/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mthe bo gnyis bteg pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ste/ sku byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las g.yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste/ g.yas pa'i mthe bo bteg pa ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi

ste gsung byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las g.yas pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste/ g.yon pa'i mthe bo bteg pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi ste/ thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i

thor to g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung pa ni rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug nas lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag ste/ g.yas pa sa la gnon pa ni mi 'khrugs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las g.yas pa mchog sbyin par

byas pa ni rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las lag pa gnyis bsam gtan gyi tshul du byas pa ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byas pa ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcing

par byas pa las gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba ni rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las gung mo'i tshigs dang po bkug ste/ rin po che'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las gung mo pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar gdu bu'i tshul du byas pa ni/ rdo rje chos ma'i

phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las gung mo nang du bskum pa ni rdo rje las ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba la mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te mthe bo'i rtse mor mig gi tshul du byas pa ni/ sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa las

gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du bzung ba ni mA ma kI'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te pad+ma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni gos dkar can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las mdzub mo

gnyis bkug pas gung mo'i sen mo mnan te mthe bo gnyis dbus su bzhag nas cung zad bkug pa ni sgrol ma'i ut+pa la'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te/ mdzub mo dang gung mo'i tshigs dbus mar gdu bu'i tshul byas nas mthe bo gnyis glor bzhag pa 'di

ni skul byed ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bcings pa byas pa las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i rtse mor bkug pa 'di ni rin chen sgrol ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang ste mthe bos so so'i mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas lhag ma rdo rje'i mtshan

nyid du byas pa 'di ni khro gnyer can ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings pa 'di ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las gung mo dang srin lag gnyis

bsgrengs te rtse mo'i tshul du byas la gung mo'i rgyab tu srin lag bsnol la/ mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas pas dkris pas mthe bo gnyis mdun du bzhag pa las cung zad bkug ste kha'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje

khu tshur bcangs pa las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying gar bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yas pa thal lcag gi tshul du byas pa ni khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis la mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud ltar mdud la mdzub mo gzhibs te bsgreng ba las bzlog ste/ dpral

bar bzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bos srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi sen mo mnan la ral gri shubs nas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las rgyab sprad de mthe'u chung

gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pa las zhags pa'i tshul du byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo snying gar bzhag la/ g.yas pa khro bo'i sor mo be con gyi tshul du phyar ba ni be con sngon po can gyi phyag

rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje snying gar bzhag la g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas par phyar ba ni stobs po che'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs la/ mdzub mo dang gung mo bsgrengs te sprad nas me tog gi tshul du byas pa ni byams pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /

lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas ut+pal kha bye ba'i tshul du gzhug pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pa glang po che'i sna ltar byas pa ni

spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur nam mkha' la sgreng ba lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du byas pa ni ye shes tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /bzang po'i 'dug stangs su 'dug ste/ thal mo khong stong du sbyar te snying gar bzhag pa ni bzang skyong gi

phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis chu rlabs kyi tshul du brkyang ba las sor mo rnams chu rlabs drang ba ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag la g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni blo gros mi zad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur pang du bzhag la

g.yas se gol gtogs pa'i tshul du byas pa ni spobs pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis pad+ma cung zad kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni mthu chen thob kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis me tog 'dor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni ngan song thams cad spong ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag

pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las bsnun pa'i tshul du byas pa ni mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang nas 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas pa la g.yon

pa zla ba'i tshul du byas pa ni zla 'od kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis bum pa'i tshul du byas nas dbang bskur ba ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la g.yas pa'i khu tshur nam mkha' la kun tu bskor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya'o/ /

g.yon pa sa la brkyang nas lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong sprad nas zhi ba'i tshul du byas pa ni sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying gar bzhag la hU~M zhes bya zhing / lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg

stabs dang bcas par phyar ba ni ri khrod lo ma can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa sor mo brkyang ba las mdzub mo dang mthe bo rkang pas 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ lag pa g.yas pa khab kyi tshul gyis 'tshe bar byed pa rnams kyi kha mig 'drub pa ni 'od

zer can ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis spyi bor sbrul mgo gdengs ka'i gdugs ltar byas nas phud ces brjod pa ni dug sel ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las g.yas

pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu yis dzaHzhes bya ba'i dgug pa ni rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu dgug pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa ste rdo rje khro bo'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung mche ba'i tshul du byas pa las bsnol te 'gram pa

gnyis su bzhag la/ lce ljib cing khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya ba ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis bskum/ mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas nas kha'i grwar bzhag ste hU~M zhes bya zhing khro bo'i lta bas lus gcu ba ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i

phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste bsnol nas gyen du bteg pa ltar byas pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te bstod cing bteg pa ni sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis

rdo rje khu tshur bsnol nas mchan khung du bsdams te khro bo'i lta bas 'gyur ba dang bcas pa ni gdon thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon brkyang ste kha sbub pa la de'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag nas lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo bskyod pa ni lha ma yin gyi sgyu

dang 'khrul 'khor 'byed pa dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo smrar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings te bzhag la/ lhag ma ba dan rtse gsum pa'i tshul du byas nas stang stabs dang bcas par hU~M zhes bya ba'i khro

bo rdo rjes 'og gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi khro bo'i mdzub mos bsdigs pa ni rdo rje'i bdag mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste phur bu'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur brdung ba'i tshul du byas

pa ni rdo rje tho ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje mdud pa dor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bcings pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te sog le drang ba'i tshul du

byas pa ni rdo rje sog le'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo zla ba'i tshul du byas te gdong g.yog cing brkyang la khro bo'i mig tu byas nas a la la zhes bya ba ni rdo rje srin mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings pa la mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis pad+ma'i tshul du

byas pa ni sprin thams cad gtub pa'i char pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te skam pa'i tshul du dpung pa brkyang ba ni 'khrul 'khor gyi phur pa dbyung ba'i skam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo lag mthil du bzhag

ste/ lhag ma rnams 'dab ma ltar g.yab cing rkang pa ya gcig sa la btsugs la/ gcig rgyab tu bskums nas khro bo'i lta bas lce ljib cing hU~M phaT ces bya bas rim gyis bskyod pa ni rdo rje nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya'o/ /'di bcings pa tsam gyis khams gsum khyab pa'i dug

kyang skad cig gis sel bar byed do/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mda' gzhu dgang ba'i tshul gyis phyogs bzhir mda' bkang ste 'phangs pas pha rol dpung gzhig pa ni mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur gnyis las gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba las rin po che'i

tshul du bkug la mthe bo brkyang ba'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas pa ni sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi phyag rgya g.yul las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos sor mo mnan te gung mo bsgreng la g.yas pas pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul du byas pa ni ha la

ha la'i phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis dkris la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng nas bzlog la dpral bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya ste/ /dur khrod du 'jug pa na mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /g.yon

pas thod pa gzung la g.yas pas mdung rtse gsum thogs nas ral pa bcings te zla bas brgyan cing mtshan bsgreng la/ mig gsum pa gar byed pa ni gar stabs kyi phyag rgya ste 'di ni bde byed kyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa mi 'jigs par byas pa las sor mo rnams cung zad phye

ste mthe bo lag mthil du bzhag /de bzhin du g.yas pa'i khu tshur dbyug tho 'dzin pa ltar byas pa ni khyab 'jug gi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang nas pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te me tog ltar byas pa ni

ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ni/ /rgyab tu mdud pa ltar 'dor zhing / /rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i/ /rin chen cod pan phreng dbang bskur/ /ting 'dzin gnas pas 'khor lo can/ /'khor lo mnga' ba'i lha rnams la/ /sangs

rgyas sa ni rab 'gengs pa'i/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa 'byung bar bsam/ /'gyur zhing cung zad 'jo tshul can/ /sgeg mo yi ni phyag rgya yis/ /gar gyi tshul du bskyod nas kyang / /hU~M zhes bya ba glur blangs shing / /de nas sangs rgyas kun dgyes pa/ /rdo rje rgyud ni

bsgreng bar bya/ /de nas phreng tshul phreng ba yis/ /lha rnams kun la bcing bar bya/ /'jo sgeg thabs la spro ba yis/ /lag gnyis bskor zhing dgrol ba dang / /g.yas nas g.yon du bskor ba yis/ /gar stabs byas nas mgo la gzhag /me tog

dbul ba'i tshul du ni/ /gang gis me tog thal mo sbyar/ /bdug spos rtse mo sbyar ba yis/ /gung mo gnyis ni bzlog ste bsgreng / /bskor cing bsgyur ba byas pa yis/ /mtheb gnyis mar me'i tshul du gzhag /dung gi tshul du lag bsgyur nas/ /dung

phor lta bu'i mchod yon dbul/ /de nas lha rnams kun la yang / /lag pa'i gar gyis byug tshul bya/ /de nas sil snyan tshul gyis su/ /lag gnyis sil snyan legs par brdung / /dung dang gling bu bud pa dang / /lag pa gnyis ni rnga yab g.yob/ /

bsil yab tshul gyis bsil yab dang / /sor mo gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan bya/ /tshon dgye tshe na lcug phran ltar/ /bskyod cing tshon gyi phreng ba dgye/ /lag g.yon snod kyi tshul byas la/ /g.yas pa yis ni lha bshos dbul/ /khang pa brtsegs pa bzhag nas

su/ /gos kyi tshul gyis gos rnams dang / /gdu bu ske rags rkang rgyan dang / /rna cha do shal gnas lngar gzhag /de nas gdugs kyi tshul gyis su/ /lha rdzas gdugs ni legs par gzung / /bsam gtan tshul gyis lag pa dag /nam mkha' la ni mdzes

bskor na/ /sangs rgyas zhing rab 'gengs byed pa'i/ /bla re rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ /grwar ni pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan/ /gsang sngags 'di ni cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis/ /sgo 'phar dag kyang dbye bar bya/ /

o~M badzra g+haN+Da ra Ni ta/ prar Ni ta sa~M bra ra Ni ta/ sarba bud+ha k+She tra/ pra tsa li te/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ nA da swa b+hA be badzra d+har+m+ma hr-i da ya/ san+to Sha Ni hU~M hU~M hU~M/ lag g.yas rdo rje gsor bya zhing / sna tshogs khugs su 'gyur ba yi/ /rdo rje glu yis bstod par bya/ /rdo rje theg pas

mnyes byed pa/ /'di ni don dam mchod pa yin/ /gang gis rnam rtog rnam spangs te/ /byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pas/ /lus ngag sems ni rnam dag pa/ /de yi mchod pa bla na med/ /sems can gang gis dbu ma yi/ /theg pa gong ma ma bsgoms shing / /

theg pa dman pa lhag mos pa/ /de yi mchod pa kun rdzogs pa/ /sangs rgyas dbang chen grags kun gyis/ /mchod pa de dag gsan pa dang / /ngo mtshar byung ba'i spyan phye nas/ /legs so zhes ni rab tu gsungs/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /

byang chub sangs rgyas thabs su ste/ /rdo rje bsgom pa byas pa yin/ /nyon mongs med par byang chub 'thob/ /rdo rje theg chen legs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa legs/ /zab cing rgya che legs pa ste/ /rdo rje rin chen kun 'dus

legs/ /de nas ye shes kyi sku gsum las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje theg pa bsngags pa thos nas/ dga' bas spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis stod par byed/ /

thog ma med cing skye ba med/ /'gyur ba med cing gnas pa med/ /mkha' bzhin rnam rtog las grol ba/ /rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtag /thabs su brtags pa gang yin des/ /ye shes kyi ni sras po kun/ /rdo rje theg pa bsgoms pa yis/ /sangs

rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur/ /zhes smras so/ /bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yis/ /dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen/ /dang po gang du rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /dag cing dri med blos ni oM du sprul/ /gzugs mang tshul gyis

phreng bas bskor ba yi/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsung snyan yi ge kun la khyab pa yi/ /spros med gsung du 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs/ /mig gsum lha mo dang bcas 'dul mdzad pa/ /sgyu 'phrul tshul mang ldan pa 'ga' ma mchis/ /

gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa/ /na chung dag dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad cing / /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor nas su/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gis dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol/ /lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor gyur pa yi/ /dam tshig rnams kyis bya ba

byas par 'gyur/ /gcig gi lag pas kun nas 'khyud pa ste/ /gnyis pa rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu/ /gsum pa mi bzod me tog phreng ba 'thor/ /bzhi pa bde ba yis ni mda' yang 'phen/ /gang zhig glu 'di len par byed pa dag /bde ba'i rdo rje can dang

mnyam par 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glu yin no/ /o~M a nun+t+ta ra sar+b+ba pU dzA me g+ha ung+ga te/ s+pha ra Na i ma~M ga ga na khaM hU~M phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di lan gsum brjod pas mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byam thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab

par 'gyur ro/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /ye shes gces pa dri med pa/ /byang chub sems ni rin po che/ /bla na med pa bshad du gsol/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa thugs su chud nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems ni lus kyi rnam pa yin/ /lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin/ /sems kyang tshig gis

brjod pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnam par sbyor ba thos nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma kun tu bzang po ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /chos rnams skye ba

med pa ste/ /g.yo ba med cing gnas pa med/ /rtog pa'i dri ma spangs pa 'di/ /bskyed par bya zhes rab tu gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsung spros pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te/ /chos can med cing chos nyid med/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag dngos

med de/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin/ /bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po skye ba med pa ste/ /dngos po ngo bo yod min pas/ /nam mkha'i go 'phang thob po zhes/ /dngos rnams rab tu brjod

pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang bla ma ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal pa/ /bzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med/ /sems can med cing srog kyang med/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med/ /rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i/ /byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin/ /zhes

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis gsungs so/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems

rnam par dag par mthong nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o dag /kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams/ /bdag med chos las legs byung ba/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom pa

yin/ /mi g.yo yi ge las byung ba/ /rmi lam sogs ltar ma skyes pa/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /dang por rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes/ /dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas/ /

yid kyis hU~M byas rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems mas byin gyis brlabs/ /rin chen lus su nga rgyal bya/ /lag pa bstod de bskor ba yi/ /lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang / /byon nas dang por phyogs bcings te/ /dam tshig dag kyang dbul bar bya/ /gdan rnams so sor

phul nas su/ /mchod yon dbul ba'i sbyor ba bya/ /dbang bskur mtshon cha go cha sogs/ /sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya/ /rnam pa kun gyis mnyes par bya/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis brtag /rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste/ /byin gyis

brlabs dang yongs brtags dang / /gzugs gnyis rdzogs par gyur pa ni/ /rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsung / /sngags kyis byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed/ /rnal 'byor byin brlabs yin par gsungs/ /byang chub sems ni dag pa dang / /gsang sngags

sa bon bskyed pa che/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs su brtags pa yin/ /rim gyis gzugs ni rdzogs byas pa/ /de ni brtag par brjod pa ste/ /rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs/ /bsdu dang spro bar byas pa las/ /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dag /skad cig ye shes

kyis rdzogs pa/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do/ /dang por dam tshig byin brlabs par/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa bdag gis brtags/ /rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag /'di ni rnal 'byor cho gar bshad/ /nyon mongs dri mar byas pa'i sems/ /byang chub sems

kyis dag byas te/ /de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes/ /brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyang / /dag 'gyur de nas blo yis ni/ /sems la so sor brtag par bya/ /sems la so sor brtags nas kyang / /phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya/ /sems tsam la ni gnas

nas su/ /byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags te/ /bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag /zla ba'i gzugs su rnam par brtag /lag pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i/ /oM gyi myu gus bskrun pa yi/ /yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs/ /rdo rje skur ni

bsgom par bya/ /AHzhes bya ba spros med gsung / /sems ni hU~M zhes bya bar sprul/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs lus/ /snying la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs/ /de la rang gi yi ge ni/ /mdog gzugs 'od ni phyed bsams te/ /nga rgyal

bskyed nas de la ni/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag yin brjod/ /rgyan kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ /cha shas kyi ni dra ba can/ /ye shes sems dpa' rdzogs par brtag /de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /go cha

mtshon cha la sogs bya/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas lngar dbang bskur te/ /cod pan phreng ba rnams kyis bklubs/ /de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi/ /sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma spro/ /yan lag bzhi pa'i dbus ldan pa'i/ /phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang / /bsnyems

ma dang ni rtogs ldan ma/ /mtshon cha mda' dang rtse mo can/ /sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam mang po/ /rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis brlab/ /kun la khyab par byed pa yi/ /sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni/ /de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'khor lo khyab byas

te/ /dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang spro/ /ting 'dzin kun gyis dga' ba la/ /longs par spyod pa'i sngags pa yis/ /'khor lo la ni rdo rje'i gzugs/ /pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni/ /'khor lo kun las pad+ma yi/ /ngo bo yis ni rol pa dang / /e zhes bya ba 'phros

pa las/ /mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugs su bya/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan nyid kun ldan pa/ /nyid kyi stan la bzhugs par blta/ /sgeg mo glu dang gar rnams dang / /rgyal mtshan la sogs tshon dgye dang / /sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni/ /sna tshogs rnams kyis

mchod par bya/ /rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni/ /bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas/ /myur ches pa dang bul ba dang / /mi gsal gug skyed nyams pa dang / /rtog pa ngan pa rnam spangs nas/ /de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya/ /bzlas pas skyon lag g.yas

kyis/ /bsgrims te rdo rje gsor nas kyang / /g.yon pas rdo rje dril gsil zhing / /rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang / /ba dan tshul du bya bas mchod/ /bzlas pa'i mjug ni brtul nas kyang / /gshegs su gsol te bdag nyid bsrung / /lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms

te/ /brtan por ci bder 'gro bar bya/ /bar chad du ni gyur na yang / /yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab/ /de ltar sgom pas sgom byed pa/ /rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i/ /byang chub des ni myur thob nas/ /zla nya'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang / /sna tshogs las kyis thog

'dren cing / /rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed/ /chags chen pad+ma'i gdung rgyud can/ /gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur/ /dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso/ /dga' chen rdo rje lcags kyur 'gyur/ /sgyu ma bshig pa kun shes shing / /dregs pa 'joms

byed khro bor 'gyur/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'i

'khor lo rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyi nang gi 'khor lo thams cad rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi las kyi sbyor ba rab 'byam 'di bka' stsal to/ /lha ni gang yang rung ba zhig /'khor lo'i dbus su bzhag na ni/ /de yi

ming smos rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsung / /zhi dang rgyas dang drag shul dang / /rang gi las la sbyor ba na/ /'khor lo'i rgyal po rnam bsgoms nas/ /bdag po nyid kyis rab tu bya/ /zhi ba spyan dang skul byed mas/ /rgyas la rin chen gos dkar mo/ /

dbang la sgrol ma lu gu rgyud/ /yams dang gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir/ /'od zer can dang ri khrod mas/ /drag shul spyad la mA ma kI/ /khro gnyer can ma dag gis bya/ /'di dag shes rab rol pa ste/ /chags pa'i rdo rjes rjes chags pa/ /gsang sngags de

nyid kyis bskul na/ /gdon mi za bar phrin las mdzad/ /spyan dang lha mo skul byed ma/ /dbang po zhi ba zla 'dra ba/ /phyag gnyis na ni bgrang phreng dang / /ril ba spyi blugs kyis brgyan pa/ /dang por ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas/ /bum pa zla ba'i mdangs ldan pa/ /bdud

rtsi'i 'o mas rab bkang ste/ /lag gnyis pad+ma'i gdub mchog gis/ /rnam par snang mdzad zhabs drung du/ /nad pa la ni bdugs par bsams/ /rin chen ma dang gos dkar can/ /sku che kha dog ser po ste/ /lha mo ser mo snang ba la/ /phyag na rin chen pad+ma can/ /

dang por ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas/ /yid 'ong rgyal ba'i 'dod pa yis/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i zhabs drung du/ /bdud rtsi'i rab tu dgang ba dang / /bla med rin chen khar bab na/ /rgyas pa mtshungs med mdzes par 'gyur/ /lha mo sku chen mdog dmar ba/ /sgrol ma de

bzhin lu gu rgyud/ /kun nas 'od dmar 'bar ba can/ /lha rdzas lcags kyu zhags thogs pa/ /rab tu bzhad cing spyan phye bas/ /'od dpag med pa'i zhabs drung du/ /bsgrub bya rgyags pas myos pa dag /bkug steng mda' yis bsnun na ni/ /skad cig nyid la dbang du

mdzad/ /mi ngas gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir/ /sku chen nam mkha'i kha dog can/ /'od zer can dang ri khrod mas/ /rdo rje don yod zhabs drung du/ /mkhas pas sngar bshad tshul du ni/ /bdud rtsi yis kyang rnam par bzlog /lha mo khro gnyer mA ma kI/ /ma rgad lta bu'i mdog

can ma/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /rdo rjes bsdigs par brtson pa yis/ /rdo rje mi 'khrugs zhabs drung du/ /khros nas rdo rje'i me yi char/ /'bebs par rnam par bsam par bya/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba des/ /bsgrub bya tshig nas mog ces byed/ /sbyor ba 'di yi mod la

ni/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ /yang na lus ni 'jig par mdzad/ /byin rlabs dam tshig dbang bskur la/ /rdo rje sems ma rin chen dang / /chos dang rdo rje las ma bzhi/ /sbyor ba rnams ni rab tu sbyar/ /sems dpa' chen po bcu drug kyang / /bla med 'khor lo byed pa ste/ /

rang gi phyogs nas las byas na/ /'bras bu don yod sbyin par byed/ /khro bo'i lus la legs gnas te/ /khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya/ /dam tshig la sogs cho ga bzhin/ /der ni rdo rje bsgoms nas bskul/ /rkang pa'i rjes kyis blangs la/ /dur khrod thal bdag dang

bsre/ /de yi ras blangs mi rus dang / /chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa dag ni/ /btags nas lung bong gcin gyis sbru/ /de las dgra bo'i gzugs byas la/ /de tshe gzugs brnyan bcing bar bya/ /dug dang ske tshe lan tshwa dang / /'bru mar tsha ba rab bsres te/ /dgra bo tsha ba bskyed

pa'i phyir/ /de yis lus nang rab tu dgang / /de nas rnam shes rlung 'dra ba/ /lcags kyu yis ni bkug nas kyang / /srin bu me khyer 'dra bcug ste/ /zhags pa yis ni dam du gzung / /de ni rdo rje sgrog tu gzhug /bsgrims nas de yi ming smos te/ /dgra bo'i lus ni ma lus

par/ /po son cha yi tsher mas dbug /mi rus las byas phur bu 'am/ /yang na seng ldeng las byung bas/ /dpral ba snying mgrin dpung mgo gnyis/ /gnas lnga dag tu bsgrims te gdab/ /nim pa'i shing la sbar ba yis/ /me 'bar ba la bskam par bya/ /mkhas pas rkang pa

nas brtsams te/ /mtshon cha rnon pos gtubs nas ni/ /'bar ba'i lus can khros pa yis/ /de yi dum bu sbyin sreg bya/ /las 'di la ni lhag par yang / /rus sbal gyi ni rkang stabs sbyar/ /nyi ma'i gung ngam nam phyed na/ /las 'di nyid ni bsgrub par bya/ /las 'di

byas nas nges par ni/ /gang zhig rgyal bas bsrungs na'ang des/ /nges par 'chi na khyab 'jug dang / /lha chen tshangs pas ci zhig smos/ /phyi rol gyi drag shul spyod pa'i go cha'o/ /gsod pa'i ye shes las sprul pa/ /nang gi yang ni bshad par bya/ /bsgrub bya yid kyis

bsrungs nas su/ /cho ga bzhin du dgug par bya/ /lag na ral gri mtshon cha dang / /be con rdo rje gtun shing zhags/ /lag na 'khor lo mda' gzhu can/ /khro bo sna tshogs bsnams pa des/ /bsgrub bya zhags pas bcings nas su/ /rdo rje yi ni khro bo

yis/ /lho yi phyogs su khrid pa dang / /rdo rje gzhan gyis brdeg pa dang / /de ni ral gris gtub pa dang / /rgyu ma lang long nar par bsam/ /o~M hU~M badzra rAk+Sha sI/ b+hak+Sha ya tha phaT/ rdo rje srin mo bsgoms nas kyang / /bya rog wa dang bya rgod kyis/ /kun nas yongs su

bskor nas su/ /de dag zang thob byed par ni/ /bsgom zhing ming nas bskul bar bya/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje rnga mo rnams bsams te/ /bsgrub par bya bar yongs brtags pa/ /de yi rgyab tu zhon nas su/ /rdo rje khro bos gzir bzhin du/ /

lho phyogs su ni dkri bar bya/ /de yi rkang rjes sa la ni/ /rlung gis gtsubs pa'i shing lo la/ /de yi ming nas brjod byas te/ /rdo rje sna yon drung du sba/ /de lta bur ni sbyor ba'i las/ /bsgom zhing cho ga bzhin byas na/ /brgya byin nyid kyang bskrad 'gyur na/ /sa

steng skye bo smos ci dgos/ /de ming gsang sngags dang spel te/ /'ug pa'i sgro la bris nas ni/ /dge sbyong bram ze'i skras dkris te/ /sa yi 'og tu brkos nas gzhug /rdo rje khro bo gnyis kyis ni/ /'thab mo 'gyed du gzhug par bya/ /de ltar bsams pa'i sbyor ba

yis/ /'dod pa bzhin du dbye bar 'gyur/ /hU~M zhes bya bas gang ba yi/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas nas/ /sna yi rtse mo nas bton te/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni dgang bar bya/ /lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad du/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bcings nas su/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'phros gyur pa/ /

des ni lus kyang bskam par bya/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgoms te/ /kun nas kyang ni gzhig par bya/ /o~M badzra DA ki nI/ a mu kas+ya rak+ta A kar+Sha tsa sha ya hU~M phaT/ sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ /skam 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /mkhas pas rlung gi phyogs song ste/ /

dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas ni/ /spos kyi thig le bdun byas te/ /de dag kham pa'i phor pa dgab/ /de ni ri rab thams cad nas/ /rtse mo brgyad par sprul byas te/ /rdo rje 'phro bas brgyan pa yis/ /de dag rnams ni mnan par bya/ /ya~M zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i

rlung bdun rnams/ /la~M zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma dbang chen gyi/ /nang du rlung rnams nges par chud par bya/ /de lta'i sbyor bas 'jig pa'i rlung yang bcings/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgoms nas de'i 'dab la/ /klu brgyad bkod dbus me tshogs 'bar ba can/ /rdo rje khro bo'i

sku yi zhabs mthil gyis/ /klu rnams mnan na char sprin char pa 'bebs/ /hU~M zhes bya bas gnyis dbus klu rnams kyi/ /snying po yongs bcug spel mas gzir nas su/ /hU~M zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas nas su/ /'jig dus char pa lta bu'i char pa 'bab/ /nyi ma'i

mdog ltar dmar po'i 'od bzang zhal/ /nam mkha' khyab par rnam par gdangs nas ni/ /kun nas char chus yongs su gang ba'i sprin/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lce yis ldag /dbugs rngub pa yis bkug nas dbyung ba yis/ /shing bal bzhin du rab tu gtor

bar bya/ /yang na rang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs 'bar ba/ /btang bas skad cig la ni bcad gtubs te/ /hU~M zhes bya bas bsdigs pa byas na ni/ /nam mkha' dag kyang ston ka'i dus ltar snang / /me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas snang mdzad kyi/ /zhabs drung dpral dbyes

nas byung mi g.yo bran/ /bdud las rnam rgyal phyag drug mda' gzhu zhags/ /ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje char 'bebs pa/ /khro bo grangs med pa yis yongs bskor nas/ /bgegs rnams sreg mdzad hU~M gi sgras bkang nas/ /'jig rten gsum po gang 'di rnam par

'jig /rkang rjes sa dang mi yi khrag dag las/ /mi yi gzugs byas mi rus phur bu la/ /'od zer can gyi gsang sngags bsgrags pa yis/ /lan grangs nyi shur mngon sngags mig tu gdab/ /tshogs kyi bdag po'i khar ni ming bcug nas/ /phyi bzhin rdo rje

gtun shing dag gis brdung / /o~M su~M b+hA badzra mus len/ tsUr+N+Na ya na ra b+hi g+hAn hU~M phaT/ las 'di bsams pas mod la ni/ /ma yi bgegs kyang bzlog par 'gyur/ /stong zil kha dog lta bu nam mkha' lding / /lus la sbrul stong dag gis brgyan byas pa/ /

mkha' la 'dug nas gdengs ka stong ldan pa'i/ /klu brgyad dag dang char sprin rnams la bsgo/ /brgya byin bka' ni de dag gis thos nas/ /sprin tshogs bum pa'i char gyis me yang gsod/ /nam mkha' lding gi 'dab mas bkab nas ni/ /mchus brkos chu klung gis ni

mtshams kyang bcad/ /o~M badzra nA rA yaN/ ni rab bA ya/ ma hi na/ ba ma mu me ge hU~M/ zhal ras gsum pa ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog /phyag bzhi 'od dmar sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /lha mo bzhi pa bsnyems ma byams ma dang / /chu srin rgyal mtshan me tog rol pas bskor/ /

g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje legs gsor zhing / /g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu sgeg par gzhag /ldem bag 'jo sgeg tshul gyis rol pa ste/ /sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sprin rnams rnam par 'phel/ /rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan cing / /rin chen cod pan dbang bskur bas/ /

nam mkha' la ni 'bab pa yi/ /thog thog rnam par zlog par byed/ /o~M ma hA puk+ka badzra/ che ge modz+dza zhes bya ba dang / hU~M zhes bya ba nas/ pU ra Ta ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ sbyor ba 'di ni byas pa yis/ /bla med byang chub rgyas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin

gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ /mi 'khrugs rin chen 'od dpag med/ /don yod gsang sngags rgyal rnams dang / /bzang po rnam pa bcu drug po/ /kun dang drag po'i ting 'dzin la/ /gnas pa yi ni khro bo dang / /gsang sngags rdzogs mdzad rig rgyal

ma/ /rnam pa kun dang ldan pa dag /rims bral rang gi ting 'dzin gnas/ /thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la/ /gzigs pa chen pos rnam gzigs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /smin ma mdzes par bskyod nas su/ /yan lag 'phrog pa'i

'dzum bstan nas/ /thugs kyi sems ni dga' bar mdzad/ /dga' bar mdzad pa'i mod la ni/ /sangs rgyas mchog kun gyis mchod pa/ /shes rab chen po'i thog 'dren pas/ /bsgrims te so sor gsor nas des/ /bde chen ting 'dzin la gnas te/ /ldem bag 'jo

tshul gyis bltas nas/ /lag gnyis pad+ma'i tshul gyur te/ /spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /ye shes lam ni rab ston pa/ /rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad la/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /yid rgyas pa yis tshig gsol pa/ /ci slad rnam pa thams cad du/ /zur gyis

rnam par gzigs pa dang / /smin ma bskyod byas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /ye shes rnam par bsgyings bas gsungs/ /byang chub chen po'i rdo rje can/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol mod la/ /brtan zhing zab pa'i gsung gis ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol pa bshad/ /bsgom pa'i

lam la legs byung ba/ /rdo rje ye shes rnams kyi thabs/ /bde ba'i byang chub thob 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas kyi/ /rjes su 'brang ba'i 'khor nyon cig /gang la dngos rnams dngos med cing / /mtha' gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma med/ /dbus la'ang spyod

pa med pa dag /dus gsum 'das pa'i nam mkha' 'dra/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa/ /de la byang chub ji ltar rtogs/ /rtogs par 'dod pa de dag ni/ /thabs rnams nga yis bshad par bya/ /phung po dngos po yong med pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni grogs

gyur pa/ /spro ba dang ni btung ba yis/ /sku gsum mchog ni mchod par bya/ /sems kyis sku ni thob 'gyur zhing / /sems kyis chos rnams bstan pa yin/ /sems kyis byang chub 'thob 'gyur bas/ /de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par bsgom/ /sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste/ /

byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra/ /dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas/ /gyo mo la ni sngags bzlas te/ /legs par byas pa'i gzugs dag la/ /sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na ni/ /rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin

bsod nams ye shes las/ /byung ba'i tshogs kyis bsgom pa'i sems/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la/ /bla med byang chub snang bar byed/ /dngos po don dam mi shes pa/ /phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa'i/ /ngan par rtog pa'i rnam rtog gis/ /

rin chen sems 'di dri mar byas/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams dang / /dngos po thams cad ldan zhes gsungs/ /de la gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs/ /mi shes pa yis yongs su brtags/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mngon zhen pas/ /don dam phyi rol byas pa yi/ /theg pa dman

pa pa rnams kyis/ /bla med byang chub ci ltar 'thob/ /byang chub rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/ /lhag ma dang bcas lhag ma med/ /lhag bcas phung po'i ngo bo ste/ /nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su bsregs/ /lhag med bag chags med pa ste/ /mkha' ltar dri ma med pa yin/ /

bla med byang chub 'di lta bur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam par bshad/ /de yi byang chub spel ba'i phyir/ /las kyi tshul ni sna tshogs yin/ /rnal 'byor can gyi gsang sngags gang / /ye shes sems dpa'i zhabs drung du/ /rtag tu mnyes byas ma grub pa'i/ /lhag ma nga

yis bshad bya ste/ /de ni bde blag thabs kyis su/ /tshar bcad nas ni bsgrub pa bshad/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po che/ /rdo rje zhags pa rab gdung byed/ /rdo rje khu tshur gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje phur bu rnams 'dril byed/ /rdo rje tho ba rdung ba ste/ /rdo rje nag mo cher 'bar pa/ /lha

rnams kun la 'jigs pa skyed/ /phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs 'di/ /bsgoms nas las la sbyar na ni/ /dam tshig rgyal bas bstan pa'i phyir/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i las byed do/ /gsang sngags rig pas hU~M zhes pa'i/ /lcags kyu btang nas zhabs drung dgug /'di ni

gal te sangs rgyas sam/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i snying las dgug /dam tshig gis ni zhugs pa dang / /rdo rje bcing bas bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas/ /rdo rje nag mos kun tu bsdigs/ /rdo rje yi ni phur bu yis/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni gnas lnga po/ /dpral

ba mgrin pa snying ga dang / /de bzhin dpung pa gnyis su gdab/ /rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par gnon/ /bsdigs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gzugs brnyan mig yor gyur pa dang / /sangs rgyas byang

chub rab rdzogs pa'i/ /dngos grub de tshe sbyin par mdzad/ /'di ni mthu yis grub pa yi/ /sbyor ba gcig pu gsang chen yin/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis gsang ba'i sgrub pa thos nas mgrin gcig tu thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya bar gsol to/ /gtso bo rdo rje

rnam snang mdzad/ /dpa' bo chen po legs so zhes/ /zab mo chos kyi mchog gyur pa/ /dam pa bshad par mdzad pa legs/ /sems can phan phyir thugs rje yi/ /lcags kyus kun nas 'bar ba legs/ /bdag med chos rnams sgrub pa yi/ /ye shes snying khu 'bar ba legs/ /gsang chen

thams cad bstan pa yi/ /rdo rje theg pa nges par gsungs/ /theg pa'i tshul 'di la gnas na/ /bla med byang chub bde bar thob/ /o~M badzra aM ku sha A ku sha A kar+Sha ya hUM/ oM badzra pA sha ban+d+ha hU~M/ o~M badzra TAk+ki rA dzA ya hU~M/ o~M badzra muSh+Ti gr-ih+na hU~M/ o~M badzra kI la ya kI la ya hU~M/ o~M badzra mud ga ra A ko Ta ya hU~M/ ye shes

kyi snying khus snying po can du gyur pa'i gsang sngags dag pa mchog tu gyur pa don yod pa'i las 'di dag su la yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni sbyor ba'i thabs kyis sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin

gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sbyor ba'i las thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbab pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba 'di bshad do/ /oM zhes bya ba mgor bzhag ste/ /AHni bzhin gyi pad+ma la/ /hU~M ni bskul nas snying gar gzhag /ya~M ni rlung gi

dkyil 'khor la/ /bzhag nas bsgrims te gdeg byas na/ /'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi/ /'gro ba thams cad 'bab par 'gyur/ /dbab snod skul byed gzugs de yi/ /gzugs kyi ngo bor bsams nas su/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i nga rgyal gyis/ /gsang sngags bsnyems dang bcas par bklag /brjod par

bya ba thogs pa med pa'i phreng ba ni/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nA~M/ samyak+saM bud+d+ha ko TInAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le tsu n+de swA hA/ brtson 'grus chen mo thogs ba med par 'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ pha rol gnod pa che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dgra sta dang zhags pa bsnams ma/ khro mo chen mo khro mo'i dbang phyug

ma/ drag po'i gzugs can ma/ zhal ras mtha' yas pa/ phyag stong ma/ mi pham ma/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod pa/ gdul bar dka' ba/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu grub ma/ rdo rje'i sen mo can

rdo rje rdo rje 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje'i spyan gdangs ba'i stang stabs can/ drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du bsgyur bar snang ba/ sku rdo rje dang baiDU r+yas brgyan ma/ oM b+ha ga pA ti tsun+de druM druM druM druM/ mr-i mr-i/ ru ru/ sru sru ru ru gr-ih+na gr-ih+na A be sha yA/ gr-i hA pa ya

gr-ih+NA ba ya/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ha ra ha ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ba tsa ba tsa/ da ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sdang ba'i gdon dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / gnod

sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / las las skyes pa dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa 'di dag dang / sdang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba thams cad/ sAd+ha ya sAd+ha ya/ marda ya marda ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ tA pa ya tA pa ya/ ut+pa d+ha ya ud+pa d+ha ya/ ha na ha na/ badzre Na sa ra sa ra

daN+De na/ ma ra ma ra/ khaD+ge na hU~M hU~M hU~M/ tsu~M tsu~M tsu~M/ tri tri tri/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de sar+b+ba sA d+ha ya swA hA/ de ni rdo rjes bskul nas su/ /rdo rje dril bu gsil bya zhing / /rdo rje bcing ba bstod par bya/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas oM/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad dang / /'brel ba'i pad+ma bzhag nas su/ /AHzhes bya bar

brgyad kyis brgyan/ /dbus su bsgrub bya bzhag nas su/ /hU~M bzhi yis ni mdzes par bya/ /kham phor kha sbyar nang bcug ste/ /steng du rdo rje 'chang bas mnan/ /sgom zhing gsang sngags bskul tshig gis/ /bzlas brjod dag ni bya ba dang / /ba zhes bya ba'i theg pa yis/ /kun nas kyang ni bkri bar bya/ /

'di ni sku gsum las byung ba'i/ /lha dang mi kun mnan par 'gyur/ /sngags la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /kha dog dmar po rdo rje can/ /'dod chags che dang ldan pa'i gzugs/ /'dod pa'i lha dang lhan cig bsam/ /sku gsum ldan pa mda' thogs shing / /g.yon

pa yis ni gzhu yang gzung / /o~M hU~M bud med spyi bor bsams nas ni/ /'dod pas snying zags dregs bdo ba/ /mdog dmar thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /'dud bzhin du ni mdun bzhag ste/ /rdo rje mda' yis bsnun na ni/ /pad+ma dag las zil pa 'dzag /rdo rje mda' yi sbyor ba yis/ /

'dod chags can ma 'dzag par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor can gyis dbang bya'i phyir/ /'dod chags rdo rje can yang bsgom/ /mi thod las byas cang te'u la/ /spre'u'i pags pas g.yogs nas ni/ /ngos gnyis la ni pad+ma bri/ /bud med khrag gis 'dzag par bya/ /de yi dkyil du breM

bris te/ /mi yi skra yis btags nas ni/ /mthing ril gyi ni rkang rus kyis/ /phreM hU~M ming nas brjod cing brdung / /lam gyi bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos bris/ /grwar ni bu mo zas sbyin ma/ /'gugs par brtson pa'i lcags kyu bya/ /gtso bo

khrag 'thung cha lugs kyi/ /gzugs can gyis ni rting bas brdung / /'dis ni khams gsum rnam gnas pa'i/ /bu mo zas sbyin 'gugs par 'gyur/ /gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan la/ /gnas pa yi ni nga rgyal gyis/ /rnal 'byor 'khor lo rdzogs gyur na/ /tshig gi

rnam pa tsam gyis kyang / /lha dang lha min mi la sogs/ /rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad byed/ /gang tshe dbang nyid la gnas pa/ /de tshe thams cad mngag gzhug 'gyur/ /bltas pa tsam gyis 'chi ba 'am/ /me tsam gyis kyang gcod pa'i mchog /sgyu ma'i ye shes kyis

bskul nas/ /rnal 'byor can gyis glu dang gar/ /ci ltar ci ltar bsgoms byas pa/ /de ltar 'gro ba rab tu byed/ /sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas pa'i/ /me yi lha ni zhal yin pas/ /sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bshad/ /sbyin sreg

gis ni lha rnams tshim/ /tshim par gyur nas dngos grub ster/ /gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa/ /thams cad sbyin sreg dag gis skong / /de phyir sku gsum mkhas mchog gis/ /sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad/ /gtsub shing las ni

byung ba'i me/ /dge ba yi ni las rnams byed/ /gdol pa'am dur khrod las byung ba'i/ /me yis las rnams rab tu sgrub/ /thab khung zlum po gru bzhi pa/ /zla gam dang ni zur gsum pa/ /dkyil 'khor zur gyi kha khyer la/ /rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan/ /

sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rig pas/ /thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni/ /pad+mo steng gnas gtsug tor dang / /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma gzhag /ci ltar rigs par 'dug gnas su/ /lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste/ /dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni/ /blugs

gzar bkang ste de bzhin bsreg /sbyin sreg la dgos g.yas su gzhag /g.yon du chu yi snod dag go/ /las kun byed pa bzlas nas su/ /bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya/ /ku sha'i rtse mos gnon pa yis/ /thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya/ /me ni 'bar

bar shes pa dang / /g.yas pas mi 'jigs mtheb bskyod cing / /gsang sngags 'dis ni cho ga bzhin/ /me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo / /tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po che/ /lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog /bsreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang / /'di nyid du ni

bzhugs su gsol/ /o~M a gA ye/ dI bya dI bya/ A be sha ma hA shri ye/ ha bya ka bya/ ba ha nA ya swA hA/ lag g.yon rdo rje bsang gtor te/ /mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /me yi phyogs nas bod pa ni/ /gsus po che la mig gsum pa/ /gdong bzhi

lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /'od dmar ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ /me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing / /las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan/ /lag pa dang po mchog sbyin la/ /gnyis pa na ni sngags nor phreng / /g.yon na ril pa sbyi blugs te/ /gnyis pa na ni be

con nyid/ /mdog dmar rgyan ni med pa la/ /drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba/ /'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang / /thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol/ /de la sbyin sreg la dgos pa/ /kun nas lan gsum bsreg blugs dbul/ /de

nas 'thor 'thung byas nas su/ /'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya/ /rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya/ /legs par tshim byas bzod gsol te/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab/ /bcum pa rgyal mtshan rdo rje gdugs/ /

pad+ma lcags kyu'i rnam pa dag /me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang / /'khyil ba'i mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag /de nas myur du 'grub 'gyur bas/ /bsgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni/ /o~M zhes pa dang swA hA mthar/ /dbyangs kyi rgyun ni bsring

ba dang / /bar chad med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba mo/ /'byor ba rgyas pa mngon par spel/ /dregs gdong stabs tshul bcas pa dang / /dbang du gyur pas dbang bya'o/ /drag shul spyod tshul la gnas pas/ /hU~M zhes pa dang phaT dang bcas/ /

lus ni me lce 'bar ba dang / /'jig rten gsum po bzar bsams nas/ /bskul ba'i tshig dang spel ba yi/ /gsang sngags yi ge nges par sbyar/ /sngags grub cho ga shes pa yis/ /sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la/ /sna tshogs las dang ldan pa'i lha/ /gang dag

yin par mchod par bya/ /sbyin sreg de nyid kyis bskul cing / /dang po dgang blugs sreg cing dbul/ /phyis ni rim bzhin rnam par spel/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams la/ /dge ba rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya/ /bshang gci khrag rkang rus pa dang / /sha chen dag

kyang sbyin sreg bya/ /ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal/ /mi gtsang ba yis bkang na go/ /ji ltar sdig pa mi skye 'gyur/ /gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang / /sems can mi shes pas rmongs te/ /thams cad shes rab rnams spangs shing / /phyi rol dngos la

mngon zhen pa/ /rnam rtog dra bas blun byas gang / /de dag gis ni dge sdig gi/ /phung po gnyis su rnam par brtags/ /chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dag ste/ /skye ba med cing gnas pa med/ /sems can shes pa spel ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs kyis bstan/ /dam pa'i don

du dge spangs na/ /bsod nams med pa ci zhig smos/ /dper na chus gang chu klung gi/ /pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag /rtswa dang shing la sogs bsdus te/ /chu las rgal ba'i gzings byas na/ /de la 'jus te legs brgal na/ /bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi/ /chos

kyi lam ni bskyed byas kyang / /chos dang chos min rnam spangs nas/ /byang chub bde ba thob pa bzhin/ /de phyir rnam rtog drang spongs la/ /zab mo yi ni chos spel te/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs lam la/ /sngags rig rnam rtog ma byed cig /rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste/ /'khor ba'i rgya

mtshor ltung byed pas/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri med pa'i/ /rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin mnos/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te/ /lus dang ngag dang sems bsdams nas/ /nga'o snyam pa'i gzi bskyed gzugs/ /rnam pa kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa tshe 'di la/ /ye shes

rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /las las byung bar rnam bstan pa'i/ /skyes pa bud med gzugs mang la/ /brnyas pa nyid du mi bya 'dis/ /rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin/ /ngan rtog bzang rtog dra ba yi/ /sems kyi sems can rnams la ni/ /sna tshogs gdung bas sun mi dbyung / /rdo rje sems

ldan dam tshig yin/ /sred pas bskyed rtsub phra ba yis/ /tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing / /mnyan na bde bar byed pa 'di/ /rdo rje ngag can dam tshig yin/ /rnam par snang mdzad cher 'khrugs mchog /sha yi khams la gnas pa yin/ /rkang la mi 'khrugs rgyal po ste/ /khrag la rin

chen 'byung ba gtso/ /sems can rnams kyi rus phung gi/ /rus gong la ni 'od dpag med/ /rtsa yi tshogs rnams rnam 'dren pa/ /thub pa skyes mchog don yod la/ /dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni/ /gsang chen nga yis bstan pa 'di/ /blo ldan rdo rje sems kyis ni/ /rtag tu bsten zhing bsgom

par bya/ /'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin rmongs/ /sred dang de bzhin rnam spel ba'i/ /chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'di/ /thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs/ /bshang gci khu ba mchil ma khrag /'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhis bsdus pa/ /bsgom pa'i blo gros rdzogs pa yis/ /dam tshig bsten

par bya ba ste/ /rtag tu bza' zhing btung bar bya/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba las 'di ni sbyin sreg rim par phye ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i mchog dngos grub 'di bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje gsang sngags bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho gas yang dag par bskul nas rdzas thams cad kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs gsang chen 'di nyon cig /

rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin la/ /gnas shing sku gsung thugs bsgoms te/ /mdun du 'khor lo legs par gzhag /sku gsum rdo rje can gyi gzugs/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /'khor lo'i nang du zhugs gyur par/ /bsgom zhing 'khor lo bsgrub par bya/ /me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /

'khor lo chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /spyan ni bzlas brjod byed bzhin du/ /bla med 'khor lo blang bar bya/ /rgyal chen 'khor lo drug pa dag /'od ni rnam par snang mdzad bzhin/ /lan gsum 'jug pa'i sems can la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /mi 'khrugs par ni rnam bsgom zhing / /rdo rje

mdun du bzhag nas ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bskul na 'dis/ /sku gsum rnam par 'phel 'gyur zhing / /'bar ba'i phreng chen mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /mA ma kI ni zlos bzhin du/ /rdo rje bla med blang bar bya/ /rdo rje rgyal po blangs pa yis/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang

gnyis 'gyur/ /gtso bo chen po sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpas yongs bskor nas/ /sems can kun sems la gnas pa'i/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / /'jig rten khams su rnam rgyu zhing / /kun gyi bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed/ /rin chen 'byung ba bsgoms na ni/ /

rin po che ni mdun bzhag ste/ /sbyor ba'i rim pas rnam spel na/ /rin chen chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /rin chen sgrol ma zlos bzhin du/ /'od bzang gzi brjid 'bar ba can/ /phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yi/ /nor bu'i rgyal po blang bar bya/ /lha rdzas nor bu blangs pa yis/ /rin

chen 'byung ba gnyis par 'gyur/ /de ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin/ /rin chen char pa rab 'bebs shing / /sems can kun gyi dbul ba 'joms/ /gtso bo yid bzhin nor bu can/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par rgyu/ /'od dpag med par rnam bsgoms nas/ /pad+ma chen

po mdun bzhag ste/ /rim bzhin gzi brjid gzengs bstod na/ /'dab ma bye bas rnam brgyan pa/ /'od bzang gser ltar 'bar ba can/ /pad+ma chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /gos dkar can ma'i gsang sngags kyis/ /yid las byung ba'i pad+ma blang / /pad+ma'i rgyal po blangs pa yis/ /'od dpag med

pa gnyis par 'gyur/ /chos mdzad rnams kyis thog 'dren cing / /sems can rnams la bdud rtsi stsol/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang byed gtso/ /bde ba can gyi rgyan du 'gyur/ /don yod grub pa rnam bsgoms nas/ /ral gri mdun du rnam bzhag ste/ /rnal 'byor rim pa 'di yis ni/ /bsgom pa de nyid kyis

bskul na/ /rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu'i 'od/ /ral gri chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /sgrol ma'i gsang sngags zlos bzhin du/ /ral gri bla med blang bar bya/ /de nas ral gri mchog blangs nas/ /don yod grub pa gnyis par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rnam rgyu zhing / /sems can rnams kyi mi shes gcod/ /

rtag tu dri med snang gyur te/ /chu yi nang gi ston zla bzhin/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub bstan nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya/ /rnal 'byor che la rnam gnas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo che/ /zhe sdang rigs ni 'dren mdzad ma/ /rdo rje gdan can mA ma kI/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i lha mo dang / /lha mo 'gro ba

dbang mdzad ma/ /mkha' la longs spyod spyod mdzad ma/ /rim pa bzhin du nga yis bshad/ /de nas bu mo mig yangs ma/ /lo ni bcu drug lon pa la/ /gzugs dang mdangs dang lang tshor ldan/ /gser gyi rna cha g.yo ba can/ /gcig cig bsgrims te btsal nas su/ /lha mo byi dor legs byas te/ /

rigs lnga yi ni tshogs can ma/ /las kyi rjes su bsgoms byas nas/ /bzhag ste sprad pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /pad+ma la ni rdo rje gzhag /sprad pa dang ni 'khyud pa yis/ /rdo rje dang ni pad+ma bskul/ /gar gyi tshul du gyur pa dang / /de bzhin spro dang bsdu ba yi/ /mod la sgyu ma'i dregs myos nas/ /rdo rje las ni

bdud rtsi 'byung / /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i shes rab las/ /pad+ma la gnas bdud rtsi btung / /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i kha yis ni/ /'thungs pas de bzhin gshegs lnga yi/ /sku ni yongs su 'gyur ba 'thob/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos kun la/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'phel/ /'di ni sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku yi snying po sgrub pa ste/ /'dod lnga'i yon tan rjes 'jug pa'i/ /byang chub bde bas bsgrubs na ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma byin brlabs nas/ /rjes su chags pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /grub chen gsang ba'i dngos grub ni/ /sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba'i thabs/ /rjes su chags pas bde

ba yi/ /rdo rje theg pas mnyes par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i khyad par 'di yis ni/ /lan gsum 'jug pa'i gsang sngags dang / /lam gyi phyag rgya ngas bshad do/ /de dag lag pa'i phyag rgya dag /ye shes phyag rgya rab bskul bas/ /dam tshig mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /thub chen sna

tshogs gzugs mnga' ba/ /sna tshogs phrin las mdzad par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje khams gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang / thugs las phyung ngo / /sa ni spyan du brjod pa ste/ /chu khams mA ma kI zhes bshad/ /sgrol ma rlung zhes kun tu brjod/ /

gos dkar can ma me ru bsgrags/ /rdo rje dam tshig nam mkha'i dbyings/ /ston pa rdo rje 'chang bas bshad/ /ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa'i dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon

de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ci ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis 'di ni rdo rje'i byang chub kyi sems su blta bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang

chub kyi sems dang rdo rje slob dpon 'di gnyis gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar nas rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus nas yang bshad par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i bar de dag thams cad dus gsum du byon

nas/ slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pas mngon par mchod nas 'di skad ces bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha yin no/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma yin no/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa yin

no/ /zhes rdo rje'i yi ge gsum phyung nas slar yang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dper na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i bar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bsod nams kyi phung

po bas ni rdo rje slob dpon de'i spu'i khung bu gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po ches khyad par du 'phags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'i bar nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no/ /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'jigs shing skrag pa'i yid kyis cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad

rnams rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bos nas shes ldan byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyon cig /phyogs bcu dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams

rdo rje slob dpon gyi drung du byon nas mchod par mdzad cing phyag 'tshal bar brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de nyid ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdag po yin

pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i sku dang

gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsum ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang yid la gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gsol pa/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba gang la gnas/ nam mkha' la gnas so/ /nam mkha' gang la gnas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi sems

la gnas so/ /sems gang la gnas/ gang du yang ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /dkyil 'khor dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya dang / stang stabs dang / 'dug stangs dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod pa dang las la sbyar

ba dang slar bsdu ba rnams ni gsang sngags kyi tshul de kho na nyid bcu yin par gsungs so/ /dus gsum du 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thugs rje'i ro gcig pa rnams kyi gsang ba dang / gsang chen dang / ye shes rnam pa gsum gyi snying po bstan pa dag ni slob dpon gyi kha nas bla ma la gus pa'i slob mas shes par bya'o/ /bla mas dam tshig

ci ltar lta ba bzhin gyi dbang du byas nas bshad par bya'o/ /bsgrims nas sems can rnams la rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po dang / lhag pa'i rnal 'byor rnams bzhin bshad par bya'o/ /'di mtha' dag ni rgyud thams cad kyi spyir shes par bya'o/ /de kho na nyid kyi dngos po mtha' dag yongs su mi

shes par gsang sngags smra ba nga yin no zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'chad par byed na dam tshig thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig las nyams na bdud kyis gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu shi nas dmyal ba'i gnas mi bzod pa chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /

sems can rnams la brten te byang chub thob par 'gyur bas sems can la bslu bar mi bya'o/ /zhes shes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam de nyid la sems can de dag sbyar bar bya'o/ /gang zhig 'di la brtson par ma byas pa de dag gis ni lag pa dang rkang pa dang / mig sbyin pa'i dka' ba

spyad pa dang / dka' thub ci lta bus kyang sdig pa gzhom pa'am/ bdud rtsi'i ro thob par mi nus so/ /rnal 'byor gcig khong du chud nas dben par song ste/ bsgom pa byas na sdig pa las grol zhing tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams dang / chos bdag med par bsgoms pas thams cad

mkhyen pa'i rnal 'byor khong du chud par bya'o/ /shes rab dang ye shes kyi 'jo tshul gyis gsang ba lnga'i bdag nyid kyi gtso bo la mchod par bya'o/ /dngos po thams cad dngos med par/ /bzhi bcu'i don ni rtog pa dang / /rdo rje pad+mas dbang bskur bas/ /bdud rtsi lngas ni dga' bar byed/ /gsang bar bya

ba'i chos gsang ba/ /gsang zhing sbas te gzhag par bya/ /'dod yon lnga yi rnam pa ni/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya sogs/ /rnal 'byor sems dpa' spyad bya zhing / /de bzhin bza' dang btung byas na/ /bltas dang khu tshur rnam pa yis/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba

las cho ga thams cad bstan pa rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la

mngon par bstod do// //rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba theg pa chen po'i yang theg pa chen po'i tshul zab mo gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba chen po rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lots+tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAk+tsit+ti kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa

dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo thams cad kyi b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs te/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / phra mo rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / phrag

dog rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / zhe sdang rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / tho ba gshin rje'i gshed dang / dbyug pa gshin rje'i gshed dang / pad+ma gshin rje'i gshed dang / ral gri gshin rje'i gshed dang / mtshams rnams su rdo rje tsa rtsi kA dang / rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbyangs can

ma dang / rdo rje gau rI ma rnams mtshams su'o/ /de dag la sogs te gshin rje'i gshed kyi tshogs chen po dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las nges par bton to/ /zla ba rdo rje sbyor ba yis/ /gshin rje mthar byed bsgom par bya/ /bdud rnams zhi bar bya phyir dang / /zhe

sdang thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/ /'od zer lnga yis 'khrigs pa yis/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i don du bsgom/ /phyi mtshams rdo rje sa gzhi dang / /ra ba dra ba de bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa po bdud 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

nas gti mug rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams la nges par phyung ba/ dbus su ya dang k+She ma med yats+tsha ni rA dzA sa do ru Na yo ni ra'o/ /ya sogs yi ge dang po las/ /gshin rje'i gshed du gyur pa yin/ /yi ge k+She ni gti

mug brjod/ /yi ge ma ni phra mar gsungs/ /yi ge me ni 'dod chags nyid/ /yi ge da ni phrag dog 'gyur/ /gshin rje'i gshed sogs lnga ru grags/ /yi ge ya las tho bar 'gyur/ /yi ge ts+tsha las dbyug pa'i gtso/ /lag na pad+ma ni yig las/ /lag na

ral gri rA las yin/ /dza las tsartsi kA zhes brjod/ /yi ge sa las phag gdong ma/ /yi ge do las dbyangs can bsgrags/ /yi ge ru las gau rI dran/ /Na yo ni ra mtshams kyi bzhi/ /thod pa bzhi ru 'dod pa yin/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs rung ba/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil

du bsam/ /de dkyil bzhugs pa gshin rje'i gshed/ /gnag cing 'bar ba bsgom par bya/ /shar du gti mug rdo rje ste/ /lho ru de bzhin phra ma yin/ /nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ste/ /de bzhin byang du phrag dog go/ /mtshams kyi rdo rje rtse bzhi la/ /tsartsi kA sogs rnam

par bsgom/ /sgo yi rdo rje rtse bzhi la/ /tho ba la sogs rnam par bsgom/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru/ /mi yi mgo bo bzhi dag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gshin rje'i gshed po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs nas zhe sdang chen po'i rigs kyi sngags gsungs pa/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-itA nan hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje chen po'i sngas gsungs pa/ oM dzi ni dzI ka /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
