dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin/ /ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon la/ /dbyangs yig drug pa dang ldan la/ /spyi bo ru ni thig les brgyan/ /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa yi ni dang po'o/ /'di ni ma he gdong can gyi/ /snying po'i

sngags su rab tu grags/ /yi ge re re 'bum bzlas na/ /'jig rten gsum gyi las ni gang / /ci yang rung ba thams cad byed/ /sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i dus 'dir mchod par bya'o/ /'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen

po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las sngags btu ba bstan pa'i rtog pa ste gsum pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa yang dag par bshad de/ chos thams cad la bdag med pa sngon du 'gro bas lhar dmigs par bya ste/ dang por re zhig rang bzhin

gyis dag pa'i sngags brjod pas/ chos thams cad bdag med pa'i ngo bor byas nas nam mkha'i dkyil du ya~M gi rnam pa las grub pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor mdog du ba'i rnam pa bsam mo/ de'i steng du dang po'i dbyangs yig las gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

dmigs te/ de'i steng du d+hIH'i rnam pa las 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i gzugs su gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /der a'i rnam pa las grub pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de

bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rig pa'i lha mo dang khro bo la sogs pa shin tu bskul te/ yang 'ongs nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa de rnams gcig tu gyur

nas/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsam par bya'o/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i rnam pas dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar khyab par gsal bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du hU~M mdog nag po 'od zer lnga dang yang dag par ldan par bsam ste/ hU~M de las 'od zer gyi rnam par 'phros pas

sngon du gsungs pa bzhin du yang zhugs te/ yi ge de las rdo rje chen po rnam par gdengs pa kha dog nag po 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa rnam par dmigs par bya ste/ rdo rje de las phra mo'i rnam pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo dang rig pa'i lha mos nam

mkha' til gyi gang bu ltar gang ba nyi ma la gnas pa rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis ni sems can yongs su smin par btul nas byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ yang de nyid lhan cig tu bsdus nas rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan la

rab tu zhugs par bsam mo/ /rdo rje'i gzugs de nyid zhal dgu pa/ ma he'i gdong can 'jig pa'i dus kyi me ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po khams gsum za bar nus pa/ zhal gtsigs pa/ ha ha zhes ljags 'dril ba/ rnam par gtsigs

pa'i khro gnyer 'jigs pa/ khro gnyer gyi 'gram nas smin ma dang spyan 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar khro ba sgra sgrogs pa/ mi'i khrag dang tshil dang zhag dang rkang za ba/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha la sogs pa la sdigs mdzub byed pa/ brgya byin

dang tshangs pa dang dbang phyug chen po dang khyab 'jug dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa za ba/ thod pa gtsigs pa'i rtse mo 'jigs su rung ba'i thod pas thong byas pa/ 'jigs pa chen po can/ phaT ces sgra sgrogs shing thod pa'i 'phyang 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa

zhabs bcu drug pa/ gcer bu'i gzugs mtshan ma gyen du 'greng ba/ g.yon brkyang ba/ gsus pa che ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/ pheM ces sgra sgrogs pa/ phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa/ glang po che'i pags pa

rlon pa 'dzin pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po/ ma he'i gdong can rnam par bsam par bya ste/ de ltar shin tu bsam pa brtan par byas te/ de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba la shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya ste/ g.yas dang po

gri gug /gnyis pa na mtshon rtse gcig pa/ gsum pa na gtun shing / bzhi pa na chu gri/ lnga pa na rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ drug pa na sta re/ bdun pa na mdung thung / brgyad pa na mda'/ dgu pa na lcags kyu/ bcu pa na dbyig tho/ bcu

gcig pa na kha T+wA~M ga /bcu gnyis pa na 'khor lo/ bcu gsum pa na rdo rje/ bcu bzhi pa na rdo rje tho ba/ lnga pa na ral gri/ bcu drug pa na cang te'u'o/ /g.yon pa'i dang po na thod pa/ gnyis pa na mgo bo /gsum pa na phub/ bzhi pa na rkang pa/

lnga pa na zhags pa/ drug pa na gzhu/ bdun pa na rgyu ma/ brgyad pa na dril bu/ dgu pa na lag pa/ bcu pa na dur khrod kyi ras/ bcu gcig pa na skyes bu gsal shing la btsugs pa/ bcu gnyis pa na me thab/ bcu gsum pa na thod tshal/ bcu

bzhi pas sdigs mdzub/ lnga pa na 'phan rtse gsum pa/ bcu drug pa na rlung gis phyar ba'i dur khrod kyi ras/ phyag gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas pa'i dang pos mi/ gnyis pas ma he/ gsum pas glang /

bzhi pas bong bu/ lnga pas rnga mo/ drug pas khyi/ bdun pas lug /brgyad pas wa/ zhabs g.yas pas 'di dag la zhon pa'o/ /zhabs g.yon pa'i dang pos bya rgod/ gnyis pas 'ug pa/ gsum pas bya rog /bzhi pas ne tso/ lnga pas

khra/ drug pas khyung chen po/ bdun pas ri skegs/ brgyad pas bzhad/ zhabs g.yon pas 'di dag mnan pa'o/ /dpal 'jigs byed chen po'i dang po'i zhal ni rab tu gnag pa ma he'i rnam pa shin tu khros pa can/ rwa g.yas kyi zhal gsum la dang po sngon po/

gnyis pa dmar po/ gsum pa ser po ste/ mnga' bdag gi zhal gsum shin tu khros pa/ rwa g.yon par zhal gsum la/ dang po dkar po/ gnyis pa dud kha/ gsum pa nag po rab tu khros pa/ gtsigs pa'i zhal rab tu bsam par bya'o/ /

rwa gnyis kyi bar du dbus kyi zhal dmar po rab tu 'jigs pa zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa bsam par bya'o/ /steng du 'jam dpal gyi zhal cung zad ser ba yud tsam khro ba byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spyi bor ral pa lnga dang ldan pa rnam par bsams te/ zhal rnams

thams cad spyan gsum par bsgom ste/ 'di ltar bdag nyid rtag tu rtse gcig tu dmigs so/ /de nyid dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can de bdag nyid yin par bsgoms nas/ dpa' bo'i gnas la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas de nas phyi nas sngags bzla

bar bya ste/ bzlas pa'i dus su rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/ de'i steng du rang gi sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya'o/ /'bar ba dang phyi nas ma yengs pa'i yid kyis bzlas pa bya'o/ /sbyor ba 'di la gnas pa'i sngags pa yis/ /rtag tu

'jigs byed las kun bya/ /dur khrod gnas la bsgom bya zhing / /rtag tu bdud rtsi lnga rnams bza'/ /de yis bsgrub las bsgrub gzhan med/ /gzhan yang mar me che za zhing / /mtshan mo rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sum 'bum rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas

bya/ /'di zlos pa yi sngags pa yis/ /thams cad las ni byed par 'gyur/ /'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud las bsgom pa'i rtog pa ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas dpal 'jigs byed chen pos bstan pa'i bris

sku'i cho ga rab tu gsungs pa/ dpa' bo'i ras sam/ ro la bkab pa'i ras sam/ me tog can gyi ras sam/ bu skyes pa'i ras sam/ de ma rnyed na/ ras gang yang rung ba la/ ri mo mkhan bzang po rnam rtog med pa/ mi khro ba/ gtsang ba/

mkhas pa/ yid gzhungs pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ brtse ba can/ sred pa dang bral ba/ 'di ltar yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /de lta bu'i ri mo mkhan gyi lag pas dpa' bo'i ras la bri bar bya'o/ /gal te dngos grub 'dod pas dpa' bo'i yon sbyin no/ /de

la cho ga ni gsang ba'i gnas su gnas la/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bri bar bya ste/ ri mo mkhan dang sgrub pa pos mthong ba las/ 'jig rten pa gzhan gyis mi mthong bar bri bar bya ste/ zhabs bcu drug pa/ phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi pa/

zhal dgu pa/ gcer bu kha dog nag po g.yon brkyang ba/ 'jigs pa chen po yang 'jigs par byed pa'i rnam pa can/ mtshan ma gyen du 'greng ba'i thang ka bri bar bya'o/ /zhal dang po ma he/ rwa'i g.yas su zhal gsum pa ste/ sngon po dang / dmar

po dang ser po shin tu khros pa bri bar bya'o/ /g.yon du dkar po dang / dud kha dang / nag po'o/ /de gnyis kyi dbus su rab tu dmar ba bri bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du 'jam dpal gyi zhal ser po cung zad khro ba bri bar bya'o/ /phyag g.yas par gri gug dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /

gtun shing dang / chu gri dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / sta re dang / mdung dang / mda' dang / lcags kyu dang / dbyig tho dang / kha T+wA~M ga dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje tho ba dang / ral gri dang / cang te'u'o/ /phyag g.yon

pa na thod pa dang / mgo bo dang / phub dang / rkang pa dang / zhags pa dang / gzhu dang / rgyu ma dang / dril bu dang / lag pa dang / dur khrod kyi ras dang / skyes bu gsal shing gis phug pa dang / me thab dang / thod tshal dang / sdigs mdzub dang / 'phan rtse

gsum pa dang / rlung gis bskyod pa'i ras so/ /phyag gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa bri'o/ /zhabs g.yas pas mi dang / ma he dang / glang dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / khyi dang / lug dang / wa rnams so/ /zhabs g.yon

pas bya rgod dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / ne tso dang / khra dang / bya chen dang / ri skegs dang / bzhad rnams so/ 'di lta bur 'dug pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po bri bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dur khrod chen po yang bri bar bya'o/ /'jigs

pa chen po byed pa/ srin po dang / zhing skyong ba dang / ro langs dang ldan pa skyes bu mdung rtser btsugs pa'i gzugs der mthong bar bya'o/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i shing dag gi steng du skyes bu 'phyang ba bri bar bya/ skyes bu bsregs bzhin pa yang bri/ mdung gis phug pa'i skyes bu yang

bri/ bya sna tshogs dang / bya rog dang / khyi dang / ce spyang dag ha ha 'byin pa bri/ sgrub pa po rnams kyang bri ste/ bcom ldan 'das la rtse gcig tu lta ba gcer bu skra bshig pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ cang te'u dang / thod pa dang / kha twA~M ga 'dzin pa/ thod pas

spyi bor brgyan pa dgod cing dur khrod der 'jug pa bri/ 'di ni gsang ba'i bris sku ste/ gnas gcig tu legs par gzhag la sha chen gyi spos dbul/ de'i mdun du dung chen gyi phreng bas bzlas pa bya/ sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pas dus gsum du 'bad

la bris sku bsrung ngo / /gzhan gang yang mi gzhag go gzhan gang gi mdun du yang mi dgram mo/ /klog pa dang / btung ba dang / bza' ba dang / ston mo ni sha chen rtag tu mtshan ma bza'o/ /gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod na dus gsum du rnam par

snang mdzad dang khrag gi spos bris sku'i mdun du dbul lo/ /'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po rnal 'byor kyi rgyud las bris sku'i cho ga'i rtog pa ste lnga pa'o// //de nas sbyin sreg gi las kyi cho ga gsungs pa/ ji ltar sngon

gyi rim pa ste/ dang por re zhig sngags pa dben pa'i gnas su phyin la/ mtshan phyed na sbyin sreg gi las kun byas te/ gong du gsungs pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas las thams cad bya'o/ /de la las ni 'di rnams yin no/ /gal te gsad

par 'dod na der mi'i rus pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / bong bu'i sbangs dang / khyi'i sbangs dang / tsher ma dang / skra dang / sen mo dang / de dag thams cad tsha ba'i mar khus sbrus la/ ma he'i zhal gyi sbyor bas shin tu mnyam par gzhag la/

kha lhor bltas te ro bsregs pa'i me la gong gi ming dang bcas par brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na the tshom med par de zhag gsum gyis 'chi'o/ /yang na phyogs gcig tu gnas la me thab gru gsum byas nas/ der sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas kyis

gtum po'i me la sbyin sreg bya ste/ sbyor ba des ni las de nyid 'grub bo/ /de nas dbral bar 'dod na bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / rma bya dang / sbrul dang / skra dang / 'bras phub dang / ma he dang / rta'i sha dang / lhan cig tu gang gi ming dang bcas par yi ge bcu pa'i

sngags kyis dur khrod kyi me la bsregs na des 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na dur khrod kyi shing la gtum po'i me rab tu sbar la khyim du gnas te/ gong gi rdzas de bsregs na/ rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang nyi ma bdun gyis 'bral lo/ /de nas bskrad par 'dod na bya rog

gi sha dang / rnga mo'i rtug pa dang lhan cig tu chang dang yang dag par ldan pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dur khrod kyi shing la me rab tu sbar la/ gcer bu skra bshig par bsgyur nas/ kha lho phyogs su bltas te/ gshin rje'i sngags kyis che ge mo'i ming dang bcas

par lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg stong byas na skrod pa las gzhan du ma yin no/ /de nas rengs par 'dod na/ ba bla dang / yung ba dang / ldong ros dang / gi wang dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la kha byang du bltas te las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sbyor

ba dmigs nas/ gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg byas na/ de nyi ma bdun gyis rengs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas grong bskrad par 'dod na/ ni ma pa'i shing la me rab tu sbar la/ khyi'i sha dang / sbal pa'i sha dang / khyim bya'i sha dang / rnga mo'i rtug

pa dang / byi la'i khrag gcig tu sbrus la/ gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas/ grong gi ming dang bcas par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu byas na grong skrod par 'gyur ro/ /las de rnams ni shin tu yang mnyam

par bzhag pas bya ste/ gzhan du na sngags pa rang nyid la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gang la yang mi bstan no/ /de nas bu mo rengs par 'dod na/ tsher ma dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang bcas par rang gi khrag gis sbrus nas/ yi ge bcu pa'i sngags dang

bcas par bu mo rengs par gyur cig ces dur khrod kyi me la sbyin sreg stong byas na rengs pa las gzhan ma yin no/ /de nas zhi bar bya bar 'dod na/ mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma dang / dUr ba dang bcas par ba la sha'i shing la me rab tu sbar na zhi bar 'dod

par dmigs nas yul gyi shar phyogs su kha bltas te gnas pas dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na des yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyas par 'dod na/ til dang / 'bras dang / nas dang / mar dang bcas pas u dum bA ra'i shing la

me rab tu sbar na las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lha'i sbyor ba dmigs te/ kha byang du bltas nas mnyam par bzhag pas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong byas na rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dgug par 'dod na ske tshes gzugs brnyan byas la/ de

nas seng ldeng gi me'i dbus su gshin rje'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na ma grub pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma bdun gyis gang 'dod pa the tshom med par 'gugs so/ /de nas smyo bar bya bar 'dod na/ bya rgod chen po'i tshang dang / sha chen bsregs

na smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /de phub ma'i me la bsregs na bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /de nas nor nor ma yin par bya bar 'dod na/ ras bal gyi me la d+ha du ra'i 'bras bu bcas par mtshan mo yi ge bcu pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na shin tu chud zos par 'gyur ro/ /

a ru ra bsregs na slar rdzas de nyid du 'gyur ro/ /rje btsun gyi mdun du sha chen chang dang bcas pa zla ba drug tu mtshan mo sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na yul thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /ba lang gi sha dang khrag tu bcas par gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg

stong byas na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bran du gnas par the tshom med do/ /khyi sha rdo rje'i chu dang bcas par skyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis mtshan mo gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bdag nyid kyi nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /

rta'i sha rnam par snang mdzad dang bcas pa gshin rje'i gshed kyi sngags kyis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad gnas gcig tu gnas la/ mtshan mo rgyal po la dmigs nas byas na zhag bdun gyis 'khor dag bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /glang po'i sha khu ba dang bcas pas

mi'i 'jig rten kun la dmigs la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis mtshan mo sbyin sreg stong byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nya dang / sha dang / chang dang bcas pas 'jigs pa med par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bud med

thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bskrad par 'dod na/ bya rog gi sha ma 'dres par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg stong byas na nyi ma bdun gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang rab tu 'bros na phra mo'i mi lta ci smos/ de nas bya rog gi

tshang dang 'bras kyi phub ma dang lhan cig tu d+ha du ra'i shing la me rab tu sbar nas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags gang gi ming dang bcas par nam phyed na sbyin sreg byas na/ nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ seng ldeng gi me la til dang 'bras dang

bud med kyi me tog dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i chu dang bsres te/ rnal 'byor gyi gzugs dmar po dmigs nas kha nub tu bltas te/ yi ge bcu pa gang gi ming dang bcas par sngags pas bsregs na/ nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'dus te/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi

'bral lo/ /de nas 'gugs par 'dod na/ bdud rtsi lnga mar dang bcas par seng ldeng gi me la gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na de skad cig gis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'di rnams ni sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i sngags pas bya'o/ /gzhan

pas byas na sngags pa 'jig rten pas dpyas par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bye brag mi bya ste/ gang la yang bre brag sbyin par mi bya'o/ /bye brag phye na sngags pas dngos grub mi 'grub bo/ /ngas rgyud gzhan las kyang bshad de/ /ji ltar bye brag ma skyes pa/ /

de bzhin bya ba'i bye brag smras/ /rdo rje sems dpas kyang mi 'grub/ /gang gi mdun du'ang sngags pa yis/ /de phyir las rnams mthong mi bya/ /gzhan du'ang lhan cig tu mi bya/ /gal te sngags pas las bya 'dod/ /de dag gcig pu zhig gis bya/ /

sngags pa de yis las kun byed/ /'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las sbyin sreg gi las kyi cho ga rgya che ba'i rtog pa ste drug pa'o// //de nas bsam gtan gyi las kyi cho ga ji lta bu yang dag par

gsungs te/ bsam gtan dang sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba las dgos pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub par bya ste/ de'i cho ga'i dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i sngon du sbyang ba byas pas las thams cad bya'o/ /re pha las yongs su gyur pa'i

me'i dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar 'bar bar rnam par bsams la/ de'i steng du bsgrub bya gcer bu skra bshig pa/ bred par gyur pa bdag gi mdun du rnam par bsam mo/ /de nas rang gi lus las khro bo'i gzugs mang po rnam par spros te/ khro bo de rnams kyis ral

gri btab cing khrag 'thung bar bsam par bya'o/ /bsgrub bya de'i sha za ba dang / rgyu ma drangs par bsam par bya'o/ /'di skad smra bar bya ste/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa dang / bla ma la skur pa 'debs pa la rgyob cig rgyob cig /sod cig

sod cig bsams pa tsam gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa yang zhag bdun gyi 'chi na phra mo'i srog chags gzhan lta ci smos/ de nas gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ba ni ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba'i nga rgyal la gnas te las thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /me'i

dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgrub bya ngu bar bsams la/ de'i mdun du srin po mang po bsam par bya ste/ srin po de dag tha dad pa'i lus can ma rungs pa/ shin tu gtum par sha za ba dang / khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /gzhan

yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya rnams te/ bya rgod dag dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / wa rnams dang / khyi rnams kyis sha za ba dang / khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam par bya ste/ bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas the tshom med par 'chi'o/ /dpag tshad brgyan

gnas pa'i skyes bu yang sems kyis bzung bas bsam gtan brtsam mo/ /sngags pas bsam gtan brtan par bya'o/ /de nas dbral bar 'dod na ma he'i snying gar bsgrub bya bsam par bya ste/ bsgrub bya gzhan rta'i snying gar rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /rta dang

ma he gnyis phan tshun 'thab par byed par bsam ste/ ji srid du rta dang ma he gnyis phye bar ma gyur gyi bar du'o/ /phyi nas bsgrub bya de gnyis/ rab tu mi mdza' bar bsam par bya ste/ bsams pa tsam gyis nyi ma bdun gyis nges par 'thab par 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma

yin no/ /de nas bskrad par 'dod na de ru ya~M las yongs su gyur ba'i rnga mo bsam par bya ste/ ya~M de'i rgyab tu ya~M gi rnam pa las gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i steng du bsgrub bya gcer bu skra bshig pa/ bred par gyur par

bsam par bya ste/ ma he'i gdong can gyi sbyor ba la gnas pas de'i rgyab tu gshin rje'i gzugs lag pa g.yas pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa skra bsil ba rnam par bsam par bya ste/ rnga mo de kha lhor bstan la gtang ngo / /de'i ming dang bcas par gshin rje'i sngags brjod pas

rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor pas 'di bsams pa tsam gyis zhag bdun na 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yang skrod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba ni bya rog gam/ bya rgod kyi rgyab tu bsgrub bya skra grol ba gcer bu rnam par bsam mo/ /de'i

rgyab tu gshin rje rnam par bsam par bya ste/ lag pa tho ba thogs pa bsgrub bya'i skra bzung ba de la ma he'i gdong can gyis bka' bsgo ste/ kha lho ru bltas nas song bar bsam par bya ste/ rtse gcig pa'i sbyor bas bsam par byas na/ rtse gcig pa'i sbyor ba des zhag

bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'gugs par byed par 'dod na yi ge ya~M las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du a las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du gshin rje'i gzugs lcags kyu dang zhags pa lag tu thogs pa rnam par bsam mo/ /

ma he'i gdong pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas de la bka' bsgo ba/ gshin rje song la yul che ge mo nas bu mo che ge mo myur bar khug cig /de skad bskul bas ya~M gi rnam par bskyod de song bar rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba la gnas pa'i

sngags pas khams gsum du gtogs pa'i bud med bkug la rol par bya'o/ /ji ltar bsam pa brtan par gyur na 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas de dag bya'i gzhan gyis mi bya'o/ /de nas sbrul gyis zin pa blang ba'i rab tu byed pa gsungs te/ rang gi snying gar pad+ma dkar

po 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsam mo/ /de'i steng du dbyangs yig gsum pa 'dab mar phaT brgyad rnam par bsam mo/ /de yis ni 'og gi klu'i gzugs rnam par bsam par bya ste/ de'i spyi bor yi ge i kha dog dkar po las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bsam par bya'o/ /klu

de'i mig rnams nas bdud rtsi 'phros nas bsgrub bya de'i lus la thim par bsam par bya ste/ bsam gtan 'di'i sbyor bas khams gsum yongs su gang ba'i dug kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /dug khur stong yang za nus so/ /de nas zhu ba'i bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba

'byung ste/ bsgrub bya mdun du bsam ste/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la yi ge ya~M las gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ de'i steng du gsang ba'i gnas su me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po raM gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o/ /de'i steng du snying

gar sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa mdog ser po la~M gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o/ /de'i steg du dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su yi ge ba~M mgo thur du gnas pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag par

bsam ste/ 'di ni legs par rnam par bsams nas rlung gis me rab tu sbar te/ me des dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsregs par rnam par bsam/ dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi drod kyis bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor de zhu bar bsam par bya'o/ /'di yi sbyor ba

tsam gyis ni/ /de yi bud med zhu 'gyur te/ /'o ma yi ni shing bzhin du/ /zhu bar byed par the tshom med/ /de nas rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod na sngags pa ma he'i gdong can gyi rnal 'byor la rab tu gnas la/ de nyid mdog dmar por bsams

te/ bsgrub bya gang du gnas pa de'i steng du gnas la/ phyi nas rang gi lus 'jam dpal mdog dmar po phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa can phyung ste/ 'jam dpal des bsgrub bya'i snying ga dang mgrin pa bcings nas bkug par bsams te/ 'jam dpal gyi sku la

rab tu gzhug go/ /bsgrub bya de myos par bsam par bya ste/ de'i snying gar yi ge bcu pa'i sngags rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /yang kha dog dmar po sgrub ba pos ye shes kyi gzugs kyis yi ge la gzhug par bya'o/ /de dang bsgrub bya gcig tu gyur par bya'o/ /bsam

gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas nyi ma bdun gyis 'khor los sgyur ba yang dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du the tshom med do/ /rab tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sngags pas mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan gyis bya'o/ /rgyud gang la yang mi sbyin no/ /gal te sngags kyang mi

bstan/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyi bsam gtan gang la yang mi sbyin/ smra bar yang mi bya/ sngags kyi dbye ba yang mi bya/ bris sku yang gang gi mdun du yang mi dgram ste/ thang ka yang gsang bar gzhag go/ /rgyud 'di rab tu sbyor ba dang / /

bzlas pa dang / smra ba gzhan su la yang 'ga' tsam yang mi smra/ gal te smras na dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis za'o/ /dam tshig nyams par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sngags pas su la

yang mi sbyin no/ /de nas dam tshig mnyam pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / dam pa'i brtul zhugs can dpa' bo bla ma la gus pa dul ba can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la nges par 'dzin pa/ rgyud sbas pa/ mi khro ba snying rje dang ldan pa/ bzlas

pa dang bsam gtan la phyogs pa/ rnam par smin pa la 'jom pa/ 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can ni slob ma bzang po ste/ dkyil 'khor dam pa dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po la mchog tu gus pa/ snying rje chen pos yid brlan pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/

mchog tu bla ma la gus pa/ rab tu brtag pa la shin tu rnam par bsams te/ bla mas de lta bu'i slob ma la dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud sbyin no/ /sngags pas gzhan la byin na de dang slob mar bcas nas dmyal bar 'gro bar the tshom med do/ /'jig

rten 'dir ni 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pha rol tu ni dmyal bar 'gro'o/ /dam tshig kyang nyams par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las bsam gtan gyi las bsgrub pa

brtag pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o// //dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud 'bum pa nas btus nas phyung ba rtog pa'i phyogs bklags pas 'grub pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i rtog pa rdzogs

so// //dpal o D+yan gyi gnas chen po nas dpal 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po zhes bya ba/ bla ma dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon dpal lA li ta badzras bton nas mdzad pa rdzogs

so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa bA ro phyag rdum gyi zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// //@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI kri Sh+Na ya mA

ri ta n+t+ra rA dza tri kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rtog pa gsum pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje'i gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don dam chos sku zhi ba nyid/ /gang 'dir khams gsum rnam rgyal te/ /

gshin rje'i dgra zhes grags pa yi/ /'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga bshad/ /yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du bsnyen byas nas/ /dur khrod dben pa la sogs par/ /maN+Dal khru do'i tshad du bya/ /dri dang ba yi rnam lnga dang / /nyi zla sogs pas

byi dor bya/ /ba lang la sogs dam rdzas lnga/ /gzhan yang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / /phyi nang mchod pa'i bye brag gis/ /legs par mchod pa byas nas ni/ /'khor lo bri dang btu ba dang / /drang dang bsre dang spo ba brtsam/ /sngags pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /

lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te/ /dam tshig rjes su dran pa yis/ /o~M badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dran byed cing / /'khor lo bri ba brtsam par bya/ /dbus nas sor tshad bcu drug par/ /kun nas zlum por bskor ba ni/ /'di ni nang gi 'khor

lo ste/ /rim pa gsum du bskor ba la/ /sgo med lcags mkhar bcu drug bya/ /'di ni gshin rje'i grong khyer te/ /srid pa gsum gyi 'jug sa yin/ /de yi phyi rim mu khyud gsum/ /kun tu lcags ris bskor ba ste/ /mu khyud de dag re re la'ang / /khang

pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mdzes/ /'gro ba chos bzhin spyod pa yi/ /'khor lo 'di ltar bris nas ni/ /phyi rim mu khyud tha ma la/ /yi ge ka sogs da yig mtha'/ /nga nya bsal nas dgod par bya/ /yi ge d+ha sogs k+ShaHyig mthar/ /de yi rjes su bri bar bya/ /

mu khyud dbus ma dag la ni/ /dbyangs yig bcu drug nyis 'gyur dgod/ /btu dang dgod sogs brtsam pa na/ /mtshan ma 'di dag shes par bya/ /zla ba mig dang yon tan dang / /rig byed mda' dang dbang po dang / /rgya mtsho bkra shis gza' dang phyogs/ /drag

po nyi ma yan lag sa/ /tshes zhes bya bar rab tu grags/ /phyi rol mu khyud tha ma la/ /shar gyi tshangs thig nas brtsams te/ /rim min gza' can khang pa nas/ /yi ge bkra shis tsam blangs te/ /nang gi ngos kyi mu khyud kyi/ /tshangs thig gi ni ngos dag

la/ /phyogs bzhir mig gi tshad du sbyin/ /rim min phyogs can khang pa nas/ /yi ge mig gi tshad blangs te/ /shar du de yi g.yas g.yon gzhag /rim min bkra shis khang ba nas/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa can blangs te/ /mig gi tshad du byas

nas ni/ /de yi ngos la re re gzhag /nub kyi tshangs thig nas bgrangs pa'i/ /rgya mtsho can gyi khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig dang ldan pa/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /lho phyogs de yi g.yas g.yon gzhag /nub nas rim pa min pa

yi/ /zla ba can gyi khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum dang ldan pa/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /lho ngos de rjes sbyin par bya/ /de nyid dbyangs yig gsal ba ni/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /sngon bzhin nub kyi ngos su sbyin/ /nub nas

bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum par ldan pa/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /nub kyi ngos la de bzhin sbyin/ /byang nas bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig par ldan pa/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /byang gi

ngos la de bzhin sbyin/ /rlung gi sa bon zhes bya ba/ /mig gi tshad blangs de rjes sbyin/ /mda' can khang pa nang gnas pa/ /'od kyi gong bur byas pa dang / /de nyid nas ni bgrangs pa yi/ /gza' can khang pa la gnas pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum par

ldan pa dag /zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /byang shar mtshams su re re sbyin/ /rgya mtsho'i khang pa na gnas pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan dag /rim min yon tan khang pa nas/ /zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /shar lho'i

mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ /rim min bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa ldan pa dag /yan lag can gyi khang pa nas/ /zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /lho nub mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ /rim min tshes can khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig

gsum dang ldan pa dang / /rim min bkra shis khang pa nas/ /zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /nub byang mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ /de ltar dgod pa byas nas ni/ /de nas drang ba brtsam par bya/ /dam tshig rjes su dran byed cing / /rdo rje shugs dang ldan pa

yis/ /shar gyi tshangs thig ngos gnyis nas/ /yi ge zung ldan drangs nas ni/ /dbus kyi khang par gzhag par bya/ /phyogs gzhan tshangs thig ngos dag nas/ /de bzhin zung ldan drangs nas ni/ /de bzhin dbus kyi khang par gzhag /de nas shar gyi yi ge

yang / /zung ldan gnyis pa drangs nas ni/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i khang par gzhag /phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no/ /shar gyi zung ldan gsum pa yang / /rim pa gsum pa'i khang par drang / /phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no/ /mtshams kyi yi ge

ya bral ni/ /rang rang nang gi mtshams su drang / /de dag phyung ba'i khang steng du/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge drang bar bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge'i gzhi la ni/ /ming gi yi ge drang bar bya/ /ming gi yi ge'i gzhi la ni/ /so so las dang mthun pa yi/ /bskul ba'i yi ge

dgod par bya/ /gsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba la/ /yi ge phaT ni gzhag par bya/ /mnan pa la ni yi ge la~M/ /zhi ba la ni yi ge oM/ /rgyas pa de bzhin yi ge swa/ /dbang la ba~M gyis brgyan pa ste/ /dgug pa la ni yi ge dzaH/ /de la las kyi 'od zer ni/ /

zhi ba chu ste rgyas pa sa/ /dbang ni rlung ste drag po me/ /dbye dgug bskrad pa dbang dang mthun/ /mnan pa la ni rgyas pa bzhin/ /drang ba'i sbyor ba byas nas ni/ /bsre ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /gnyis med sngags dang ldan pa yis/ /dbus kyi bkra shis yi

ge yang / /zla ltar 'od kyi gong bur bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang / /'od kyi gong bur de nang du/ /'dod pa'i bsgrub bya gzhag par bya/ /de dkyil rang ming dang por gzhag /phyogs kyi khyim na gnas pa yi/ /yi ge zung ma thams cad kyang / /

de tshe 'od kyi gong bur bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang / /bcu gnyis khyim du spel te bri/ /byin rlob hU~M zhes bya ba yang / /khang pa bzhi la zur re mdzes/ /yongs su dag par dgod byas nas/ /mchod dang gtor ma byas nas ni/ /spo pa dag ni brtsam

par bya/ /las kyi dbye ba ji lta bar/ /'khor lo'i ras ni blang bya ste/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa la/ /shin tu dge ba'i ras la bya/ /dbang dang dgug pa smad 'tshong sogs/ /gsad dang dbye dang bskrad pa dang / /mnan pa la ni dur khrod ras/ /gi wang gur

gum zhi rgyas la/ /dbang dang dgug la tsan+dan dmar/ /mnan pa la ni ldong ros sogs/ /bskrad la bya rog khrag gis te/ /dbye la rta dang ma he'i 'o/ /gsad la dug la sogs pas bri/ /dge ba'i ras la bzang po'i shing / /dge min la ni rus pa dang / /

lcags la sogs pas bri bar bya/ /zhi ba shar bltas dbang la nub/ /rgyas pa byang ste drag po lho/ /gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa la/ /sa bskor rim bzhin dgod byas te/ /gnas bskor dag ni rim las bzlog /gsad

bskrad dbye dang mnan pa la/ /sa bskor rim las bzlog pa ste/ /gnam bskor dag ni rim bzhin bri/ /'di ltar legs par ma bris na/ /'khor lo rang la ldog par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de bya/ /ras kyi 'khor lo legs zin nas/ /maN+Dal la gnas

'khor lo de/ /ras kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ /rdo rje bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /maN+Dal 'khor lo bsdu bar bya/ /ras kyi 'khor lo mchod nas ni/ /bden pa'i byin brlabs dmigs par bya/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /'khor

lo spo ba byas nas ni/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /o~M badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ dam tshig gi sngags so/ /o~M badzra be ga hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyi sngags so/ /o~M a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye swA hA/ yi ge bsre ba'i sngags so/ /o~M badzra sa mA dzaH/

'khor lo spo ba'i sngags so/ /o~M ya ma rA dzA sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya phaT phaT/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te las thams cad pa'o/ /o~M hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i ta nan hu~M phaT/ 'di ni las kyi gsang sngags te las

thams cad pa'o/ /shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ /zhi bar bskul ba'o/ /puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas pa'i'o/ /ba shaM ku ru swA hA/ dbang gi'o/ /mA ra ya phaT/ gsad pa'i 'o/ bi dwe Sha ya phaT/ dbye ba'i 'o/ /uts+tsha Ta ya phaT/ bskrad pa'i 'o/ /s+t+waM b+ha ya hU~M la~M/ mnan pa'i 'o/ /

A kaR+Sha ya hU~M dzaH/ dgug pa'i 'o/ /o~M mu~MH/ slar dgrol ba'i 'o/ /A li kA li'i grong khyer ni/ /gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ste/ /las kyi btson rar dag kyang yin/ /yi ge btu ba med na ni/ /gsang sngags sgra ni log par 'gyur/ /yi ge tshang bar

ma bkod na/ /gsang sngags sgra ni nyams par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags brda yis ma brjod na/ /sngags ni dngos grub med par 'gyur/ /drang ba dag ni ma byas na/ /shin tu 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yi ge bsre ba ma byas na/ /bcu drug khang pa don med 'gyur/ /

bskor phyogs log na don mi 'grub/ /rig sngags nyams dang log pa ni/ /lha min g.yul las pham pa dang / /dbang po'i dgra yis dgra bsad bzhin/ /'khor lo spo ba ma byas na/ /cho ga dag ni nyams par 'gyur/ /rgyu yin pa dang sbyor ba dang / /dad pa brtan

pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de bya/ /dpal gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa ste dang po'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsten pa ni/ /ru sbal 'o ma zhes bya dang / /

de bzhin 'od kyi lo ma dang / /'jim pa skam po nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin me yi khu ba dang / /sgra brnyan gyi ni rdzas dag ste/ /'di rnams rtag tu spyad na ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni nad med cing / /tshe ring dbang po rgyas pa dang / /rtag tu lang tsho dar la bab/ /lha rnams kun gyis byin

gyis rlob/ /'di la dpyad par mi bya ste/ /mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub/ /ting 'dzin sngags kyis byin brlabs na/ /las kyi rnam smin sbyong bar byed/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas/ /de phyir cho ga bzhin du bsten/ /tshes gcig skya rengs shar tsam na/ /snod

ma reg la ru sbal zho/ /drod ma yal bar btung ba'am/ /yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung / /mar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la/ /'od kyi lo ma btsal nas ni/ /de nyid nas ni bzung nas kyang / /zhag gsum skya rengs shar ba na/ /lo ma de bcang bza' bar bya/ /yang na nyi ma'i sbu

gus bya/ /'jim pa bzang po sbyar nas ni/ /zhag gsum chu yi nang du sbang / /de blangs nas ni yang bskams nas/ /phye ma byi la'i sbar tshad re/ /ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar nas/ /sngags pas rtag tu btung bar bya/ /me yi sdong po sar pa ni/ /sa yi mar gyis dril nas

ni/ /kha sbyar snod dang ldan byas nas/ /me chu sa yis btsir nas ni/ /btung ngam nyi ma'i sbu gus btung / /lan tshwa bral ba'i sgra las ni/ /zhag gsum bcings pa'i sgra brnyan rdzas/ /nam gyi gung la sngags pas blangs/ /cha gsum snod du zhag gsum gzhag /

rtse mo'i cha ni byug pa ste/ /dbus ma'i cha ni bdud rtsi yin/ /rtsa ba'i cha ni dor bar bya/ /'di rnams so sor bsten pa na/ /tha mar 'bras bu gsum gyi phye/ /byi la'i sbar tshad re dang sbyar/ /ma sbyar na yang nyes pa med/ /tshogs par bsten na bzang bar bshad/ /re re bsten

kyang nyes pa med/ /'jam dpal gyi rtog pa las dam rdzas sman du bsgyur te bstan pa'i cho ga'i rtog pa ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni/ /las kyi grogs kyi bye brag ste/ /zhi ba'i las ni zla ba yin/ /rgyas pa de bzhin mig tu

bsgrags/ /dbye ba yon tan zhes bya ste/ /dbang du bya ba rig byed yin/ /dgug pa'i las ni de bzhin mda'/ /bskrad dang mnan pa dbang po yin/ /mnan pa rjes su 'brang ba yis/ /gsad pa'i las ni rgya mtshor 'dod/ /las rnams de dag re re yang / /'phags

sogs mchod sbyin dang po ste/ /nyi ma gnyis pa gtor ma sbyin/ /gsum pa bzlas pa rnam par 'bad/ /bzhi pa sbyin sreg tshang bar bya/ /lnga pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /drug pa bsam gtan rtse gcig bya/ /bdun pa las kyi lhag chad bskang / /grogs kyi las la khyad

par du/ /las kyi gtsor ni gang bsgrub de'i/ /'khor lo bskor ba nyi ma bzhi/ /las kyi bye brag 'di shes na/ /zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob/ /rgyas pas yon tan drug dang sbyor/ /dbang gis mos pa rnam bzhir 'gyur/ /dbye bas gsang sde brgyad dang 'byed/ /mnan pas

dbang po drug 'ching byed/ /gzhan ni ji ltar de bzhin no/ /sngags dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba la/ /dpyad na dngos grub mi 'grub ste/ /gal te yid gnyis za gyur tam/ /bsam par 'gyur ram dad pa nyams/ /de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang / /phyir ldog 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /dad pa brtan pos bsgrub pa

na/ /nam mkha' med par gyur na yang / /sngags kyi dngos grub med mi srid /lha dang drang srong gis bshad pa'i/ /rig sngags bslu ba mi srid na/ /'dod chags bral bas bshad pa yi/ /gsang sngags sbyor bas bslu ba ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos nyid bsam gyis

mi khyab pa'i/ /don la the tshom med pa yi/ /mkhas pa la ni dngos grub nye/ /yang na blun po dad pa brtan/ /de la sbyor ba'i dngos grub nye/ /rtog cing dpyod pa'i rtog ge pa/ /de la sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring / /bla mas man ngag bstan byas kyang / /slob ma yid gnyis yod pa na/ /

de la dngos grub ring bar bshad/ /bla mas man ngag sbas byas kyang / /slob ma yid gnyis mi za zhing / /bla ma'i man ngag dam pa zhes/ /gces spras byas na 'grub par nges/ /de yi phyir na sngags pa yis/ /rang gi yid gnyis spang ba'i phyir/ /bla ma mnyes par bya ba gces/ /

bsnyen bkur byas na nus mthu che/ /gsang ste brjod pas bar chad med/ /yon chen phul ba byas pas ni/ /rang sems rin chen rnam gnyis 'gyur/ /rin chen gnyis las grub pa 'byung / /dkon par gyur pas bsngags pa brjod/ /bsngags na yon tan 'byung 'gyur te/ /

bsngags pa dag ni ma byas na/ /ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu yang / /gang gis bsngags pa ma byas pa/ /de la 'dod don mi ster ro/ /dad pa sangs rgyas dad ba chos/ /dad pa dge 'dun dad pa ma/ /dad pa bla ma dad pa pha/ /dad pa lam chen dad pa gru/ /dad pa yid bzhin

nor bu ste/ /dad pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid/ /dad pa bsod nams nor nyid de/ /de yi phyir na sngags pa yis/ /rang sems dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ /gzhan la gus pas mchog tu bkur/ /dpal gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga las/ /las

kyi rgyud dang grogs bsten pa'i rtog pa ste gsum pa'o// //dpal gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud rtog pa gsum pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra b+hai ra ba kalpa tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i

rgyud kyi rgyal po/ ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'dir ni bshad bya ba/ /ji ltar 'gro rnams zad byed cing / /sdug bsngal rnam thar byed pa yi/ /sgrub pa'i thabs chen mchog gyur pa/ /gsang sngags de las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad de/ /de dang nye bar ngag

dbang phyug /rdo rjes 'khor lo sgyur ba'o/ /gdon gyi bdag dang 'byung po'i rje/ /mi yi sa bon gnyis ldan bya/ /mchod rten sreg byed mtha' dang bcas/ /gzhan du shes par mi 'gyur te/ /rdo rje can gyi mkha' la gnas/ /yi ge 'bum phrag khri brjod na/ /nyams pa thams cad sel byed cing / /

zhi dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod/ /gsod dang skrod dgug dbye dang / /dman par byed dang rgyal srid sogs/ /thob pa nyid la the tshom med/ /dur khrod tshang tshing khron ngogs rtsub/ /shing gcig khang stong mtshan gcig dben/ /gang 'dod gnas su bsam gtan brtsam/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phrul ba thams cad la khyab pa me long lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /sku dang ye shes thams cad la khyab par bya ba'i phyir/ /sku mdog dkar po zhal lnga dang ldan par byas nas/ /'jig rten pa thams cad la gzigs nas/ /rang gi rigs kyi

yi ge nyid brjod pas/ sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang / phrin las dang / ye shes kyang gcig gi ngo bor sprul pa'i skur gyur to/ /kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje che/ /don rnams bskyed pa yang nyid do/ /mkha' dkyil 'od kyis 'gengs 'gyur ba/ /slar zhing kha dog lnga ldan pa/ /

sa bon sngags kyis bskul ba yi/ /'od kyi rtse phrag thub pa'i sku/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas gnas las skyes/ /rang la zhugs pas sku rdzogs 'gyur/ /zhal drug khro gnyer rab brjid pa/ /ma he'i zhal ldan steng gnas pa/ /'jam dpal zhal ni 'dzum bcas bzhugs/ /lhag

ma dmar dang ser dang sngo/ /du ba'i mdog mtshungs gyen skrar ldan/ /thod pa skam rlon rgyu ma sbrul/ /rus pa rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan/ /glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni/ /hU~M phaT glur len mo can/ /nam mkha'i lus can khro bo'i sprin/ /yang dang yang du spro byed pa'i/ /phyag drug rab

tu brjid pa ste/ /dbyug pa tho ba gtun shing dag /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rim bzhin 'dzin/ /dgra sta dang ni lcags kyu dang / /zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin/ /pad+ma nyi ma ma he dang / /gshin rje'i steng na 'gying bag can/ /zhabs drug g.yon brkyang gar gyis gnas/ /'jig

rten bdag po mthar mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar gang zhig dad pa dang / /blo ldan g.yo sgyu rab spangs shing / /legs par dbang rnams thob byas nas/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyes byed pas/ /yang nas yang du dran byed na/ /brtan pa chen po thob par 'gyur/ /lha yi dge 'dun nga la nyon/ /dpa'

bo 'chang la rab dga' zhing / /sha chen rtag tu mur byed na/ /las rnams de yis myur du 'grub/ /sku ni du ma 'phro byed cing / /sku la sku rnams nges thim byed/ /thams cad sgyu ma nyid shes pas/ /'jig rten rnams su yid sad byed/ /khong stong rtsa ni ka ba ste/ /rgyun du byang chub sems

'dzag byed/ /chu skyes dmar po kha sbyar gnyis/ /yan lag gnyis kyis legs par bcun/ /shes pa 'phel ba me dang rlung / /nyi ma zla ba thabs ldan dang / /shes rab ldan par shes par bya/ /gnyis po de nyid rnam spangs na/ /khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro/ /chu skyes kha sbyor la brten te/ /

gsum gnas pa yi ting 'dzin la/ /rdo rje chos kyis rgyas btab pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab grol ba'i rgyu/ /blo ldan 'bad pas shes par 'gyur/ /de phyir de la brtson par bya/ /chos rnams chos nyid dbyer med pas/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes che/ /mi shigs rtog bral mtshan ma med/ /bde chen

ye shes rdo rje'i skur/ /ye shes mi rtog rtog pa bral/ /rtog pa'i mtshan ma thams cad sreg /spros pa'i mtshan ma mtha' dag ni/ /ji snyed sgyu ma'i rnam pa shes/ /de nyid shes nas grol ba'o/ /mi shes pas ni phyir zhing 'khor/ /'jig rten skye bo blo ldan 'gas/ /nges par rtog pa thabs kyi

mchog /sdug bsngal chen po rab 'jigs nas/ /bde ba 'dod pas nan tan bya/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi bsam gtan bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sngags grub pa las byung ba yi/ /las

rnams 'dir ni shes bya ste/ /der ni lha yi sku yang sbyar/ /zhi sogs bzlas pa'i rim pa la/ /rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje ni/ /nyi zla la brten yi ge yi/ /phreng ba kha dog lngar shes pa/ /skyen bul spangs nas bklag pa ni/ /mkhas pas bzlas pa'i rim pa'o/ /drag po'i las rnams sgrub pa la/ /

nyon mongs gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /ser po rtse rtsibs bcu ba la/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba bsam/ /zhi bar 'dod pa'i skyes bu des/ /sems ni yang dag mnyam gzhag nas/ /sngags kyi 'od kyang 'gro gzhan la/ /phan pa'i yid dang ldan par bya/ /gro ga ras dang shing shun la/ /

gur gum gi wang dri rnams kyis/ /mchod rten rim pa lngar ldan zhing / /gdugs dang 'khor lo ldan par bya/ /sgrub pa po yi ming dang rus/ /de yi bum pa'i nang du bri/ /ye d+harmA la sogs pa yi/ /sngags kyis g.yon nas bskor bar bri/ /cig shos g.yas nas g.yon du bri/ /

de la spel tshig mang pa'am/ /yang na 'khor lo'i bar du gzhag /'khor lo kun la kha sbyor gnad/ /rab tu gnas par byas nas kyang / /lus sam mgul lam gang bder gzhag /des ni gdon dang byad stims dang / /rims dang yams rnams sel bar byed/ /gang zhig yul rnams

gzhom 'dod na/ /hu~M gi sa bon dang ldan par/ /ming yig tsam po bri bar bya/ /so phag phye ma ldong ros dang / /ba bla ma he'i khrag gis brdzis/ /zla gam gnyis pa'i gzugs byas te/ /bar du gang 'dod bsgrub bya yi/ /gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa yi tshad/ /byas la gan rkyal du gzhag la/ /

ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis/ /khri phrag gcig tu sngags bzlas nas/ /dum bu dum bur gtubs byas te/ /chu bo'i gzhung du dor byas na/ /skad cig de la de dbang 'gyur/ /bya rog 'ug pa'i gzugs byas te/ /ma nu ma li ro tsa nas/ /khyo shug bsgrub bya'i ming bris te/ /gshin rje'i phyogs bltas

gsang sngags gdon/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ /mi yi rje ngar phur pas gdab/ /skad cig tsam la de dag dbye/ /de nas 'dir ni bsad pa yi/ /cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /zhal drug phyag drug zhabs drug gam/ /yang na zhal gcig phyag bzhi'am/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis

pa yang rung / /ma he'i gdong gi sbyor ba yis/ /khrag rnams sna tshogs tha dad dang / /bsgrub bya'i rjes dang dug gi rigs/ /rta dang ma he bong bu'i chus/ /sbrus pa'i bsgrub bya'i ling ga bya/ /lus la tsher mas gzugs bya zhing / /til mar gyis kyang bsku bar bya/ /yang ni shing lo gro ga'am/ /

dur khrod ras sam shun pa la/ /rang nyid gcer bu skra bshig nas/ /lus ni thal bas byugs byas te/ /mngon sum khros nas sha chen bza'/ /rab tu zhim pa'i chang 'thung zhing / /nag po'i chos kyi mtshan phyed dus/ /'khor lo bri ba brtsam par bya/ /le tshe bcu gnyis 'khor lo ni/ /hU~M

dang hrIHSh+T+rIHdbus su dgod/ /Na yo ni ra rtsibs mchan la/ /yungs kar til dang skags khu dang / /rta dang ma he ra khyi khrag /bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro yis bri/ /yi ge ya yi lto bar yang / /ming dang rus su ldan par bri/ /phyogs bzhir yi ge bcu pa ni/ /ming dang bcas pa bri bar bya/ /brgyad po dag

la rim pa bzhin/ /yi ge 'di dag bri bar bya/ /o~M mu sa le tsur+Na ra ga tsa ra na tsu sha na hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ yi ge ya la bskor nas ni/ /bsgrub bya gzugs dang ldan par bri/ /de yi mu khyud dag la ni/ /yi ge bcu pa ming bcas bri/ /phyogs bzhir rtse gsum rdo rjes mtshan/ /de bzhin rdzas rnams

ma lus pas/ /'khor lo lto bar ldan pa bri/ /gshin rje'i gzugs ni ral gri dang / /dbyug pa 'dzin pa bris nas ni/ /de dang de gnyis lto sbyar la/ /mtshan ngan thod pa'i nang du gzhug /tsha gsum ske tshe dug mu zi/ /ro nyes bkang nas dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru gsum dbus su gzhag par bya/ /

yungs dang bra bo sA lu nag /dza b+hi bra bo sogs rnams la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po brjod byas te/ /dro'am du ba 'thul bar du/ /rims dang rims kyi khrag rnams ni/ /ma lus zad par 'thung ba yis/ /ma yengs par ni bsam gtan bya/ /yang na bsgrub bya za bar mthong / /shing gcig rtsar ni

rengs pa dang / /mal gyi 'og tu zha zhing lkugs/ /chu mdor 'byed cing ri rtser bskrad/ /gsad pa me thab 'og tu sba/ /dgug pa la ni sgo khang 'og /lha 'am 'khor lo sgyur ba'o/ /bde gnas rnams kyis dbang du 'gyur/ /mar khu chen po thod pa yi/ /nang du blugs nas bskol byas te/ /bzhar bas

mig la byug byed na/ /mngon shes de nyid myur du 'thob/ /rigs ldan rgyal po las rnyed cing / /mdog ldan lang tsho gsar bkug la/ /tsan+dan lde gu mang byas te/ /las kyi sbyor bas de nyid bcing / /yang na me la gdung bas 'grub/ /o~M badzra kro d+ha ya ma rA dzaHbadzra kI li kI la/ hA na ha na mA ra ya phaT/

ces bya'i gsang sngags brjod byas la/ /rus pa'i phur bas gdab par bya/ /gsal shing la btsugs skyes bu yi/ /rdzas la brten te bsgrub par bya/ /til mar byugs la thod pas bzhar/ /mar mer byas pa'i dud pa yis/ /mig rnon dag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyal

po thogs med la/ /bsten pas thob bya mang mod kyang / /'dir ni brjod pa ci zhig dgos/ /yang na 'di ltar shes bya ste/ /rang nyid sngags dang ting 'dzin ldan/ /brtson chen gzhan du ma yengs pas/ /gang du brtsams pa de 'grub 'gyur/ /smad 'tshong rang byung nyid

kyis ni/ /sngon bstan tsakra legs bris te/ /ling ga'i snying gar bcug byas la/ /rang mdun khrag gi zla gam steng / /khrag gis byugs pa'i steng du gzhag /mi 'am rgyal po'i bu mo dag /dgug dang dbang gi yi ge yis/ /de nyid du ni nges par 'gyur/ /nyal sa'i 'og tu

mnan par bya/ /mi glang ra khyi bse phag khrag /'khor lo bris nas ling ga yi/ /mgrin par bcug nas bya rog gi/ /khrag gis khrag skyug sngags bris nas/ /yi ge de ldan thod pa ru/ /bcug nas gsang sngags mang bzlas te/ /dur khrod me thab 'og bzhag na/ /

khrag skyug pa la the tshom med/ /bsros na tsha ba'i nad kyis 'chi/ /sbal khrag pha wang klad pa yis/ /'khor lo de nyid legs bris nas/ /ling ga'i mchan khung g.yon bcug la/ /g.yas g.yon glang khrag sbal khrag byug /ling ga'i phyogs su rang nyid kyi/ /rkang pa

g.yon pa'i mthe bos mnan/ /de tshe bzlas pa mang byas nas/ /rgya gram lam du mnan la gzhag /de las zlog pa bris nas ni/ /shing gcig khong par sbas na rengs/ /rnga mo bya rog rgan po'i khrag /'khor lo bris nas ling ga yi/ /rkang gnyis bar bcug rang mdun du/ /

khrag gis rnga mo gzugs bris te/ /de yi steng gzhag rang nyid kyis/ /rlung gi bsam gtan nges ldan na/ /bskrad pa nyid du the tshom med/ /ri bo'i rtse la 'dzegs te sba/ /ne'u le sbrul rta ma he dang / /bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag gis ni/ /khyo shug rkang pa'i rjes sbrus pa'i/ /ling ga

sor brgyad par byas te/ /khrag des bris pa'i 'khor lo dag /snying gar bcug pa gnyis byas te/ /ne'u le gzugs byas steng du gzhag /lag gnyis rta dang ma he yi/ /rus pas brdung zhing gsang sngags zlos/ /rtse 'drud shing rtsar sbas na 'byer/ /tsan+dan dkar pos

legs bris nas/ /gser sogs rin chen rdzas su dril/ /mdun du zla ba'i gzugs steng du/ /gzhag la nyin re'i bskor ba ni/ /ji srid byas na bsrung bar nges/ /spyi bor btags na g.yul las rgyal/ /rkang par btags na chu steng 'gro/ /ba yi 'o mas khrus byas te/ /ku

sha ba mar sogs mchod na/ /gsol btab nad rnams thams cad srung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das las phra ba thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ las thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sngags 'di sku dang / gsung dang thugs

rdo rje las phyung ngo / /mA ra ya phaT ces bsad pa'i 'o/ /bi dwe Sha ya dbye ba'i 'o/ /uts+tsha Ta ya bskrad pa'i 'o/ /mo ha ya rmongs pa'i 'o/ /ba sha~M ku ru dbang du bya ba'i 'o/ /stam+b+ha ya mnan pa'i 'o/ /A kar+Sha ya dzaHdgug pa'i 'o/ /o~M hrIHswA hA mchod pa'i 'o/ /o~M i da~M g+ha swA hA zhal bsil

gyi'o/ /o~M duSh+Ta swA hA dri'i'o/ o~M b+ho ya~M dzaHdza me tog gi'o/ /o~M Sh+Ti ha he phaT phaT/ bdug pa'i 'o/ o~M dI po d+ha na ma ya swA hA/ mar me'i'o/ /o~M badzra nai bid+ya AHhU~M swA hA/ zhal zas kyi'o/ /o~M kA la rU ba sa twa da ma ka /ma hA b+hU ta pa ti/ i da~M ba li gr-ih+NA pa ya swA hA/ gtor ma'i'o/ /

o~M hrIHya ma rA dza e h+ye hi A gats+tsha b+ha ga bA na sar+b+ba mA~M sa me da madz+dza/ ru d+hi ra pri ye b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ ma ma sar+b+ba satwa da ma ka /karma ku ru sid+hi sme swA hA lha spyan drang pa'i'o/ /o~M hrIHbadzra dza ye su dza ye ma hA badzra dza ye mu ni badzra muHlha la sogs pa gshegs su gsol ba'i'o/ /de nas rdo rje

'dzin pa nyid chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang sngags yongs su rdzogs pa'i phrin las 'di nyid bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /hU~M las yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /rdo rje

'jigs byed bsam par bya/ /dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /shes rab mo dang mnyam du sbyor/ /dbyug pa thod khrag phyag na 'dzin/ /ma he pad+ma nyi ma la/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi tshul gyis bsgom/ /o~M ya mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di bzlas na/ /'dod

pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'byung / /nam mkha'i dbyings su dbus gnas par/ /ya yig sngon po las skyes pa'i/ /khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed ni/ /pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan steng na/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa'i/ /gri gug bi d+hi pa la dang / /dgra sta dang ni

thod khrag dang / /phyag bzhi po ni rim pas 'dzin/ /ma he nag po zhal steng na/ /'jam dpal zhal ni ser zhing 'dzum/ /dpa' bo chen po rang nyid bsgom/ /rab tu zhim pa'i chang btung zhing / /sha chen dag kyang mur bar bya/ /mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu byed cing / /rtag par

gsang sngags bzla bar bya/ /thig le 'dren pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /bsgrub bya'i phyogs su bsam par bya/ /las rnams myur du 'dis 'grub po/ /yang na 'di ltar shes bya ste/ /ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis/ /sku yi kha dog so sor shes/ /khyad par du yang gsad pa la/ /

nag po ma he'i zhal can ni/ /rtse gsum lcags kyu 'dzin pa ste/ /ma he sha steng bsam byas na/ /khrag 'dren pa yi mchog tu gsungs/ /res 'ga' sku la khro bo ni/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa grangs med spro/ /zla ba spyang kis zin dus su/ /byi la'i sder mo ra snying dang / /

bya yi khrag dang mi rus bsres/ /gang la phog pa smyo bar 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyor ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sgrub par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dur khrod ras sam dpa' bo'i gos/ /yang

na mtshan gyi kheb ma la/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje chus/ /dpa' bo'i khrag dang chang dang dug /go ro tsa nas ras tshos bya/ /legs par dam por drud byas te/ /lus ngag yid kyi gnas su ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chus/ /yi ge o~M dang AHhU~M bri/ /skra phyed dur khrod sol ba

dang / /khrag chen ldong ros ba bla yis/ /dbang thob dam tshig srung byed cing / /shin tu gsang la dam pa yi/ /ri mo mkhan ni brtson ldan des/ /rgyud kyi don la mkhas byas nas/ /nag po'i tshes kyi mtshan phyed dus/ /gsang ba'i gnas su rab zhugs nas/ /bcom

ldan rdo rje 'jigs mdzad bri/ /rtsa ba ma he khros pa'i zhal/ /de steng 'jam dpal 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /lhag ma dmar dang ser dang sngo/ /du ba'i mdog mtshungs gyen skra can/ /rab tu brjid cing khro bo'i zhal/ /drug dang ldan pa'i sku lus che/ /thod pa skam rlon rgyu ma sbrul/ /

rus pa rdo rje phreng bas brgyan/ /glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni/ /pad+ma nyi ma ma he la/ /gshin rje mnan nas zhabs drug gis/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum gar gyis 'gying / /phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na/ /rtse gcig gnyis pa tho ba ste/ /gsum pa gtun

shing mkha' la 'phyar/ /dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa ni/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin pa bri/ /nam mkha'i mdog can thal bas byugs/ /sku la khro bo du ma 'phro/ /sna tshogs mchod pa'i lha mos bskor/ /legs par de ltar bris pa yi/ /rgyab dang phyogs rnams

thams cad du/ /dur khrod chen pos bskor bar bri/ /mgo rdum rgyu ma mkha' la khyer/ /rkang rdum lag rdum ro langs dang / /wa dang spyang ki gtum po dang / /mkha' 'gro pho mo sha za'i tshogs/ /bya dang gcan gzan sna tshogs bri/ /skyi bung rab tu 'jigs bris nas/ /

der ni sgrub pa po yang bri/ /gri thod bzung nas sha chen mur/ /gos nag gyon nas khrag chen 'thung / /rta dang ma he rus pa yi/ /phreng ba bzung nas gsang sngags 'don/ /bcom ldan 'das la lta bar bri/ /de ltar bris nas chang dang khrag /sha chen go ro tsa

nas mchod/ /mnyam gzhag lha yi dge 'dun des/ /dus gsum rgyun du mchod byed na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa myur du 'thob/ /sku ni rab tu sba zhing gsang / /phan yon dam pa 'di las 'byung / /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las bris sku'i le'u ste

gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rtog pa ma lus zad byed cing / /las rnams thams cad grub 'dod pas/ /blo ldan ser sna rnam spangs te/ /rtul phod g.yeng ba rnam spangs nas/ /sbyin sreg las la rab brtson bya/ /mtshal dang ba

bla ldong ros dang / /shan pa'i go thal dur khrod sa/ /mi dang ma he khrag gis brdzi/ /khru do pa la khru phyed brtsig /gru bzhi'i steng du zlum po ni/ /rdo rje rgya gram ldan byas la/ /de steng 'khor lo rtsibs drug la/ /mtshan ma drug ni dgod par bya/ /lte bar me yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /mtho gang tshad du byas pa la/ /

ma he'i khrag gis legs par byug /bdag nyid lho yi phyogs bltas te/ /ma he zhal gyi sbyor ba yis/ /thab kyi nang gi phyogs mtshams su/ /me yi sa bon mngon bltas la/ /bskal ba'i me chen lta bur bsgom/ /der ni me lha'ang bsgom bya ste/ /zhal gsum phyag bzhi gnag la rtsub/ /phyag gnyis rang 'dra'i yum la 'khyud/ /g.yas

ba'i phyag gis 'gro rnams la/ /skyabs sbyin mdzad cing bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /g.yon pas ril ba mchog stsol brtson/ /zhabs drug rigs drug mtshan ma brdzis/ /zhal nas me rnams rab 'phro zhing / /'od rnams sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ /de ltar shes nas rab bsregs na/ /'dod pa'i don rnams rab tu 'byung / /

dgra bo'i gzugs dang sha chen dang / /chang dang ma he'i khrag bcas pa/ /stong phrag gsum du bsregs byas na/ /bsgrub bya khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi/ /glang po rta bong khyi sha la/ /stong phrag gsum gyis dbang du byed/ /bya rog 'ug pa khyi sha chu/ /bsregs na mi rta 'byer bar nges/ /til dang nas dang gro sA lu/ /

yung ba gi wang so phag rnams/ /stong phrag drug tu gang bsregs pa/ /longs spyod thams cad rnyed par 'gyur/ /rta dang rnga mo bya rog sha/ /mi sha rdo rje chur bcas pa/ /gsang sngags rnal 'byor ldan byas te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis nges par skrod/ /ra sha da na ut+pa la/ /chang dang ma he chur bcas pa/ /gang 'dod brgya rtsa brgyad

kyis lkugs/ /dug dang khrag dang sgog pa dang / /sha chen til mar rab sbags te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs byas na/ /pha rol gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod/ /tsan+dan dkar po 'bras dkar dang / /til dkar 'bras chan yungs kar dang / /ut+pal dkar dmar ga pur dag /shar du bltas te brgya rtsa brgyad/ /

bsregs nas dus rnams kun tu bsrung / /gang zhig bya ba'i rims sogs dang / /sngags rnams bsam gtan nges ldan pas/ /snying rje'i yid ni ma bral na/ 'dod pa thams cad 'dir bsgrub bya/ /gzhan du rmongs pa'i byis pa 'ga'/ /blo gros med gang shes rab 'chal/ /sngags dang dam tshig dman gyur cing / /

ting nge 'dzin la mngon g.yel ba/ /brtson pa chung zhing lhod pa 'gas/ /bskal pa stong du bsgrubs byas kyang / /'bras bu yod pa ma yin te/ /sha thang chad pa nyid du 'gyur/ /dper na blo zhan byis pa rnams/ /'ga' zhig 'bras 'dod 'khrul gyur nas/ /phub ma rlung khar byed pa la/ /'bras yod nam yang mi 'gyur bzhin/ /ji

ltar sprin dang chu zla dang / /dbang po'i gzhu rnams rtag min te/ /thar pa 'dod pa'i bya ba'ang de/ /sgyu ma nyid la sgyu ma rol/ /ye shes gcig pu rnam grol rgyu/ /stong pa dpag par blos ci nus/ /de la dpyad cing gzhal bzod na/ /brtags pa'i snying po de la med/ /de la dngos rnams ma grub na/ /bsgrub pa'i rim gzhan smos ci dgos/ /

bya ba dang ni byed pa dag /nges par de la brtag mi bzod/ /ngam grog g.yang sar lhung yang bla'i/ /chad par rtog pa 'di mi bzod/ /rtag pa nyid kyang rig min te/ /dngos po yod pa ga la 'gyur/ /dper na byis pa rnams la mas/ /sa 'dir sdod dang ma nyid kyis/ /'bras bu shing tog mang blangs la/ /khyod la bde bas sbyin zhes

brjod/ /de bzhin rnam pa du ma yang / /'jig rten rtog pa tha dad pas/ /de dag drang bar bya phyir bshad/ /bcom ldan lha yi lha mdun du/ /sha chen bo yi zhal zas dang / /chang dang til mar ma he khrag /rab tu zhim pa'i zas mchog rnams/ /dus rnams rtag tu dbul bar bya/ /gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge bcu/ /bdag gis

rgyun du gdon bya zhing / /bsam gtan rtag tu brtson par bya/ /de ltar shes shing sgrub byed pa'i/ /skyes bu blo ldan de yis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang myur 'grub 'gyur/ /zhi sogs las rnams smos ci dgos/ /grong khyer dkrug na sngags pa des/ /khyi sha sbal sha rus sbal sha/ /rnga mo byi la'i sha rnams la/ /stong rtsa brgyad du

bsreg par bya/ /rta sha dri chen rab sbyar bas/ /ril bu byas te bdag mdun du/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas byas nas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs pas ni/ /rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /bud med dbang du byed 'dod na/ /nya sha chang dang sha chen rnams/ /rdo rje chu yis sbags byas te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya/ /tha

mal dbang du byed 'dod na/ /sha chen glang po'i sha dang bcas/ /byang chub sems dang bsres byas te/ /stong phrag brgyad du bsreg par bya/ /dgug pa dus rnams thams cad du/ /khyi sha nya sha bdud rtsi lnga/ /cha mnyam ril bu byas nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na 'gugs/ /sbyin sreg las rnams thams cad kyang / /ma he zhal

gyi sbyor bas ni/ /gsang sngags rgyal pos 'dod pa sbyar/ /ma yengs rtse gcig sems kyis bya/ /gsungs dang ma gsungs mtha' dag kyang / /ji lta ba yi rim pa yis/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid nyer gnas/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu myur du 'thob/ /zhi la zhi ba'i yid kyis te/ /rgyal po lta bur rgyas pa la/ /sdang bral

chags pas dbang la'o/ /drag po'i las la khro zhing rtsub/ /rab tu gtum pa'i yid kyis ni/ /gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par bya/ /gang zhig ltos pa med pa'i mi/ /grub pa myur du tshol byed na/ /sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de 'grub 'gyur/ /dngos po gang dang gang spyod yul/ /de dang de

yi rang bzhin 'gro/ /mnyam gzhag nyams par mi bya la/ /dus rnams rtag tu rnal 'byor pas/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag par bya/ /des ni thar pa nyid kyi rgyu/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di las ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub myur byed de/ /dka' ba med pa'i thabs 'di ni/ /dka' spyod brtul zhugs rnams spangs te/ /shin

tu bde bar sgrub pa'i thabs/ /sdug bsngal 'jigs med bdud rtsi'i ro/ /blo ldan legs par blang bya ste/ /shin tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/ /mi shes blo gros rmongs pa 'ga'/ /rtog pa'i dra bas bsgribs pa'i tshe/ /bsod nams dang ni sdig pa yi/ /phung po rnam pa gnyis su brtags/ /'on kyang 'dod pa thams

cad ni/ /rgyud mchog 'di las 'byung 'gyur phyir/ /dman zhing brtson pa chung ba 'ga'/ /'di la zhugs na myur du 'grub/ /de bas ngo mtshar rgyud 'di ni/ /rnyed dka' khyad par mchog gyur pa/ /yi ge'i dbyibs kyang mi bstan na/ /bshad cing 'grol ba smos ci dgos/ /dbang rnams nges par ma blangs shing / /bla ma

mnyes par ma byas tshe/ /bstan kyang thob par mi 'gyur te/ /tsha ba la sogs 'khor bar 'khor/ /de skad ston pas bshad pa'i tshe/ /sde rnams myos shing brgya la rmongs te/ /kun kyang 'dud cing mgo bo smad/ /'jig rten 'di ni shin tu g.yos/ /gang zhig rgyud 'di nyan pa dang / /shes nas 'chang bar byed pa dang /

dus rnams kun tu 'don byed na/ /tshe 'dir 'jigs pa kun bsal te/ /shi nas mtho ris myur du 'thob/ /gal te gzhan du rgyud mchog 'di/ /bstan nam bshad dam gsal phye na/ /de ni sdug bsngal mang myong nas/ /shi nas myur du dmyal bar 'gro/ /rang gis shin tu bcang byas shing / /dngos grub

nyid bzhin mngon byas na/ /sdug bsngal mtha' dag nges zad nas/ /myur du bla med thob par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyin sreg gi rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i

las kyi dngos grub brtag pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po a mo g+ha'i zhabs nus pa can dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba mar pa ban+de chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /slad kyis grub thob chen po kar+Na shrI'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/ /thar pa lo ts+tsha ba

nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @##/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bcom ldan nyid kyi sku gsung thugs/ /rdo rje rnams las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis/ /lho phyogs

rgya mtsho'i phar rgal na/ /de nas gshin rje'i grong khyer ni/ /ga la ba yi gnas su byon/ /mi bzad zhabs ni bcu drug gis/ /lcags mkhar sgo med bcu drug brdzis/ /ye shes rtse gcig mtshan ma yis/ /dbus kyi lcags mkhar chen po brdzis/ /de tshe bdud chen las brgyal nas/ /ha ha hi hi'i sgra sgrogs pas/

chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/ /gzir bzhin du ni rab smras pa/ /dpa' bo chen po ga la ci/ /dpa' bo'i dgos pa bdag gis bgyi/ /bdag cag srog gi snying po rnams/ /tshul bzhin 'bul gyis dpa' bos bzhes/ /lha ma srin ni sde brgyad kyis/ /srog gi yang snying phul ba ni/ /gshin rjes ya phul ma mos

ma/ /srin pos ra phul gnod sbyin k+She/ /mi yis Ni phul sa bdag sa/ /btsan gyis tsa phul bdud kyis da/ /de rnams gcig tu dril ba ni/ /bran du yang ni khas blangs so/ /gtan tshigs chen po de yi phyir/ /ye shes lha yi dgongs pa dang / /bsnyen pa nyams 'og rab chud nas/ /lha yi bsnyen pa la chud nas/ /

sngon gyi thugs dam las mi 'da'/ /mi 'grub pa ni mi srid do/ /ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ /ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ de skad ces ni smras pa dang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis/ /chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/ /gshin rje'i pho nya thams cad kun/ /sgrol ba'i

ging du byin gyis brlabs/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams/ /'khor bcas rnams la bka' bsgo ba/ /lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la/ /nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ /rnal 'byor rig 'dzin ldan pa la/ /bka' bsgo'i las rnams tshul bzhin gyis/ /ces pas dam bcas pa dang

mnan bzhin du mna' bor ro/ /gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ts+tshu ts+tshu na d+ha ra kalpa na maH/ bod skad du/ te'u lo pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba gshin rje'i gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas ts+tshu ts+tshu na d+ha ra'i cho ga zhib mo

bshad par bya ste/ oM tu tra ya ma he sha ra yo ga prat+ta ma ya/ yo ga sid+d+hi/ dA hA ni me swA hA/ hU ha/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ur d+hi ya hUM phaT/ rig sngags 'di'i bya ba'i cho ga ni/ /nyin mtshan du mi nyal bar dri dang me tog dang / bdug spos phul nas/ gtor ma btang ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na

'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas las rnams su 'gyur ba ni/ /ts+tshu ts+tshun d+ha ra shi ba blangs la/ pags pa dang rus pa dang / sha dang spu rnams phye mar btags te stong phrag gnyis bzlas nas phye ma de dpral bar byugs na bdag nyid dgras mi mthong / oM ma ma hU pa ti/ phye ma de lag pa la bskus nas gang

la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de rkang pa la bskus nas dpag tshad brgyar song na yang ldog go/ /phye ma de nyid kyis dgra'i sgo logs la bskus nas khyim gyi sgor stong phrag brgyar bzlas na skrod par 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de dang dur khrod kyi ras dgra bo'i sgo rtsar bcad cing sbas na dgra bo'i rigs rnams 'joms

par 'gyur ro/ /yang na dgra bo'i rigs skrod par 'dod na ts+tshu ts+tshun d+ha ra'i pags pa phye mar btags la/ stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas nas gcin shul gyi sas bkang nas skud pa sngon pos bcings te nam mkhar bteg na gcin 'gags par 'gyur ro/ /bkrol na ni thar ro/ /ts+tshu ts+tshun d+ha ra'i

pags pa phye mar btags nas lha chen po'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas la yang dri dang me tog dang bdug spos dang gtor ma btang ste/ slar yang stong phrag brgyad bzlas na des 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de sna'i rtse mor bskus na skye 'gro thams cad la sdug par 'gyur ro/ /mgo bor

bzhag na dgra thams cad dang 'gyed pa'i lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de nyid rang gi snying gar bskus nas dgra la bstan na snying na bar 'gyur ro/ /sA lu'i phye ma la gzugs byas nas phye ma de bskus na mdzes thebs par 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi thal ba dang bcas pas dgra

bo'i tshogs la gtor na gang gis mnan pa dang mthong ba de dag nad kyis thebs par 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de la lan stong bzlas nas gang gi mgo bor blugs pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de thod pa dang lhan cig sgo logs su bzhag na dgra bo dang dbye bar 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de bud

med kyi lag pa la bskus na bud med de 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de gang gi sgor sbas na skrod par 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de sha chen po dang bsres nas gang gi btung bar sbyin na nyi ma bdun gyis 'chi'o/ /phye ma de dgra la byin la dgra bo bkres pa dang / /gzhang 'brum dang / tshad

pas thebs nas phyi nas ni rang nyid dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /ts+tshu ts+tshun d+ha ra'i rus pa blangs nas gang gi khyim du sbas na 'chi'o/ /ts+tshu ts+tshun d+ha ra'i sha dang nya'i zhag dang bcas pa lha la mchod pa byas nas dur khrod du thod pa'i steng du 'dug nas thod pa bzung la bzlas pa bya/ dur

khrod kyi sol ba la lan stong du blugs cing / sbyin sreg byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de tsha ba gsum dang bsres pas las su 'gyur ba ni/ gang gi khyim du bzhag na/ de la me'i tsha ba gsum dang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de ske tshe dang bsres pas kyang las de nyid du 'gyur

ro/ /phye ma de dang dur khrod kyi sas gzugs brnyan byas te sgo rtsar sbas na/ phral du na tshas gsod par 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de lan tshwa dang bsres nas gang la brdeg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /phye ma de yungs kar dang bsres nas rgyal po'i sgo la gtor na/ rgyal po dbang
du 'gyur ro/ /ts+tshu ts+tshun d+ha ra'i rtog pa zhib mo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI pa~M ka ra dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba rwa rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /ya mA ri kr-i Sh+Na kar+m+ma sar+b+ba tsakra sid+d+ha kar nA ma ta n+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i 'khor lo las thams cad grub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di

skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gti mug rdo rje dang / ser sna rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje dang / zhe sdang rdo rje dang / phrag dog rdo rje dang / sa rdo rje dang / chu rdo rje dang / me

rdo rje dang / rlung rdo rje dang / byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po ma dang / yon tan gyi phreng ba ma dang / sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pa ma dang / brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / me tog ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma dang / de la sogs pa dpag tu med

pa dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas lha mo bai tA lI stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das da ltar 'di na gdug pa can rnams kyis sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na yang theg

pa chen po pa dang / sems can thams cad la'ang 'tshe bar bgyid pa dag 'byung na de rnams ji ltar tshar gcad par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las snying po 'di

phyung ngo / /hrIHde ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das nyid zhal drug pa phyag drug pa zhabs drug pa'i ngo bor gyur nas ma he rwa gnyis pa brdzis te/ ma he'i bdag po chung ma bcas par oM hrIHSh+TIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA zhes zhal bzhad pa dang bcas pas oM gsung zhing mnan par gyur to/ /

lha dang lha ma yin dang bdud thams cad kyang skrag cing 'dar ba dang bcas pas 'dud par gyur to/ /tshangs pa dang / dbang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan khro bo yi/ /rgyal po chen po rab 'jigs pa/ /thugs rje chen po

dang ldan pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba/ /rtsibs brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la/ /bdag nyid phyag dang zhal rnams ni/ /drug drug ldan par gyur pa bsgom/ /zhabs kyang de dang 'dra ba ste/ /g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag na ni/ /rdo rje tho ba

g.yas gnyis na/ /ral gri de bzhin g.yon gyi yang / /dang por zhags pa sdigs mdzub ldan/ /gnyis par gtun shing legs par 'dzin/ /rdo rje dril bu tha mas bsnams/ /steng zhal nag por ba 'jigs pa/ /zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung ste/ /brkyang bskum gar

gyis zhabs bzhir gnas/ /stag lpags kyis ni rnam dkris shing / /seng ge ser la ral pa ni/ /gyen 'greng bsdus te spyi bor yang / /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par bcings/ /'di ni khro bo 'chol pa ste/ /lag cha sna tshogs dag dang ldan/ /shar rtsibs la sogs rnam

bzhi la/ /gti mug sogs te bzhi po yang / /dkar dang ser dang dmar ba yang / /de bzhin bzhi pa ljang gu ste/ /g.yas kyis 'khor lor rin chen 'bar/ /pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /g.yon gyis dril bu legs par 'dzin/ /mtshams su la~M sogs las skyes pa/ /lha

mo bzhi po nges par bsam/ /bdag po 'dra ste sgeg nyams 'dzin/ /grwa yi lha mo mtshan la ni/ /sgeg mo khu tshur dkur ldan no/ /rin chen phreng ba phyag gnyis bsnams/ /pi wang sgrogs pa'i gsung dbyangs can/ /gar gyis rgyas par 'gro ba yi/ /don la rtag tu brtson

'grus ldan/ /bdug spos sogs dang bzhi po yang / /rang gi mtshan ma nges par 'dzin/ /phyag rgya'i sngags rnams brjod pas so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM dzi na dzika /de

nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ser sna rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM rat+Na d+h+r-ika /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'dod chags rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM A ro lika /de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sa rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM lo tsa nA hU~M/ de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos chu rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM A ma kI trAM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos me rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM paN+Da ri bA hrIH/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rlung rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM ta rA AH/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bde ba chen po skyed par byed pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM lA s+ye/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pas yon tan rgyud pa ma'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM mA le/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dbyangs can ma'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM gI ti/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gar ma'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM nr-i t+ye/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos mchod pa'i sngags rnams gsungs pa ni/ oM badzra d+hU pe/ oM badzra puSh+pe/ oM badzra dI pe/ oM badzra gan+d+he/

de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcings pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dgyes par byed pa'i sngags rnams bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsungs pa ni/ oM badzra oM ku sha dzaH/ oM badzra pA shahU~M/ oM badzra s+pho Ta ba~M/ oM badzra A be sha hoH/ blo ldan mkhas pas ci nus kyis/ /thig gi thig ni gdab pa la/ /tshad ldan 'jur mdud med pa dang / /gsher

zhing sar pa mdzes pa yis/ /shar du bltas te gdab par bya/ /tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab pa yang / /lho ru bltas te gdab par bya/ /de 'og mtha' yi thig gdab pa/ /byin zar gnas te dbang ldan blta/ /rlung gnas bden bral kha bltas te/ /nub tu legs

par bri bar bya/ /der gnas shar du kha bltas te/ /byang du bris te byin zar gnas/ /bden bral min pa'i mtha' ma gdab/ /blta ba bden bral phyogs su'o/ /slob dpon ldang min grogs po ni/ /zhon pa'i phyogs 'dug ste/ /tshangs thig dang po gdab par

bya/ /gnyis pa'ang bden bral phyogs 'dug ste/ /bgegs phyogs brkyang la gdab par bya/ /dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba yi/ /gzhal yas khang pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang / /rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa yi/ /dbus su rtsibs brgyad lte ba

la/ /rdo rje tho ba bri bar bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du/ /gri gug kyang ni bri bar bya/ /shar rtsibs 'khor lo chen po ste/ /rin chen lho yi phyogs rtsibs la/ /pad+ma dmar po nub tu bri/ /byang du rdo rje kun du rtse/ /shar lho phyogs su'ang de dang 'dra/ /grwa bzhir brgyad

po'ang nyis brtseg tu/ /mtshan ma rnams ni legs par bri/ /sgo bzhi dag tu bri ba yang / /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /gzhan yang rgyan kun legs par bri/ /mchod pa legs par dgram par bya/ /khu tshur dku gnyis bzhag pa dang / /de bzhin dpral bar nyug

pa dang / /kha nas 'byin dang gar bskyod dang / /bdug spos nyug dang me tog 'thor/ /mthe bong bsgreng ste rang lus la'ang / /gzhan la nyug tshul gnas pa ni/ /brgyad po mchod pa'i lha mo dag /bskyed dang legs gnas phyag rgya yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams dag /

rang lus bcug ste gnas pa la/ /sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+h+ra ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ mig sogs byin gyis brlab pa la/ /gti mug rdo rje

sogs kyis bsrung / /dbang sgrub stong pa nyid byas te/ /snying po'am ming gi yi ge yi/ /rigs kyi phyag mtshan bsnams pa yi/ /sku rnams nges par bskyed pas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bdud

rtsi myang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM AHhU~M/ dag cing 'bar bar rnam brtags te/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag po ste/ /zla ba'i dbus su gti mug bsam/ /rin chen dbus su bsam

pa yang / /ser sna nyid du bsam par bya/ /pad+ma'i dbus su 'dod chags bsam/ /sna tshogs dbus su phrag dog bsam/ /bsam bya ljags la sa bon te/ /'phros pas bkug ste tshim par bya/ /shar ni dkar po chen po ste/ /lho ni ser po nyid du'o/ /nub tu dmar

por nges par shes/ /byang ni ljang gu yang dag ldan/ /de las de bzhin re khA'i rim/ /dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i tshe na yang / /byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms/ /tshad med pa yi rim pa yis/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po

rnams/ /yod min med min gnyis ka min/ /gnyis ka min pa'ang ma yin te/ /spros bral ngo bo med par bsgom/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ ra~M las nyi ma rnam bsgoms te/ /de dbus las kyi rdo rje ni/ /kun tu rtse lnga'i rang bzhin te/ /de dbus hU~M las rdo rje ni/ /

kun tu phra mos bgegs bcom ste/ /ra ba gur dang sa gzhi yang / /de yi 'og tu nges par bsgom/ /gru gsum gyen bsgreng dkar po ni/ /shin tu gsal bar bdag gis dmigs/ /zhe sdang las ni sngar ma byung / /byung zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems la gzhol

ba dang / /gtong zhing thos pa'i khengs pa med/ /le lo bcom zhing khro ba med/ /ser sna med de g.yo yang med/ /sgyu spangs shes rab gsal ba dang / /gcig tu theg pa che la gzhol/ /des ni dka' ba med par yang / /gzhan gyi don du 'di brtsams na/ /grangs ni bye ba tshang ba

yi/ /bcu bzhir tshang ba'i gsang sngags kyis/ /las rnams kun grub the tshom med/ /yang lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de yi 'khrul 'khor ji lta bu/ /yi ge rnams ni ji ltar bri/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bdun tshan bdun dang

ldan pa yi/ /re'u mig legs par bri bar bya/ /las kun byed pa'i 'khor lo la/ /mchod pa yis kyang legs mchod la/ /de 'og las rnams brtsam par bya/ /bzlas pa'i mtshan ma rmi lam mam/ /mngon sum byung bar gyur nas kyang / /'khrul 'khor rnams ni bri

bya ba'i/ /rmi lam mtshan ma 'di yin te/ /tshal chen zug pa'i gling dag dang / /lha khang mchod rten gzhal yas su/ /dam pa rnams dang nges phrad de/ /dbang bskur ri la 'dzeg pa dang / /rgya mtshor bcas pa'i chu brgal lam/ /kla klo bran du 'khol rmi na/ /nges par 'grub

ste 'khor lo bri/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa gsungs te/ ya~M las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor/ /sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs can la/ /ba dan ldan par nges par bsam/ /ra~M las byung ba'i me dkyil 'khor/ /gru gsum

dmar po bsam par bya/ /ba~M las byung ba chu yin te/ /dkar po zlum po bsam par bya/ /la~M byung sa yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /ljang ser gru bzhi bsam byas te/ /sngon du bsam bya lta rim bzhin/ /twa ra phyi nas nges par bsam/ /b+h+ru~M las byung ba'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs/ /

drug gnyis ldan pa'i lte ba la/ /b+h+ru~M las gzhal yas khang pa ste/ /gdan dang ldan par sgrub pos bsam/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis bde bar gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsdu bar bya'o/ /oM badzra sa mA dzaH/ lag ngar

gnyis ni nges bsnol la/ /mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul byas te/ /se gol brdab cing bsdu bar bya/ /lcags kyu la sogs rnam pa bzhis/ /nges par dgug pa la sogs bya/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos mchod pa'i sngags

'di gsungs so/ /oM ar+g+haM pratI ts+tsha swA hA/ pra bar sat+kA ra pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ nag po ra ri med pa yi/ /bum pa lto che bre tshad pa/ /mchu 'phyang mgrin ring gdan ldan par/ /snying por ldan pa'i sman sogs gzhug /mgrin par ras dag gis dkri/ /'dab mar

ldan pa'i lcug ma yang / /dri dang ldan pa'i kha rgyan te/ /bdud rtsir ldan pa yis kyang mchod/ /bla re gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / /ba dan sil snyan rol mo yis/ /gus pas dkyil 'khor la yang mchod/ /'dzam bu'i gling ngam gling gzhan dag /nor bu rin chen bkang ba yang / /

stong gsum la sogs de bzhin te/ /zhum pa med par byas te dbul/ /blo ldan sgrub pos sems can la/ /phan pa'i sems kyis srog mi gcod/ /ma byin par yang mi blang ngo / /'dod pa mi spyad mi smra/ /gnod pa'i rgyu phyir chang mi btung / /gdug pa rnams las bzlog

ste bya/ /dngos su'am yang na sngags dang gzhan/ /'khrul 'khor dang ni ting nge 'dzin/ /sman gyis kyang ni bya ba ste/ /de ltar mi byed de yi ni/ /nges par dam tshig nyams par 'gyur/ /gdon dang log 'dren dag gis kyang / /nges par 'chi ste dmyal bar ni/ /yun ring sdug

bsngal gyis sdug ste/ /de bas nan tan ldan pa ru/ /bzod pa mi bskyed snying rje yis/ /sngags kyis nges par gsad par bya/ /mi ldog pa yi sems su gnas/ /byang chub chu yis ra ro zhing / /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/ /phyag rgya che la de gzhol te/ /ngo bo dang bral dngos po

'jig /ma byin byang chub blang pa la/ /brtson pas le lo dor bar bya/ /du shes bya dngos po rnams/ /de nas de bzhin gzhan la brjod/ /rgyas btab pa yi dngos po la/ /rgyab shig shes rab ral gri yis/ /bcad cing rnam pa med pa la/ /bsad pa yang ni nga yis bsgrags/ /

u med pa yi yi ge rnams/ /steng gi g.yas phyogs nyid nas bri/ /'og gi yi ge bri ba ni/ /de nyid g.yon gyi phyogs nas bri/ /A li kA li nges bris te/ /k+ShaHma gtogs par dbus stong ste/ /de la bgegs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ /ming sogs nges par bri ba yang / /lto ba'i
