nang du chud par bri/ /'khor lo nyid kyang de 'dra ba/ /grwa bzhi dag tu bri ba ni/ /ma ning 'dod pa'i kA li dang / /A li min te lhag ma yin/ /gdug pa'i yi ge bcu bzhi po/ /ming dang bcas pa phyogs bzhir bri/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa yis/ /bzhi pa gcig

gi mgo stengs su/ /sum skor nyid ni shis pa yin/ /las kun byed pa'i 'khor lo de/ /'dri bar byed pa'i spyi dus dang / /khyad par dus tshes lha yi ni/ /rnal 'byor med pas bya ba min/ /phyogs su blta ba'i bye brag gis/ /las kyi sgrub pos shes par bya/ /las kun

byed pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /bde gshegs kun gyi snying po ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'ang yin/ /'khor lo 'dir ni bcug pa gang / /sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig /dam chos smod pa'ang de bzhin zhi/ /'khor los sgyur ba'ang dbang du 'du/ /lha min pra

ti'ang zhi bar byed/ /dgra bcom gsod pa'ang de zhi la/ /brgya byin nyid kyang dbang du nges/ /de lta bu yi 'khor lo de/ /thog mar bris te de 'og tu/ /byin rlabs ma nor de nyid la/ /mchod pa gus par bdag gis bya/ /mchod min las rnams byas pa la/ /'bras bu

'byung min 'khrul pa la'ang / /'bras med ngal ba nyid yin no/ /yang lha mo ro langs ma nyid stan las langs te mchod pa chen po byas te 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// //'khor lo 'dri ba'i snag tsha gang / /bri gzhi smyu gu ji lta bu/ /gcig gam 'on te de tha dad/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /ji ltar las rnams bye brag yod pa ltar/ /bri ba'i gnas dang gzhug pa'i gnas/ /

tha dad de bzhin 'khor lo bsgrub/ /snag tsha tha dad 'bru rnams bzhin/ /grong khyer chen po bsrung 'dod dam/ /skyes pa bsrung bar 'dod na yang / /gro ga de bzhin u b+hi shun/ /gla gor zho sha'i shun pa'am/ /ras la kha ches 'khor lo ni/ /bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan

par ro/ /so ma btang ba'i kham phor du/ /sbrang mar dag dbus 'khor lo gzhug /skud pa dkar pos legs par dkri/ /nang par shar du kha bltas te/ /me tog dkar po dag gis mchod/ /bdag nyid dkar po'i mdog tu bsam/ /mdun du skyes

pa zla ba la/ /mtha' dag gnas pa mdun du bsam/ /sangs rgyas phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yis/ /bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yi/ /chu rgyun dag gis dbang bskur te/ /de 'og bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /swA hA'i sngon du bskul tshig ldan/ /bud med la ni gi wang

ste/ /phyi rol mtshams bzhir phur pa yis/ /bgegs bskrad steng du bla re bri/ /phyi ma skyes pa'i ji bzhin no/ /bye brag tu yang skyes pa'am/ /bud med zhi bar 'dod na yang / /ga pur tsan+dan dag gis ni/ /shir sha shing gi shun pa la/ /'khor lo yi ge legs bris

te/ /shar du nang par bltas te mchod/ /las kun byed pa'i thabs la yang / /sngon gsungs zhal ldan dgod par bya/ /phyi rol mtshams bzhir phur pa yis/ /bgegs bskrad steng du bla re bri/ /bum pa kha rgyan dang ldan zhing / /rin chen 'bru dang sman du ldan/ /dri

zhim chu dang ldan par bya/ /gos ni mgrin pa dkri/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya/ /thang ka'am dkyil 'khor la mchod de/ /dri'am chu dang me tog dang / /bsres pa'i skyor mos chu yang blugs/ /gzar bu stong gis sbyin sreg bya/ /chu des gzhan yang

gtor bar bya/ /bar ma chad par nyin bdun du/ /de ltar rgyun du gtor ma sbyin/ /phyi nas 'khor lo rin chen de/ /bum pa'i nang nas rnam phyung ste/ /rgyal mtshan rtse la btags nas su/ /gnas mthon por yang gzhag par bya/ /zhi bar byed pa the tshom med/ /sngar bshad

pa yi shing shun dang / /dur khrod ras la sgrub po yis/ /yung ba'i khu bas 'khor lo bri/ /so ma btang ba'i kham phor du/ /bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes sa dag dang / /snang mdzad chu ngogs sa dag dang / /ri dang lam sa btags nas ni/ /ldong ros dang ni yung ba yi/ /khu bas

sbrus te gzugs byas la/ /'khor lo gnyis dril yung ba dang / /ldong ros kyi ni khu bas bsku/ /snying gar bcug ste gzhug par bya/ /seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pas/ /lus la sogs pa gdab par bya/ /dgra rnams 'ong ba'i lam du yang / /khung bur brkos te gzhug par

bya/ /la~M las dbang chen gyis mnan cing / /su~M las skyes pa de steng na/ /sna tshogs las kyis mnan pa yi/ /kham phor skud ser dkri bar bya/ /rgyal chen dag ni ser po yang / /dbang chen la gnas lhor bltas te/ /bsgrub bya ser po'i rigs mnan par/ /bsams

nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /swA hA med par sta~M b+ha ya/ /la~M gyi mtha' can lnga stong bzlas/ /gtor ma rgyun du sbyin par bya/ /rengs pa chen po'i las 'di yis/ /dmag gi dpung yang nges par rengs/ /'ga' tsam la ni smos ci dgos/ /sran ne lan gsum bsngags pa

yis/ /dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bri/ /rims dang dug gis zin pa de/ /de yi steng du gzhag par bya/ /bdag nyid dkar por rnam bsams te/ /cho gas byab cing gdon par bya/ /de ni de nas zhi bar 'gyur/ /ngag dag rengs par 'dod na yang / /smyo byed khu ba dur khrod

sol/ /btsag rnams bsres te so ma btang / /kham phor gnyis la 'khor lo 'di/ /pho dang mo yi skor phyogs gnyis/ /ma nor bris te kha sbyar la/ /ro bsregs so dang thal bas g.yogs/ /steng du bzlas shing spel ba ni/ /sta~M b+ha na dang ku ru la~M/ /swA hA med pa'i sngags

'di yis/ /kha bcing ba ni nges par 'gyur/ /gang zhig gsad par byed pa la/ /snying rjer ldan pa'i gang zag gis/ /gdug byed las 'di byed pa la/ /gshin dgra lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /gcig gis ni 'grub par byed/ /bcu bzhi nyi ma phyed pa na/ /bya rog

sgro rtsa'i smyu gu yis/ /dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la/ /dug dang tshwa dang ske tshe dang / /nim pa tsha ba gsum dag dang / /tsha ba'i mar khu dur khrod sol/ /smyo byed mdzub mo'i khrag gis bri/ /ro bsregs pa yi thal ba dang / /bsgrub bya'i rkang pa'i rjes kyis/ /mi yi rus phye la sogs

la/ /gzugs byas de yi snying gar gzhug /dur me dag la de bgro zhing / /khros pa'i sems kyis khri bzlas na/ /skad cig tsam gyis 'chi ba ni/ /de yi khyim mam dur du sba/ /de lta'i las kyis de 'grub ste/ /mtshan mo phyed na kha lhor blta/ /

bdag nyid 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te/ /zhal sogs sngon du gsungs pa ltar/ /ma he'i steng na mche ba gtsigs/ /gsus khyim che la gyen skra 'bar/ /spu sogs gzhan yang de 'dra'o/ /ba spu dag gi bu ga nas/ /'jigs mtshon sna tshogs thogs pa yi/ /

khro bo mang po 'phro ba ste/ /bdag nyid bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar/ /bsgrub bya mdun du bsam bya ba/ /mtshams med rdzogs pa'i sdig dang ldan/ /dri ma can de phyogs gos 'chang / /grong khyer skye bos 'tshe ba can/ /grang ba'i reg pas lus la rgyas/ /mtshon gyis btab

pa byas pa la/ /gcan gzan sogs za mdun du bsam/ /ngag tu'ang de ltar yang yang brjod/ /lcags kyi 'khyud mos yan lag bsdams/ /tsher mas dbug pa byas pa ste/ /lus kyi pags pa med par bsam/ /ske tshe lan tshwas lus byugs te/ /a chu ba

yi sgra 'byin bsam/ /de yi mgon skyabs bsal byas nas/ /gshin rje'i lto ba'i tha mar gzhag /be con thogs pas de za'o/ /'di ltar bsad pas sangs rgyas kyi/ /sras su de ni skye bar 'gyur/ /las kyi sdig las de grol lo/ /gsod pa'i sngags de spel

ba ni/ /hU~M che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M/ bsgrub bya nang dag dbye ba ni/ /ma he rta yi pags pa dag /yang na ro dang dur khrod ras/ /rta dang ma he byi la 'am/ /khyim bya'i khrag dang ske tshe bsre/ /der ni 'khor lo 'di bris te/ /rnam par 'gras pa bskul

dang ldan/ /rta sbal dag gi nang bcug ste/ /ma he'i rmig pa'i nang bcug la/ /stong phrag bcu ni tshang bar bzlas/ /nim pa'i shing bsros de nang sba/ /de nang 'gras pa nyid dang ni/ /dpag tshad brgyas chod 'thab par 'gyur/ /a nu ki dang a mu ki/ /bi dA+e Sha ya phaT/ rims

kyis thebs par bya ba la/ /dur khrod ko ba che ba la/ /arka shing gi lo ma dang / /tsi tra ka dang ske tshe dang / /khrag gis 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /bri ba bskos la ri mos dgang / /seng ldeng 'dab ma du med la/ /bsro zhing khros pas lnga brgya bzla/ /khyim dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / /dur khrod sbas na

rims kyis 'dzin/ /rgyas pa'i las kyis rgyas 'dod na/ /gi wang gis ni gro ga la/ /'khor lo gnyis ni rnam bris te/ /bskul tshig ldan par yi ge bri/ /zla drug thang ka'i mdun dag tu/ /gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mos/ /rin chen char ni 'bebs pa dang / /gshin dgra ser

po zla ser la/ /gnas par bsams te khri bzlas na/ /'phags pa nor 'dzin 'dra bar 'gyur/ /oM che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru oM/ grog sogs kyi shog shog la/ /gi wang dang ni rang byung gi/ /me tog dag gis bri ba ste/ /yang na tha ltag khrag dang ni/ /bil ba'i lo ma'i khu ba dang / /

ras dmar po yi khu ba dang / /sen rtsi rnams bsres bri bar bya/ /spra tshil gyis ni 'khor lo dril/ /bum pa mar sbrang ldan par gzhag /dus bzhi dag tu mchod pa ni/ /me tog dmar pos mchod pa'o/ /de tshe bzlas pa tshul dag ni/ /hoHwA shaM ku ru hoH/ /de mthag tu lha rnams

kyang / /dbang du byed par nges 'gyur ro/ /gro ga dag la bri ba ni/ /zla ba gzas zin dus dag gam/ /rgyal gyi nyin par bri bya ste/ /skud pa dmar pos 'khor lo dkri/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /thod pa kha sbyar nang gzhag ste/ /bzlas pa khris ni brgya byin gyi/ /bu mo 'ang rnyed par

nges 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la/ /gur gum sogs kyis 'khor lo bri/ /yi ge thig les rnam bskor te/ /a mu ki dang mA ma kI/ /mo ha na dang rnam spel la/ /bsgrub bya'i gos kyi mtha' ma la/ /legs btags chos kyi dbyings nyid du/ /bsgoms nas zlos shing 'gro na

yang / /lha dang lha min gyis mi mthong / /bdag nyid gshin dgra nyid bsgoms nas/ /chu yi steng nas 'gro 'dod na/ /rdul phran lha yi rnam par te/ /o rgyan du ni bdag rang nyid/ /nges par steng 'gro gzhan dag kyang / /bu mos nags kyi ras bal la/ /skud pa bkal ba gzhon nu mas/ /

sum sgril du yang de yis bya/ /gdug sngags stong du tshang bar te/ /bzlas tshul sngon du gsungs pa bzhin/ /skar ma rgyal gyi dus la bzla/ /bri ba'i nyin mo'ang de la'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhar brtag pa/ /g.yon gyis mdud byas gzhan la gdags/ /ma lus

mtshon dag rengs byed de/ /gcer bu ba lang rengs par byed/ /me tog las ni gzhan du min/ /sha lnga sogs kyi ril bu ni/ /legs par grib ma dag la bskam/ /lcags gsum dag gis dkri bar bya/ /bzlas shing mchod pa byed pa'i tshe/ /dngul dag gi ni rang bzhin bya/ /'bar

bar gyur ba nyid na yang / /mchod pa legs par rnam byas te/ /skor ba brgya phrag du ma bya/ /de nas blo ldan sgrub pa pos/ /khar bcug tsam gyis 'dod pa bsgrub/ /phyung na sngon ltar rnal ma nyid/ /gso ba 'dra bar 'o mas kyang / /nges par 'khrul 'khor bkru bar bya/ /rig sngags

'khrul 'khor las grol te/ /rnal ma nyid la gnas pa yin/ /snum ster dag gi sa bon la/ /nya lcibs dang ni byi tang ka /khu bas yang de byugs pa la/ /thod pas sa ni rnam bkang bar/ /sbas te bzlas pa grangs med bya/ /de tshe mchod dang gtor ma dag /yongs rgyas 'bras bu rnam

blangs te/ /khar bcug mkha' 'gro'i byar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /zhus dang 'das dus byung gdug pa/ /mngon par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par spros pa dang / /thig gis gzhal yas mtshon pa dang / /rdul tshon phyogs las rnam par

brtags/ /yang dag byin gyis brlabs pa dang / /bdud rtsi myang bar bya ba dang / /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa dang / /sngags kyi dngos med de bzhin mtshams/ /chos 'byung dang ni sgrub po dang / /bzlas dang de yi grangs tshad dang / /'khor lo dang ni yi ge gnyis/ /nges par

zhus dang mchod pa dang / /'khor lo 'dri ba'i mtshan ma dang / /'byung ba bzhi dang bsdu sogs dang / /sdom pa 'khor lo'i yi ge bri/ /gzhi dang de bzhin snag tsha dang / /so so las kyi bye brag ste/ /bsdus te nga yis bstan pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po rnams la

gtor mas tshim par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las sngags 'di phyung ngo / /oM hrIHSh+yIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'byung po rnams dang rnam spel te/ /tha mar sbyar ba byas pa ni/ /hi hi hi hU~M phe~M phe~M phe~M swA hA/ /

dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam bzhugs pa'i/ /zhe sdang gshin gshed rdo rje ni/ /spros med nam mkha' lta bu las/ /snying rje'i thabs kyis sku sprul ba/ /ye shes khro rgyal rab 'jigs pa'i/ /dud pa mun chen sku la 'dud/ /gar dgu nyams dang ldan pa yi/ /gti mug rdo rje

gshin rje'i gshed/ /skye med don dam ngang nyid las/ /thabs kyi sprul pa'i skur bstan pa/ /'jigs byed drag po'i cha lugs can/ /zla ba nya 'dra khyod la 'dud/ /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi/ /ser sna gshin rje'i rdo rje ni/ /'dzin pa po las grol ba yis/ /

gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bor sprul/ /gter 'chang ser sna grol mdzad pa/ /btso ma gser 'dra khyod la 'dud/ /chags pas ma lus dbang mdzad pa'i/ /'dod chags gshin rje'i rdo rje ni/ /skye med rnam dag chos dbyings las/ /khams gsum pa dag khro bar

sprul/ /ma chags spyan ldan thugs rje can/ /ban+du lta bu'i sku la 'dud/ /shes rab thabs ldan he ru ka/ /phrag dog gshin rje'i rdo rje ni/ /rnam rtog dpe dang bral ba las/ /thugs rjes sprul pa'i khro bo ni/ /'gro don brtson pa'i ral gri can/ /sna tshogs mdog can khyod

la 'dud/ /thams cad bskyed pa'i lha mo che/ /dpang po lta bur sgyur mdzad pa/ /khams gsum gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan/ /rnam snang can gyis bdud bzhi 'jigs/ /bde ba chen pos rtag tu dgyes/ /ye shes spyan can khyod la 'dud/ /kun sdud lha mo rin po che/ /rnam

rtog skyon las rnam grol yang / /dus gsum bde gshegs bdag gir byed/ /rin chen tog can mdzes pa'i sku/ /don dam thugs chud 'khor ba sel/ /ma lus kun gyi bdag la 'dud/ /'dus byas ma lus sreg byed pa/ /rnam rtog zhi ba'i rang bzhin las/ /khams

gsum ma lus sgrol bar byed/ /'od dpag med kyis rab mdzes pa/ /ma chags phyag na bsnams pa yi/ /phrin las dag byed can la 'dud/ /thugs rjes g.yo ba'i rang bzhin can/ /'jig rten gsum dag sgrol bar byed/ /gnyis med bde chen

ngang nyid las/ /phrin las grub pa'i rang bzhin can/ /btang snyoms bzhugs pas 'gro ba 'dul/ /kun tu las kyi rgyal la 'dud/ /ces gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa la so sor yongs su bstod do/ /de nas yang thams cad kyi bdag pos legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo

rnams kyi sku la btud de/ /gdug pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge ni/ /bcu bzhi pa la dmigs pa yang / /'khor bar dmigs par bya ba 'am/ /nyi ma'i steng na skyes pa ltar/ /dmigs te ma yengs brjed pa med/ /bzlas pa nyid ni de ltar bya/ /bye ba tshang bar bzlas pa yis/ /

rab 'byam las la mi 'grub pa/ /med de de yis thams cad 'grub/ /'bum dang sa ya bzlas pas kyang / /phra mo'i las rnams 'grub par byed/ /gzhan du mi 'gro'i sems kyis ni/ /de lta'i tshul du bzlas pa bya/ /yul gzhan blo ni 'gro ba yis/ /bskal

par bzlas kyang 'bras mi 'byin/ /mi 'phro sems kyis 'di zlos shing / /lam du zhugs pa'i skyes bu la/ /stag sogs chu yis mi 'jigs so/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dbang gi blo sbyangs rab ldan pas/ /'bras thob de med mi 'grub ste/ /de bas de ni

bshad par bya/ /bum pa'i dbang gis thog mar sbyang / /gsang ba'i dbang gis gnyis pa ste/ /gsum par bya ba de nyid ni/ /shes rab ye shes de yin te/ /de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yin/ /brtan g.yo dngos po ma lus pa/ /bsgom par bya ba'i dus nyid la/ /

blos ni yongs su mi bsgom ste/ /kun gyi mtshan nyid ma shes na/ /bsgom pa kho na de min te/ /thams cad dngos nyid yongs shes na/ /de ni bsgom par yongs su bsgrags/ /de nyid bla ma'i kha yis te/ /'bad pas mnyes bya de mi smad/ /de la thams cad 'byung ba

ste/ /bla ma la smod g.yo sgyu can/ /nges par de ni dug dang yang / /gdon chen dag ni ma lus pas/ /'chi zhing brlags par de gyur nas / /dmyal ba dag tu yun ring ltung / /bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal te/ /rtag tu cho nges 'debs par byed/ /de bas blo gros chen po la/ /

nam du'ang mi smad gzhan du na/ /bkur sti phu dud 'gro ba la/ /phan pa'i sems kyis de ltar bya/ /gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba nyid/ /gang dag dbang po'i lam 'gro ba/ /de de'i ngo bor bdag gis bya/ /bsam gtan mi byed de blo yis/ /kun tu blo yis bsgom par bya/ /

bcom ldan bdag po chen po yis/ /gsang dbang lag na rdo rje la/ /bos nas gsang ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs/ /gzugs sgra la sogs drug po rnams/ /dngos med mkha' dang 'dra ba las/ /longs spyod yul du du mar snang / /shel la tshon ni ji bzhin du/ /'dod pa

lnga dang chos rnams la/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor spyod par shog /a la la ho/ /rol du gsol/ bsnams par mdzod/ mi 'dzin sgyu ma lta bu la/ /gar gyis dgyes pa'i rol pa mdzod/ /rig bya dgag pa med pa la/ /mi g.yo bzhin du rol par mdzod/ /ho chags pa med pas

chags par mdzod/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i/ /de yi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i phyir/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /lce la sgom pa'i rdo rje ni/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes nag po ste/ /kha ni kun du gyes pa yi/ /lag gnyis

thal mo nges sbyar te/ /gung mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs nyid la/ /mthe bong nges par sbyar bar bya/ /mdzub mo gung mo'i rgyab rtser sbyar/ /'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya ste/ /snying ga dpral ba lkog ma dang / /spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT a d+hi tiSh+Tha

swa mAM/ /gzhan yang rdo rje sems ma sogs/ /phyag rgyas dbang bskur dbu rgyan brtag /gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa/ /so so'i bdag pos dbu brgyan cing / /dbang bskur tshe na bum pa che/ /phyag gis bsnams te dbang bskur ro/ /'khor lo las kun byed pa la/ /

gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod/ /gdug pa skrag byed 'khor lo me ltar 'bar/ /dus gsum khro rgyal he ru ka yi thugs/ /las rnams dag byed phrag dog rdo rje ste/ /ma lus tshems gcod gsol bas sku yi

dang / /hU~M dang phaT kyi gdug rtsub sbyor bas gsung / /kun gyi rang bzhin khyod kyis gshin rje yi/ /ltor 'dzud bka' las ngas kyang mi 'da' zhing / /phyogs bcu'i sprul pas gnas nas 'gugs mdzad pa/ /ma lus kun byed 'khor lo che mchog la/ /gzhan gyi don

rdzogs gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni dpa' bo thub chen kun gyi bdud/ /nga yis lam bstan bdud rnams mi phyed kyang / /dam las 'da' zhing log pa kun bskyed la/ /khyod kyang bka' las ma 'da' las rnams sgrubs/ /tshe dang srog bsdus yan lag rnam par

bcings/ /bdud rtsi chu rgyun rnal 'byor nga la 'dod sgrub na/ /ngas ni sbyin bya khyod ni dam las ma 'da' zhig /ces dpal gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i 'khor lo gzhan gyi lto ba la gnas 'cha' bar 'dod pa'i gtan 'pho ba ma yin pa'i tshe bya'o/ /'khor lo snying gar lta ba'i

tshe/ /sa bon tshul te lte ba la/ /yi ge ma lus 'dod pa yang / /mtshan nyid ngan pa'i rtog pa las/ /grol te mtha' gsum ngo bo las/ /k+ShaHni zad pa'i bdag nyid la/ /u ni hU~M gi bdag nyid de/ /de ni sems kyi rang bzhin nyid/ /dga' las 'das pa'i ye shes

te/ /thabs ni shes rab ldan pa las/ /dus thabs bstan pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /'thob ste gzhan du de mi 'thob/ /chu 'gram chen po bas mtha' dang / /dur khrod shing drung dgon pa ste/ /dben pa'i yul dang ma mo'i khyim/ /der ni mgon po 'di la 'bad/ /gzhan

du bsgrubs kyang de mi 'grub/ /skad cig de la rang bzhin kun/ /nges par mi snang rig pa yi/ /lam du gyur pa med par shes/ /'bras bu de ni rgya chen te/ /mtha' yi 'thob pa de yin no/ /de nas yang thams cad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pas rdo rje sa'i cho ga gsungs pa na

skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor rab gnas pas/ /sdang ba'i log 'dren skye bo dang / /bgegs rnams bsal ba 'di skad gsungs/ /dpal

ldan bdag ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /bdag gis ye shes rdo rje yis/ /lus ngag yid du bcas pa dag /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni/ /khro bo gshin rje nag po'i bdag /slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes lan gsum

gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni drung nyid du/ /dar gyis gdong ni bkab pa la/ /sgo drung gnas pa khyod gang yin/ /slob dpon gyis ni rab brjod de/ /des bdag skal ba ldan par brjod/ /ji ltar bla med dpa' bo yis/ /mgon la dbang ni bskur ba bzhin/ /

bla med byang chub gnas bya'i phyir/ /bdag la'ang mgon pos dbang bskur gsol/ /me tog sogs te mchod pa'i mchog /rab 'byam rgya mtsho ma lus pas/ /slob dpon dpa' bo de nyid la/ /yang yang mchod cing bstod pa'i tshogs/ /rgyas par mnyes bya de 'og

tu/ /dpa' bos de la dbang rnams sbyin/ /de nas rgyal po bde chen po/ /dpa' bo longs spyod kun ldan pa/ /'gro don brtson pa'i sku gsum bdag /nyid kyis 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /sbyin sreg med na 'bras mi 'byin/ /de bas bdag nyid dam pa yis/ /

de yi las la 'bad par bya/ /gos nag rgyan gyis rnam brgyan la/ /gshin rjer rnam bltas rnal 'byor pas/ /khro bo'i skyil krung bcas pa yis/ /sra ba'i stan la bdag 'dug nas/ /las rnams bsgrub par bya ba ni/ /mtshan mo'am nyi ma phyed nyid na/ /ra~M

byung me yi dkyil 'khor du/ /hU~M phaT mtha' na yod pa yi/ /sngags kyi thog ma bar tha mar/ /sbyin sreg bya ste de me ni/ /dur khrod me 'am rus pa'am/ /rdo nyid las ni byung pa'am/ /tsaN+Da lI yi khyim nyid nas/ /thab khung gru gsum can der ni/ /tsher ma can gyi

bud shing brdzang / /rlung g.yab sbar te hU~M dz+wa la ra~M/ /dz+wa la hU~M brjod me sbar brjod/ /lag g.yas ku sha bcas pa yis/ /mthe bong srin lag rtsa ru gzugs/ /oM e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta de ba r-i Shi dwi dza sat+ta ma gr-i hI twA A hU ti A hA ra~M a smin sa~M ni hi to b+ha ba zhes

brjod la spyan drang ngo / /'bar ba me yi dbus nyid du/ /ming de zad byed ces bya ba/ /khro bo me ltar phun sum tshogs/ /ba spu kham pa de bzhin du/ /du mdog zur mig steng du gzigs/ /sgra che mche bzhi ldan stobs che/ /ya~M las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /bzhugs

nas drag po'i yi ge brjod/ /spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /rig pa'i gnas la legs par bzhugs/ /zhal bdun rnam gtsigs ma he la/ /chibs pa du ba'i phreng rnams 'khrigs/ /phyag gnyis mdung dang rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnyis kyis ral gri gri gug 'dzin/ /de yi

g.yas kyi phyogs nyid du/ /de bzhin mdun gyi phyogs nyid dam/ /spyan drangs byin brlabs ldan pa la/ /ar+g+haM sogs kyis mchod pa bya/ /oM ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ lag g.yas mdzub mo mthe bong dag /skam pa lta bur rnam byas pas/ /chu blangs bskyod pas dbul bar bya/ /

oM pA t+yaM mthar ni sngon gyi brjod/ /zhabs bkru ba la shis pa yis/ /dgang gzar yu ba sor bcu drug /de min sor bzhi zabs sor gnyis/ /zur gsum dbus su sor gnyis tshad/ /rtse gsum phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /de yi dbus su'ang mtshan ma ste/ /

stag sbrul gang 'dod pas mtshan bya/ /khu bcud 'dzag pa sor gcig go/ /khro bo rdo rje mchu yi dbyibs/ /byin brlabs sor gcig tshad can no/ /blugs gzar yu ba sor bcu bzhi/ /zabs su sor gcig gru gsum dang / /yu ba'i mthar ni rtse gsum

pa/ /gdengs pa byin brlabs mngon spyod kyi/ /gzar bu yin par nga yis bstan/ /gnam lcags tsher ma can sogs shing / /de la de byas sangs rgyas 'jigs/ /bsreg rdzas gzugs brnyan la sogs bsreg /stong du tshang pas 'bras bu ni/ /nges

par 'byin par byed ma yin/ /g.yon gyi rtsa der dgang gzar la/ /g.yas pa blugs pa'i gzar bu yin/ /kha ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma yin/ /sor mo gnyis par de rgyas so/ /rdo rje bar gyi thod pa dag /bsreg rdzas kyi ni snod yin la/ /rdzas rnams

rdo rje rin chen dpal/ /hU~M phaT kyi ni mtha' can gyis/ /bsreg bya sa chu me dang rlung / /nam mkha' lta bu'i dbus su gnas/ /kha bye gnas pa rtag tu'o/ /kun tu'ang kha phye bskor bar bya/ /bzhi gnyis 'dab ma'i steng du ste/ /lte ba dang ni yang dag ldan/ /

lhan cig rnam par shes pa'i lha/ /nam mkha' nyid du nges par 'bar/ /de yi mtshan mar shes bya ba/ /rdul gyi rnam par de nyid do/ /thig le yi ge med pa ste/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'od kyis gnas/ /brgyar gshags skra yi tshad kyis so/ /ar+g+has rab

tu sbar bar bya/ /sngar gsungs 'byung ba rnam bzhi dang / /nam mkhar yang dag ldan pa yi/ /sor mo lnga dang nges ldan pas/ /gang gi sbyin sreg des bya'o/ /gzhan dag sor mo gsum gyis bsreg /dmigs pa thams cad 'gag par 'gyur/ /rten

med stong pa nam mkha' 'dra/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/ /phyag rgya chen po dbang du 'gyur/ /bde gshegs kun dang mnyam 'gyur ba/ /shes rab dang ni snying rje ches/ /'gag pa med pa'i chos 'gyur ro/ /bde chen nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /rnal

'byor pa yi dmigs pa yin/ /mdog nag 'dab brgyad lta bu la/ /rgya dang zabs su sor mo ni/ /nyi shu de bzhin bcu pa'i thab/ /byang du rtse mo bstan pa la/ /rdo rje tho ba'i mtshan ma de/ /sor ni bzhi bar bri bar bya/ /de steng sor mo gsum bor bar/ /kha

khyer kyang ni de yi tshad/ /sa nag bong bu rnga mo'i sbangs/ /mi rus 'bras kyi phub ma dang / /sol ba'i phye mas rnam byugs la/ /mi zhim dri dang bdug pas mchod/ /dur khrod shing ngam bong bu dang / /rnga mo'i sbangs skam bud shing ngo / /sor gcig gis ni dma' ba

yin/ /nim pa de bzhin seng ldeng dang / /se ba de bzhin bse shing dang / /dur khrod shing bu sor bcu ba/ /rtsa ba'i cha las rnam byung ba/ /dur khrod mar khu rnams bsnyugs la/ /de yis yam shing bya ba yin/ /bya rog 'ug pa'i gshog pa

dang / /nim pa'i 'dab ma thal ba dang / /rkang rjes sa dang bong bu dang / /rnga mo sogs kyi sbangs dang ni/ /skra dang zhag dang bshang ba dang / /gci ba mi rus yungs kar dang / /yungs mar khrag dang lan tshwa dang / /de la sogs pa re re zhing / /ji ltar rnyed pa'i

rdzas rnams ni/ /dug dang khrag dang smyo byed kyi/ /'dab khu thal ba sol ba dang / /'bras kyi phung ma la sogs pa/ /dgra bo dag gi gzugs byas la/ /mgo nas brtsams te ral gri yis/ /dum bur gtub cing lcags phor du/ /khrag dang chu dang mi

rnams dang / /bong bu'i gcin la phaT ldan pa'i/ /gdug pa'i yi ge rnams bzlas pa'i/ /rdzas la bsang gtor byas nas kyang / /slob dpon la sdang rmongs pa 'di/ /brjod cing sbyin sreg dbul bar bya/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /'byung bo tshim bya

gtor ma dang / /bstod bzlas mnyes par bya ba dang / /dbang gi dbye ba bstan pa dang / /dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya ba dang / /de yi sa la mchod pa sogs/ /cod pan du ni bde gshegs gzhag /mngon spyod hom gyi cho ga dang / /bsdus nas bar du rnam pa

brgyad/ /pad+ma dkar 'dra mgrin pa ring / /gzugs mdzes ha cang ring ba min/ /lus la rdul byung yid 'phrog ma/ /dri ni shin tu'ang zhim pa yin/ /lta stangs mig sogs 'dra/ /mgrin dang lto ba'ang kyi/ /skal bzang rked pa'ang

kyi/ /glang chen dri ldan bzhin 'phel che/ /myos shing nu ma rab tu rgyas/ /gzhan yang kun rdzob bden pa ni/ /bong thung de yi skra yang thung / /rkang lag ring zhing bzhin ring ma/ /nya yi dri bro bong ring ma/ /zla 'dra skye gnas rab tu ring / /skye gnas chung zhing yan lag

rtsub/ /bong ring de bzhin nu ma mkhrang / /skra srab dal smra yan lag chung / /sngo bsangs ri mo mnyam pa de/ /gsang ba shes rab rnam gnyis la/ /rig mar nga yis bsgrags pa yin/ /ngang pa'i 'gros can skra 'khyil ma/ /bzhin zlum nu rgyas lus kyang rgyas/ /

shin tu ring min dal bar smra/ /dbus nas rna 'phyang gnyer gsum can/ /mtshan nyid ngan zhing le lo che/ /yan lag nag cing skra 'khyil ma/ /khang par gnas shing lus rtsub ma/ /sa li'i dri 'byung sa li bro/ /nu yangs de ni skyes bu bzhin/ /chang gis

myos pa'i dpa' mo ste/ /chang la shin tu chags pa yin/ /de gnyis de la shis pa yin/ /tha ma tha mar nges par yin/ /'chi ba'i bsam gtan de nyid ni/ /bde ba dam pa kho bos 'dod/ /'di la'ang bde ba de nyid yin/ /ka sogs spangs pa'i A li

ni/ /bcu drug yin te phrag gnyis po/ /'khor lo sogs pa'i sa bon yin/ /zla ba de dag sum cu gnyis/ /A sogs spangs pa'i kA li ste/ /bcu bdun gnyis pa de steng du/ /ya sogs spangs pa min pa nyid/ /gsum pa'i gsum dang bzhi

pa'i gnyis/ /bcu phrag bzhi ste de phrag gnyis/ /sen mo zangs sogs sa bon te/ /nyi mar rnam bsgrags de dbus gnas/ /hU~M dang a yi rang bzhin las/ /rdo rje tho sogs so sor rtog /thim pas nan tan ye shes te/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid dag

pa ste/ /gshin dgrar bdag nyid 'dod pa yin/ /rgyan gyi bye brag lus la gnas/ /de ni 'di skad bya ba ste/ /rig pa shes rab bstan pa dang / /bskyed pa'i rgyu yi bye brag ni/ /tha mar bstan te sdom gsum mo/ /mtshon par byed pa'i bdag nyid de/ /mtshon bya sngon bstan

nyid yin no/ /gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i las thams cad grub par byed pa'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs // //paN+Di ta bA ro phyag rdum gyi zhal snga nas/ rwa rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /shrI rak+ta ya mA ri tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ /bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje'i gshed dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rje btsun gsang ba las ches shin tu gsang ba/ e ma'o byang chub sems dpa'

chen po snying rje chen po phyag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i snying po gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rang bzhin nyon cig /phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ /'dir gsungs pa'i gshin rje 'joms par byed pa ji tsam zhig mchis/ /gti

mug rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / phra ma rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed ces bya'o/ /rdo rje tsartsi kA dang / rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / rdo rje gau rI ma rnams kyang ngo / /mtshams

rnams la bum pa rnams so/ /de lta bu la sogs pa'i gshin rje 'joms pa'i tshogs rnams kyis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bdud thams cad 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams

las phyung bar mdzad pa ni/ sngags kyis 'gugs dang dbang byed che/ /de bzhin mthu yi cho ga mang / /ral gri bsgrub dang rgyal po dang / /pha rol dmag tshogs rnam 'joms dang / /mi snang mig sman bcud len dang / /de bzhin grib gnon rig pa dang / /ro langs gnod sbyin

sgrub pa dang / /sbrul gdug la sogs bsrung ba dang / /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor las rnams dang / /byang chub sems kyi rnam dpyod dang / /thabs rnams kun gyi spyod pa dang / /pha rol grong du 'jug rnams la/ /'od zer rnam lnga 'khrigs pa yi/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i don du bsgom/ /

rdo rje sa gzhi'i cha rnams la/ /ra ba gur rnams de bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bskyed par mdzad pa/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gti mug gshin rje'i gshed la sogs pa

thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams las nges par phyung ngo / /ya ni dbus su ste/ /k+She ma med yats+tsha ni rA dza sa do ru Na yo ni ra/ dang por ya las gshin rje'i gshed/ /k+She yig las ni rmongs par brjod/ /ma yig las ni phra mar bshad/ /me yig las

ni 'dod chags nyid/ /da yig las ni phrag dog ste/ /gshin rje'i gshed rnams lnga ru grags/ /dza yig tsartsi kAr bshad do/ /sa yig la ni phag mo'o/ /do yig dbyangs can mar bshad do/ /ru yig gau rI mar 'dod do/ /Na yo ni ra mtshams bzhi la/ /mi yi thod pa

rnam pa bzhi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po gshin rje'i gshed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhe sdang chen po'i rigs bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gsungs pa/ sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod par ldan/ /ro gcig

mkhas pas sems can don/ /byams sogs yon tan kun tu rdzogs/ /thos pa'i rgyun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dang por kha sogs yongs su gsang / /snga bar snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /rab tu rtsom pa dben pa'i phyogs/ /dur khrod sogs su bde ba'i gdan/ /dben

zhugs nyid kyi thugs kar ni/ /pad nyi blta zhing 'od rab 'bar/ /de yi 'od kyis bkug byas nas/ /sems can don rnams phun sum tshogs/ /bsgom bya bla ma sangs rgyas rnams/ /ji snyed ma lus nam mkha'i mthil/ /dmigs te phyag 'tshal de rnams kyi/ /sku yi

bkod pa rnam par bsgrub/ /tsartsi kA sogs rnams kyis mchod/ /de la sdig pa rab tu bshags/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/ /yang dag sdig gyur byas de bzhin/ /bdag gis de bshags gang zhig yang / /dus gsum mgon mdzod rjes yi rang / /rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas mtshungs rnams kyis/ /bsod nams tshogs la rjes yi rang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam chos dang / /tshogs mchog rnams la bdag skyabs mchi/ /yon tan rgya mtsho khyed rnams la/ /bdag gi lus 'di dbul bar bgyi/ /gnas dang

chos kun ston pa dang / /shin tu mthar yang mdzes pa dang / /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /de nyid sbyin sogs gzugs can gyi/ /sku gsum ye shes thob bya'i phyir/ /bsten cing 'di la rab tu dad/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed phyir/ /byang chub

sems dag bdag gis bskyed/ /gang zhig bsod nams nyer bsags rnams/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdag gis bsngo/ /'gro 'di kun la phan mdzad phyir/ /dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed gyur/ /lhag par smon lam 'di byas pas/ /de rnams la ni gshegs

su gsol/ /brtse bas byang chub bzhin du blta/ /khams gsum rnams ni stong par bsam/ /rang bzhin gyis ni sbyor bral bas/ /rgyu dang de bzhin mtshan nyid la/ /rnam par rtog pa bral ba dang / /lha dang smon lam rnams par spangs/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba

At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ ya~M ra~M ba~M la~M bzhi la dkyil 'khor bsdus nas b+h+ru~M yig las skyes pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgom par bya'o/ /zur bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa la/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis spras pa/ /lha dang lha mos shin tu mdzes/ /ba dan dril bu bcas

pa rnams/ /sna tshogs rtse mo rlung gis bskyod/ /ba~M yig las ni de dbus gnas/ /sna tshogs pad+ma rnam par bsam/ /de yi ze 'bru'i dbus gnas la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dbyug par bcas/ /yongs su gyur las mtha' dag rtags/ /zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rim

mtshungs pad+ma nyi ma la/ /ma he dmar po'i steng du ni/ /sprul pas bdud rnams ma lus pa/ /g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan par bya/ /nyi ma bye ba'i 'od 'bar lha/ /ro langs ma yis mgul nas 'khyud/ /dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par

brgyan/ /spyan gsum dmar zhing 'jigs su rung / /mgo bo dmar po brgya yi phreng / /g.yas na rdo rje'i dbyug pa dang / /g.yon na thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /khro bo'i mtshungs par ldan pa dang / /ljags ni bskyod cing mche ba gtsigs/ /khro gnyer sku mkhregs rked pa la/ /stag

gi pags pas rnam par brgyan/ /thung zhing lto 'phyang rngam zhing 'bar/ /shin tu rnam dag dri ma bral/ /ro langs ma yi g.yas gri gug /g.yon na mi yi thod pa'o/ /spyan gsum skra ni grol ba dang / /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba mtshungs par ldan/ /

ro bcud 'dzin pa gtso bo yi/ /shar gyi 'dab ma la gti mug rdo rje dkar po/ rdo rje tsartsi kA dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /lho'i 'dab ma la phra ma gshin rje'i gshed kha dog ser po/ /rdo rje phag mo dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /nub kyi 'dab ma la 'dod chags gshin rje'i gshed

kha dog dmar po/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /byang gi 'dab ma la phrag dog gshin rje'i gshed kha dog ljang gu rdo rje gau rI dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /tsa rtsi kA nag mo'o/ /phag mo ser mo'o/ /dbyangs can ma dkar mo'o/ /gau rI sngon mo'o/ /g.yon

phan thod pa dang g.yas pa na gri gug go/ /phyag dang zhal dang sku mdog yang dag par gnas pa ni dpa' bo ji lta ba bzhin no/ /me'i mtshams na mu men gyi bum pa bzhi mnyam gyis gang ba'o/ /bden bral du gser gyi bum pa gla pa yis gang ba'o/ /rlung du byi ru'i bum pa si h+las gang

ba'o/ /dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa gu pur gyis gang ba'o/ /thod pa yis kha g.yogs pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po la sogs pa dpa' bo gtso bo'i sngags gsungs pa ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ snying po'i sngags so/ /oM hauM k+ShauM k+Sha yauM

kA rA ya gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA yak+Sha senA d+hi pa ta ye ma hA dur dAn ta da ma kA ya nA sha ya nA sha ya/ bi drA pa ya bi drA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ phreng sngags so/ oM dwe Sha ra ti nu da nu da tru Ta tru Ta hU~M dzaHswA hA/ rje btsun ma'i sngags so/ /oM ma~M

hAn ta kr-ita hU~M hU~M phaT/ /oM bi shu nAn ta kr-ita hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM rA gA na ta kr-i ta hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM Ir Sh+yan ta kr-ita hU~M hU~M phaT/ dpa' bo bzhi'i sngags so/ /oM mo hA ra ti hU~M dzaH/ oM pi shu na ra ti hU~M dzaH/ oM rA ga ra ti hU~M dzaH/ oM I ra Sh+ya ra ti hU~M dzaH/ dpa' bo'i dbang phyug

ma bzhi'i sngags so/ /oM mar me mar mA bi g+hA te oM badzra tsartsi ke ha ra ha ra buk+kam rA ya che ge mo la dzaH/ oM g+ho Ne su g+ho Ne badzra mA ma kI/ b+har b+har/ sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra hU~M dzaH/ oM mar me mar mA k+Sho b+ha NI badzra sa ra swa ti dar dar/ thar thar/ phar phar/ ka~M pa ka pa/ d+hu na d+hu na hU~M/ che ge mo

la dzaH/ oM gam+b+hi re badzra kA ra ti ke g+ha g+ha/ rak+ta sho Na ti pri ye gau rI che ge mo la dzaH/ gdengs ka'i dbang po dga' bo ni/ /sngon pos skra bcings 'jigs par byed/ /klu 'jog dmar pos rna ba la/ /brgyan cing rtse mo 'khyil ba ste/ /rig ldan khra pos dpung pa brgyan/ /lag gdub

gdengs ka dung skyong ser/ /shin tu dkar ba pad do shal/ /mtha' yas sngon po mchod phyir thogs/ /shin tu mdzes par byas pa'o/ /bdud rtsi'i kha dog gdengs ka ni/ /nor rgyas kyis ni cod pan byas/ /pad+ma'i sdong bu'i kha dog dkar/ /rkang gdub pad+ma chen po

yis/ /thams cad phu tA'i yi ge sgrogs/ /phyag gnyis pa dang mche ba gtsigs/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /gshin rje 'joms pa zhes bya la/ /rnam rtog thams cad 'joms pa yi/ /sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya/ /mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas kun/ /rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi/ /lcags kyus kun bkug khar zhugs nas/ /bde ba snying gar zhugs shing zhu/ /de las spro byas sa bon rnams/ /de zhu rdo rje'i lam nas ni/ /rang 'od pad+ma'i nang mthar gnas/ /de bltas sa bon rang gzugs la/ /de yi

sa bon las skyes pa'i/ /'khor lo sa bon kun byin brlab/ /me stag 'phro ba'i tshogs gsal ba/ /cho ga bzhin du mkhas pas bsgom/ /blta zhing snying gar bzhu byas la/ /rdo rje'i lam nas dbyung bar bya/ /rang rig pad+ma'i ze 'bru la/ /lha yi tshogs rnams blta

byas la/ /sna tshogs me tog la sogs dbul/ /lag na lo ma 'dzin rnams kyis/ /legs par mchod par bya ba ste/ /mchod pa'i glu ni yid 'ong dang / /sna tshogs gar gyi rang bzhin dang / /de bzhin bde ba chen pos mchod/ /e ma gshin rje'i gshed dmar po/ /

bla ma srin po'i rang bzhin te/ /bdag ni khyod mthong 'jigs pas na/ /bla ma srin po'i rang bzhin spangs/ /mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og rnams/ /khyod kyi gar gyis g.yo bar byed/ /khrag gi mig sman khro bo'i sems/ /gar mdzad khyod ni ro langs gzugs/ /dmar

zhing thung ba'i tshad ldan pa/ /rnam pa mang po'i sprul gzugs byed/ /rdo rje dbyangs can ma yis zhus/ /khyod kyi gar mdzad bde ba che/ /khyod kyi hrIHSh+T+rIH'i sngags kyi gar/ /sa gsum po yi 'khrul pa sel/ /brtse bas khro ba'i rje btsun khyod/ /'gro la lta zhing gar

mdzad do/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ sgra yi tshogs pa thams cad la/ /sgra brnyan dang ni mtshungs par blta/ /'khor lo yi ni 'dren pa la/ /de yi de la de bzhin bstod/ /gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin rje'i gshed po shin tu 'jigs/ /

ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin rje'i gshed po shin tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje'i thugs dang rab mtshungs pa'i/ /rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /

'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso/ /gsung mchog kun gyi rab mchog ste/ /gsung gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin rje'i gshed po las kun pa/ /rdo rje'i sku dang rab mtshungs pa/ /phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rab mchog gtso/ /dkyil 'khor dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod/ /AHyig las skyes rnam dag pa/ /mgo bo gsum gyi steng du gnas/ /pad+ma'i snod ni gang ba yi/ /de

'og me yi dkyil 'khor te/ /raM yig las byung gru gsum mo/ /de 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /nag cing g.yo ba gzhu yi dbyibs/ /ya~M las byung ba ba dan mtshan/ /de la rnam par snang mdzad sogs /da yig la sogs las byung ba/ /glang po

la sogs lnga rnams so/ /hU~M skyes rdo rje'i dgab bya 'dis/ /bkab pa mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /rlung gis bskyod cing me yis zhu/ /de la rnam pa bsgom par bya/ /rdo rjes mtshungs par ro gcig gyur/ /shin tu dri med dag par blta/ /hU~M yig 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams/ /

ye shes gzugs kyis dgug par bya/ /rab zhugs sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni/ /mchog gi bdud rtsi lnga rnams blta/ /de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlab/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams la mchod/ /lce la rnam dag rdo rje nyid/ /hU~M yig las byung de la blta/ /de yi 'od zer

sbrubs rnams las/ /mtshungs par dgug cing de yis ni/ /khams gsum bzhugs pa'i rdzogs sangs kun/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor mchog 'di la/ /snying ga'i ye shes dgug gzhug bya/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /thog mtha' dbus ma'i dbye ba yis/ /dpag

med gzugs bye de la yang / /'khrul pa'i gzugs la de nyid med/ /gang las 'khrul pa gnyis la gnas/ /'khrul med thams cad sems la sbyin/ /'phro dang bsdu ba rnam par gzung / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i

rgyud las mngon rtogs kyi rim par phye ba ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa dang / /ji ltar sems can rab 'jug la/ /las kyi dbye

ba'i rab dbye las/ /ye shes kyi ni rgya mtsho rnams/ /rdo rje chen po bshad kyis nyon/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /las kun thams cad rab bsgrub pa/ /nyes kun gso ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /tshig 'di nyid ni bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa la/ bcom ldan 'das mchod cing phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyan par mdzad do/ de

nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /dbang du bya ba'i 'khrul 'khor gsungs/ /'khrul 'khor mthar thug gshin rje gshed/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang du bya ba dang / /bsrung ba'i don dang de bzhin du/ /zhi ba la ni gi wang gzung / /de bzhin gro ga'am

smyug shun la/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mngon par bri/ /ming ni nA maHbrten par bya/ /nag po'i rtsa sogs dang bral ba'i/ /kham phor gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /dbus su zhun mar sbrang rtsi blugs/ /srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya/ /me tog dkar pos thun mtshams

gsum/ /mchod bya kha ni shar ru phyogs/ /gshin rje mthar byed chu shel bzhin/ /bdag nyid bsgoms nas bsgrub bya ni/ /mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng / /bltas la mngon par dbang bskur ro/ /bum pa dkar po zla ba bzhin/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis yongs su

gang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis khrus mdzad pa/ /yang dag blta zhing bzlas pa brtsams/ /oM hrIHSh+TIHwi kr-i twa nan hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ na maHlha sbyin la shAn+tiM ku ru na maH/ zhi ba'i dam tshig 'di lta ste/ /skyes bu rnams kyi zhi ba la/ /gur gum gyis bri rgyas pa yang / /'khor

lo gnyis bri kha che yis/ /swA hA'i dbus su ming bcug ste/ /bsgrub bya'i ming blang de rnams la/ /bu yis mngon par gtor bar bya/ /kham phor kha sbyor nang bcug nas/ /srad bu ser pos dkri bar bya/ /kha ni byang bltas thun mtshams gsum/ /me tog ser pos mchod

par bya/ /kha dog ser po gshin rje gshed/ /bdag nyid nges par blta bar bya/ /bsgrub bya zla ba ser la gnas/ /bum pa ser po chu yis bkru/ /mngon bar dbang bskur bsgom par bya/ /rgyas par bya phyir yang dag bzla/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ lha

sbyin gyi puSh+Ti~M ku ru swA hA/ pho Tha Ta oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ lha sbyin gyi puSh+Ti~M ku ru bau ShaT/ ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /gro ga'am ni ras dag la/ /rgya skyegs dag gi khu ba 'am/ /yang na tsan+dan dmar

po la/ /ming med dag gi khrag bsres nas/ /'khor lo gnyis ni yang dag bri/ /hoHyig gis brten byas pa yi/ /'khrul 'khor nag sogs dang bral ba/ /kham phor gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bcug byas la/ /srad bu dmar pos dkri bar bya/ /

kha ni nub tu mngon phyogs gnas/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /kha dog dmar po 'bar ba che/ /bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms byed la/ /bsgrub bya zla ba dmar po'i steng / /de bzhin du ni bsam par bya/ /rang gi lus las 'thon gyur te/ /'od zer

dmar po'i lcags kyu yis/ /bsgrub bya 'gugs par bsgom par bya/ /sngags ni khri tsam spro zhing bzlas/ /des ni bsgrub bya myos gyur te/ /rkang pa dag ni de bzhin 'gyel/ /gos bral skra ni grol ba ru/ /bsam zhing bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /gal te dbang du ma

gyur na/ /brtul zhugs can gyis 'khor lo bsro/ /mar sogs bral bar byas nas ni/ /du med seng ldeng me la'o/ /oM hrIHSh+TIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT hoH/ lha sbyin gyi mchod sbyin dbang du gyis shig swA hA/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ bau Sha Ta lha sbyin gyi mchod

sbyin dbang du gyis shig /bau Sha Ta zhes ba ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang gi dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /yang na dur khrod gos dag gam/ /rang byung gis byugs ras dag la/ /rgyu skyegs khrag dang bsres pa yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni yang dag bri/ /dzaHyig dang

ni hrIHyig gis/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni brten byas la/ /bud med pad+ma'i snod dag ni/ /kha sbyar nang bcug mchod par bya/ /srad bu dmar pos dkri byas la/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs dmar/ /bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms byed do/ /

kha dog dmar po'i lcags kyu yis/ /bsgrub bya 'gugs par bsgom par bya/ /snying gar lcags kyus dgug bya zhing / /mgrin pa zhags pas bcing bar bya/ /seng ge dmar po la zhon nas/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar ba yis/ /'ong ba dag ni bsam bya zhing / /bdud rtsi

lnga yi chu yis bkru/ /gal te bsgrub bya ma 'ongs na/ /brtul zhugs can gyis 'khrul 'khor bsro/ /seng ldeng shing gi me la'o/ /de nas bzlas pa yang dag brtsam/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT che ge mo khug cig hrIH/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT dzaHlha

spyin khug dzaHzhes pa ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gugs pa'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /blo ldan gang gis dur khrod gos/ /yung ba dag gi khu ba yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni yang dag bri/ /la yig dag gis brten byas la/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni yang dag gzung / /kham phor kha

sbyor dbus su'o/ /kham phor ser po steng du gzhag /de la mkhas pas re khA bri/ /bdun dang bzhi pa'i re khA bri/ /bdun dang bzhi pa'i re khA sogs/ /yang dag bris te ting 'dzin bya/ /ri rab rtse mo brgyad par grags/ /de yi steng du yang dag bri/ /hU~M yig dang ni ba~M yig ste/ /de yi dbus su ri rab bo/ /de yi steng du laM yig

gis/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan bya zhing / /srad bu ser pos bcing bar bya/ /gshin rje 'joms byed kha dog ser/ /bdag nyid rnam par bsam par bya/ /bdag nyid kha ni lho ru phyogs/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa'i/ /

bsgrub bya ser po rnam par bsam/ /myur du ri bo dgod cing gnon/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan byas la/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor 'og dag tu/ /man+da ra sogs ri 'jigs dang / /gangs ri mi g.yor gyur pa yis/ /bsgrub bya mnan par bsgom par bya/ /de la 'di

bzhin bzlas par bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ laM lha sbyin rang gnas su rengs laM swA hA/ zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs pa chen po'i dam tshig go/ /ngag ni rengs par 'dod pa yis/ /'khor lo gnyis bo de bzhin bri/ /nang du bsgrub bya'i ming byas na'ang / /de la

sngags ni spro zhing bzlas/ oM hrIHSh+T+riHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT la~M lha sbyin gyi 'dod pa'i don gyi phyir 'gog cing ngan par smros shig /mchod sbyin gyi ngag sta~M b+ha na~M ku ru la~M zhes pa ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis ngag rengs pa'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /shin tu mthar

thug legs par sba/ /ji ltar 'di yi bya ba bshad/ /nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /bshin rje gshed dmar sbyor bas so/ /dur khrod ras la sngon bzhin du/ /'khor lo gnyis bri brtul zhugs can/ /ske tshe ba dang tshwa dang ni/ /dug dang nim pa ka 'am ni/ /tsha ba

gsum dang tshwa rkyang ngo / /de bzhin dur khrod sol ba dang / /d+ha du ra yi lo ma'i chu/ /tsaN+Da'i sa bon de bzhin du/ /mdzub mo yi ni khrag blangs te/ /tsi tra ka yi khu bas sam/ /tsha sgo tsan gyi sa blangs te/ /gdol pa'i rdza yi drag pa dang / /bya rog sgro yi smyu gu yis/ /bcu

bzhi la bri brtul zhugs can/ /gung thun khro ba'i sems kyis ni/ /gdug pa can rnams gsang pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs sems can rnam 'joms pa/ /hU~M gi yi ges mtha' rten la/ /rnal 'byor kha ni lho ru phyogs/ /bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms byed de/ /khro bo'i gzugs

can gtum po che/ /mgo bo'i dum bus rnam par brgyan/ /ma he la bzhugs ljags bskyod cing / /gsus chen 'jigs par byed pa po/ /mche gtsigs skra ni gyen du brdzes/ /smin ma dmar ser de bzhin du/ /g.yas na rdo rje'i dbyug chen la/ /de bzhin g.yon na thod

pa'o/ /mi sdug mche ba rab tu gtsigs/ /bskal pa'i me ni 'bar ba bzhin/ /de bzhin bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /myur du bsgrub bya de mdun gzung / /dri ma dang ni rma dag dang / /gdug pa'i nad kyis bzung zhing 'joms/ /gos dang bral zhing 'dar bar byed/ /ngal

zhing lus ni rma dang ldan/ /phol gyi phreng bas lus la bzung / /mtshon gyis rma ni dod par byed/ /grang ba dang ni rlung gis gtses/ /me yi dbus su yang dag brten/ /ma he stag dang khyi rnams dang / /mchu rnams kyis za bar byed/ /sangs rgyas sde rnams 'joms byed

pa'i/ /ma rungs chen po rnams kyi ni/ /lto ba'i nang nas rgyu ma dang / /lus la tsher mas gang ba dang / /rkang pa gdos dang sgrog gis bsdams/ /de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas/ /pags pa nges par bshu bar bsam/ /ske tshe tshwa yis byug par bya/ /grang ba yis ni lus

'don bsgom/ /de yi lus kyi bsrung sogs rnams/ /bcad cing bdag nyid mdun du gzung / /de yi go cha gcad par bya/ /lus ni de bzhin stong par bsgom/ /bdag gi las las skyes pa yi/ /khro bo gshin rje gshed gzugs kyis/ /'joms pa dag tu bsgom bya zhing / /

rkang dang tshil rnams 'thung ba ste/ /de yi mdun du gshin rje bsgom/ /lag na dbyug pa stobs chen ldan/ /ma rungs de yis gdug pa de/ /rnam par 'joms pa bsgom par bya/ /de yi rgyu ma rtsa rnams ni/ /bya rgod kyis bzung mkha' la 'gro/ /klu yis sa 'og 'gugs

par byed/ /lha ma yin la sogs pas btsir/ /de ltar bsgrub bya bsam par bya/ /snying rje'i sems kyis rab bcings nas/ /'khor ba las ni pha rol byas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing du 'gro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thugs

dgyes nas gsungs pa/ 'di lta ste/ /kye ma gsad bya legs par byas/ /gsad par bya ba ma bsad de/ /ji srid sdig rnams grol bar byas/ /shi ba de yang ma shi ste/ /sdig pa stong phrag byas pa yi/ /mnar med la sogs mi skye'o/ /e ma bdag nyid chen po ste/ /

bsad pas sangs rgyas byang chub thob/ /slar yang brtse bas sems can rnams/ /gsang par bya bas gsad par bya/ /e ma snying rje'i stobs kyis te/ /snying rje dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT hU~M lha sbyin sod hU~M/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M

hU~M phaT phaT hU~M phaT lha sbyin mA ra ya hU~M phaT ces pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtog pa chen po gsang pa'i rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang rgyud kyis gsad pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /de nas 'khor lo gnyis bris te/ /phaT kyi yi ge'i nang du ni/ /bsgrub bya'i

ming dang bcas pa gzung / /thod pa yang dag sbyar byas te/ /srad bu nag pos dkri bar bya/ /zhe sdang sems kyis nyin gung la/ /dur khrod du ni gzhug par bya/ /gshin rje mthar byed mtshungs bltas nas/ /bsgrub bya rang gi mdun du bya/ /rta dang ma he'i

steng na gnas/ /gnyis po de yi lag na mtshon/ /khro bo'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor/ /gnyis po'i phyogs la bsam par bya/ /gnyis po ngag ni 'thab byed cing / /khro bas sems ni bcings pa ste/ /'thab mo byed par bsgom byas la/ /sgom zhing bzlas pa

brtsam par bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin dag rnam par zhe sdang bar gyis shig phaT ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis zhe sdang chen po'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /cho ga de yis sngon ma bzhin/ /'khor lo gnyis po kun tu bri/ /hU~M phaT yi ge dag

gis brten/ /thod pa gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /srad bu nag pos yang dag dkri/ /phag shin nags su bzhags byas la/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsgrub bya sngon du gzung bar bsgom/ /ya~M las byung ba gzhu yi dbyibs/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag

pa la/ /rnga mo chen mo kha dog sngo/ /de yi steng du bsgom par bya/ /de la ma rungs chen po ste/ /rdeg cing lho phyogs 'dod pa dang / /khro bo rnams kyis 'joms pa dang / /sangs rgyas yin yang bzlog par dka'/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT lha sbyin skrod par gyis

shig hU~M phaT ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad pa chen po'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /rnal 'byor khro zhing lhor phyogs la/ /khrag bcas dur khrod thal ba dang / /dug dang tshwa dar ske tshe dang / /tsha ba'i mar khu smyo lo mas/ /de bzhin dur khrod gos la ni/ /'khor lo

gnyis pa de bzhin bri/ /gsad bya gshin rje'i lus la gnas/ /sdang sems ma he rta dag la/ /bskrad pa rnga mo'i lus la gnas/ /zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar/ /rgyas pa zla ba ser po la/ /bud med snying gar dbang du bya/ /ngag bcing nga yi lus la gnas/ /rengs

pa ri rab dbus su ste/ /dgug pa seng ge stag la gnas/ /de bzhin gzhan yang mtshon par bya/ /gi waM dang ni rgya skyegs dang / /de bzhin kha che'i bye brag gis/ /dbang bya gro ga shing shun bri/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /kham phor kha sbyar nang du gzhug /dge ba'i sems

kyis yang dag gzung / /bya rog sgro yis bri bar bya/ /pad+ma kha sbyor dur khrod la/ /nyi ma'i gung la sba bar bya/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor bdag /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHsogs sngags bzlas la/ /lho phyogs gnas te tshar gcad do/ /zhi ba'i kha dog ya yig dbyi/ /ni gnyis kyang

ni de bzhin no/ /phyi nas dbus su ya yig las/ /lhag ma'i yi ge ci bde bar/ /sngon du bsnyen pa khri bzlas la/ /las 'di rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste/ /gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba yis/ /drag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /gang du bris shing

gnas pa dang / /yi ge bris par gyur pa yis/ /khyim de rtag tu 'thab mor 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las 'khrul 'khor gyi skabs rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// //ri dang skye

bos dben pa'i phyogs/ /gsang zhing yid brtags sa gzhi la/ /ri mo gsal bris rnal 'byor bdag /sngags kyis 'gugs pa brtsam par bya/ /dkar zhing zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa yi/ /tsartsi kA ni bsgom par bya/ /rnal 'byor

khrag 'gugs rab sbyor ba/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed chen po dkrug pa rdo rje khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rdo rje tsartsi kA'i sngags gsungs pa/ /'di lta ste/ oM badzra tsartsi kA+e si d+hA na tra nA la hA ri Ni rat+na tra yA pa ka ri

No ru d+hi ra mA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ zhal ni rab tu bskyod mdzad nas/ /sngags 'di rjes su dran byas la/ /khams gsum pa yi khrag chen po/ /'gugs 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas gshin rje gshed chen po rdo rje myos pa 'gugs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs so/ /rdo rje phag mos chang dgug pa'i dam tshig gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ /oM g+ho ne su g+ho ne badzra mA ma kI b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa~M b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra/ trai d+hA tu ka ma d+yA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ rdza mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas/ bum pa kha ni mdzes byas te/ /rkun

po'i skra yi steng du gzhag /sngags ni rjes su dran par bya/ /sngags 'di'i bdag nyid che ba ni/ /mchod rten pa ta na ru bstan/ /mkhas pas 'bad pas dmigs byas na/ /chang ni 'gugs par rab tu grags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyi rdo rje shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /dbyangs can mas sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+hA ba ra d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud ng+hi ba ra ng+ha ni swA hA/ tshes gcig nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji

srid lnga'i mthar thug kun/ /legs par sbyar ba brtsam par bya/ /ji srid zla pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /gsung gi dbang phyug ma ni 'grub/ /'di yis tshigs bcad brgya phyed do/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus shing / /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das gshin rje mthar byed chen po dkrug pa rdo rje khu ba 'gugs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /khu ba 'gugs pa gau rI'i sngags gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ oM kar+N+h+ri ni kar+Sha Ni gau rI dzaHduSh+Ta pra duSh+TA/ yAHshu kra mA kar+Sha ya dzaHdzaHdzaHhU~M swA hA/ /

nam mkha'i gdong dang rdo rje'i lam/ /rlung dang dril sbyor lcags kyu yis/ /khu ba'i tshogs rnams 'gugs par byed/ /bsgom dang bzlas pa rab sbyor bas/ /skye bos dben dang nags tshal du/ /las 'di rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /mtshan mo bdun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /

'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed chen po dus kyi dbye ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'dir mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las spro bar mdzad nas/

u dum bA ra man dA ra/ /yongs su skyes dang sna ma dang / /kar+Na ka yi phreng ba rnams/ /bu khyod zung la byin gyis rlobs/ /khams gsum ral gri chen po la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /bzung na bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /las kyi ral gri dam pa 'di/ /

thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi/ /rdo rje dril bu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /bu khyod gsang ba'i rdo rje zung / /slob ma yang dag gzung bar gyis/ /'di ni btung ba rin chen te/ /rdo rje'i lus su rab sgrub pa/ /mi yi btung bya ye shes chu/ /bu khyod kyis ni thams cad

du/ //slob ma'i khar yang blud par bya/ /gshin rje gshed kyis rab tu gsungs/ /sems ni rab tu dga' ba yis/ /rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las sngags kyis 'gugs pa

rab tu sbyor ba ste rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// //de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /ral gri sgrub pa gsung bar mdzad/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /lha mo khyod ni dpag du gyur/ /gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /slob dpon rnams gsungs

rgyud bsgrub phyir/ /khab len lcags kyi ral gri nyid/ /de rnams yang na bcud can gyi/ /ral gri khru gang tshad bcas tshad/ /brtul zhugs can gyis rnam par bsam/ /bcu bzhi 'am ni brgyad dag la/ /dur khrod dbus su sba bar bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang mtshungs

par ldan/ /thun mtshams gsum du bzlas pa khri/ /zla ba so so'i bcu bzhi la/ /gtor mas sngon du mchod par bya/ /zla ba re la bzlas pa 'bum/ /'bum phrag lnga yis 'grub par 'gyur/ /grub na ral gri rab tu 'bar/ /'od zer lnga yi glog chen 'khyug /grub

pa de ni gzung gyur pas/ /mi rnams khams gsum las rgyal 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor gang gis ral gri grub/ /gshin rje gshed po 'jigs byed sbyor/ /bde bar 'grub cing sa chen gyis/ /de yis 'thab pa bzod mi nus/ /rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi kun/ /mthong

bas gnas skabs bcu ru 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min gyis mi bzod/ /mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos/ /rgya mtsho'i sa ni blangs byas la/ /klu yi gzugs ni sbyar bar bya/ oM phuHyi ge hU~M la dgod/ /hrI Sh+T+riHla sogs sngags rnams bzla/ /char

mi 'bab pa'i dus rnams la/ /khri ni bzlas bas 'bab pa 'gyur/ /sbrul nag sha dang nim pa yi/ /lo ma dag ni bsres pa yi/ /de yi ril bu legs par bya/ /brtul zhugs can gyis rgya mtshor 'phang / /khri phrag bzlas par gyur pa yi/ /dpa' klong

rengs byed mchog yin no/ /tsaN+Da'i sa bon brgya bzung zhing / /mon sran gre'u 'bras bsres te/ /'bum phrag brgyad bzlas sbyin sreg gis/ /de yis lha rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /dud khrod ro bsregs mgal ba'i shing / /brtul zhugs can gyis gzugs brnyan

bri/ /smyo byed khu bas byugs byas te/ /khri phrag bzlas na mdze yis 'khyer/ /yungs kar sa bon bsdus pa la/ /'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas byas te/ /sbrul gyis gzung nas 'gyel ba la/ /gtor na 'tsho bar the tshom med/ /ri bo chus bkas sa blangs nas/ /

sngags ni 'bum du bzlas pa yis/ /mgo la byug pa tsam gyis ni/ /mgo yi zug rnams 'joms par 'gyur/ /bdun nyid mngon par bsngags byas te/ /lag pas mgo bo mnye byas na/ /mgo yi zug rngu mi 'byung zhing / /nyams par 'di la the tshom

med/ bram ze yi ni sha dag dang / /dur khrod sa dang thal ba la/ /gshin rje gshed kyi sku gzugs bya/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /g.yas na rdo rje chen po ste/ /g.yon na mgo bo de bzhin du/ /kha dog dkar po 'jigs chen po/ /de yis

gdug pa 'joms par byed/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga yis ni/ /nyi ma so sor gtor ma sbyin/ /bdag gi dgra bo sod cig ces/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag gsol gdab/ /'di smras mtshan mo nyal ba las/ /dgra bo tho rangs 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang na nad

kyis 'debs 'gyur te/ /chu 'gags la sogs kyis khyab 'gyur/ /dgra las rnam par snang mdzad blang / /mi yi rkang sbubs yongs bkang ste/ /sngags ni 'bum du bzlas nas ni/ /shing gi drung du mngon par 'gyel/ /nags su rtag tu 'khyam/ /

rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshim pas bde/ /sna tshogs don rnams rab tu 'grub/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba ste rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o// //

de nas rgyal po rab bsgrub pa/ /bdag gis yang dag bshad par bya/ /ma nyams de bzhin rma med pa/ /ljon shing dag la sbyangs pa blangs/ /phab nas legs par khrus byas te/ /phreng ba'i bzlas pas bsgrub par bya/ /zla ba zla ba'i bcu bzhi la/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang

ldan pa yi/ /sha lnga yis ni byugs byas la/ /mchog gi bzlas pas bzlas par bya/ /'di ni bye ba bzlas pa yis/ /rgyal po nges par 'grub 'gyur te/ /e ma sngags kyi nus pa yis/ /ro ni sgrogs par byed 'gyur na/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor

ldan/ /cung zad 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /rnal 'byor gang dang gang 'dod pa/ /de rnams thams cad ster bar 'gyur/ /ma he dang ni chu srin nam/ /stag gam de bzhin gzhan yang ni/ /dred dang spre'u'i khyad par can/ /dug dang ske tshe ch+wa dang ni/ /sho b+hAny+dza naM tsha

pa gsum/ /de rnams las ni gzugs brnyan ni/ /gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'jigs byed/ /hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags bzlas la/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gsol ba gdab/ /rgyal po che ge mo sod la/ /bdag la de yi bya ba gyis/ /bsnyen pa bye pa

bzlas pas 'grub/ /nges par bden par the tshom med/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyal zla yi/ /dkar phyogs nyi ma snubs ldan tshe/ /rdul gyi gos ni yang dag blang / /ri mo mchog nyid bri bar bya/ /snag tsha chen po mtshungs sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po

nyid/ /kha dog dkar po 'jigs chen po/ /mchog ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas na rdo rje 'bar ba dang / /g.yon na khrag bcas mgo bo 'dzin/ /g.yon brkyang zhabs dang 'jigs pa ste/ /rin chen cod pan rnam brgyan cing / /

rin chen rgyan rnams yongs rdzogs la/ /'od zer phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste/ /rgyal po gsod par byed pa ni/ /'og gi cha la nges par sbyar/ /ming bcas kha dog yang dag ldan/ /ji lta ba yi rnam par gnas/ /lha la yongs su rdzogs par bya/ /ji lta ba

yi dngos po'i tshad/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum nges par ni/ /de yi mdun du sbyin sreg bya/ /sbyin sreg 'bum gyis rgyal po ni/ /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas gzhan yang zla gzas gsung / /yang na nyi ma ma mthong tshe/ /dur khrod thal ba blangs nas ni/ /

brtul zhugs can gyis gzugs brnyan bya/ /rwa can ske tshe sha lnga dang / /nim pa d+ha du ra'i lo ma/ /cho ga 'di yis gcig byas nas/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzugs brnyan bya/ /kha dog sngon po 'jigs chen po/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag ni gnyis/ /ma he la gnas

zhal ni gdangs/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /sku gzugs rdzogs par byas nas ni/ /rnam pa mang pos mchod par bya/ /hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags ni bzlas/ /bzlas pa 'bum gyis rig par bya/ /rgyal po che ge mo yi ni/ /sde dang yongs su 'dzin bcas choms/ /

rnal 'byor bdag nyid bzlas pa 'bum/ /'bum du bzlas pa'i khyad par las/ /cho ga 'di yis sbyin sreg dang / /mchod pa'i las rnams ldan par bsam/ /sems can don byed blo ldan gyis/ /rgyal po thob 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas gzhan yang rdul gyi gos/ /

nam mkha'i rang bzhin chu yis ni/ /gza' ni bkra shis la bkrus te/ /ri mo mngon par bri par bya/ /zhal gcig pa dang phyag ni gnyis/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs ldan pa/ /skra ni 'od zer yang dag ldan/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang / /gri gug thod pa lag na

ldan/ /ma he'i steng du bri byas nas/ /'di yi bsgom pa brtsam bar bya/ /dgra ni mdun du bsam bya ste/ /gri gug gis ni gcod byed cing / /rkang dang nag rnams 'thung bar bya/ /rgyu ma rnams ni za ba dang / /khrag ni mang po 'thung bar byed/ /'bum du gyur pa tsam gyis

ni/ /zha 'am rma yis snying la gzer/ /de nas gzhan yang mi'i rus pa sor bzhi pa blangs la/ hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs pa'i sngags kyi nang du byas te dgra'i sgo la sbas na 'khor dang bcas bskrod par byed de/ /gal te brgya byin dang mtshungs pa yin yang 'gyur ro/ /skye bos

dben pa'i sa phyogs su gcig bur gyur pas rje btsun gyi thad ka gsal bar byas te/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bltas te/ mi'i rus pa bcad pa'i khrag chen po bya rog gi khrag dang bsres nas/ sor bcu

gnyis pa'i tshad kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis po'i dbus su sa bon bcu gnyis po de la dgra'i ming mang du tsheg drag dang bcas pa yang dag par sbyar te/ Tha yig gsum gyis phyi skor te bya rog gi ske la btags nas gal te rgyun rab tu 'bab pa la bskur na de gzung du med do/ /de

bzhin du sa bon bcu gnyis bris te/ phaT phaT hU~M hU~M na na tA kr-i wi Sh+TIHhrIHoM/ ji lta ba'i dngos po mchod pa byas te/ stobs chen po'i spos byin te rgyun rab tu 'bab pa la bskur na de gzung du med do/ /mi 'dod na bya rog gi gshog pa la lan bdun du mngon par bsngags te/ /

ming nang du byas te dgra'i sgo la sbas na 'khor dang bcas pa nges par skrod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i dbus su tsha ba gsum dang dug dang ske tshe rnams rus pa chen po'i smyu gus me'i sa bon gyi dbus kyi dbus su tsheg drag dang bcas shing b+ha yig

gnyis yang dag par sbyar te/ /Tha yig gsum gyis phyi bskor te lci ba'i me la bsregs na bu dang chung ma dang 'khor dang bcas pa de'i skad cig la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las rgyal po

sgrub pa ste rim par phye ba lnga pa'o// //de nas pha rol dmag tshogs rnams/ /nyams bya bdag gis bshad par bya/ /bram ze mo yi rdul gos la/ /rgyal zla nyid la yang dag brtsam/ /ma he'i gdong can ri mo bri/ /lag pa brgya ni rab gsal la/ /mtshon

cha shin tu rno ba rnams/ /thams cad du ni bri bar bya/ /ri mo dkar po rdzogs pa la/ /pad+ma dkar pos mchod par bya/ /sngags ni 'bum du bzlas byas te/ /pad+ma yang ni de bzhin no/ /ri mo mdun du gzhag bya ste/ /ba dan steng du bzung byas na/ /skye bo gang gis mthong rnams

kyi/ /rkang gnyis rkang bzhi la sogs rnams/ /thams cad de la lta mi nus/ /seng ge glang chen mthong ba bzhin/ /de nas gzhan yang tshangs sa bon/ /khri bzlas zhag chen sta res bcad/ /rnga mo'i chu dang sbyar byas te/ /brtul zhugs can gyis ri mo bya/ /rang gi

dmag gdong thig le bya/ /pha rol dmag rnams rnam par 'jig /mya ngan med kyi ljon shing 'og /'gro zhing brgyad dam bcu bzhi la/ /zla ba gcig gi thun mtshams gsum/ /sngon bsnyen 'bum phrag gcig byas nas/ /oM sid+hA na ta nA la hA ri Ni pa ra sai n+ya bi nU si ni hrIH

swA hA/ /de rnams kyis ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /mthong bar gyur pa tsam gyis ni/ /pha rol dmag rnams rnam par 'jig /gshin rje yi ni snang ba yis/ /de rnams kyang ni 'bros par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang shing gcig drung du song nas ni/ /ro ni sbyangs pa mchog la ni/ /

g.yas na ral gri bzung byas nas/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis so/ /hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags rnams ni/ /mtha' dag mtshan mo bzlas par bya/ /de la ral gri 'phro ba ste/ /de yis pha rol dmag rnams 'joms/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs

gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las pha rol gyi dmag nyams par bya ba ste rim par phye ba drug pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /mi snang sgrub par rab bshad de/ /dang po rnal 'byor ba mi snang ba bsgrub pa'i phyir rgyal gyi nyi ma'i nyi ma la brtsam par bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i

bsam pas sngon du 'bum bzlas pas de grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma bzung ba'i dus la pa Ni Ta ga ra'i rtsa ba dang / dngul chu dang / kha~M gA ri dang / daN Da'i rtsa ba dang thams cad gcig tu ril bu byas te khar bcug pas mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang kho TI dzA la

ki dza yan ti dang / rgan po 'joms pa'i rtsa ba dang / thams cad sbal pa'i sha dang cha mnyam du byas te nyi ma gsum bskams nas ril bu khar bcug na mi snang par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang nyi ma gzas bzung ba'i dus su u ka nu kha~M dang / dngul chu dang gser dang d+ha du ra

zhes pa rnams rta rgod ma'i chu dang yang dag par sbyar nas ril bu byas te khar bcug na mchog tu mi snang ngo / /de nas gzhan yang byi ba'i mig dang bya rgod kyi mig dang 'og skyong gi mig dang cha mnyam du ril bu gcig tu byas te khar bcug na de'i skad cig la mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas

gzhan yang gza' nyi ma la byi ba'i mig rab tu blangs te/ rams dang tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba dang / bya rgod kyi khrag dang sbyar te ril bu khar bcug na mi snang ba'i mchog go/ /de nas gzhan yang pA shI'i sha dang / ba hu ra'i 'bras bu mnyam du dar gos kyis dril nas bram ze'i thod pa la mig

sman bya'o/ /de'i mig sman gyis mig gnyis la byugs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang tsaN Ta lI'i me tog dang / sha tA bar ti dang b+ha dra pa k+Shi'i mig dang de rnams ril bur byas nas khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang b+ha dra pak+Sha Na~M bzung ste nyi ma

bdun gyi mthar thug pa dngul chu ma sha gcig zas su byas nas de'i brun gang yin pa dang / de yis bdag nyid kyi khu ba dang lhan cig tu byas nas thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni mi snang ba'i rab tu bya ba'o/ /mig sman bshad par bya ba la/ re zhig dang po mig sman gyi phyir

bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags 'bum phrag lnga yongs su bzlas te mig sman sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/ /sram dang bya rgod dang kur rA rnams kyi mig blangs nas tshad mnyam par byas te sa 'og gi sprang gi khu ba la dar gos kyi sdong bus mig sman bya'o/ /'di'i mig sman gyis sa'i mthongs mthong bar

'gyur ro/ /skar ma lag la br-i ha tI dkar po'i rtsa ba dang / nag po dza yan ti'i rtsa ba dang / ce spyang gi mig rnams mnyam du dong gi sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig tu byas te thig le byas na sa'i mthongs las mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sa'i 'khri shing dang bi ShaM ka rI'i rtsa ba dang /

tsa sen dang / rdul dang lhan cig tu dar gos la gzhon nu mas bkal pa'i srad bus dkris nas sdong bu byas te mi'i thod pa la dreg pa brus pa'i mig sman gyis gter rnams nges par mthong ngo / /de nas gzhan yang rgyal gyi zla ba skar ma snubs la rdul gyi gos bzung ste/ brgyad dam

yang na bcu bzhi la rdo rje tsartsi kA'i ri mo mngon bar bris nas mchod pa chen po byas te/ mtshan mo gcig khri bzlas na rmi lam du gter nges par mthong ngo / /gzhan yang nim pa'i shing ljon pa'i 'og tu phyin te brgyad dang yang na bcu bzhi la ri mo'i mdun du tsartsi kA bsgom par bya zhing / ce spyang gi

mgo bo'i steng du khri bzlas so/ /tsartsi kA 'ongs nas bdag gis ci bya zhes 'dri bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ste/ bdag la mig sman gyi dngos grub gnang bar mdzod cig /dngul chu dang bcud kyis len yang stsol cig ces so/ /gi wang dang sha la'i mig dang dngul chu

dang shI ta lI'i khu ba dang dong gi sbrang rtsi rnams mnyam du ril bu byas te 'di'i mig sman gyis sa'i mthongs las mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /ce spyang gi mig dang bya rgod kyi mig dang ku ra rA'i mig rnams de bzhin du g.yon la g.yon dang / g.yas la g.yas blangs te zhag chen po'i dreg

pa bya'o/ /'di'i mig sman gyis sa'i mthongs las mthongs las mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang gi wang dang mi'i mkhris pa dang ga bur dang dngul dang de bzhin du zas sbyin par bya'o/ /'di'i mig sman gyis sa'i mthongs las mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang sna tshogs

pa'i dngos grub kyi don dang nor dang 'bru la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / rig byed brgyad rmongs pa dang / mkha' la spyod pa ster bar byed do/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i don la sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas dngul chu bsgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/ /dang po

dngul chu blangs nas tsitra ka dmar po'i khu bas mnye bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la zangs kyi phye ma dang / gser gyi phye ma bzhi cha sbyin te shA kho Da'i khu bas bsdu bar bya'o/ /glang po che'i sha dang lhang tsher mnyam du byas te lugs kong gi dbus su ra dza~M la byin nas sbyar zhing bcings pas rdog

por 'gyur ro/ /'di'i phye mar ti yis srang la bsnun par gyur na gser du 'gyur ro/ /'dir dngul chu zhag chen la mnyes nas lhang tsher dang mu zi zhag chen po la nyi ma gsum du btso zhing / yang ji srid rdog por ma gyur gyi bar du'o/ /sbrang dang lhan cig zegs ma re zos na mi de lo

stong du 'tsho'o/ /dngul la bsnun na gser du 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang dA h+lA pa'i khu ba nas dngul chu mnye bar bya ste rdog bor ma song gi bar du'o/ /shIta li dang dzam+b+hi ra'i khu ba la shA kho Da'i 'bras bu ba gu la so sor mnyam du byin nas lugs kong gi nang du bcug ste des de bzhin du yongs

su byugs te lugs kong bskam par bya'o/ /phyi nas lci ba'i me la bsregs pas rdog por 'gyur ro/ /ra ti gnyis kyi tshad kyis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu'o/ /ji srid du lo ma dang skyur rnams spong ngo / /thams cad du bud med bsten pa spangs pas mi de lo stong phrag bcu gnyis 'tsho zhing

mkha' spyod 'thob bo/ /spyang tsher la bsnun na gser du 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang rany+dza nI la'i khu ba la su par Na mA k+Shi ka~M dang sbyar ba'i snying po dang / dI sna ne na dang mnye bar bya'o/ /lhang tsher dang na ra she Na'i khu ba bsres te lugs kong gi nang du bcug nas sa ha rI'i mar khus

sbyar na zla ba drug gis rdog por 'gyur ro/ /lcags brgyad la byugs na nges par gser du 'gyur ro/ /zos na mkha' spyod thob par 'gyur ro/ /mig la byugs pa tsam gyis lo lnga brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang dngul chu ku mA rA'i khu bas mnyes nas so

ma la ta dang pa lA sha'i rtsa ba dang nA ga ge sar dang ba ku laM dang btsag dang ka thi nI dang de bzhin du n+ya gro d+ha'i lo ma dang / de bzhin du yang mnyam du lugs kong gis kha bkab cing sbyar bar bya'o/ /thun tshod gnyis kyis rdog por 'gyur ro/ /gzegs ma zos pa tsam gyis sa gsum

la nges par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ra ti tsam gyis zangs srang gser du nges par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang dngul chu shi ri khan da'i 'o mas dar tsam mnyes la mu zi dang mnyam du zangs kyi snod du dzaM bi ra'i khu bas mnyes te nyi ma la bskam par byas na rdog por 'gyur

ro/ /lugs kong gi nang du bcug cing sbyar te thun tshod gnyis kyis so/ /shin tu grangs pa dang bton nas ra ti'i tshad kyis mnan te zangs la bsnun na gser du 'gyur ro/ /lus la byugs pas skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang dngul chu dang

bA lA'i rtsa ba mnye bar bya'o/ /slar yang tsaN+DA li'i me tog dngul chu dang mnye bar bya'o/ /rtsabs dang rnam par snang mdzad kyi khu bas slar yang mnye bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes su bzhi cha'i tshad kyis gser gyi phye ma la byin pas rdog por 'gyur ro/ /'dab ma bdun pa'i

lugs kong gi nang du glang po che'i rkang pa'i tshad kyi thum po la byin pa las rdog por 'gyur ro/ /de bton nas ra ti'i tshad kyis zangs la bsnun na gser du 'gyur ro/ /lus la yang ra ti'i tshad kyis nyes ba gsum 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor chen po

rnams kyi 'du ba'i nang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zos pa tsam gyis rgyang grags brgyar 'gro nus so/ /de nas gzhan yang dngul chu tsam gnas pa la rdo rje dang nges par ti Sha dang tri hI'i rtsa ba dang / ka rany+dzany+tsa dang ma nu'i rtsa ba dang mnye bar bya'o/ /ba Ni Ta pa shUr Na sbyar te lugs kong nang du sbyar

bar bya'o/ /mtshan mo ril po bsregs pas de 'grub ste/ ra ti'i tshad blangs nas zangs la bsnun pas de 'grub bo/ /ra ti tsam gyis bza' bas skra dkar dang gnyer ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba drug tu rab tu sbyor bas lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang sbyor

ba de bzhin du dngul chu srang gcig bzung nas shring gI'i bu ba dang mnye bar bya'o/ /a b+h+ra TaM dang gser gyi gzegs ma sbyar la/ /shring gI dmar po dang mnyam ste tsi Ti pA'i khu ba blangs te/ nyi ma bcu gnyis de'i rjes su lugs kong gi nang du bcug nas sbyar bar bya'o/ /glang po

che'i rkang pa'i tshad las phyung ste mnyam du blangs nas ra ti'i tshad gzhug par bya'o/ /zangs ma la bsnun na ma lus pa nges par gser du 'gyur ro/ /zos pas yun ring du 'tsho zhing mkha' spyod du 'gro bar the tshom med do/ /gnod sbyin dang mi'am ci'i bdag po rnams zham ring byed bar

'gyur zhing gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi 'gro'o/ /de nas gzhan yang lhang tsher nag po srang gcig dang sbal pa'i lo ma'i khu bas sbyar ba'i dngos po zla ba phyed mtshal dang ro mnyam par byas te zla ba gcig gi tshad kyis chu grang mo dang bcas te bza' bar bya'o/ /zla ba'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor

gyi bdag nyid nad dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang lcags srang tsam bzung ste re t+ya'i phye ma'i rab tu byed pa dang / ka shI'i khu ba dang mnyam du sbyar te nyi ma'i 'od zer las bskam par bya'o/ /dngul chu dang lhang tsher dang mu zi rnams de'i bzhi cha'i tshad sbyor ba las ka

ko la dang li shi'i phye ma rnams sngon ma'i tshad las phyed dang gnyis so/ /thams cad gcig tu byas te/ /lcags dang mnye bar bya ste rdo brtan po la'o/ /lugs kong gi nang du bcug ste kha bcad nas sbyar te lci ba'i me la bsreg par bya'o/ /de nas phyung ste lcags chen po dang mA sha'i tshad

kyis zos na skra dkar gnyer ma rnam par 'joms shing nang dang 'chi bas mi tshugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las mi snang ba dang mig sman dang bcud len sgrub pa ste rim par phye ba bdun pa'o// //de nas rdo

rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos grib gnon gyi rab tu byed pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ dgra bo rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi chad pa'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di gsungs te/ dang por re zhig gshin rje gshed 'jigs so/ /sems can kun gyi rmongs byed bsgom par bya/ /rang gi khyim du mtshan mo'i

dus/ /stag gi pags pa'i stan la gnas/ /zhal gcig dmar po shin tu rngam/ /zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu 'dzin/ /ro yi steng du 'jigs chen gnas/ /spyan gsum shin tu 'jigs par byed/ /lha rnams thams cad rmongs byed pa/ /me stag tshogs pas 'khrigs pa

ste/ /de bzhin bsgom zhing bzlas pa 'bum/ /phyi nas cho gas spyad par bya/ /ka ra bI ra dkar po'i rtsa/ /de bzhin dan+ti dmar po'i rtse/ /sbal pa'i khrag gis sbyar byas te/ /brtul zhugs can gyis thig le gzung / /gang gi grib ma rkang pas mnan/ /de ni

brgyal bar byed 'gyur te/ /rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi dag /thams cad rmongs pa the tshom med/ /gza' ni nyi ma'i dkar phyogs la/ /lto ba las byung srin bu la/ /de rnyed nas ni 'bad pa yis/ /shring gI Na yis thig le bya/ /dpral bar thig le byin pa yis/ /gang

gi grib ma 'phro bar byed/ /gal te myos thob grol byed na/ /'o mas gtor bas bde bar byed/ /dan+tI ro ha lung thang nag /de rnams rtsa ba gcig tu byas/ /bya rog khrag gis sbyar byas te/ /brtul zhugs can gyis thig le bya/ /thig le 'di yi mthu yis ni/ /lha rnams

kyang ni rab tu g.yo/ /phyag ni btsal bar mi bya ste/ /byas na de ni brgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gzhan yang rab sbyor te/ /ra sa shring gI ku thA ri/ /pha Ni nA ga pa Ni dang / /de rnams thams cad zla ba yis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis ril bu bya/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin

chu yis ni/ /thig le spyi bor gzung bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal gdong du bltas pa yis/ /mi de khrag tu skyug par 'gyur/ /kA ma tsA dang ma d+hu dkar/ /khu byug dkar po'i mig rnams ni/ /nam mkha'i chu dang yang dag ldan/ /spyi bo ru ni thig le bya/ /thig le de yi mthu yis ni/ /

dgra rnams dbang du 'du bar 'gyur/ /gang la phyag ni btsal gyur na/ /de ni nges par rmongs 'gyur te/ /de nas gzhan yang rab sbyor te/ /ltos 'gro nag po'i lce dang ni/ /de bzhin na ku la yi lce/ /byi ba'i mkhris pa yang dag bsres/ /ril bu khri phrag lnga byas nas/ /'di

yi thig le'i mthu yis ni/ /khro bo'i sngags 'jug de la 'gro/ /rgyal po rtag tu rmongs 'gyur te/ /gdug pa can dang lhan cig go/ /de nas gzhan yang rab sbyor te/ /bdud rtsi rtsa ba arka dkar/ /ba ku ri yi 'bras de bzhin/ /de rnams cha ni mnyam po ru/ /mkhas

pa yis ni ril bu bya/ /'di yi thig le rtag bzung na/ /'jig rten gsum ni rmongs par 'gyur/ /kha yi bdud rtsi blangs nas ni/ /g.yon pa yi ni ming med kyis/ /sngags 'dis ril bu thams cad la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM ma hA yak+Sha se nA d+hi pa ta ye ma hA

dur dam+taM da ma kA ya/ /nA sha ya nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ bi trA pa ya bi trA pa ya/ hU~M hU~M sarba duSh+T+rA~M DA~M phaT/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las grib gnon bsgrub pa ste/ rim par phye ba brgyad

pa'o// //'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs gsungs pa ni/ oM hU~M dzAHa pa rA dzi taHoM hU~M dzaHa dzi taHoM hU~M dzaHpU ra Na/ oM hU~M dzaHa bU ra Na/ oM shrAM dzaHsh+ma shA nA d+hi pa tiH/ oM r+yuM dza ku le shwa raH/ oM hU~M dzaHb+hU te shwa raH/ oM aM dzaH/ kiM

ka ro ta ta maHzhes pa 'di rnams 'byung po'i bdag po chen po rnams so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa sgrub par gyur na dpal ldan rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i mdun du sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas pa byas nas de rdzogs pa dang mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zas dkar po dang

zho dang bu ram dang 'o ma'i thug pas ji ltar gsung ba'i mchod par bya'o/ /gu gul gyi spos phul nas mtshan mo hril po bzlas pa bya'o/ /shin tu snga ba na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te ma 'ongs na de'i skad cig la 'chi bar byed do/ /'ongs nas gnang ba

zhu bar byed de/ /bdag gis ci bya zhes so sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ste/ /bdag gis gang bsgo ba gyis shig ces so/ /de nas bzung ste gang bsgo ba'i las rnams byed do/ /rig pa 'dzin pa dang rgyal po yang ster ro/ /dgra rnams la chad pas gcod par byed do/ /zla ba'i lha mo

yang blangs nas ster ro/ /rgyab la zhon pas lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing brgya byin yang ster ro/ /bskal ba bdun du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas a dzi ta sgrub par gyur na mchod rten gyi mdun du mtshan mo stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas te/ nyi ma bdun pa'am brgyad pa la mchod

pa rgya chen po byas te gtor ma phul nas gu gul gyi spos phul te bzlas pa bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i mtha' la nges par 'ong bar 'gyur te/ /kyai sgrub pa po bdag gis ci bgyi zhes so/ /sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ste/ /bdag gi bya ba gang yin pa bya dgos so zhes so/ /de nas

bzung nas bsgo ba'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /slar yang rgyal po ster zhing lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang sgrub par gyur na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khang bar zhugs te stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /nyi ma bdun pa'am nyi ma brgyad pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa rgya chen po

byas te/ /kha zas dkar po dang zho dang ji skad bshad pa'i mchod pa phul nas ji srid nam phyed kyi bar de srid bzlas par bya'o/ /ji srid nam phyed du gyur pa na rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /me tog dang mchod yon phul te tshim bar byas pas rgyal po ster bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa
