phyis byas pa las chu yongs su zad pa las rgyal lo/ /shing shal ma la'i rtsa ba la mtshal dang ldan pa zos pa las me tog ltung bar bya'o/ /kAM guSh+Tha dang / ma dir ya sbyin par bya ba'am/ yang tam+bu la yis rdul dang phral bar 'gyur ro/ /shing snu hi'i lo ma dang marka Da'i sa bon dang / gu

Na'i phye mas bu ram dang lhan cig zos pa las khrag ltung ngo / /tshu tshun da ra'i phye mas rta'i sna la bskus na zas mi byed do/ /tsan+dan gyis bkrus pa las thar ro/ /shing ke ta'i rtsa ba mgo la bcing bar bya/ shing 'bra go'i rtsa ba lag pa la/ shing ta la'i rtsa ga khu rum rgyal la gdon par bya'o/ /

byang phyogs su bltas te gcer bu skra grol bar gyur nas gsum po rnams cung zad btags nas btung bar bya ste/ mtshon chas 'joms par mi 'gyur ro/ /sho nA kA'i sa bon dang / bU ra ka pA du ka gnyis po sha ba'i pags pa'i khud du de mnyes te lce'i mthil du bzhag pa lat+ta pa'i 'bras

bu zos pa las/ sreg par mi byed do zhes gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud du thun mong gi sman gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //kye bcom ldan 'das ci ltar dus byed pa dang / sems can byed par nges pa de rnams kyi rgyu mtshan bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ rkang pa dang

rkan la phug nas mig tu zug pa las zla ba gsum gyis grub bo/ /rna bar phug pas zla ba bzhis so/ /mdzod spur zug pa las nyi ma gcig gis so/ /rkang pa dang rkan la phug nas lte bar zug pa las zla ba gsum gyis 'chi'o/ /rkang pa dang rkan la phug nas sna la zug pa las zla ba

gsum gyis so/ /bshang ba rab tu 'dzag pa'i dus mtshungs par sbrid pa byung na lo gcig gis so/ /shin tu dga' ba'i rab tu gal te sbrid pa byung ba dang mtshungs par mthe chung thams cad du zug pa las zla bas so/ /snying dang mgrin par zug pa las phyogs gsum gyis so/ /

mtshungs par rkan la gsum zug pa las nyi ma gsum gyis so/ /rkang pa'i mthe bong nas brtsams nas lte ba'i mthar thug par zug pa las zla ba drug gis so/ /sna'i rtse mor zla bas de der gyur na mtshan mo bdun gyis 'chi ba'i dus su 'gyur ro/ /rna ba dag gi dril bu'i sgra las zla ba gsum

gyis so/ /rna ba gnyis dang smin ma'i dbus dang klad pa'i rtse mo rnams su so so so sor zug pa las nyi ma gcig gis so/ /sen mo la dmar ba'i mchog tu mthong ba las zla ba drug gis so/ /so bskams pa las zla ba drug gis so/ /byas pa shes par 'gyur ba nyid/ /rdo rje skyes ba de bdag

la gsol/ /'dam skyes 'dab ma gsum pa ni/ /ge sar sbrang rtsis brgyan pa mthong / /e ma bde ba ldan pa'i zhing / /chags pa sangs rgyas nye bar mdzes/ /chags can rnams kyis bde ba zhi/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /yid ni 'dod chags kyis dkrugs pas/ /bud

med gan rkyal bsgyel nas ni/ /phrag par rkang pa zung byin nas/ /'og dang steng du nges brtags nas/ /de yi pad+ma rgyas pa yi/ /pad+ma'i bu gar 'jug par byed/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mar sha'i snying po/ /ldan par rdo rje de bcug nas/ /ji ltar bdag gi nur nur bo/ /bye ba nyis stong 'bum

rnams kyis/ /dbus su sems la rab mchod bya/ /bdag la rlung pang snying po las/ /snying po bla med rdo rje'i rtser/ /rak+ta ban d+hu ka dang ldan/ /blo ldan de der brjod smra byed/ /slar yang sems dpa' gcig bsgom bya/ /bde ba g.yo med dam pa'i sems/ /de las so sor

mchog sbyin nas/ /dga' ba'i skad cig nyis 'gyur nyid/ /ji srid rab brjod 'di lta bu'i/ /gzugs sku skad cig tsam bsam bya/ /bud med ri mo bskyed ma'ang cig /'gro ba rnams kyi yang gsum mo/ /bde ba sbyin pa zhi bar rig /cung zad 'dir ni rtog par byed/ /kha drag ched du

sdig las gnas/ /de des gting dpag dka' ba can/ /ngu 'bod du ni rtag tu brdungs/ /rnam mang sreg cing 'o dod 'bod/ /lus ni bskal ba gsum du gnas/ /bud med yon tan brjod ci dgos/ /sems can kun la yongs su 'dzin/ /snying rjes nyin mor byed pa las/ /bud med sems

kyis so sor gnas/ /nub par gyur pa legs shes shing / /yongs su shes pa'ang rgyas par byed/ /gal te de lta'i slong mo'i gzugs/ /gzhan min rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ /de yi nub dang mthong ba ni/ /sa dang sa la ring ba las/ /gang gis dran par byed tsam gyis/ /skad cig de las bde ba

myong / /phyogs nyid yul dang bud med nyid/ /lha yi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/ /phyag rgya de la phan byas nas/ /yid ldan de la gnas par byed/ /de phyir skyon las rnam par grol/ /yon tan dam pa kun la mkhas/ /bsod nams bsod nams bsod nams che/ /rab dang byed pa mthar

phyin can/ /de phyir de la brtan bltas nas/ /de mchu so yis btsir byas te/ /rnal 'byor pa shIta sgrogs byed cing / /de la'ang sta zur du bya ba/ /rang bde 'byung ba bcing bar bya/ /sa ma dam+b+ha ka nyid kyang / /bcing ba 'das tshogs ming can no/ /bung ba'i dra ba bcings pa yang / /rkang pa steng nas

'khrul 'khor lo/ /de bzhin kho nar rus sbal gyi/ /bcings pa'ang kun las bzang po nyid/ /de la skyil krung dbus su ni/ /lnga gsum tsog pu'i gdan du ni/ /byas nas dpung pa zung la ni/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la dam po yis/ /'khyud nas pad+mas rdo rje

ni/ /rgyas par byas nas rab gsol ba/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /sgom pa ci lta bu zhig 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ba rnams phan don du/ /zhus pa 'bras bu bcas par mdzod/ /bka' stsal pa/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gang / /rnal 'byor brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /nyin

mtshan mnyam pa'i tshul du ni/ /sems gcig gis ni bsgom par bya/ /dge legs gang bsgom rtag bya ba/ /srid pa'i ngo bos nges par rgyas/ /shin tu brtan zhing mngon sbyor bas/ /ji bzhin kho nar gsal bar 'gro/ /de nas ma dang bu mo'am/ /rnal 'byor ma dang tsha mo dang / /gzhan yang nye du mo

rnams kun/ /gtum mo de bzhin bram ze mo/ /mi mo'i tshogs ni 'di dag sbyin/ /cho ga bzang pos kun bsnyen bya/ /ji ltar dbye ba mi shes pa/ /dbye bas rje btsun chog shes pa/ /sgrub po mnar med 'khrid par byed/ /'dir ni 'jig rten 'gal ba nyid/ /'jig rten pha rol bden pa bcom/ /de

phyir kun tu rab 'bad pas/ /blo bzang legs pas yang dag brtsam/ /mkha' 'gro ma sngags bzhin sbas nas/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i/ /yid dang rjes mthun phyogs su ni/ /nye bar 'tshe ba kun spangs te/ /rang sems dga' ba'i 'dod pa mo/ /rab dang de dag yang dag

blangs/ /dben zhing dub pa med byas nas/ /ji srid rnyed pa'i gos dang ni/ /gnyis kyis brtan par bsgom par bya/ /blo bzang phan tshun sbyor ba las/ /bud med rang la mngon phyogs byas/ /zhugs nas gnyis dag phan tshun du/ /chags pas brtan par brtag par bya/ /de

nas blta dang khar brjod pa/ /rtse gcig yid kyis gnas par bya/ /de bzhin de nyid las brjod bya/ /bden pa'i gzi brjid shin tu byed/ /de yi bu dang khyim thab khyod/ /bdag la spun dang pha zhing pa/ /khyod nga'i ma dang chung ma ste/ /rnal 'byor ma dang tsha mo dang / /skyes

bu bdun gyi 'bangs nga yin/ /khyod zhal can gyi 'bangs dang bran/ /smra ba de 'drar brjod par bya/ /bde ba gzi brjid byed pa'i mchog /khyod nga'i pha ma chung ma dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang tsha mo dang / /nga ni khyod kyi dus kun 'bangs/ /mdung thung rnon po mchog tu gzhol/ /brtse

ba'i ma yis bdag la gzigs/ /bsnyen pa'i lta bas nges rtogs pas/ /de bdag skyes bu mthong nas ni/ /yang dang yang du 'o byas nas/ /yi ge gsum ni ster bar byed/ /rdo rje'i sbrang rtsi mtshungs pa'i khrag /pad+ma sa 'jigs par bya'o de'i/ /

mthong nas mig ni rnam par 'khrul/ /gdong yang dri yis byugs byas nas/ /de nas nu mar btsir bar bya/ /bstan par kun tu khar de'i khar/ /reg nas kha ru sbyin par byed/ /g.yo bar byed cing smra bar bya/ /de yis 'di 'drar brjod par bya/ /bdag gi a run+d+hat+te ni/ /

mthong phyir bza' ba rnam snang mdzad/ /zla drug lte ba phyin ci log /bu ga thams cad mthong ba'i phyir/ /ha yig reg cing mthong ba las phyogs gsum gyis so/ /ming med kyi rtsa bar ri mo nag po mthong ba las so/ /yan lag thams cad bsil bar mthong ba las

nyi ma brgyad na'o/ /khrus byas pa byas ma thag bskams pa na nyi ma bcu yis so/ /lus dri ngan pa las zla ba gnyis na'o/ /gcin g.yon du 'khor ba las mtshan mo gsum gyis so/ /lus phra mor mthong bas zla ba drug gis so/ /sna'i rtse mo ma mthong ba las nyi ma

gcig la'o/ /phyogs kyi 'di dag shes pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor pa sgom dang / /bsam gtan brtson pas sngags bzlas bya/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'bad pas bklag /bsrung ba lnga sogs bklag pa yang / /rang ngam gzhan gyis bya ba'o/ /nyin rer tshogs la zas

dang ni/ /dge 'dun zas dang de bzhin gzhan/ /dman dang zhan la rjes brtse bas/ /sems can rnams la rtag tu bya/ /zhes pa sna tshogs rgyud du gsungs/ /zhes so/ /gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud du le'u nyi shu gcig pa'o// //kye bcom ldan

'das/ mu stegs byed pa rnams thams cad la snying brtse ba med par 'dod pa'i don lhur len pa dang / gang zhig ngag gdug pa thams cad du gsod pa lhur len pa de rnams kyi bsam pa la thugs brtse bar gyur pas de dag mnga' bdag gis bdag la gsung du gsol/ /dang por

gso sbyong sbyin par bya/ /phyi nas bslab pa'i gnas lnga sbyin/ /bye brag smra ba 'bad pas bslab/ /mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no/ /dge ba bcu la goms gyur cing / /bla ma la gus 'dul la mos/ /dbu ma'ang slob tu bcug nas ni/ /sngags ni kun tu brtsam par bya/ /gsang las shin tu gsang ba'i

rgyud/ /myur du phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'dis myur du/ /bslab pa thos nas spyod yul bzang / /bdud bzhi rnams spangs rnal 'byor pas/ /lha yi sbyor bas gnas par bya/ /sta res gcod pa dang thod le kor byas nas nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su mi bskyod pas gtor te/ de

nas rkang pa gnyis kyis mnan nas sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /gsang sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na thig le 'ching ngo / /gshin rje'i stobs su 'gro ste de gsal bar byed do/ /bdag gi lte bar bsgom pa'i man ngag go/ /gang gang skad cig las brtsams te/ /de yi nyi mas bsgrub par

bya/ /nyi ma lnga yi mthar thug bya/ /log par smra ba'i 'jig rten las/ /legs sbas rab tu gsal ba ni/ /de nyid 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor mchog /rnal 'byor ma kun de nyid bstan/ /bzlas brjod 'bum phrag gcig tu brjod/ /brtul po yis ni 'bum phrag lnga/ /gang zhig rgyud du

gsungs rang gi/ /rang bzhin las ni 'bum phrag bzhi/ /de nas shin tu chung ba 'di/ /lha mo de kun gsal bar bstan/ /dpal ldan gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //rang gi rgyud 'di mi shes par/ /rgyud dang rgyud du nges brjod pa/ /

gal te 'tsho ba'i bsam pa yis/ /stong pa'i sa la de 'khor ro/ /dpal ldan gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //skad gnyis smra ba chen po thar pa lots+tsha ba'i bka' drin gyis bskyangs pa/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis/ chos kyi rje khro phu lots+tsha ba'i

gdan sa gnas gsar dgon par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgyud 'di 'gyur las 'bad pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /nag po'i rtsa lag ma lus kun bcom ste/ /bstan pa'i bya ba yid bzhin 'grub pa dang / /mthar thug 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid gyur cig/ //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI b+ha ga bA na e ka dza Ta ma hA kalpa tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i brtag pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag

gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi gnas rdo rje'i ri bo'i zom na bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jigs byed rgyal po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdong can dang / ye shes bkod pa'i phyag rgya la sogs

pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i de kho na nyid shin tu sbas pa'i mdzod la mnga' brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par nges pa/ rigs dang tshogs dang dam tshig dang brtul zhugs chen po phyag rgya rgya mtsho lta bu'i tshul

la gnas pa/ gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba'i bde ba chen po la rnam par rol pa/ thabs dang shes rab bla na med pa'i kha sbyor las nges par 'byung ba'i ye shes can/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi kun nas ldang ba dang bag la nyal 'joms pa la mkhas pa dpag tu med pa dang thabs

cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje che/ /rdo rje'i rgyal po kun bdag po/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad bskyed mdzad yab/ /bde chen 'khor lo bdag la gsungs/ /srid gsum thibs po sel mdzad cing / /mya ngan 'das la mi gnas pa/ /lus can kun skyob brtse chen po/ /'dren pa khyod lam bstan du gsol/ /blo gros snying rje brtan ldan pas/ /thabs ni gang

zhig mngon bsgoms na/ /sku lnga phyag rgya 'grub 'gyur ba/ /gtso bo de ni 'dir bshad gsol/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor cher 'byung ba/ /'bum phrag rgyud chen las gsungs pa/ /ral pa gcig phreng dkyil 'khor gtso/ /sbas pa gang lags brtse bas gsungs/ /zhes

gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i bdag po rab tu dgyes pas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog lnga phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te slar 'dus pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs te/

bcom ldan 'das nyid la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas yang dbu'i gtsug tor gyi nor bu las zla ba dang / kun+da lta bu'i 'od zer dkar po byung ste/ dbu'i steng du dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par 'byung ba'i rnam par bkod pa mngon sum du

gsal bar mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /snying rje chen po khyod sems can thams cad la sman pa dang bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mngon

par 'byung ba'i mdzod rdo rje sgeg pa chen po ral pa gcig pa'i gsang ba mchog zhus pa legs so legs so/ /rdo rje 'chang 'di ni khyod kyi dus yin zhing 'di ni khyod kyi snang bar byed pa yin no/ /nga yang sngon rdo rje ri bo'i zom 'di nyid du byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya bar

gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / ye shes ral pa gcig pa'i gsang ba lhan cig tu rnam par rol pas sems can dpag tu med pa smin par byas pa rjes su dran no/ /de bas na khyod kyis snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pas gsang sngags kyi nges par

'byung ba'i rtog pa 'di legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /o~M AHoM oM AHhrIM trIM hU~M/ o~M AHsarba ta

thA ga to gar+b+he badzra ta twa sar+b+ba ny+dzA na dz+wA la hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHsarba ta thA ga to m-I tr-i badzra ta two pA ya sa ra beM hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra dz+nyA na hU~M phaT/ o~M AHbadzra tsakra a hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra rat+na i hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra pad+ma u hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M

AHbadzra bi shwa e hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra mo hA a~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra war+N+Na I hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra rA ga U hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra dwe Sha ai hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra s+thI ra au hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra yo ga a~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra dz+wA la

AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra ba la AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra rU pa Ni ka hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra shap+da tsa hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra gan+d+ha Ta hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHra sa ta badzra hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra s+phar+Sha pa hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra d+harma ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra k+Shi tra sha hU~M

phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra A lo kAk+ShaHhU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra oM ku sha r-i hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra pA sha r-I hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra ban+d+ha l-i hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M AHbadzra g+haN+Da l-I hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsarbA d+harmAHswab+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ o~M badzra shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmAHbadzra shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ o~M yog

shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmAHyo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ rdo rje mi bskyod ral pa gcig /mi bskyod pa ni byang sems bcas/ /rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje dang / /rdo rje zhags pa rnam par bsgom/ /gti mug bag chags 'dod chags dang / /zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor lor gnas/ /ri rab nyi zla ba dan las/ /

'byung bzhi'i rdo rje de bzhin no/ /khyams bzhir me long pi wa~M dang / /dri mchog zhal zas las byung ba/ /gzugs sgra dri ro rdo rje ma/ /mkhas pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /phyogs bral na bza' chos 'byung dang / /maN+Dal mar me las skyes pa/ /reg chos zhing

dang snang ba yis/ /rdo rje lha mo rnam par blta/ /sgo bzhir lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog dril bu yongs gyur pas/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bsgom/ /rang mtshan ka pA las rab mdzes/ /gtum drag tshang tshing 'khrigs pa dang / /'ur 'ur 'bar bas

khyab pa dang / /keng rus 'jigs rung shar sogs kyis/ /phyogs su g.yon bskor gyis legs gnas/ /ha har dgod pa dbang ldan du/ /byin zar dpal gyi nags tshal lo/ /mun pa mi bzad bden bral du/ /rlung du ki li ki lir sgrogs/ /mi mnyam med pa zur bzhi

yin/ /dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs bzhi/ /rnam thar brgyad phyir ka ba brgyad/ /byang chub yan lag bdun dag phyir/ /dra ba dang ni dra ba phyed/ /phyogs bzhir tshad med bzhi yin te/ /pad+ma 'khor lo shes rab thabs/ /rnam par

shes brgyad yongs dag pa/ /de ni dur khrod chen po brgyad/ /zla ba me long nyi mnyam nyid/ /sa bon mtshan ma kun tu rtog /yongs gyur bya ba grub pa ste/ /nyer rdzogs chos dbyings ye shes yin/ /lnga phung dang ni dri ma bzhin/ /chen po bzhi dang spyod yul brgyad/ /

rnam bzhi tshor ba rnam dag lha/ /ye shes bdag nyid 'khor lo'o/ /dgod dang phrad 'khyud 'khrig pa dag /pU dzA o a go ra de ma/ /ka o tri ko ka la kA hi/ /pre gr-i sau su na si ma ku/ /ha hi hu he ho ha~M/ /a i u e o a~M/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin/ /

rnam par 'joms dang rnam mtshan bral/ /dga' dang mchog dga' dga' bral dang / /lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid do/ /dgod dang phrad 'khyud 'khrig pa dag /bde chen dag phyir bum pa dang / /gsang ba shes rab bde ba che/ /dbang bzhi rgyal po thob par

'gyur/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ dmigs pas dub dang gzhan goms 'dod/ /rnam par mi rtog de nyid bsgom/ /rmi lam nam mkha'i sbyor ba ni/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzhag /spyi bo snying ga lte bar ni/ /zla ba pad+ma nyi steng du/ /ha~M dang hU~M dang a zhes pa/ /yi ge bde

gsal mi rtog rgyud/ /snying po 'pho dang thim dang gnas/ /'gyur dang 'gul dang 'phar ba dang / /mda' bsnun bsdu dang 'gro 'ong sbyar/ /lus med sems ni ci bder 'gro/ /bstims nas 'phro zhing 'bar bar byed/ /dbang du byed dang kha sbyar bsgom/ /'dun pas

bsgrub dang sa bon bsgyur/ /'phen dran bar dor don sgrub 'gyur/ /tshe 'di yi ni de bzhin du/ /nying mtshams sbyor dang srid mtshams yang / /rnal 'byor rgyal po thabs ldan pas/ /bde chen sa gsum bde blag 'gro/ /srid zhi dag dang nges pa dang / /rten 'brel

'byung dang zlog dang gsad/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang zhi la sogs/ /'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /gnyis sbyor rgyun mi 'chad ba de dang / /kun nas 'od gsal lhan cig skyes/ /bung bas me tog rtsi ltar ni/ /rnam pa kun tu don bsgrub pa'o/ /oM a kA ro mu kha~M

sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma nA~M Ad+ya nut+pan+ta twA ta sarba ni swa b+hA ba hU~M/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor de dag thams cad rab tu yi rangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod cing mchod pa bsam gyis

mi khyab pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la brtson par gyur te/ 'jig rten mgon po bcom ldan legs/ /'gro ba nyon mongs bskyab slad du/ /stong pa'i ting 'dzin spangs nas ni/ /khyod kyis byams chen skur bstan mdzad/ /thugs rje chen po bcom ldan legs/ /sems can

sdug bsngal bsgral slad du/ /zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas par/ /brtse chen rnam par 'phrul par mdzad/ /bde chen rgyal po bcom ldan legs/ /lus can bde don bsgrub slad du/ /zag med dbyings thugs ma gzhol bar/ /dgyes chen kun du snang mdzad legs/ /gtso

bo rdo rje rgyal po legs/ /skye bo dub ba ngal bso'i phyir/ /mtha' gcig rgyun chad mi bzhugs par/ /ma lus 'tshal ba sgrub pa rmad/ /de nas 'khor gyi tshogs phal mo che de dag dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das

kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa'i nges par gyur pa thabs dang shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzhal du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas bzhin du thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du/ cho 'phrul chen po du ma bstan to/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i gsang ba chen po rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba la sogs pa de dag ni nga dang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'bar ba khrag 'thung gi rgyal

po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig mang po yang de yi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyis tshe rabs thams cad du yi dam byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'am mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba dang / ya nga ba dang / bkra mi shis pa thams

cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang gi khyim na gnas pa de yang mchod rten du bya bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa dang dngos grub thams cad kyi gter tshad med par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi

dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa brtag pa rdo rje'i rgyud chen po bla na med pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi tra

A nan+da'i bka' drin la brten nas/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po badzra shr-i kha la ru dra dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsan+d+ra gu h+ya til ka nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod

skad du/ dpal zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar chen por gyur te/ yang 'dus nas phyag gar dang bcas pas thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas/

bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la gtsug gis 'dud pas gsol ba btab pa/ dpa' bo kun gyi gsang ba yi/ /zla gsang thig le dga' byed pa/ /gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung / /bcom ldan khyed kyis bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi ma skyes pa/ /skye

dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba'i/ /mchog tu rtog par sbyor ba'o/ /rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas dag /dri med nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i/ /rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng byas te/ /nyi ma chen pos dbang bskur ba'o/ /chos kyilongs

spyod yang dag 'byung / /pad+ma dmar po mchog gi mdog /'dod chags de nyid gsang ba che/ /thams cad bde byed bdud rtsi'i mchog /A dang lar ni yang dag ldan/ /yang dag mdzes pa 'gying ba'i 'gros/ /sna tshogs ye shes sna tshogs che/ /zla

gsang thig le'i mchog nyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ 'gog pa chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la de kho na nyid dbyangs kyis bskul te bzhengs par mdzad do/ /o~M hU~M AH/ mi skye ye shes bde ba'i mchog dang

ldan pa'i ro la mnabs su gsol/ /a la la ho/ /sems pa bde mchog de nyid 'gog pa rnams la bslang ba'i phyir/ /chags pa med pa'i bde mchog mnga' mdzad bzhengs shig mnabs/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i bde la rol cing dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol/ /byang chub

skye gnas bde mchog dbyings las mi nyams dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig /a la la ho/ /sngon gyi zhen pa'i mtha' dang sngo skams nyon mongs gzir ba la/ /rmongs med bde mchog rgyan dang ldan pas thabs kyis bskul te go bar mdzod/ /'gro kun mtshungs par spyod pa'i sgo mor

byang chub lam ston cing / /bde mchog bdud rtsi khyad par med par 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsol cig /a la la ho/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen

po zla gsang thig le skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi thugs kyi gsang ba'i thig le las shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po zla ba'i thig le'i

dbus su rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du yang snang bar byas/ steng dang 'og tu yang zhugs te/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i ri dang / sems can rnams la gsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bas mnyes par byas te/ slar de nyid du log nas

bcom ldan 'das shin tu mnyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po snying po gsang ba mchog gi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus na bde bar bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde ba chen por gyur pa'i snying po des bskul ba

na/ gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su mchog tu gsang ba'i shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar gcig tu stug por gyur pa bsgrubs te/ rang rang gi sku bud med kyi tshul du

bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /de nas la la ni spyan pad+mo 'bar ba rgyas pa ltar bsgyur zhing bzlog ste smin ris g.yo bas/ sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /rdo rje rab dgyes

gdon mi za/ /sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas bde ba'i bde ba yis/ /bcom ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur/ /smin ma bsgyur zhing zhabs bsgyur ba/ /spyan bsgyur shin tu gnon pa yi/ /sor mo'i mtha' ma rnam bsgyur ba/ /rdo rje'i

tshul gyis gar mdzad de/ /rdo rje che la mnyes mdzad cing / /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /skad cig skad cig bskul ba yis/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par gyur/ /brjid pa'i zhabs dang rin chen dbu/ /dri med spyi bos gar mdzad cing / /zhal gyi dkyil

'khor rnam bsgyur bas/ /bde byed chen po myang bar mdzad/ /dur khrod yon tan tshogs dag gi/ /pad+mo'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing / /bde ba bdag po chen po la/ /rin chen tshul gyis mdzes par mdzad/ /shin tu dgyes gsal bde dam pa/ /pad+mo dmar la

phye mdzad de/ /'dod chags bul dgyes rnam bsgyur bar/ /pad+mo dra bas gar mdzad cing / /pad+mo rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs te/ /bde ba che la mnyes mdzad cing / /bcom ldan pad+mor gnas par gyur/ /phyag gi

rtse mor sor mo'i mtha'/ /rnam par bsgyur bas gar mdzad cing / /phyag sbyar khong stong pad+mo yis/ /glog bzhin dpal dang spyi gtsug tu/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis lang long pos/ /sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la/ /las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing / /sna tshogs

bcom ldan gnas par gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje

dang / rin po che gsang ba dang / pad+mo dang las kyi gsang ba chen po thams cad kyis bzhed pa/ bde ba chen po zhes bya ba 'od zer chen po'i sprin gyi tshogs nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mchog las phyung ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di dag thams cad

snang bas snang bar byas te/ nyid kyi thugs kyi zla ba'i thig le la stug po gcig tu gyur nas bzhugs te/ thugs kyi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su 'od zer des dgyes pa bskyed cing drangs nas bcug ste gcig tu byas nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dgyes pa chen po gdon mi

za bar rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /

dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshul gyis su/ /cho ga sbyor bas spro byas te/ /theg dang mthun par dkyil 'khor don/ /sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar bya zhing / /ji ltar yang dag brtag par bya/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na/ /zla gsang thig le'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

dpa' bos kyang / /brtag par nus pa ma yin no/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtags pa/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis/ /lha yi sbyor bas rgyas btab pas/ /cho ga shes pas bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /thig

bzhis yongs su bris pa ste/ /ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas/ /kun tu yongs su zlum pa ste/ /zla ba de yi dbus bsam pa/ /bde ba chen po mi phyed pa/ /gtso bo de steng bri bar bya/ /de ni tsheg drag bcas pa ste/ /yi ge bcu gsum ldan pa yi/ /yi ge mchog tu bde ba ste/ /

rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang dag 'byung / /shes rab can gyis de mdun du/ /mi phyed yid phyung bri bya ste/ /drag po'i tsheg dang 'dren par bcas/ /bzhi yis gtsug tu byas pa'o/ /de yi lho yi phyogs su ni/ /mi smra ba yi yi ge'i mchog /phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog thams cad/ /

sgrub par byed pa'i yi ge bri/ /ha dang rang ldan tsheg drag bcas/ /bzhi pa yi ni dbus byas pa/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyi yi ge ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya'o/ /khro bo'i yi ge ye shes che/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya'i rmad byung ba/ /brjid du bcas pa dgod pa yi/ /byang gi phyogs

su bri bar bya/ /sems can thams cad mchog dag dang / /dgyes pa chen po rab 'grub phyir/ /nga yi de nyid gsung gis ni/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /gar gyis tshud pas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sems can mchog gis ston

byed na/ /de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la gar mdzad cing / rab tu spros pa spyan gdangs nas/ /zhabs dang zhabs

kyis gnon pa yis/ /sdud cing 'dor ba 'dzugs par mdzad/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis/ /rjid pa'i rtse mo mtha' las dgrol/ /cung zad zur gyis gdangs pa'i spyan/ /mdzes pa'i spyan tshugs rnam bsgyur bas/ /spyan gyi phyag rgyas gar mdzad pas/ /'gro

la rgyas btab 'dud par 'gyur/ /sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo la/ /dbyangs 'di yis ni bskul mdzad cing / /shin tu dgyes che dkyil 'khor du/ /rnal 'byor ma kun gnas par 'gyur/ /shin tu dgyes che rdo rje dag /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po/ /

dkyil 'khor mchog tu dgyes pa yi/ /de nyid bcom ldan nyid kyis shod/ /rnam pa kun tu skye ba med pa'i bde bas rol cing chub mdzad pa'i/ /bdag cag gzugs kyi dam dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyur ba med pa'i yid/ /bde mchog byang chub sems ni rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal

yongs bral te/ /che ba'i ye shes lhun grub mchog ldan bde spyod bde la rol par mdzod/ /a la la ho/ /'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis/ /shin tu srid pas mya ngan 'das/ /dga' chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlob/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rgyas pa'i spyan ut+pa la kha phye ba bzhin smin ma dang sku rnam par 'gyur ba/ glog dang chu rlabs bzhin du 'gyur ba'i rnam par gnon pas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so/ /

dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje ye shes thugs la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog nyid ni/ /bdag nyid sbyor bas brtags pa yin/ /rdo rje dgyes pa chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor zla ba gang ba 'dra/ /'od zer dkar po'i phreng bas mdzes/ /byang chub sems

mchog 'dra ba yin/ /rdo rje dpa' bo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /mdzes pa'i zla ba kham pa la/ /mthing ga'i 'bar ba kun rgyas pa/ /me dang rlung gis bus pa bzhin/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i mchog sgrub pa/ /rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor ni/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor cha brgyad kyi/ /'bar

dang bcas pa'i nyi ma bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa/ /pad+mo'i dbang po pad+ma 'dra/ /'dab ma brgyad po gyes pa yi/ /ge sar zla bas mdzes byas pa'o/ /thams cad las ni grub byed pa/ /rdo rje'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor

gru gsum ste/ /rab tu 'bar ba me dang 'dra/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag par bya/ /skyong ba rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /ji ltar de nyid sprul pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang bzhengs nas brjid

pa'i rdo rje gang dag gis gar mdzad cing glu dang sil snyan gyi gling bu dang pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / dun+du b+hi dang / ba na wa dang / pa li ka dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun tu brdung ba dang / sil snyan la sogs pa'i rnam par rol pas lha'i ro dang /

ro'i zas dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / theg pa dang / stan dang / gos dang / bldag pa dang / bzhib pa dang / 'jams la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la bstabs nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas

pad+mo'i sor mo khong stong du mdzad de g.yon du btud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/ yang de kho na nyid bskul bar mdzad pa'i dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad do/ /shin tu bde ba'i byams pa kun tu gzigs pa'i thugs rje spyan mnga' bas/ /byang chub chen po snying

por 'gro ba bsgral bas skyo yid mi mnga' ste/ /mthun pa'i lam ston nyon mongs drug las bsgral ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i tshul du gzungs kyi rang bzhin bde gshegs kun la stobs/ /e ma'o/ /bde ba kun tu rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren cing bsnams/ /sa yi khyad par

bde bas rdzogs pa'i sku nyid stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin/ /chos nyid ji bzhin de la reg pas sku nyid che ba kun ston cing / /snying po byang chub bgrod phyir 'gro ba thams cad sgo mo bsam gyis mi khyab bstan/ /dpal gyi snying po gzungs su bstan te rigs lnga'i gtso rnams mnyes

mdzad cing / /dgyes pas drongs la mnabs shing rab tu dgyes pas rol mo mdzod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba mnos te bying ba'i gnas nas bslang ba'i phyir/ /gnod sbyin cha lugs skye 'gog med pa'i tshul dang rnam par ldan/ /snying rje chen po bcas nas bde ba

chen po ston pa'i chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin/ /dgyes pa mchog gi ngang la sprul pa'i lha mo skye mched dang / /rol pas 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde mchog stsol bar mdzod/ /ha ha ha hoHbde la gnas shing bde mnobs hU~M/ /dgyes pa mchog dang ldan pa'i mi skye bde mchog bde

la char pa rab tu dbab tu gsol/ /rnam pa kun tu mtha' dang bral ba'i dbyings la bde gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol/ /dpal gyi rgyal po tshul bzhin de ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas su mnabs su gsol/ /ngo mtshar byang chub che ba 'di nyid 'gro ba rten bzhin bde thob pa/ /

pha rol phyin drug dngos nyid gang la'ang mi brten par/ /mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzungs dang rtag tu rnam par ldan/ /mtha' dang bral ba'i bde bas chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yi/ /rmongs pa'i bde bas bying zhing gnas pa'i 'gro la snying rje'i chus khrus mdzod/ /hoH/ de nas/ shin tu

dgyes mchog mi chags pa/ /'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis/ /yid dang mthun pa'i bde chen po/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba'i dbyangs

kyis bstod pa nye bar gnas nas yang chu skyes kyi 'dab ma dri ma med pa dang 'dra ba'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs shing 'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur nas/ yang tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal pa rgyas

pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs thams cad las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / chos 'dzin dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams

cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi tshogs chen po dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshon dang / dga' ba dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo'i g.yog gi tshogs tshad med pa 'dren par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa la sogs

pa'i rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs dang / grangs med pa'i rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /

nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par bde ba chen po gyur pa dang bcas pa'i kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i rnam par gnon pas kun tu gnon pas/ rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pas 'degs shing tshems kyis 'debs pa

dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i kun tu 'brel pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg pas 'gying ba dang / spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa'i rnams dang / kun tu 'dor ba'i rnam par gnon pas 'khor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la

byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /bdag nyid de nyid mnyam gzhag dang / /de bzhin lha yi de nyid dang / /sngags dang phyag rgya de nyid dang / /de yi dkyil 'khor mchog

tu 'gyur/ /yan lag thams cad bsgom las 'das/ /rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs pa/ /'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya/ /chos dang chos min rnam spyod pa/ /chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya/ /rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba yi/ /

dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin/ /'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam/ /chu yi pad+ma dmar ba 'dra/ /rang sems 'dod chags shin tu chags/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /gzugs dang gzugs min dri med pas/ /gang khams kun la 'jug 'gyur ba/ /

sems ni chu dang skul byed pa/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po g.yog dang bcas pa dang / pho nya dang pho nya mo dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor de

dag thams cad yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin gtso bo chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma'o rab dgyes sems dpa' mchog /kye ma'o rab dgyes phyogs bsgyur ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mchog gi/ /

dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba sbyor che ba/ /rdo rje sbyor ba bla na med/ /'jigs gsum bde mchog thob 'gyur bas/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsung / /rin chen pad+ma sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba'i gar mdzad pa/ /rnam grangs

thig le'i 'jig rten du/ /rnam dag dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rnal 'byor ma thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag pad+ma'i sor mo'i 'dab ma kun tu 'brel pa'i rdo rje'i thal mo dang / gar rnam par 'gyur ba'i brjid bag tu bcas pas mtha' 'grol zhing

ma mchu tshems kyis mnan nas chu skyes sar pa'i 'dab ma bzhin gzigs pas bzhad pa/ glu'i phyag rgyas dbyangs len pa dang / gcig la gcig bskul ba dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa la 'degs shing g.yas dang g.yon pa'i rnal par gnon pa'i tshul gyis/ o~M hU~M a la la la ho/ /

kun tu snang zhing mi chags par/ /mi chags pa yi bde mchog gis/ /bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzugs kyi rnams/ /stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pas/ /a la la la ho/ /bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/ /bzhengs shing gzhan la stobs la grub par

mdzod/ /chags pas mi gos dngos po yi/ /bde ba kun la reg par mdzad cing dgongs su gsol/ /de nas kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i bdag po de kho na nyid kyis dbyangs chen po'i bskul bas thugs sad par gyur te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu

longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir sna tshogs shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rnam par gnon par gar mdzad/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i

rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis glu len/ rdo rje rnam par rol pa chen pos rnam par rol/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i zla ba'i thig le'i dkyil nas/ o~M ma hA su kha hUM zhes brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye

shes dbyings phyug ma phyung ngo / /steng du zla gam ldan pa yi/ /gnyis pa yi ge ma lta bu/ /mtshan du thig le ldan byas pa/ /ye shes gsal ba'i rnal 'byor ma'o/ /A li kA li 'dren bya ba/ /dbus su ri mo brtag byas te/ /de yi mgo dang mjug dag tu/ /khro bo gnyis po mchog

bsam bya/ /'di ni btsun mo'i rab gsal ba/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o/ /'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang / /bsod nams kun gyis byin rlob 'gyur/ /A li gnyis dbus ri mo bri/ /ldan pa 'dren pa yang dag ldan/ /de steng zla gam thig le dag /mgo mjug gnyis su

gzhan yang tra~M/ /'di ni don dam gsal ba ste/ /rin chen rnal 'byor ma dbang sbyin/ /dran pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te/ /sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed/ /A li gnyis dang ldan byas te/ /tsheg drag yi ge gnyis su bshad/ /'di ni rab dga' kun tu chags/ /chu

srin ma zhes bstan pa yin/ /dang po skal ba chen po yi/ /tsheg drag po dang bcas pa gzhan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi a li 'di/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed/ /bdag nyid la'am yang na gzhan/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /bsgrub bya'i dkyil 'khor grub

byed na/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog /yi ge'i phyag rgya'i mngon gnas pa'i/ /'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /bris pa yis kyang khyad par 'gyur/ /e ma'o bde ba ye shes che/ /de yi ye shes tshe 'di la/ /'dod

byed bde ba sten byed cing / /'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur/ /khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'di las rgya che mchog gzhan med/ /sgrub pa po yi sems can kun/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/ /zla gsang thig le'i gsang ba'i rgyal po chen po

shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te

dang po rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dgyes pa'i yid bde ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba bskyed nas gar dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad pa mdzad cing yang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i

bde ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro/ /bde byed chen po bshad pa shod/ /bde ba chen po bshad pa shod/ /gsang ba chen po bshad pa shod/ /dgyes pa chen po bshad pa shod/ /khyod las

'dod chags yang dag 'byung / /khyod las zhe sdang chen po ste/ /khyod las sdig byed sdug bsngal dang / /khyod las khams gsum thams cad 'byung / /khyod las skyes pa ma ning dang / /khyod las 'dod gzir bud med dang / /khyod las 'dod las rnam grol dang / /khyod las

byang chub bla med 'byung / /khyod las nam mkha' rlung dag dang / /khyod las gzi brjid me yi khams/ /khyod las de bzhin chu dang sa/ /khyod las spyod dang mi spyod kun/ /khyod las sangs rgyas dpa' chen po/ /yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /khyod las chos dang dge 'dun dang / /

khyod las pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / /ri dang skye bo thams cad 'byung / /khyod las rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /khyod las dri med pad+mo dang / /khyod las rin chen tshad med che/ /de bzhin rdo rje sna tshogs 'byung / /khyod las phyag rgya sngags kyi

rnams/ /khyod las rig pa'i snying po 'byung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzums pas smin ma brkyang ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chen po dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la

'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa kun 'dus pa thams cad

la skad cig skad cig tu kun tu gzigs nas brjid pa dang bcas pa'i phyag 'jam pos nyid kyi snying ga'i rdo rje gsor zhing / nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rdo rje rjes su chags pa rab tu rgyas pa chen po'i lta bas 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ nyid kyi thugs pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

yi ge'i thig le'i dkyil nas 'od zer phyung ste kun tu snang bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dang po'i yi ge bcu gsum pa/ /thig ler

bcas pa bsam byas te/ /bde chen tshul bzhin gzhag byas la/ /gzhan gyis mi phyed thig ler bcas/ /yi ge drug pa 'dren pa ru/ /tshul bzhin 'og tu yongs su brtag /'di ni gsang ba chen po ste/ /rmad byung yi ge phyag rgya'o/ /bde chen bde bar bskyed pa'i phyir/ /sangs

rgyas kun gyis bsgrags pa yin/ /ye shes kyi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /skad cig snying pos rgyas btab na/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'chad pa po/ /ston pa rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po skul byed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs par byed/ /yi ge ye shes grub pa

yis/ /ye shes dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur/ /'phrul gyi mig dang shes rab che/ /mi shes sdig pa 'joms par byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'dra bar/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po reg pa che/ /sdug bsngal 'dod pa 'joms byed pa'o/ /shes

rab ye shes dngos grub che/ /byang chub myur du 'thob 'gyur te/ /rig ma 'bum phrag brgyas bskor cing / /sems dpa' chen po de dang rtsen/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/ /thal mo brkyang ste rol pa yis/ /tshe dang lang tsho skal dang ldan/ /dran pa tsam gyis 'thob par 'gyur/ /

'dod pa yis ni dgos pa'i rnams/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /'og dang steng gi nam mkha' la/ /bdag 'dod bzhin du 'gro 'ong byed/ /sa yang rnam par phug nas su/ /stobs chen de 'dir 'ong bar byed/ /sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed de/ /byang

chub par ni gdon mi za/ /bde ba chen po'i rnam mdzad pas/ /gzhom zhing de bzhin myang ba yi/ /rdo rje blo yis bdud kyi rnams/ /rnam par 'gyur bas thams cad bsgral/ /bde ba chen po gtong ba yis/ /skad cig nyid du gsol bar bya/ /grub pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa che/ /dpa' bo chen

pos dgug par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams ci 'dod par/ /rnam gnon tshul gyis gnon par bya/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen po/ /gnod byed stobs kyis dgon gnas par/ /rab tu rnam 'joms gnon pa yis/ /gzhom pa'i tshul gyis bsgral bar bya/ /mtshon cha lnga yis

rnam gnon pas/ /gzhan gyi bud med rtsen par bya/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde gnas pa'i/ /sems can chen pos grol byas te/ /byang chub sems ni bde 'byung bas/ /sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /dam tshig rjes su ldan pa yis/ /rnal 'byor rtag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur/ /skad cig mtho ris

'gro bar byed/ /skad cig bde ldan 'gro bar byed/ /rdo rje'i shugs kyis thams cad du/ /sems can skad cig 'di ru'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas su 'gyur/ /sems can rnams dang grags chen po/ /thams cad kyi ni rigs rnams dang / /pha rol phyin rnams skye gnas te/ /

de bzhin rigs dang pha rol phyin/ /de dag 'di la rab tu gnas/ /dbang por gyur pa brten chen po/ /yon tan tshogs ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /de nyid dngos po thams cad la/ /thams cad dus gsum mnyam gnas te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde/ /sems dpa'

thog ma tha med yin/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos kyi yi ge zhes bya ba yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /bcu gsum gyi ni yi ge che/ /ye shes thig le ldan pa ste/ /rdo rje yid 'byung lhags pa yi/ /ha la ra btags

dbu bskor bya/ /'di ni yid las skyes pa ste/ /shin tu dgyes che mdzes pa yis/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya phyag rgya che/ /gtso bo'i spyan sngar gnas pa yi/ /gsang ba'i snying gi pad+mo la/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /shin du dgyes pa'i mnyes par

'gyur/ /gtso chen rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /de yi bde bas mnyes byas te/ /dbang po yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /de dang rol pas myur du 'grub/ /de gnyis phan tshun dgyes pa las/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i gzhir gyur te/ /rig 'dzin mchog gi gzugs ldan dang / /lha mi kun

gyis mchod par 'gyur/ /de dang lhan cig rol pa na/ /lha chen tshangs pa gtogs 'dod rnams/ /phyag rgya sbyor ba'i tshul gnas pa'i/ /bdag nyid che la phyag byed pa'o/ /nyes gsum dri ma spangs pa yi/ /shin tu sbyor ba'i rgyas btab pa/ /sems can gar ni byed pa dang / /

sems dpa' che la mnyes par byed/ /de ni sa dang nam mkha' la/ /bde bar gnas shing 'gro bar byed/ /sna tshogs lha mo bde che ba'i/ /sna tshogs bde bas nyer spyod do/ /phyag rgya'i gar gyis gar mdzad cing / /sems can myur du rtogs par byed/ /ral grir gyur pa gzi chen

po/ /nam mkha' kun tu phan tshun 'gro/ /lha mo 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang / /lha min klu yi bu mo dang / /gzhan yang 'phrul ldan mi'i bu mo/ /de yi bud med kun bsgrub bya/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes rab gnas pas/ /de nyid kun tu 'gro byed de/ /ji tsam 'dod par dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' che gnas so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad myur du 'grub/ /thams cad chos ni bde chen po/ /dge 'dun chags med thams cad rnams/ /de dag thams cad de yin no/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi/ /thogs med stobs kyis bkug nas su/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs

gnas pas/ /gzhan gyi bud med rtsen par bya/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /phyag rgya ye shes bsgrub bya ste/ /skad cig skad cig bsten pa yi/ /bdag gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gnyis med sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /de ni dngos grub kun 'gyur te/ /bdag med

nga rgyal med 'gyur te/ /snang ba med cing yi ge med/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i yid dang rjes su mthun par mdzad ma'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /lha mo rdo rje kI li ni/ /dang por oM gyis rnam brgyan pa/ /bgegs mthar byed dang ldan pa ni/ /dbang mchog sbyin

par mdzad ma ste/ /de yis bud med snying ga ru/ /bdag nyid kyis ni byin brlabs te/ /dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas tshul bzhin bsgom par bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor chen po de/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug byin brlabs pas/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag

tu/ /mdzes pa'i spyan dang rol cing 'gro/ /bdag gam 'on te gzhan dag la/ /phyag rgya de yis rgyas btab ste/ /rdo rje pad+mo phye ba yis/ /sgrub pa pos ni myur du bsgrub/ /pad+ma rnam par phye byas te/ /phyag rgya sbyor bas rol pa yi/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /'gro dang

'ong ba gdon mi za/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis su/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya bzung byas te/ /sbyor ba chen po bsgom byas na/ /de ma thag tu nam mkhar 'gro/ /bdag nyid gan rkyal gnas byas te/ /nyid kyi steng du phyag rgya gzhag /nyid kyis byin brlabs phyag rgya la/ /sngags

pas tshul bzhin bskyod par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi glo dag tu/ /dgyes dang mdza' ba gnyis bzhugs par/ /mi g.yeng phyag rgya bzhag byas te/ /bdag nyid shin tu dgyes par bsgom/ /'di yis dngos grub thob 'gyur te/ /'di dag lhan cig 'grogs pa yis/ /gzungs

ma kun gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'gyur/ /'di dang lhan cig sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' bdag po sangs rgyas bzhin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas/ /de ni sangs rgyas ngo bor 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/ /nub gcig

bdud rtsi dbyung byas te/ /gzungs ma'i phyag rgya la brten nas/ /rmad 'byung nyid ni 'thob ces bshad/ /mtshan gyi mtha' dang nyin gyi mtha'/ /dang por gnyis ka 'dus byas na/ /sngags kyi dbyings phyug gar 'gro ba/ /de dang lhan cig dngos grub 'gro/ /phyed dam yang na nam

phyed na/ /rig ma'i dbyings su reg bya zhing / /myur bas khros pa'i sgra sgrogs pas/ /gyad kyi 'gyed pas brtsam par bya/ /bkye ba'i mjug tu de ma thag /'o ma mchog ni btung byas nas/ /de nas de ni rdo rje 'grub/ /zla gsang dkyil du 'gro bar byed/ /bya ba de bzhin bzlog

pa dang / /ci bde bsten pa byas pa las/ /byang chub sems ni 'char ma thag /'phrog ma yi ni dngos grub bo/ /'di yis rin chen gtsug nyid du/ /mi g.yeng mtshan mo byas gyur na/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub 'phrog byed de/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub nyid kyis thob/ /'di

yis snying gi zla gsang la/ /thig le nyid du brtag byas na/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /zla gsang thig le'i mchog 'drar 'gyur/ /'di yis reg pa tsam gyis kyang / /dngos grub gang dag 'thob byed de/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzi chen po/ /rgyal po 'di ni rnam par rgyu/ /

'di ni sgrub pa'i dus su yang / /rnam par rtog pa yong mi bya/ /rtag tu mi rtog 'gyur ba yis/ /nan tan gyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /sdug bsngal ba yi sems can la/ /sbyin pa bzhi ni rtag tu sbyin/ /de la bde ba sbyin byas te/ /mi snyan nam yang sbyin mi bya/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i

sems ma chen mo dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje kI li kI li shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa'o/ /thog ma o~M ste 'ja' chen mo/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes dang 'brel/ /'di ni 'dod chags thams cad la/ /'dod chags bde byed snyoms par 'thob/ /rol pa'i

sbyor bas bud med la/ /'di ni rtag tu mnyes par bya/ /'di yi 'gro ba gsum dag tu/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed/ /pad+ma kha che rgyas pa'i spyan/ /sngags mkhan de ni skad cig 'gyur/ /gtso bo yi ni bde mchog gis/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bya/ /sprod pa'i phyag rgya rgyas

btab ste/ /skad cig skad cig spyad par bya/ /dus dag tu ni reg pa dang / /gzhug pa yang ni rtag tu bya/ /bskyod dang mnye ba de bzhin du/ /mnyam du 'grogs pa'i cho ga bya/ /bskyed pa dang ni sbyang ba dang / /skad cig skad cig bsnyen par bya/ /gar dang kun nas bskor ba dang / /

'jib dang de bzhin btung ba dang / /the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dam tshig dang ni bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /mi g.yo tsher ni dngos grub ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dngos grub dang / /bskal par gnas pa smos ci dgos/ /'di ni

dngos grub 'thob ma thag /pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rjes 'gyur te/ /lag na pad+ma 'bar khyer bzhin/ /blo ldan mi g.yeng bskal par gnas/ /brjid pas dpal dgyes lhan cig tu/ /bde ldan zhing du 'gro 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor chen po der phyin nas/ /bde ldan gyi mchog gtso bo

yi/ /pad+mo'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /de ni bde bar gnas par 'gyur/ /bde ldan rtag tu 'grogs 'gyur ba/ /dngos grub ye shes bde myong 'gyur/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /pad+ma las skyes gzungs gzung ste/ /byin gyis brlabs nas bde myangs na/ /pad+ma

bde ba'i bdag por 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi bud med bdag nyid kyis/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /bsten byas 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid du/ /sngags mkhan 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /sdug cing la sogs brgyan pa yi/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer gsar byung bzhin/ /dri med yangs

pa'i lta ba yis/ /pad+ma sems dpa'i tshe 'grub po/ /ji tsam nam mkhar nye bar ni/ /dpa' bo chen po 'phur byed de/ /rig ma 'bum phrag brgya tshogs kyi/ /lha mo yis ni mchod pa byed/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas kun gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag nyid mchod/ /

'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe/ /'khor ba'i dri mas mi gos so/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /rtag tu nyon mongs dag 'gyur te/ /sman gyi phye ma sbyor ba yis/ /sbrul ni gsod par gyur pa bzhin/ /zla gsang thig le'i dga' byed 'di/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob 'gyur

te/ /'di yi mthu yi ngo bo yis/ /dgos pa thams cad dngos grub bo/ /gang 'dod dngos grub don yod pa/ /'khor ba 'di dang pha rol gyi/ /mthu chen phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis/ /dran pa tsam gyis de dngos 'grub/ /shin tu dgyes pa pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes

so// //dang por o~M dang yang dag ldan/ /tha mar bsgyings pa'i hU~M nyid de/ /dbus su rab dgyes rdo rje bzhag /yi ge 'di ni rmad byung ba'o/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /sdig pa skad cig med par 'gyur/ /khams gsum 'di ni dngos grub che/ /dpal gyi

bsgyings pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /bdud dang bdud las rjes 'jug pa/ /mi thogs par ni brgyal byed de/ /sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam sbyor bas/ /de yis khams gsum 'phrog par byed/ /bdag gi mthu yis rnam rgyal te/ /de yis khams gsum longs spyod do/ /phyag rgya

'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /pad+mo rdo rje rab ldan bya/ /phreng phyed phreng ba'i tshul gyis su/ /phreng ba bskums te 'dzin pa bzhin/ /'di yis byin gyis brlabs byas te/ /bsnyen na myur du dngos grub bo/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi smin bsgyur bas/ /chu skyes spyan ni sbyar byas te/ /phyag

rgyas btab ste rol byas na/ /bla ma'i dngos grub 'thob par byed/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor nye ba yis/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid mchod byed de/ /de dag kun gyis bskor byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bo yis/ /'jigs shing skrag las sbyin

byed pa/ /rang nyid kyi ni phyag rgya'i gzungs/ /nyid kyis dngos grub stobs par byed/ /gzhan ni yang dag pha rol phyin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgyan/ /de yang de la 'jigs skrag nas/ /rang gi dgyes mchog stobs par byed/ /bdag nyid chen po dmigs gsum

dang / /che ba'i pha ni ngo bzhi dang / /rdo rje 'dzin dang gtogs rnams dang / /rang gi sdug pa stobs par byed/ /gshin rje sha ka rgyal po dang / /rdo rje 'dzin de dngos grub la/ /'ongs nas bdag gi sdug pa rnams/ /srog gi phyir yang stobs par byed/ /gzhan gyi 'phrul gyi lus

kyi rnams/ /khams gsum lam la gnas pa dag /myur du nye bar 'ongs nas kyang / /bdag nyid dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /sna tshogs gnyen ni rgyal po che/ /dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs byed/ /de yang nyer 'ongs gtsug gtugs te/ /rnal 'byor sna tshogs ma sbyin byed/ /

gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs la sogs/ /sha za bu mo rnams/ /sbyor ldan phyag rgya blang byas te/ /brtag pa mchog gis brtag par bya/ /thams cad las byed dge ba yi/ /'di yis dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /lha dang klu yi bu mo dang / /

lha min lha yi mngal skyes pa/ /phyag rgya 'di yis byin brlabs na/ /grub pa myur du dngos grub po/ /gzugs bzang yang na ngan yang rung / /gang de bud med bzung byas pa/ /rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis su/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba brtag par bya/ /'di yis sangs rgyas

thams cad dang / /de bzhin dpa' bo kun nyid du/ /skad cig skad cig rgyas btab pas/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po sna tshogs dpe med pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// //nga ro bcu gsum steng nyid du/ /de bzhin thig le'i

rgyal po ste/ /rab dgyes rdo rje lta che bde/ /mtha' ni yi ge hi sbyar ba'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bde chen spyan ni dga' byed yin/ /phyag rgya'i yi ge 'di yis ni/ /mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs byas na/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /bla med 'phrul gyi spyan

du 'gyur/ /stong nyid ye shes gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas shin tu 'phra ba mthong / /smin ma rnam sgyur rgyas pa yis/ /lta ba'i phyag rgyas gar byed cing / /'gugs byed sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo rdo rje kun 'dzin dang / /pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang / /de

bzhin gzungs ma'i tshogs rnams dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dang / /phyi dang nang gi tshogs rnams dang / /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /lha min dngos grub lus kyi mchog /grul bum mi 'am sam/ /sha za 'phrul gyi mi bu mo/ /'di ni snying gar bzhag pa

yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin du bdag nyid 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas yang na nyi ma dang / /pad+mo dra ba sna tshogs blo/ /lha dang lha min mi dag dang / /gzhan yang gnod sbyin srin po dang / /bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyi/ /gzhan gyis 'phrog par yong mi nus/ /lha dang lha min gyis mchod

cing / /dngos grub khams gsum 'gro bar byed/ /lha dang lha min sten byed cing / /skad cig nyid du 'gro bar byed/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa'i yul/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing kun tu/ /rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang / /de ni rtsen zhing 'gro bar byed/ /'jigs med yan

lag kun spangs pa/ /thog ma tha ma med 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen sbyor bas/ /dgyes pa'i rmad mchog gcig tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i nang na rdo rjer 'gyur/ /rin chen nang na rin chen 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i nang na pad+mar 'gyur/ /sna tshogs nang na sna tshogs mchog /de la sogs pa mtha' yas

mchog /mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs pas/ /dam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur/ /gzugs mi sdug pa gzugs mchog 'gyur/ /mig med pa yang mig ldan 'gyur/ /rna 'on pa yang sgra thos te/ /glen pa yang ni yid rnor 'gyur/ /de

la sogs pa dpag med pa/ /mig gi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur/ /de yis lus la yon tan ni/ /yon tan dam pa mdangs cher 'gyur/ /ji tsam de ni nam mkha'i mthongs/ /'phur zhing 'og tu 'bab par byed/ /de ni ri yang phug nas 'gro/ /sa dang sa yi 'og tu ni/ /

sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnams byed pas/ /de ni skad cig 'gro bar byed/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sngags mkhan 'gying ba gar byed pa/ /bde ba chen po bskyed pa yis/ /sems can de ni 'jug par byed/ /mi g.yeng blta ba'i bsgyur ba yis/ /las rnams

thams cad de yis byed/ /'degs pa dang ni lta ba yis/ /gar dang rnam par bskor ba dang / /'gro ba thams cad 'bab byed de/ /ri dang sems can thams cad la/ /smra ba dang ni sgra 'byin dang / /ci dga' ba ni mngag par byed/ /gdug pa'i lta bas srog chags rnams/ /

rdeg pa dang ni sgrol bar byed/ /gtum dang gdug 'jigs che ba dang / /khro bo'i lta bas sgrol bar byed/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje spyan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes kyi mthu chen po'o// //dang po oM

gyis rnam par brgyan/ /tha mar 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa/ /rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i sku/ /bde ba skyed byed bshad pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo yi/ /gang gis 'di ni bsgoms ma thag /rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlob 'gyur/ /

bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung / /'di yis nyid kyi snying ga ru/ /bsgoms te gnyis med sbyor byas na/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rab tu 'grub/ /bsgrubs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bud med kun dang rtsen byed de/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /sems can dman

pa'ang dngos grub po/ /shin tu skal ldan thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas skal ldan 'thob 'gyur te/ /skal dang ldan pa thams cad kyis/ /chu skyes zhabs la bsnyen par byed/ /lha dang lha min bu mo de'i/ /rig mas mthong na dga' byed de/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes

brgyan pa yi/ /sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur/ /spyod dang mi spyod mi dag dang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /mi 'am ci dang skyes bu yi/ /dngos grub pas ni 'phrog mi nus/ /de la sogs pas stod byed de/ /'jigs par 'gyur ba'i sems kyis

ni/ /bla ma bzhin du mchod byed cing / /kun gyis bstod mchod bsti stang byed/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /nam mkha' mtha' klas lha rnams dang / /nyi ma bcu yi 'od zer bzhin/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'grub pa 'gro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing kun du/ /

'od kyis thams cad mnyes byed cing / /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /zil gyis mnan te gnas par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la/ /sras rnams 'dud cing phyag byed de/ /lha dang lha min grul bum dang / /tshangs pa gtogs 'dod lha

chen po/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs der/ /'jigs shing skrag pas 'ong bar byed/ /bcom ldan dngos grub bka' stsal stsol/ /ji ltar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin/ /spyi bos bka' blangs gdul dka' rnams/ /de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi/ /

mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi po yi/ /dam pa rnams kyang bskyang bar bgyi/ /zla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid kyi/ /dbang bskur ba yang blang bgyi ste/ /rigs lnga rnams kyi sdom pa nyid/ /rnam pa bzhi po thams cad blang / /chu skyes dngos grub khyod zhabs drung / /'tsho ba'i bar

du bdag cag 'bangs/ /khyed kyi spyan sngar zham ring du/ /ci bgyi zhes ni bka' nod do/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas gdab na/ /spyod bcas mi spyod dga' byed de/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog /shin tu bde dang mdza' ba myong / /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i sku chen mo

bde ba dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin to// //dang por o~M steng thig le ste/ /gzhan gyis mi phyed khros bcas pas/ /gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni/ /gsung gi rdo rje shin tu dgyes/ /bde gsang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu

ro ni myong byed pa/ /dam chos sgra yis gang byas pa'i/ /gsung gsal rna ba dga' bar byed/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya chen po 'di/ /byang chub chen por grub byed de/ /yon tan yon tan sdug mtho ba'i/ /tshad med yon tan 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal ldan phyag rgya 'dis btab na/ /

dpal kun bdag po de ma thag /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'thob/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bdag gam gzhan/ /rgyas btab 'dod pa spyad byas nas/ /dngos grub rmad du byung ba yi/ /de yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /

sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /sgrub pa po yi bka' nyan te/ /ci ste rmongs pas 'da' byed na/ /de yi srog ni tha ma yin/ /de yi bsrung ba byas na dpal/ /tshe dang lang tsho bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje gsung gis bstan pa bzhin/ /gdon mi za bar 'thob par

'gyur/ /phyag rgya ye shes rjes bsdus pas/ /sgrub pa mi byed cung zad med/ /bdag nyid thams cad sprul pa ni/ /mchog gi ye shes dngos grub 'gyur/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mi ldog dang / /chos dbyings mi mnyam rab

klas pa/ /dngos grub bdag nyid gshegs nas kyang / /shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /sems dpa' chen po de khrid do/ /rang gi ting 'dzin ldang ba'i tshe/ /dam tshig mchog tu bsrung bya ba/ /ji snyed nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du/ /'dod pa

thams cad de spyod de/ /rnal 'byor chen po mi 'da' zhing / /ngan song gsum yang mi 'gro byed/ /de ni cung zad 'og sdug bsngal/ /'gro ba thams cad myong mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum de rmad 'byung bas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags byed de/ /bag chags mtshams

sbyor rnam grol bas/ /nam mkha'i rim pas 'gro 'ong byed/ /lha yis rtag tu mchod byed de/ /mchod par byas pas shin tu mchod/ /sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'dug kyang / /bde byed kun gyis bdag nyid dge/ /gnas dang zas dang btung ba sogs/ /nam mkha' las

ni skad cig rnyed/ /bud med rin chen mchog mkha' las/ /bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /las kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa/ /de yis khams gsum 'thob par byed/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba dngos grub kyi/ /rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog par 'gyur/ /

'di las brtul zhugs drag pa med/ /dka' thub 'di dang 'dra med de/ /bud med mchog tu bde ba las/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod spyad pas 'grub/ /dge ba'i pad+mo'i rigs kun tu/ /sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang 'gyur/ /gzungs ma kun gyis bde chen po/ /

rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro/ /gsung thams cad kyi rdo rje dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos 'thob par byed pa khams gsum kun tu snang bar grags pa pad+ma'i rigs kyi tshogs zhal gyi gsung gis dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par

byed pa'o// //oM bcas mi phyed tha mar te/ /rab tu sems ni bde ba ste/ /rdo rje rab dgyes bde byed che/ /dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis dngos grub che/ /byang chub sems ni rab bsgrubs pa/ /'di yis byin gyis brlabs ma thag /bdud

rtsi'i mchog ni chud par 'gyur/ /thams cad 'dod pa ldan byas na/ /de ste thams cad sems kyang rung / /bde ba chen pos sems thams cad/ /sngags mkhan reg pa'i rgyas btab na/ /'di yis rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang / /rdo rje dpa' bo nyid du yang / /lha mo'i phyag rgyas byin

brlabs pa/ /skad cig tu ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /lha mo rnams dang gar byed cing / /de ni rab dgyes bdag po khrid/ /pho brang dga' byed rab dgyes che/ /rab tu chen po bde 'thob tu/ /seng ge'i gdan rab 'jog byed do/ /bzhi dang bzhi yi mchog nyid kyi/ /rdo rje pad+mo sbyor ba

yis/ /de ni khrid nas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdzogs sangs tshe dpag med/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che/ /yod dang med pa'i 'dod spangs pa/ /de la phyag ni byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems mchog 'jog byed de/ /rang gi spyod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /pha rol

phyin pa thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyis mdun du bskor/ /sa gsum thams cad kun tu ni/ /sems dpa' chen pos ston byed pa/ /res 'ga' shin tu dga' spyod pa/ /res 'ga' khab nas 'byung ba dang / /res 'ga' byang chub res 'ga' lhums/ /res

'ga' skye dang res 'ga' 'pho/ /res 'ga' spyod chen rol pa dang / /res 'ga' bdud las rgyal bar mdzad/ /res 'ga' byang chub mngon byang chub/ /res 'ga' 'khor lo skor mdzad de/ /res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug par mdzad/ /res 'ga' dus su shin tu mdzes/ /

res 'ga' bud med skyes pa dang / /res 'ga' lha dang skye dgu'i bdag /res 'ga' 'dod dbang rgyal po ste/ /res 'ga' 'dod la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /res 'ga' zhi la res 'ga' drag /res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas

pa/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pa/ /ci dgar dngos grub 'dod pa la/ /bdag gis ngo bor ston par byed/ /mi phyed cho ga sbyor ba yis/ /'dren pa mi phyed nye byas te/ /phan tshun reg pa chen po yis/ /rdo rje can gyis de 'bigs te/ /gzungs ma mang po tshogs kyi

rnams/ /bde byed chen po gzhan ci smos/ /spyod bcas mi spyod bde dam pa/ /'bad pa mi dgos thob par 'gyur/ /brjid pas byang chub snying po ru/ /rtag pa ru ni gnas 'gyur te/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /sbyor ba rjes sdud ldan pas

so/ /thams cad cha ni rnam bral ba/ /byang chub sems ni mchog bzhin de/ /yi ge 'dis ni sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen mo tshim pa'i yid las skyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad

grub par byed pa'o// //dang por oM ni sbyor ba ste/ /tha mar gnyis po rdza rnga'i sgra/ /rab dgyes rdo rje byin rlabs pa'i/ /lha mo dngar byed dbus su gzhag /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rab dgyes thob pa rmongs byed ma/ /rdo rje ye shes thugs gnas pa/ /dngos

grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /sngags mkhan yi ge phyag rgya 'dis/ /bdag gam gzhan la rgyas btab ste/ /rdo rje 'dam skyes bcug byas na/ /de nas de myur dngos grub bo/ /thams cad las byed dpal dang ldan/ /tshe dang lang tsho skal ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra 'thob

ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo yi/ /sangs rgyas kun dang rtsen byed cing / /sde dbang rnams dang lha rnams kyi/ /'phrul gyi bud med 'phrog byed do/ /rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa chen mo dngar byed kun tu myang ba me tog gi rgyal mtshan

dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba las thams cad byed pa chen mo gdon mi za ba'i gzhan gyis mi phyed ma'o// //tshangs pa'i gsung gi nga ror bcas/ /tha mar dril bu'i nga ro gnyis/ /dbus su ming gi phreng ba ste/ /yi ge

'di ni chu 'dzin mchog /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yid kyi dngos grub thob byed de/ /'dod pa yi ni thams cad rnams/ /yi ge skad cig 'grub par byed/ /'di yis rgyas btab bud med rnams/ /bdag dang rang gi slob ma'ang rung / /de nyid sbyor bas

bsten byas na/ /rdo rje 'dzin dpal 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag por ni/ /myur du mkha' la 'gro byed de/ /tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang chen dang / /lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur/ /lha mo'i tshogs dang rtsen byed cing / /lha mo kun gyi bdag por

'gyur/ /'phrog byed la sogs bdag po che/ /'jigs par byed dang rku byed pa/ /sems can kun gyi mchog dam pa/ /sems dpa' chen por de 'gyur ro/ /sdug pa'i tshogs kyi dbus su ni/ /brjid la sogs pa'i spyod pas 'gro/ /brjid che pad+mo chen mo la/ /thams

cad kun tu brjid pa yis/ /bde byed chen po myong byed de/ /rab tu dgyes pas sgeg pa bzhin/ /rab tu skal ldan mgrin 'khyud pas/ /rnal 'byor chen por de gnas te/ /'di ni snying la bris pa yis/ /ci 'dod par ni 'dod pa thob/ /phyag rgya chu skyes btab byas te/ /

de ltar byas na phyag rgya dgyes/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dri ma med pa'i mdog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste thams cad las byed pa dge ba'o// //dang po nyid du o~M bya ste/ /thig le'i rgyal pos nye bar brgyan/ /tsheg drag bcas pa 'dren pa

gnyis/ /ldan pa mtha' mar gzhag byas te/ /rdo rje rab dgyes brgyan byas pa/ /rdo rje ston ka dbus su bsam/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /ye shes snang ba rab sgrub pa/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /nyid kyi snying gar rgyas btab na/ /sangs rgyas

ye shes mchog byed pa/ /de yis ston ka ma dngos grub/ /sde dbang lhar bcas lha rnams dang / /gnod sbyin srin por bcas pa dang / /sbrul dang mi 'am ci gnas pa/ /thams cad 'di yi g.yog tu 'gyur/ /'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /sangs rgyas

mchog gi thugs ldan de 'gro ste/ /sna tshogs rab 'byung dpal gyis yang dag khyab/ /chos mchog dam pa byed pa gtong byed cing / /spyod bcas mi spyod 'jig rten snang byed de/ /sprin dang bral ba'i zla ba'i 'od mchog byed/ /mkha' dbyings rnam par bsgyings pas rab

dga' bas/ /A li kA li pad+mo bde mchog la/ /myong zhing mchog byas bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ /'di yis sdig pa 'phrog byed de/ /'di yis myur du dga' bar 'gyur/ /'dis ni bde ba'i ngo bo de/ /'di yis dngos grub grub par 'gyur/ /skye ba'i

sdug bsngal rgyab phyogs pa/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen mo ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'grub par byed pa'o// //dang po o~M dang yang dag ldan/ /tha

mar dgyes pa'i yi ge gnyis/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/ /dbus su gsal ba'i yi ge bsam/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro/ /sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni/ /sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo/ /sngags mkhan nyid kyis byin brlabs

pa/ /sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i yan lag kun spangs te/ /bsod nams kun gyi yan lag dge /kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grub ni/ /'di nyid kyis ni rab tu 'grub/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma'i bde chen gyis/ /sna tshogs chen po'i bskal par gnas/ /

rdo rje'i bdag nyid brgyan pa yi/ /bud med kun dang rtsen par 'gyur/ /de nas de yi chos dbyings gnas/ /dbang phyug mchog gi dngos grub bo/ /pad+ma'i mdun du thog ma'i lha/ /byas te rdo rje bsgrub par bya/ /mthe bong srin lag de phyung ste/ /kha yi nang du gzhag par bya/ /

chang bzhin myang bar byas na ni/ /mod la 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /bud med rnams dang rtsen par byed/ /blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /'di ni shin tu dgyes zhes bya/ /bsil ba dga' byed chen mo ste/ /sna tshogs 'di ni 'gro la

gnas/ /dang po oM ni gnas pa ste/ /tra ta dang ldan tha mar bya/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes che ho/ /sgeg mo dbus su bskul ba'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sgeg par bya ba sprul pa yin/ /'di dag mnyam par sbyor ba yis/ /sgeg mos ye shes bskyed par bya/ /

rdo rje blo ldan brtan po yis/ /bde bar 'dod pa'i pad+mar gzugs/ /'dod pas 'dod pa spyad par bya/ /myur du 'dod pas dngos grub bo/ /de nas rdo rje 'dod dpal te/ /bde byed thams cad nye bar sgrub/ /sems can kun gyis 'dod bskyed pa/ /bde ba chen por de 'gyur ro/ /

mthu yis pha rol phyin pa'i mchog /pad+mo'i tshul du sgeg pa yis/ /rdo rje sbyor thabs la gnas pas/ /rdo rje chen po de dngos grub/ /ci dga' 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis/ /rtag pa'i lam dang yang dag ldan/ /rtag pa'i chos kyis rjes mthun spyod/ /bsgrubs na brtag

pa rtogs par 'gyur/ /'di yis kun tu bzang zhes bya/ /de ni dngos po kun yin te/ /'dod pa med cing nyon mongs med/ /nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pa/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu brtag pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chen po de yi dngos/ /dpal ldan thog ma tha ma med/ /chos

rnams kun gyi rjes mthun pa'i/ /'dis ni dngos po thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas bdag por bdag nyid 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang / /'di la khyad par cung zad med/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bdag po'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa sgeg mo dpe med pa dang

ldan pa'i yi ge'i mchog gi sku'o// //dang po o~M bcas lha mo yi/ /tha mar tsheg drag mi phyed gnyis/ /de gnyis dbus kyi phyogs nyid du/ /he zhes bya ba rnam brgyan te/ /shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje che/ /bzhad pa nyid ni rab tu sbyar/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /nyid

kyi snying la rgyas btab na/ /phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam brgyan par/ /dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /yid kyis ji ltar bsams pa bzhin/ /de ni sangs rgyas yul du 'gro/ /de ni de phyir sangs rgyas mthong / /chu skyes de dang rtsen par byed/ /de nas 'dus pa dgyes 'gyur te/ /

sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bde ba che/ /dngos grub rnal 'byor de la sbyin/ /byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang / /bde ba chen po 'phrog pa yis/ /rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la/ /gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed/ /thabs bcas

shes rab chen po la/ /rgyal ba nyid kyis stobs byed de/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /bde ba chen po mgu bar byed/ /bde ba thabs kyi dngos grub rnams/ /sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /shin tu dngos grub mchog

tu brtag /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba'i phreng ba rgyas pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin pa'o// //o~M ni dang por gtsug tor bya/ /te de skad snyan tha mar te/ /dbus su he dga' zhes bya ba/ /bde chen dga'

ba rdo rje dbyangs/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes che yi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab dgyes 'brel/ /bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang / /dran pa yis kyang dngos grub ster/ /sdig pa kun las grol byed cing / /bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'gro/ /mi dge thams cad ma lus spong byed cing / /

sems ni phyag rgya'i yi ge brgyan te 'gro/ /'jig rten thams cad kun tu bkur sti byed/ /rig ma stong gis mngon par mchod byed cing / /rig 'dzin mu sman bud med rnams kyis ni/ /g.yag rnga dkar po'i tshogs kyis g.yob byed pa'i/ /'jig rten dbang po bde mchog 'brel

ba 'thob/ /blo ldan nam mkha' ngos ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /yid du 'ong ba'i spyan ni rgyas pa dang / /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bde bas 'bigs pa yis/ /mgul nas 'khyud pa'i rtsen pas rol par byed/ /pi wang gling bu ya

mtshan sgra snyan gyis/ /glu blangs dngos grub rgya che thob par byed/ /ji snyed yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni/ /'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba dag /bde ba'i sgra yis bskyed par rnam bsgyur ba'i/ /de dang mthun pa'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed/ /kha Ta ba da gar

dza'i dbyangs/ /glu ru blangs pas pad+ma gnas/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed/ /'di yis byin rlabs dag pa dang / /'di yis byin rlabs bde ba'i rnams/ /sbyor ba 'di yis sbyar ba yis/ /'dod byed thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen

po rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dbyangs dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// //de bzhin o~M ni dang por te/ /dbus su he dgyes bde ba che/ /rdo rje gar byed bde ba gnyis/ /'di ni thams cad bde byed de/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab

dgyes nyid/ /rnal 'byor yis ni rgyas btab na/ /bde dang ldan par byed cing 'gro/ /'og min gyi ni gnas chen du/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang thabs cig 'grogs/ /bde byed chen po'i dbang chen dang / /chos kyi rgyal po bde chen thob/ /ji snyed gar gyi gtsug lag las/ /

sgyur bar byed pa shad pa dang / /ji snyed de snyed phyag rgya'i rnams/ /gnyis min 'dus pas 'di dngos grub/ /kye ma'o dgyes pa bde byed che/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde chen po/ /kye ma'o 'dod pa 'dod chags che/ /kye ma'o sna tshogs bdag nyid che/ /de la sogs pa tshad med pa/ /'jig

rten gyi ni yo byad rnams/ /pad+mo gsal ba gar gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor gar byas dngos grub bo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'di/ /sna tshogs gar ni ston byed pas/ /myur du gar ni mang byas pas/ /gar gyi gtsug lag dngos grub bo/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i dpal

bde ba chen po dga' byed gar zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag rgya phan tshun bcu pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gsum pa'o// //bcu gsum yi ge dang po nyid/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje'i sku ni sna tshogs che/ /tha mar 'bar dang 'dra ba'i dza/ /nam mkhar zla skar 'dra ba yi/ /

phyag rgya'i ye shes rmad byung ba'i/ /'di yis thabs kyis mnyam gzhag ste/ /gzung ba gsal bar gzung ba yi/ /tsha ba'i gser gyis gzi brjid 'dzin/ /ye shes snying gar bsam par bya/ /nam mkha' nyi ma bum 'dra bar/ /de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs

rgyas thams cad nyid/ /shin tu rmad byung thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi bde 'brel pa/ /rdo rje blo mchog dngos grub bo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin dge yi/ /sna tshogs chen po thob 'gyur nas/ /'dod pa'i chos kyis mi gos blo/ /'dod pa chen po sten par byed/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sku dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o// //de bzhin o~M ni gzhag bya ste/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa

che/ /rdo rje'i sgra ni bde 'brel pa/ /tha mar khro bcas sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste/ /bar bcad pa yang thos par 'gyur/ /khams gsum ngo bo thams cad ni/ /sgra yi thos pa dngos grub bo/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la dngos

grub ste/ /bud med pad+mo ut+pal dang / /ma lus rgyal ba rnams dang rtsen/ /rdo rje pad+mar sbyar bas na/ /dga' byed myur du dngos grub bo/ /rab tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi sgra dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don gyis dpal thams cad grub

par byed ma'o// //o~M ni spyi gtsug thig ler babs/ /rab dgyes chen mo rdo rje can/ /rdo rje dri bder 'brel pa yi/ /tha mar gnas shes rab sbyar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs chen mo mdun du 'gro/ /sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni/ /sna tshogs

ye shes grub par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rdo rje brgyan pa yi/ /de ni mtshan ldan kun dang rtsen/ /de nas chos dbyings gnas pa des/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byas na/ /dbang phyug dam pa dngos grub 'gyur/ /'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /

blo ldan rab tu dgyes zhes bya/ /rdo rje'i dri dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// //o~M mchog gtsug tor rnams byas te/ /shin tu dgyes che dbus nyid du/ /rdo rje ro ni sbyor che ba/ /tha mar he ste thig le gnyis/ /'di yis rab tu dgyes par 'gyur/ /

dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang / /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba sna tshogs bdag /sangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yis/ /mchod pa mi zad byed par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas thams cad/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid thob bo/ /rab tu

dgyes pa'i dbang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po zla gsang thig le bshad pa'i rgyal po las/ chos kyi

'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad

nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gsang ba'i gzungs dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang bcas pa rnams
